T08TD4104.1E:83b-24: rin thang so sor bskur ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:83b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcu phrag gsum gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:83b-26: sdom la zhes bya ba'i dgos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:83b-27: tshig gi don ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:83b-29: spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos bcu bstan te /
T08TD4104.1E:83b-38: so so nas slong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:83b-41: spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos bcu ston la /
T08TD4104.1E:83b-42: bcu pa gsum pas kyang bcu ston te /
T08TD4104.1E:83b-43: spyir spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:83b-44: tshe dang ldan pa dag spang ba'i 'du byed kyi chos sum cu po 'di dag zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa las 'byung ngo zhes bya bas ni /
T08TD4104.1E:83b-45: spang ba'i ltung byed gdon pa'i lus dbog pa bstan to //
T08TD4104.1E:83b-46: spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:83b-47: dge slong gi yo byad spang bar 'gyur na de sems kyis spangs shing /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-0: zhag gcig yan chad bdag nyid dang bral bar byas nas ltung ba @84a * //
T08TD4104.1E:84a-1: bshags par bya dgos pas spang ba'i ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:84a-2: de nyid kha na ma tho ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas chos zhes bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:84a-3: sum bcu po'i 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni bcu pa dang po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-5: gsum pa las 'byung ba dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:84a-6: zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa las 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni zla ba phyed phyed cing gso sbyong 'don pa'i tshe 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i kha ton las 'byung ngo zhes bstan pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:84a-7: 'chang ba'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyam yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-9: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:84a-10: de'i tshe na dge slong rnams chos gos mngas ches pa'i yan lag gis lung mnod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-15: nang gis sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed nas dge slong don nyung du dag smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-17: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-18: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:84a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-20: dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na zhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag pa rung bar ma byas pa bcang bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:84a-21: de las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-23: gang zag ni dge slong rab tu mang po //
T08TD4104.1E:84a-24: nyon mongs pa ni zang zing la 'du ba /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-25: nyes pa ni bya ba shor ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:84a-26: de la dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:84a-27: chos gos zin zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-28: dge slong gis chos gos bkru ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-32: sra brkyang phyung na zhes bya ba la sra brkyang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-34: phyi mar gnas par khas blangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-36: dge slong thams cad kyi dbyar gyi rnyed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-37: phan yon gyi gtan pa bca' ba'i chos gos gtan pa lta bu byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:84a-38: phyung na zhes bya ba la sra brkyang dbyung ba'i dus ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:84a-39: dbyar snga mar gnas par khas blangs pas ston zla 'bring po nya la dgag dbye byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-0: tshes bcu drug la sra brkyang bting na ni de dbyung @84b ba'i dus dpyid zla ra ba nya la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:84b-1: dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs pas ston zla tha chungs nya la dgag dbye byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-2: tshes bcu drug la sra brkyang bting na ni /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-3: dbyung ba'i dus dpyid zla 'bring po nya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:84b-4: zhag bcu'i bar du zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo bcu'i mthar ro //
T08TD4104.1E:84b-5: gos lhag pa zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab par bya ba las lhag pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:84b-6: rung bar ma byas pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-8: bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:84b-9: de las 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar 'chang ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:84b-10: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-11: dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-12: des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:84b-13: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-14: dge slong gos rang gi 'khor gsum khebs pa'i mtha'i tshad dang ldan pa yod la byin gyis ma brlabs par zhag bcur rjes su zhugs pa nyid yin na /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-15: zhag bcu gcig ba'i skya rengs dang po shar na 'chang ba'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:84b-16: 'di'i byed pa po ni rang gi gos dang byin gyis ma brlabs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:84b-17: 'di la yan lag bdun gyis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-20: 'khor gsum khebs pa'i mtha' tshad dang /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-22: byin gyis ma brlabs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-23: zhag bcur rjes su zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-24: zhag bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:84b-25: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:84b-26: 'chang ba'i spang ba ste dang po'o /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-28: // /'bral ba'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-30: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:84b-31: de'i tshe na dge slong rnams chos gos mngas ches pa'i rkyen gyis chos gos kyi gtur bu'i bam po gzhan la 'doms shing /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-32: bdag nyid chos gos stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'dod zhing lus ma sbas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-33: sped du ma bcug par gyur la /
T08TD4104.1E:84b-34: dge slong gzhan dag kyang de'i sba brtul dang byi dor gyi las kyis lung nod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-3: nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-4: dge slong don nyung du dag smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-6: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-7: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:85a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-9: gal te nub gcig kyang chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-10: mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-11: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-13: gang zag ni dge slong rab tu mang po //
T08TD4104.1E:85a-14: nyon mongs pa ni chos gos stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyu ba /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-15: nyes pa ni rang gi lus ma sbas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-16: gzhan gyi bya ba shor ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:85a-17: de la dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:85a-18: nub gcig kyang zhes bya ba ni nub gcig gi mthar yang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:85a-19: chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-22: mthang gos las gang yang rung ba dang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:85a-23: mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-24: gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:85a-25: dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis gnang ba bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:85a-26: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-27: dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:85a-28: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-29: gnang ba ma thob pas chos gos byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-30: gnas nyen kor dang bcas pa nas zhag gcig bral na /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-31: 'bral ba'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:85a-32: 'di'i byed pa po ni byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-34: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhir 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-35: gnang ba ma thob pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:85a-38: gnas nyen kor dang bcas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-1: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-2: 'bral ba'i spang ba ste gnyis pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-4: // /'jog pa'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-6: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-7: de'i tshe dge slong rnams gos ha cang mang ba nyid kyi rkyen gyis gos sngon po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-11: srab mo dag rnyed na des de byed du mi 'jug par gang gi tshe 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe chos gos byed du gzhug go snyam du re bas de 'jog par byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-12: dge slong don nyung du dag smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-13: phyar ka gtong bar byed kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-14: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-16: dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung nas dus ma yin pa'i gos shig rnyed la /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-17: 'dod na dge slong des gos de blang par bya /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-18: blangs nas gal te langs na myur ba kho nas gos su byas te bcang bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-19: gal te mi langs la kha ma langs pa kha skong ba'i gos la re ba yod na dge slong des gos de zla ba gcig gi mthar gzhag par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-20: de las 'das par 'jog na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-22: gang zag ni dge slong rab tu mang po //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-23: nyon mongs pa ni zang zing la gdu ba /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-24: nyes pa ni gos kyi kha sogs 'jog pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-25: de la dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-26: dus ma yin pa'i gos shig ces bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-27: dge slong gi gos kyi dus ni gang yin dus ma yin pa ni gang yin zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-28: sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas na ni /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-29: ston zal 'bring po nya nas dpyid zla ra ba nya'i bar gyi zla ba de dag ni gos kyi dus yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:85b-30: de phan chad du ni dus ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-31: sra brkyang ma bting ba'i gnas na ni thams cad dus ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-32: rnyed la zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-33: 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-34: dge slong des gos de blang bar bya zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:85b-35: gal te langs na zhes bya ba ni gal te chog na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86a-0: chos gos su byas te bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni mi brkyang @86a * //
T08TD4104.1E:86a-1: ba kho nar byin gyis brlab tu rung bar byas te'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86a-2: gal te zhes bya ba ni gal te mi cho ga na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86a-3: kha ma langs pa kha skong ba'i zhes bya ba ni snam sbyar ram /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-5: mthang gos kha ma langs pa kha skong ba'i 'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86a-6: gos la re ba yod na zhes bya ba ni dge slong la /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-7: mas bdag la gos sbyin pa'i re ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-12: mkhan pos bdag la gos sbyin pa'i re ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-13: lo lnga'i dus ston gyi tshe 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-14: lo drug gi dus ston gyi tshe'am /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-15: gtsug phud 'breg pa'i dus ston gyi tshe'am /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-16: gnas khang gi dus ston gyi tshe'am /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-17: dus ston chen po'i tshe rnyed du re ba yod na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86a-18: dge slong des gos de zla ba gcig gi mthar gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni zla ba gcig gi mtha' tshun chad du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86a-19: de las 'das par 'jog na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-21: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-22: dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-23: des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:86a-24: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par bzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-25: dge slong gos kha bskang ba la re ba yod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-26: byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i chos gos gsum med pa'i gos chung ba khru gang yan chad pa zhag sum cu 'das par 'jog na /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-27: 'jog pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:86a-29: gos kha bskang ba la re ba yod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-30: byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i chos gos gsum med pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86a-31: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-32: gos kha bskang ba la re ba yod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-33: byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i chos gos gsum med pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-35: tshad khru gang yan chad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-37: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:86a-38: 'jog pa'i spang ba ste gsum pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-40: // /'khrur 'jug pa'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-41: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:86a-42: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:86a-44: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas sngon gyi chung ma dge slong ma sbed ma rang gi gnas su 'ongs pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-4: dga' mgur spyad pa dran te /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-5: kun du chags par gyur nas brtsal bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-6: sbed ma bros pa'i phyi bzhin bsnyags pa de'i tshe de la brla'i reg pas khu ba byung nas /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-7: sham thabs ma rung bar gyur pa /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-8: sbed mas blangs te bkru bar brtsams pa'i tshe sbed ma de kun tu chags par gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-9: khu ba de rang gi mngal gyi sgor blugs pa las /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-10: bu gzhon nu zhes bya ba chags par gyur pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-11: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:86b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-13: dge slong rnams kyi nyes dmigs gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug pa las gyur pa yin no snyam nas snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-14: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jud dam /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-15: 'tshed du 'jug gam 'chag tu 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-19: nyes pa ni dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86b-20: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-21: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86b-22: dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86b-23: nye du ma yin pa la zhes pa ni phyi mo dang mes po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-24: phrugs la brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-25: de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:86b-26: gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-27: sha na'i gos dang zar ma'i gos dang /
T08TD4104.1E:86b-31: nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86b-32: rnying pa zhes bya ba ni dus tshigs gsum po dag las dus tshigs gang yang rung bar spyad pa gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86b-34: tha na chur snyug par byed du 'jug na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86b-35: 'tshed du 'jug gam zhes bya ba ni tha na tshon du snyug par byed du 'jug na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86b-36: 'chag tu 'jug na zhes bya ba ni tha na thal mos brdebs pa byed du 'jug na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:86b-37: spang pa'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:87a-0: @87a * // de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-1: dge slong gis byin gyis brlabs pa rang gi rnying pa 'khrur gzhug par 'os pa /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-3: gding ba dag las 'ga' zhig dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la bsgo bas /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-5: 'chag tu bcug pa dag byas pa nyid na 'khrur 'jug pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:87a-7: gos dang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa'i yul la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:87a-8: 'di la yan lag brgyad kyis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-14: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-17: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:87a-18: 'khrur 'jug pa'i spang ba ste bzhi pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-21: // / len pa'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-23: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:87a-24: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-25: dge slong ma rnams kyis dgon par gnas pa ma bkag pa de'i tshe na dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog 'khor lnga brgya dang /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-26: nags mun pa can du 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-27: chom rkun pa g-yon can lnga brgya tsam gyis ras yug chen po la 'os pa gcig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-28: bsod snyoms kyi phud gcig phul ba dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog gis /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-29: rgyal byed kyi tshal du bsod snyoms kyi phud ni dge slong rnams la phul /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-30: ras yug chen po ni nye dga' la phul nas /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song bas autpa la'i mdog gi chos gos ngan cing /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-32: snam sbyar kyang rnyings par gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-33: kun dga' bo la ji ltar gyur pa rmas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-35: btsun pa sring mo 'di ni dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can lags te /
T08TD4104.1E:87a-38: dge slong yid du 'thad pa dag la ma phul ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-0: yongs su mi gtong @87b ba ci yang ma mchis pas 'dis deng ras yug chen po rnyed nas de yang nye dga' la stsal te /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-2: dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog la gtsug lag khang chen po nas /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-3: chos gos lnga stsal bar gtad de /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-4: dge slong dag dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las gos lhag pa len par dgongs nas snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-5: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las gos len na brjes pa ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-8: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-9: nyes pa ni dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las gos len pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:87b-10: de la dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni nye dga' 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-11: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:87b-12: dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:87b-13: nye du ma yin pa las zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang mes po dang phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:87b-14: gos zhes bya ba ni gos bdun po bal gos dang /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-20: nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:87b-21: len na zhes bya ba ni bdag gir byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:87b-22: brjes pa ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-24: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:87b-25: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-26: dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la der 'du shes pas gos dag gi rnam par rig byed kyis len na lag tu 'ongs pa las /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-27: lta ba'i nyen 'khor du gyur pa na len pa'i spong ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:87b-29: yang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa'i yul la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:87b-30: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-31: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-33: ngag gi rnam par rig byed dang /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-35: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:87b-36: len pa'i spang bas te lnga pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-38: // / slong ba'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:87b-39: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-0: @88a * // rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:88a-1: mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa de la /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-2: rang gi chung mas ras zung bzang po cig byin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-3: khyim bdag de dad pa dang ldan zhing dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-7: nan gyis de'i bla gos blangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-8: dor thung gyon te phyir bstan nas smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-10: kha zer bar byed pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-11: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag khyim bdag gam /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-13: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa las /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-14: gos slong ba dgag par dgongs nas snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-15: yang dge slong gang khyim bdag gam /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-16: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-17: gos slong na dus ma gtogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-19: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-24: gos chus khyer na de la de ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-27: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-28: nyes pa ni khyim bdag gam /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-29: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa las gos blang ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88a-30: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni nye dga' 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-31: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88a-32: khyim bdag gam zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88a-33: khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni bud med do //
T08TD4104.1E:88a-34: nye du ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-37: phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:88a-38: de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:88a-39: gan du song ste zhes bya ba ni drung du song ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88a-47: nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88a-48: slong na zhes bya ba ni slong mo byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88b-0: dus ma gtogs te @88b zhes bya ba ni dus gzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88b-1: spong ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88b-2: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-3: dge slong gos phrogs sam zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-4: dge slong gi gos dag chom rkun pa dag gam g-yon can dag gis phrogs par gyur pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88b-5: gos brlag gam zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-6: dge slong gi gos dag brlag par gyur pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-8: gos tshig gam zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-9: dge slong gi gos dag mes tshig par gyur pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88b-10: gos rlung gis khyer ram zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste dge slong gi gos dag rlung gis khyer bar gyur pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88b-11: gos chus khyer na zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-12: dge slong gi gos dag chus khyer bar gyur na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88b-13: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i gzhi de la de ni gnang ba'i dus yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88b-14: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-15: dge slong gos phrogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-16: brlag pa dang tshig pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-18: chus khyer bar ma gyur ba slong bar mi rigs pas mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-19: khyim par gyur pa srog dang ldan pa nye du ma yin pa las /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-20: gos rung ba tshad dang ldan pa las mi chung ba /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-21: rin thang dang kha dog dang khru tshad las rnam pa gang bslangs pa de nyid thob na /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-22: slong ba'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:88b-23: 'di'i byed pa po na mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa gyur pa /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-24: srog dang ldan pa nye du ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:88b-25: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-30: chus khyer bar ma gyur par slong bar mi rigs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-31: sbyin bdag mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pa srog dang ldan pa nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-32: gos rung ba dang tshad dang ldan pa las mi chung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-33: rin thang dang kha dog dang /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-34: khru tshad las rnam pa gang bslangs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:88b-36: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:89a-1: ba'i spang ba ste drug pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-3: // / slong bar rig pa'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:89a-5: nye dga' la blo skyes pa /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-7: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis bsdams /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-8: phyin chad gang nas kyang bca' ba'i rin tsam yang bslang bar mi nus na /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-9: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa la brten nas bslab pa'i gzhi bag yangs su mdzad pa yod pas bdag gis de dag sngon du btang ste /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-10: rnyed pa bsgrub par bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-11: des grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dge khrid de /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-14: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi pho brang dang /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-15: btsun mo rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-16: btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-17: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-18: btsun mo 'khor gyi zhal ta ba drang srong byin dang /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-20: dge bsnyen ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-21: dge bsnyen ma khyim bdag gi chung ma legs skyes kyi khyim dag nas gos mang po bslangs te /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-22: drug sde 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis bsnams nas /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-23: grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag la /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-24: rnyang rnying nyung shas zhig byin te btang pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-25: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:89a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gos slong bar rigs pas kyang /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-27: stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa'i mthar thug pa las lhag pa len pa dgag par dgongs nas snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:89a-32: gos chus khyer na khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song la gos bslang bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-0: gal te de na bram ze'am khyim bdag dad pa zhig gis dus kyis gos mang po stobs @89b par 'dod na dge slong des de las stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa'i mthar thug par blang bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-1: de las lhag par len na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad do //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-3: gang zag ni grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu dang drug sde rnams /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-4: nyon mongs pa ni ma brtags par spyod pa dang 'dod zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-5: nyes pa ni len pa'i drod mi shes pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-6: de la dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-7: gos phrogs sam zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-8: dge slong gi gos dag chom rkun pa dag gam /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-9: g-yon can dag gis phrogs par gyur pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-10: gos brlag gam zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-11: dge slong gi gos brlag par gyur pa'am 'khyams par gyur pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-12: gos tshig gam zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-13: dge slong gi gos dag mes tshig par gyur pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-14: gos rlung gis khyer ram zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-15: dge slong gi gos dag rlung gis khyer bar gyur pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-16: gos chus khyer na zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-17: dge slong gi gos dag chus khyer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-18: khyim bdag gam zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-19: khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-21: nye du ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-22: phyi mo dang mes po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-23: phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-24: de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-25: gan du song la zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-27: gso zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-28: sha na'i gos dang zar ma'i gos dang /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-32: nye 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o /
T08TD4104.1E:89b-33: bslang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni slong mo bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-34: gal te de la bram ze'am khyim bdag dad pa zhig gis dus kyis gos mang po stobs la zhes bya ba ni 'bul ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-35: 'dod na zhes bya ba ni don du gnyer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:89b-36: dge slong des de las gos stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa'i mthar thug pa blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa ni gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-1: smad g-yogs dang bcas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-2: khyim pa'i stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:90a-3: dge slong gi stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-4: sar pa las snam sbyar nyi rim dang /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-5: ras yug phran khru lnga pa dang do pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:90a-6: khyim pa'i stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-7: ras yug chen khru bcu gnyis dang /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-8: ras yug phran khru bdun pa dang do pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:90a-9: de las lhag par len na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-11: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spang nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-12: des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:90a-13: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-14: dge slong gos phrogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-18: chus khyer ba slong bar rigs pas mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-21: nye du ma yin pa las /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-22: stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-23: rung ba tshad las mi chung ba phrugs gcig las lhag par len na /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-24: slong bar rigs pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:90a-25: 'di'i byed pa po yang mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pa srog dang ldan pa nye du ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:90a-26: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-27: dge slong gos phrogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-31: chus khyer bar gyur pa slong bar rigs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-32: sbyin bdag mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pa /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-33: srog dang ldan pa nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-34: stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-35: rung ba tshad dang ldan pa las mi chung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-36: stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa phrugs gcig gi mthar thug pa las lhag pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-38: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:90a-39: slong par rigs pa'i spang ba ste bdun pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:90a-41: // spags pa slong ba'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal @90b mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:90b-1: mnyan yod na khyim bdag gza' bran gnyis shig 'dod pa la log par spyod pas /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-2: bu mo mngag gzhug ma zhig yod pa rtag tu brdegs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-3: nye dags de tshor nas khyim bdag gzha' bran gnyis ci nas kyang skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-4: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par gyur pa de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod cing /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-5: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i bsngags pa ma yin pa yang brjod nas /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-6: des de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:90b-7: de phyin chad de gnyis bu mo de la yang mi rdeg cing nye dga' la yang ras yug chen po gcig dbul par glengs pa bu mo de thos nas nye dga' la sbran pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-8: nye dga' der 'ongs te ras yug chen pa bdas nas phul pa dang des ma mgu ste /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-9: tshong 'dus nas ras yug chen bzang po nyos te dbul du bcug pa'i rin dus su ma 'khor nas /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-10: bu lon pas khyim bdag bzung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-11: nyi ma la btags nas smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-13: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-14: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:90b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spags pa slong ba dgag par dgongs nas snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-16: dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas gos kyi rin dag spags nas /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-17: bdag gis gos rin 'di dag gis gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la /
T08TD4104.1E:90b-18: dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs dang /

T08TD4104.1E:91a-14: spags nas zhes bya ba ni sta gon byas nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:91a-15: bdag gis gos kyi rin 'di dag gis zhes bya ba ni gser ram dngul la sogs pa gang dag spags pa dag gis so //
T08TD4104.1E:91a-16: gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig ces bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /
T08TD4104.1E:91a-22: nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:91a-23: nyos la zhes bya ba ni nyos te'o //
T08TD4104.1E:91a-24: dge slong 'di dang 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs dang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:91a-25: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:91a-26: de la gos rung ba dus su bskon no snyam pa las zhes bya ba ni longs spyod par bzod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:91a-27: de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par zhes bya ba ni sngar mgron du ma bos par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:91a-28: rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung ste zhes bya ba ni bsnyen bkur byed pa 'ga' zhig byung ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:91a-29: bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:91a-30: rab dang mchog 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T08TD4104.1E:91a-31: khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa de'i gan du song nas zhes bya ba ni drung du song nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:91a-32: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pas bdag gi phyir gos kyi rin gang dag spags pa'i /
T08TD4104.1E:91a-33: gos kyi rin de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la zhes bya ba ni gcig nyos te'o //
T08TD4104.1E:91a-34: bdag la gos rung ba dus su legs par bskon cig ces smras te zhes bya ba ni spags pa slod pa'i tshig de skad ces smras te'o //
T08TD4104.1E:91a-35: gos grub na zhes bya ba ni gos thob na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:91b-0: spang @91b pa'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:91b-1: de la spags pa slong ba'i spong ba 'di ni /
T08TD4104.1E:91b-2: sngar slong ba'i spang pa bshad pa'i rab tu dbye bar gyur pa yin pas mtshan nyid gzhan thams cad ni sngar slong ba spang ba'i skabs su bstan pa kho na bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:91b-3: bye brag tu na sbyin bdag gang yang rung bas spags kyang rung ma spags kyang rung ba dge slong gis mi shes pa slong ba ni slong ba'i spang ba sngar bstan pa'i yul yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:91b-4: sbyin bdag spungs chung dus spyi la spags pa dge slong la ma phul ba dge slong des shes pa slong ba ni sbags pa slong ba'i spang ba'i 'di'i yul yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:91b-5: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:91b-6: dge slong gos phrogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:91b-7: brlag pa dang tshig pa dang /

T08TD4104.1E:91b-13: 'di'i byed pa po yang mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pa /

T08TD4104.1E:91b-16: dge slong gos phrogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:91b-20: chus khyer bar ma gyur pa slong bar mi rigs ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:91b-21: sbyin bdag mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pa /
T08TD4104.1E:91b-22: srog dang ldan pa nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:91b-23: gos rung ba tshad dang ldan pa las mi chung ba spags pa ma phul bar shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:91b-24: rin thang dang kha dog dang khru tshad las spags pa ma phul bar shes par pa rnam pa gang bslangs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:91b-26: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:91b-27: spags pa slong ba'i spang ba ste brgyad pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:91b-29: // / so so nas spags pa slong ba'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:91b-30: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-1: byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:92a-2: mnyan yod na khyim bdag gza' bran gnyis shig 'dod pa la log par spyod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-3: bu mo mngag gzhug ma zhig yod pa rtag tu brdegs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-4: nye dags de tshor nas khyim bdag gza' bran gnyis ci nas skyang skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-5: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod cing /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-6: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i bsngags pa ma yin pa yang brjod nas /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-7: des de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-8: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:92a-9: de phyin chad de gnyis bu mo de la yang mi rdeg cing /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-10: nye dga' la yang so so nas ras yug chen re re dbul bar glengs pa bu mo des thos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-11: nye dga' la sbran pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-13: so so nas ras yug chen re re dbul bar byas pa bdas pa phul ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-14: des ma mgu ste tshong 'dus nas so so nas ras yug chen bzang po re re nyos te 'bul du bcug pa'i rin dus su ma 'khor nas /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-15: bu lon pas khyim bdag de bzung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-16: nyi ma la btags nas smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-18: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-19: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:92a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis so so nas spags pa slong ba dgag par dgongs nas snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:92a-21: dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag dang khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas gos kyi rin so so ba dag spags nas /

T08TD4104.1E:92a-23: dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs dang bdag cag gnyis kyis so so nas /

T08TD4104.1E:92b-0: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gi phyir @92b gos kyi rin so so ba gang dag spags pa'i gos kyi rin so so ba de dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:92b-1: tshe dang ldan pa dag gos 'di dang 'di lta bu so so ba dag nyos la gnyi ga 'dus te /

T08TD4104.1E:92b-8: de la dge slong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni /

T08TD4104.1E:92b-12: khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni bud med do //

T08TD4104.1E:92b-28: so so ba dag ces bya ba ni tha dad pa'o //

T08TD4104.1E:92b-33: de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:92b-34: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //

T08TD4104.1E:92b-36: bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rab dang mchog 'dod pa'i phyir ro //

T08TD4104.1E:93a-11: bye brag tu na sbyin bar byed pa'i spungs kyi bye brag las ltung ba tha dad par rnam par gzhag par bya ste /
