T08TD4104.1E:93a-13: 'dir so so nas spags pa slong ba'i spang ba ni sbyin par byed pa khyim bdag dang khyim bdag gi chung ma gnyi gas so so nas gos kyi rin spags pa spungs chen po'i bye brag las rnam par gzhag ste /
T08TD4104.1E:93a-14: de ltar na slong ba'i spang ba dag /
T08TD4104.1E:93a-15: spags pa slong ba'i spang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:93a-16: so so nas spags pa slong ba'i spang ba la bye brag 'di yod de sbyin bdag gang yang rung bas spags kyang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:93a-17: ma spags kyang rung ba de dge slong gis mi shes pa slong ba ni slong ba'i yul yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:93a-18: sbyin bdag spungs chung ngus spyi la spags pa dge slong la ma phul ba dge slong des shes pa slong ba ni spags pa slong ba'i spang ba'i yul yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:93a-19: sbyin bdag sbungs chen pos so so nas spags pa dge slong la ma phul ba dge slong des shes pa slong ba ni so so nas spags pa slang ba'i spang ba'i yul yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:93a-20: de la 'dir ni dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:93a-21: dge slong gos phrogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-0: chus khyer bar ma gyur pa slong @93b bar mi rigs pas sbyin par byed pa sbungs che ba mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-1: khyim par gyur pa srog dang ldan pa nye du ma yin pa las /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-2: gos rung ba tshad dang ldan pa las mi chung ba so so nas spags pa ma phul bar shes pa dag rin thang dang /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-3: kha dog dang khru tshad las rnam pa gang dag bslangs pa de dag nyid thob na /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-4: so so nas spags pa slong ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:93b-5: 'di'i byed pa po ni sbyin par byed pa sbungs che ba mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pa srog dang ldan pa nye du ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:93b-6: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-7: dge slong gos phrogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-11: chus khyer bar ma gyur pa slong bar mi rigs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-12: sbyin bdag sbungs che ba mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pa /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-13: srog dang ldan pa nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-14: gos rung ba tshad dang ldan pa las mi chung ba /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-15: so so nas spags pa ma phul bar shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-18: khru tshad las so so nas spags pa ma phul bar shes pa rnam pa gang bslangs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-20: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:93b-21: so so nas spags pa slong ba'i spang ba ste dgu ba'o /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-23: // / bskul ba'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-25: 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:93b-26: nye dga' la blo skyes pa /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-27: 'di dag thams cad mgon med zas sbyin gyis bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis bsdam pa byas pas phyin chad ras yug phran sgre bo yang su la yang bslang bar mi nus kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-28: 'di na bdag dang lhan cig yi ge grva na yig 'bru'i yi ge dag slob slob pa bram ze dbyar tshul yod kyis de'i gan du song ste bltas na /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-29: de las cung zad thob po snyam nas de'i khyim du song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:93b-30: bram ze dbyar tshul gyis nye dga' dbyar gnas pa la k'arsh'a pa na drug cu dbul bar khas blangs so //
T08TD4104.1E:93b-31: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs par chas nas nye dga' bram ze dbyar tshul gyi gan du song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-1: dbyar tshul gyis nye dga' gang dang gang du gnas par /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-2: k'arsh'a pa na drug cu bskur bar byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-3: nye dga' yang bcom ldan 'das kos la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs pa'i zham 'bring du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du byon nas /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-5: mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na gzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:94a-6: de'i tshe na bram ze dbyar tshul gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-7: mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rgyal po'i khab tu tshong la 'ongs pa'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-8: mnyan yod du 'gro ba zhig la /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-9: k'arsh'a pa na drug cu bskur te /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-10: nye dga' la phul cig ces bsgo'o //
T08TD4104.1E:94a-11: de nas tshong pa des de khyer te /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-12: mnyan yod du nye dga' la phul nas /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-13: nye dags de srang nas gtsug lag khang du khyer ba'i khye'u dag brnyas te /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-14: mthar gyis spos 'tshong gi khye'u dad pa can zhig gi khyim du gtams te bzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:94a-15: phyi de nang par nye dga' de len du 'ongs nas tshong pa rnams kyis kyang bdag cag las gang nang par sngar mi 'du bar nyi ma shar na 'ong ba de k'arsh'a pa na drug cus bcad pa'i khrims su bya ba bcas te /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-16: de nas nye dags spos 'tshong gi khye'u de la gtams pa'i k'arsh'a pa na drug cu bdas te /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-18: nye dga' la de 'bul ba'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-19: nye dags rgya lta ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyis brgyangs pa na nyi ma shar bar gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-20: spos 'tshong gi khye'u de tshogs kyi nang du 'du 'phyis pas /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-21: k'arsh'a pa na drug cus bcad nas de smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-22: phyar ka gtong bar byed kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-23: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to ;
T08TD4104.1E:94a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor dad dang mi mdzes pa dgag par dgongs nas snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-25: dge slong gi phyir rgyal po 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-34: ded dpon gyi pho nya'i lag tu gos kyi rin dag bskur bar gyur la /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-35: de nas pho nya de gos kyi rin de dag khyer nas dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:94a-36: dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa mkhyen par mdzod cig /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-7: ded dpon che ge mos gos kyi rin 'di dag bskur gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-8: 'phags pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di dag bzhes shig ces zer na /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-9: dge slong des pho nya de la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa pho nya dge slong dag ni gos kyi rin dag len du mi rung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-10: bdag cag gos rung ba dus su rnyed na ni len to zhes brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:94b-11: gal te pho nya de dge slong de la 'di skad ces /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-12: 'phags pa rnams kyis zhal ta bgyid pa 'phags pa rnams kyis zhal ta nyams su len pa gang lags pa 'ga' mchis sam zhes zer na /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-13: dge slong gos 'dod pas pho nya 'di ni /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-14: dge slong rnams kyi zhal ta byed pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-15: 'di ni dge slong rnams kyi zhal ta nyams su len ba'o zhes kun dga' ra ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-16: dge bsnyen zhal ta byed pa bstan par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:94b-17: de nas pho nya des gos kyi rin de dag khyer nas zhal ta byed pa ga la ba der 'gro bar bya zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-18: phyin nas zhal ta byed pa de la 'di skad ces /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-19: tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa shes par gyis shig /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-20: khyod kyis gos kyi rin 'di dag gis gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-21: dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs dang /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-22: de la gos rung ba dus su bskon cig ces brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:94b-23: de nas pho nya de zhal ta byed pa de la shin tu legs par yang dag par bsgo zhing yang dag par bstan nas /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-24: dge slong ga la ba der 'gro bar bya zhing phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-25: dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pas zhal ta bgyid pa bstan pa gang lags pa de las bdag gis yang dag par bstan lags kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-26: de'i gan du bzhud cig dang des khyed la gos rung ba dus su bskon par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:94b-27: dge slong gos 'dod pas zhal ta byed pa'i gan du song la /
T08TD4104.1E:94b-28: tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa bdag gos 'dod do //
T08TD4104.1E:94b-29: tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa bdag gos 'dod do zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du bskul bar bya dran par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:94b-30: lan gnyis lan gsum du bskul zhing dran par byas pa na gal te gos de grub na de lta na legs /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-0: @95a * // gal te ma grub na lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs su cang mi smra bar bsdad par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:95a-1: lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs su cang mi smra bar bsdad pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-2: gal te gos de grub na de lta na lags /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-3: gal te ma grub na de'i 'og to gos bsgrub pa'i phyir btsal te /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-4: gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:95a-5: gal te ma grub na phyogs gang nas gos kyi rin de dag 'ongs pa der bdag 'gro bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:95a-6: yang na yid brtan pa'i pho nya las tshe dang ldan pa dag gis dge slong che ge mo'i phyir gos kyi rin gang dag bskur ba de dag ni dge slong de'i don cir yang ma grub kyis shes par gyis shig /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-7: tshe dang ldan pa dag gi rang gi nor chud ma gsan cig ces spring bar bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-8: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-11: nyon mongs pa ni nor dang /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-12: nyes pa ni mi mdzes pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:95a-13: de la dge slong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-14: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'i phyir ro //
T08TD4104.1E:95a-15: rgyal po'am zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-17: bud med rgyal srid la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur na de yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-21: dmangs rigs rgyal srid la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur na /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-22: de yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:95a-23: blon po chen po'am zhes bya ba ni rgyal po las gzhan pa blon po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-25: sna chen po la gtogs pa rgyal srid byed pa gsang tshig mthun pas 'tsho ba gang dag rgyal po la brten nas 'tsho bar byed pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:95a-26: bram ze'am zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-27: bram ze'am gtsang sbra can no //
T08TD4104.1E:95a-28: khyim bdag gam zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-30: grong rdal gyi mi'am zhes bya ba ni grong khyer mi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:95a-31: yul mi 'am zhes bya ba ni yul gyi mi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:95a-32: nor can nam zhes bya ba ni bye bas byug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:95a-33: tshong dpon nam zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:95a-35: ded dpon gyis zhes bya ba ni gang gis lan gnyis lan gsum 'don pa don mthun bdas par gyur bas so//
T08TD4104.1E:95b-0: @95b pho nya'i lag tu zhes bya ba ni skyes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-3: gos kyi rin dag ces bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-4: gser ram dngul dag bskur bar gyur la zhes bya ba ni bsring bar gyur pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:95b-5: de nas pho nya de gos kyi rin de dag khyer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-6: dge slong ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-7: dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa mkhyen par mdzod cig /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-17: ded dpon tshe ge mos gos kyi rin 'di dag bskur gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-18: 'phags pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di dag bzhes shig ces zer na zhes bya ba ni pho nya dge slong dag la sbyin bdag gis gos kyi rin bskur ba dag phul nas phrin de skad ces smras na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:95b-19: dge slong des pho nya de la 'di skad ches tshe dang ldan pa pho nya dge slong dag gi ni gos kyi rin dag len du mi rung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-20: bdag cag gos rung ba dus su rnyed na ni len to zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-21: dge slong dag dngos po mi rung bar rung bar ma byas pa dag mi len pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-22: gos rung ba dus su rnyed pa len du rung ba'i tshul go bar byas te gos kyi rin dag ni gser dang dngul la sogs pa mi rung ba rung bar ma byas pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:95b-23: gos rung ba ni spyad bzod ba dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:95b-24: dus su rnyed pa ni gos bged pa'i dus su /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-25: slong bar rigs pa'i dus dang /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-26: bstabs pa'i dus su rnyed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:95b-27: len to zhes bya ba ni bdag gir byed do zhes bya ba ste /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-28: de skad ces brjod bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:95b-29: gal te pho nya de dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa rnams kyi zhal ta bgyid pa /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-30: 'phags pa rnams gyi zhal te nyams su len pa gang lags pa 'ga' mchis sam zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni pho nya dag slong rnams kyi rung bar byed pa su yod ces brtag pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-31: zhal ta bgyid pa zhes bya ba dag la zhal ta nyams su len pa zhes bya ba ni bsnan pa'i tshig ste /
T08TD4104.1E:95b-33: dge slong gis gos 'dod pas pho nya 'di ni dge slong rnams kyi zhal ta byed pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-0: @96a * // 'di ni dge slong rnams kyi zhal ta nyams su len pa'o zhes kun dga' ra ba pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-1: dge bsnyen zhal ta byed pa bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge slong gis dge slong rnams kyi rung bar byed pa bstan pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-2: dge slong gos 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-3: gal te gos don du gnyer bas so //
T08TD4104.1E:96a-4: kun dga' ra ba pa zhes bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-5: dge bsnyen zhal ta byed pa zhes bya ba ni gzhi tha dad de /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-6: gnyi ga yang zhal ta byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-7: zhal ta nyams su len pa yin par sbyar ro //
T08TD4104.1E:96a-8: de la kun dga' ra ba pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-10: lha 'bangs dang rtse rgod la sogs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:96a-11: dge bsnyen zhes bya ba ni gsum la skyabs su song ba bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-12: dge slong gi 'khor du gtogs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:96a-13: de nas pho nya des gos kyi rin de dag khyer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-14: zhal ta byed pa de ga la ba der 'gro bar bya zhing phyin nas zhal ta byed pa de la /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-15: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa shes par gyis shig / khyod kyis gos kyi rin 'di dag gis gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-16: dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs dang de la gos rung ba dus su bskon cig ces brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-17: pho nyas gos kyi ri na dag zhal ta byed pa la gtad cing /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-18: de dag gos rung bar sgyur la dge slong de la dus su phul cig ces gtams shing rjes su bstan pa'i tshig yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:96a-19: de nas pho nya des zhal ta byed pa de la /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-20: shin tu legs par yang dag par bsgo zhing yang dag par bstan nas dge slong de ga la ba der 'gro bar bya zhing phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-21: dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pas zhal ta bgyid ba bstan pa gang lags pa de la bdag gis yang dag par bstan lags kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-22: de'i gan du bzhud cig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-23: des khyod la gos rung ba dus su bskon par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-24: yid gcugs pa'i tshig gis sngar mngon sum gtugs pa'i don gyi phyir rjes su go bar bya ba'i tshig yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:96a-25: dge slong gos 'dod pas zhal ta byed pa'i gan du song la /
T08TD4104.1E:96a-26: tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa bdag gos 'dod do //
T08TD4104.1E:96b-0: tshe dang @96b ldan pa zhal ta byed pa bdag gos 'dod do zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du bskul bar bya /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-1: dran par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge slong gis 'jig rten dang mi 'gal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-2: 'dul ba dang mi 'gal bar bya ba'i tshul bstan pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-3: lan cig gis grub na gnyis bya mi dgos /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-4: gnyis pas grub na gsum bya mi dgos /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-5: gnyis pas ma grub na gsum pa yang bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-6: re zhig de dag ni dus dang por bya ba yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:96b-7: lan gnyis lan gsum du bskul zhing dran par byas pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-8: gal te gos de grub na de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba ste /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-9: sbyin bdag dang pho nya dang zhal ta byed pa la yang btang ba las byung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-10: yongs su longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi 'phel bar 'gyur la /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-11: dge slong la yang 'jig rten dang 'gal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-12: 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T08TD4104.1E:96b-13: gal te ma grub na lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs su cang mi smra bar bsdad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge slong gis 'jig rten dang mi 'gal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-14: 'dul ba dang mi 'gal bar spyad pa'i cho ga yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:96b-15: phyogs su zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi po dag ste /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-16: phyogs bzhi po dag gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-22: rdza mkhan gyi gnas dang 'dreg mkhan gyi gnas so //
T08TD4104.1E:96b-23: khyim gnas ni khyim gyi gnas sam chu'i gnas so //
T08TD4104.1E:96b-24: las kyi mtha' ni bu ram shing gi las kyi mtha' dang /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-25: 'bras s'a lu'i las kyi mtha' dang /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-26: lan tshva'i las kyi mtha' dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:96b-27: las kyi gnas ni tshong khang dang /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-29: cang mi smra bar bsdad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bskul ba'i sgo drug po dag gis te /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-30: bskul ba'i sgo drug po dag gang zhe na khyod 'ongs sam zhes zer bal de'i phyir ro zer ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-31: 'ongs pa legs so zhes zer ba la de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-32: stan 'di la 'dug shig ces zer ba la de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:96b-33: rkang pa khrus shig ces zer ba la de'i phyir ro zhes zer ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-0: bca' ba dang bza' ba zo shig ces zer ba la de'i @97a * //
T08TD4104.1E:97a-1: phyir ro zhes zer ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-2: btung ba 'thung shig ces zer ba la de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:97a-3: bskul ba'i sgo drug po dag ha cang myur ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-4: thogs pa med par brjod cing de la gzhan gyi tshig gi skabs med par byed na bskul ba'i sgo drug po dag yongs su ma rdzogs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:97a-5: bskul ba'i sgo drug po de dag ha cang mi myur ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-6: thogs pa dang bcas par brjod cing de la gzhan gyi tshig gi skabs yod par byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-7: bskul ba'i sgo drug po dag yongs su rdzogs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:97a-8: lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs su cang mi smra bar bsdad pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-9: gal te gos de grub na de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-10: dge slong la 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i kha na mtho ba'i dngos gzhi dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-12: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba yang med la /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-15: zhal ta bdag la yang btang ba las byung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-16: yongs su longs spyad pa la byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T08TD4104.1E:97a-17: gal te ma grub na de'i 'og tu bsgrub pa'i phyir brtsal te gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni ltung pa 'di'i byed pa po yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-18: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni de'i 'og rol du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:97a-19: gos bsgrub pa'i phyir brtsal te zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'gal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-20: 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i 'dzem pa spangs nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:97a-21: gos grub na zhes bya ba ni thob na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:97a-22: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-23: des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:97a-24: da ni dus dang por bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-25: ltung ba med par bya ba'i cho ga sdar bstan pa de dag la tshul bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong bslab pa'i gzhi 'di'i ltung ba ma byung bas sbyin bdag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-27: dge slong rang nyid kyi 'dod pa bzhin ma grub par zhal ta byed pas /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-28: 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gyi don la ma gzems par spyi mthun gyi rdzas dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97a-29: bsod nams bar du brnogs pa la dge slong gis chos bzhin du bsgrub pa'i cho ga bstan par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-1: gang nas gos kyi rin de dag 'ongs pa der bdag 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-2: dge slong bdag nyid sbyin bdag gi drung du brda sprad du 'gro bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:97b-3: yang na yid brtan pa'i pho nya las tshe dang ldan pa dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-4: dge slong che ge mo'i phyir gos gyi rin gang dag bskur ba de dag ni dge slong de'i don cir yang ma grub kyis shes par gyis shig / tshe dang ldan pa dag gis rang gis nor chud ma gsan cig ces spring bar bya ste zhes bya ba ni yang na lhan cig gnas pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-5: nye gnas las de skad spring bar bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-6: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni skabs de la thabs de ltar bya ba de ni 'jig rten dang mi 'gal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-7: 'dul ba dang mi 'gal ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:97b-8: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnams par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-9: dge slong gis sbyin bdag mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pas gos kyi rin gser dngul la sogs pa rung ba ma yin pa pho nya mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pa las bskur ba spangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-10: pho nyas dge slong gi zhal ta byed pa mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pa dris shing /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-11: dge slong gis bstan pa la pho nyas bsgo zhing smras te /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-12: dge slong la yang brjod pa'i zhal ta byed pa de la bskul pa lan gsum dang bsdad pa lan gsum las lhag gam sbyin bdag gi sems bsdu bar rjes su bskur par khas ma blangs pa las gos blangs na bsgrub pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:97b-13: 'di'i byed ba po ni sbyin bdag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-15: zhal ta byed pa gsum char mi nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-16: khyim pa nyid yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-19: sbyin bar byed pa'i sems bsdu bar rjes su bsgrub pa khas ma blangs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:97b-20: 'di la yan lag ldas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-23: zhal ta byed pa gsum char mi nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-24: khyim pa nyid yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-25: gos kyi rin rung ba ma yin pa spangs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-26: bskul ba dang bsdad pa lhag pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:97b-27: sbyin par byed pa'i sems bsdu bar rjes su bsgrub par khas ma blangs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-0: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci regs par na @98a * //
T08TD4104.1E:98a-2: bskur ba'i spang ba ste bcu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-5: srin bal 'ba' zhig cha gnyis dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-6: drug dang mtho gang lam dang ni //
T08TD4104.1E:98a-7: 'khru ba dang ni gser dngul dang //
T08TD4104.1E:98a-8: mngon mtshan can dang nyo tshong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:98a-9: zhes bya ba ni bcu pa gnyis pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-10: sdom la zhes bya ba'i dgos pa dang tshig gi don ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:98a-11: bcu pa gnyis pa 'dis kyang spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos bcu bstan te /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-15: lo drug tu bcang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-19: gser dngul la reg pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-20: mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-24: nyo tshong byed pa la shin tu chags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i gzhi'i dbang du byas nas gleng gzhi lnga dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-26: gnyis rim bzhin du spyar bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:98a-27: de la srin bal gyi spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-28: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:98a-29: de'i tshe na dge slong dag srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-31: srin bal dkon zhing rin che bas bya ba mang ba dang byed pa mang bar gyur cing lung mnod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-36: nang gi sems kyi zhig gnas kyang gtong bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-38: srin bal gyi don nyid du 'ongs ba dag /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-39: bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la yang dag yang du rig par byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-42: sh'a kya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni srog gcod bar byed pa dag ste /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-43: srog gcod pa la las ma log /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-45: so sor ma spangs pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-46: des na srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-48: de dag srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-49: byed du 'jug pas srin bal las 'byung ba'i srin bu srog chags mang po'i chogs bsgrub cing srog gcod par byed de /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-50: su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98a-51: bya bar sems zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-0: @98b kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-1: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:98b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-3: yang dge slong gang srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-5: gang zag ni dge slong rab tu mang po //
T08TD4104.1E:98b-6: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-7: nyes pa ni srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:98b-8: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:98b-9: srin bal gyi zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-10: dar gyi srin bu las byung ba'i srin bal gyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:98b-11: stan zhes bya ba ni stan gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-14: don 'dir ni gnyis ka yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:98b-15: sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-18: don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:98b-19: byed na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-20: bdag nyid kyis byed dam gzhan byed du 'jug na'o /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-21: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:98b-22: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-23: dge slong gis srin bal sar pa'i chun po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-25: phung po las stan nang tshangs can nam /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-26: blings pa rang gis byas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-27: gzhan byed du bcug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-28: dang po bkram pa nyid kyi tshe srin bal gyi spang ba'i ltung byed gyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:98b-29: 'di'i byed pa po ni srin bal sar pa'i stan nang tshangs can dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-30: blings pa tshad dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-31: de bas lhag pa byed pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:98b-32: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-37: byed pa mthar thug pa'i dang po bkram pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:98b-38: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:98b-39: srin bal gyi spang ba ste bcu gcig pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-41: // / bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-42: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-43: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:98b-44: de'i tshe na dge slong dag bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:98b-46: bal nag po 'ba' zhig ni dkon zhing rin che bas bya ba mang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-3: klag pa dang kha ton dang /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-6: nang gis mes kyi zhi gnas kyang gtong bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-7: bal nag po 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-8: bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi don du 'ongs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-9: bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la yang dang yang ru rig par byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-10: dge slong don nyung du dag smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-12: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-13: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:99a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du yang dge slong gang lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-16: gang zag ni dge slong rab tu mang po //
T08TD4104.1E:99a-18: nyes pa ni lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:99a-19: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:99a-20: lug bal zhes bya ba ni lug gi bal lo //
T08TD4104.1E:99a-21: nag po 'ba' zhig gi zhes bya ba ni nag po bzhi ste /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-22: rang bzhin gyis gnag pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-26: stan zhes bya ba ni stan gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-29: don 'dir ni blings pa yin pang dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:99a-30: sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-33: don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:99a-34: byed na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-37: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:99a-38: de la bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi spang ba'i dang /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-39: sngar srin bal gyi spang ba'i rnam pa bstan pa'i gnas skabs thams cad 'dra ste /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-40: khyad par du na sngar srin bal zhes bya ba de'i gnas su //
T08TD4104.1E:99a-41: 'dir bal nag po 'ba' zhig ces bya ba'i ming gzhan brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-42: de'i phyir lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig ces bya ba gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:99a-43: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:99a-44: dge slong gis lug bal nag po sar pa 'ba' zhig gi chun po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-0: phung po las @99b stan blings par rang gis byas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-1: gzhan byed du bcug na dang po bkram pa nyid kyi tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-2: bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:99b-4: lug bal nag po sar pa 'ba' zhig gi stan blings pa tshad dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-5: de bas lhag pa byed pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:99b-6: 'di la yang lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-7: lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-11: byed pa mthar thug pa'i dngos po bkram pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:99b-12: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:99b-13: bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi spang ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-15: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel //
T08TD4104.1E:99b-17: cha gnyis bsre ba'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:99b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gis stan sar pa mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-20: de dag bal dkar po dang 'khob bal cung zhig bcug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-21: lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gis stan sar pa byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-23: des de dag kyang bya ba mang po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-24: byed pa mang bar gyur cing /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-30: nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas kyang gtong bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-31: de 'dod pa dang de'i don nyid du 'ongs ba dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-32: yang dang yang du rig par byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-33: dge slong don nyung du dag smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-35: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-36: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:99b-37: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-38: dge slong gis stan sar pa byed na cha gnyis ni lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las gzhug par bya /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-39: gsum pa ni dkar po las /
T08TD4104.1E:99b-40: bzhi pa ni 'khob bal las gzhug par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:99b-41: gal te dge slong gis cha gnyis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las ma bcug gam /
T08TD4104.1E:100a-1: 'khob bal las ma bcug par stan sar pa byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:100a-3: gang zag ni dge slong rab tu mang po //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-5: nyes pa ni bal dkar po dang 'khob bal cung zhig bcug nas lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gis stan sar pa byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-6: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-7: stan zhes bya ba ni stan gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:100a-10: don 'dir ni blings pa yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-11: sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:100a-14: don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-15: byed na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis byed dam gzhan byed du 'jug na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-16: cha gnyis ni lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las gzhug par bya zhes bya ba la cha gnyis zhes bya ba ni rangs pa gcig la bzhi cha bzhir gshags pa'i bzhi cha gnyis te phyed do //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-17: lug bal zhes bya ba ni lug gi bal lo //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-18: nag po 'ba' zhig las zhes bya ba ni nag po bzhi ste /
T08TD4104.1E:100a-19: rang bzhin gyis gnag pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:100a-22: kham pa ste de las so //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-23: gzhug par bya zhes bya ba ni bsre bar bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-24: gsum pa ni dkar po las zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:100a-25: gsum pa zhes bya ba ni rangs pa gcig la bzhi cha bzhir bsres pa'i bzhi cha bzhir bsres pa'i bzhi cha gsum pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:100a-27: dkar po zhes bya ba ni glo'i bal dang /
T08TD4104.1E:100a-29: gnya' ba'i bal te de las so //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-30: bzhi pa ni 'khob bal las gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:100a-31: bzhi pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:100a-32: rangs pa gcig la bzhi cha bzhir bsres pa'i bzhi cha bzhi pa ste bzhi cha gcig go //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-36: lto ba'i bal te de las so //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-37: gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsre bar bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:100a-38: de ltar na stan rangs pa gcig gi rgyu'i phye ni lug bal nag po /
T08TD4104.1E:100a-40: bzhi cha ni 'khob bal las spyir bsres te bling bar bya'i /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-0: @100b bzhi cha 'khob bal gyi kha dog las khra bor bya ba ni ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:100b-1: gal te dge slong gis cha gnyis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las ma bcug gam /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-2: gsum pa dkar po las bzhi ba 'khob bal ma bcug par zhes bya ba ni ma bsres par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:100b-3: stan sar ba byed na zhes bya ba ni stan blings pa gsar pas sar pa bdag nyid kyis byed dam gzhan byed du 'jud na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:100b-4: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:100b-5: cha gnyis bsre ba'i spang ba 'di dang /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-6: sngar srin bal gyi spang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-7: bla nag po 'ba' zhig gi spang ba'i rnam pa bstan pa'i gnas skabs ngang 'dra ste /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-8: khyad par du ni sngar srin bal zhes bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-9: bal nag po 'ba' zhig ces bya ba de'i gnas su 'dir cha gnyis bsres zhes bya ba'i ming gzhan brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-10: de'i phyir lug bal nag po de dag phyed pas lhag pa nyid na'o zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:100b-11: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-12: dge slong gis stan sar pa byed na phyed ni lug bal nag po /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-13: bzhi cha gcig ni dkar po /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-14: bzhi cha gcig ni 'khob bal gzhug par gsungs pa'i srang tshad las lug bal nag po dag phyed las lhag pa nyid las stan blings pa gsar pas sar pa rang gis byas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-16: dang po bkram pa nyid kyi tshe na cha gnyis bsre ba'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:100b-18: yul gang na lug bal nag po dkon zhing rin che ba lug bal nag po sar pa phyed pas lhag pa nyid kyis stan tshad dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-19: de las lhag pa byed pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:100b-20: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-21: lug bal nag po dag phyed pas lhag pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-25: byed pa mthar thug pa'i dang po bkram pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:100b-26: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:100b-27: cha gnyis bsre ba'i spang ba ste bcu gsum pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-29: // / lo drug tu bcang ba'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:100b-30: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-1: tshe na dge slong rnams la stan mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung bar gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:101a-2: de dag stan 'di ni ha cang rings so //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-5: 'di ni ha cang kyang yangs so //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-6: 'di ni thams cad kyi thams cad du bug rdol dang /
T08TD4104.1E:101a-8: bcos pa dka' ba nyid yin no zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jug pas dge slong de dag stan byas shing 'dor ba na bya ba ma mang ba dang byed pa mang bar gyur cing /
T08TD4104.1E:101a-14: nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:101a-15: dge slong don nyung ngu dag smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:101a-17: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:101a-18: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:101a-20: dge slong gis stan sar pa byed na mi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-21: gal te dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad stan rnying pa de spangs kyang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:101a-22: ma spangs kyang rung stan sar pa gzhan byed na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:101a-23: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad do //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-25: gang zag ni dge slong rab tu mang po //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-26: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:101a-27: nyes pa ni stan lo drug ma lon par stan sar pa gzhan byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-28: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-29: stan zhes bya ba ni stan gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:101a-30: nang tshangs can dang blings pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-31: don 'dir ni blings pa yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-32: sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:101a-35: don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-36: byed na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis byed la /
T08TD4104.1E:101a-38: mi 'dod bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ma dad bzhin du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-39: lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni lo drug tshun chad du bcang bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-40: gal te dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du zhes bya ba ni de tshun chad du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:101a-41: stan rnying pa de zhes bya ba ni stan gang yod pa de'o //
T08TD4104.1E:101b-0: spangs kyang rung ma spangs kyang rung zhes bya ba ni yod kyang rung @101b med kyang rung ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:101b-1: stan sar pa gzhan byed na zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:101b-2: dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis gnang ba bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:101b-3: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:101b-4: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-5: dge slong lo drug tshun chad du stan bya ba'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-6: dge 'dun la gnang ba ma thob pas stan snga ma gzhan yod pa'am rang dgar btang bas /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-7: lo drug ma lon par stan blings ba'i phyi ma gzhan byed na zin pa'i mthar lo drug gi bcang ba'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:101b-8: 'di'i byed pa po ni gnang ba ma thob pas lo drug tshun chad du /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-9: stan blings pa tshad dang ldan pa de bas lhag pa byed pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:101b-10: 'di la yan drug gis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-11: gnang ba ma thob pa dang lo drug ma lon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-15: byed pa mthar thug pa'i dang po bkram pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:101b-16: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:101b-17: lo drug bcang ba'i spang ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-19: // / mtho gang gi spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-21: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:101b-22: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa de'i tshe na thams cad du yul dbus su sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung zhes grag go zhes sgra grags so //
T08TD4104.1E:101b-23: byang phyogs pa'i tshong pa dag gis kyang yul dbus su sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ste gang dag de la mchod pa byed pa de dag gis mchod pa byas pa de dag ni shin tu 'bras bu che ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-26: rgya chen por 'gyur ro zhes thos so //
T08TD4104.1E:101b-27: thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-28: bdag cag zong dag thogs te mnyan yod du 'dong zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-29: der bdag cag gis khe spogs kyang bsgrub par bya /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-30: bcom ldan 'das la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam du rig nas /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-31: tshong pa lnga brgya byar phyogs nas mnyan yod du lhags pa rnams kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:101b-32: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang skad sbyar te /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-0: bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas @102a * //
T08TD4104.1E:102a-1: brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas chos ma nyan ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-2: de dag gis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams mtshan mo skyil krung gis 'da' bar byed pa dag gis gding ba dbus rdol ba dag mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-3: dge slong rnams la ras yug chen lnga brgya phul lo //
T08TD4104.1E:102a-4: dge slong rnams kyis gding ba rnying pa de dag khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang chen po bla gab med pa zhig tu rdul gyi phye ma dag dang 'dres par sa la bkram ste gzhag pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-5: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-7: sha dang khrag dag btsir cing sbyin pa dag sbyin /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-8: bsod nams dag byed pa gang yin pa de la /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-9: dge slong dag drod mi shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-10: so sor mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod bar byed do snyam du dgongs nas snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-11: dge slong gis gding ba sar pa byed na sar pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-12: gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas glan par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:102a-13: gal te dge slong gis sar pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas ma glan par gding pa sar pa spyod na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad do /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-15: gang zag ni dge slong rab tu mang po /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-16: nyon mongs pa ni drod mi shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-17: so sor mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod par byed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-18: nyes pa ni gding ba sar pa la rnying pas ma glan par rnying pa bor pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:102a-19: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:102a-20: gding ba zhes bya ba ni so sor gding pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:102a-21: sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-22: gsar pas sar pa dang rnyed pas sar pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:102a-23: don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:102a-24: byed na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:102a-25: bdag nyid kyis byed dam gzhan byed du 'jud na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:102a-26: sar pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sar bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T08TD4104.1E:102a-27: gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor ba glan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-0: gal te gding @102b ba bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor ba gzhan yod na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:102b-1: bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:102b-2: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru'i khru phyed dang do yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:102b-3: 'khor ba zhes bya ba ni kun nas mtho ri yod pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:102b-4: glan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyar bar bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:102b-5: gal te dge slong gis sar pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-6: gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas ma glan par zhes bya ba ni ma sbyar ro //
T08TD4104.1E:102b-7: gding ba sar pa spyod na zhes bya ba ni gding ba'i dgos par spyod na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:102b-8: spang pa'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:102b-9: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-10: dge slong gis gding pa rnying pa las bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gis ma glan pa'i gding ba sar pa spyod na spyad par brtsams pa'i tshe nyid na mtho gang gis spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:102b-11: 'di'i byed pa po ni gding ba sar pas sar pa byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-12: gding ba rnying pa nyid mod pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:102b-13: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-14: gding ba gsar pas sar pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-16: gding ba rnying pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-17: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gis ma glan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-19: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:102b-20: mtho gang gis spang ba ste bco lnga pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-22: // / bal thogs pa'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:102b-24: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-25: kye dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag gi rkang pa spre'u zhag gis bskus te /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-26: 'gro na yang 'gro bar chas pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-27: 'ong na yang glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnyed pa sgrub bar byed cing skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-29: 'u bu cag ni khron pa'i rus sbal dang 'dra bar gar yang mi 'dong /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-30: gang nas kyang mi 'ong bas rnying pa thob pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-31: skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:102b-32: yid du 'ong bar ga la 'gyur gyi /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-0: 'u bu cag kyang 'gron pa don mthun @103a * //
T08TD4104.1E:103a-2: bal yul du 'dong ngo zhes de dag las 'char ka gzhi srungs su bzhag ste /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-4: bal yul ni rnga mo'i rgyab 'dra ba yin pas de dag nyi ma gang kho na la bal yul du phyin pa'i nyi ma de la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-5: de dag tshong pa bal yul nas yul dbus su 'dong pa dag dang 'grogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-7: bal yul na bal dang ldon gros gnyis mod pas /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-8: tshong pa de dag gis bal gyis shing rta bkang ste chas pa'i lam kar shing rta'i srog shing chag nas bcos shing /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-9: sgra dbyung ngu chom rkun po dag gis 'jigs nas por te dong ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-10: drug sde mi lnga las gcig gis lnga char gyi yo byad khur te /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-11: bzhis bal khur po che re re drags khur nas ri brags shig na mar dong ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-12: de na chom rkun pa gcad pa'i phyir yang rgod kyi mi mang po 'khod pa dag gis mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-13: glang po che dang bcas pa'i dmag gam rnga mo'am /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-15: khur thogs pa dag cig yin par mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-16: de dag thams cad skrag ste nags khrod du byer ro //
T08TD4104.1E:103a-17: de nas de dag lam gol ba nas sho gam 'dral la bsgugs pa dag tho 'tshams te /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-18: rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sge'u chung nas nang du zhugs te /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-19: bal gyi khur de dag bshig pa dang ri rab kyi rnam pa 'dra ba'i phung po chen po 'dra bar rnam par gnas shing /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-20: de nyid kyis ngo tsha bar mi byed par khengs par byed pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-21: dge slong don nyung du dag smod par byed phyar ka gtong bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-22: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs te /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-23: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:103a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-25: dge slong rnams lam du zhugs pas lug bal dag rnyed la /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-26: 'dod na dge slong des blang bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:103a-27: blangs nas khyer ba med na dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha'i bar du bdag nyid kyis bskur bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:103a-28: de las 'das par khyer na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:103a-31: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod zhe na dang ngo tsha med pa /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-1: de la dge slong zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-3: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-4: lam du zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-5: dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-6: lug bal dag ces bya ba ni lug gi bal dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-7: rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so ;
T08TD4104.1E:103b-8: /'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-9: dge slong des blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni mnod par bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-10: blangs pa khyer ba med na zhes bya ba ni rung bar byed pa med na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-11: dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha'i bar du zhes bya ba ni dpag tshad gsum gyi mthar phyin par thug pa'i bar tshun chad du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-12: bdag nyid kyis bskur bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdag rang gis bskur bar bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-13: de dag las 'das par khyer na zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar khyer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-14: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-15: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-16: dge slong lam du zhugs pas lug bal dag rnyed la 'dod cing blangs nas khyer ba med na /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-17: dpag tshad las rgyang grags gcig gi mtha' las 'das par khyer na /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-18: bal thogs pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-19: 'di'i byed pa po ni lug bal rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-20: rgyang grags kyi mthar khyer ba nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-21: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-24: zhva rgyu la sogs pa'i tshad las lhag pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-26: rgyang grags kyi mthar phyin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-27: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-28: bal thogs pa'i spang ba ste bcu drug pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-30: // / bal rmel du 'jug pa'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-31: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-32: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-33: mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:103b-34: drug sde dag gis bal de dag cha drug tu bgos nas 'char kas rang gi skal ba'i bal de dag skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-35: goo ta mi la rmel du bcol nas /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-36: de slob ma gnyis len du btang ste /
T08TD4104.1E:103b-37: dbyar khang du bshig nas phung po chen por rnam par gnas par gyur pa /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-1: chen mo goo ta mi'i 'khor dang bcas pas /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-2: yun ring mo zhig tu rmel bas /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-3: de dag gi lag pa gnyis 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-4: dper na bco blag mkhan gyi lag pa dmar ba ltar dmar ba /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-5: shin tu dmar bar gyur pa /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab nas /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-7: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge slong dag /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-8: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la lug bal dag rmel du 'jud dam zhes bkas smras nas /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-10: dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la lug bal 'khrur 'jug gam /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-12: rmel du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-14: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa 'dod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-15: nyes pa ni dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-16: lug bal dag rmel du 'jud pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:104a-17: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-18: 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o ;
T08TD4104.1E:104a-19: dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:104a-20: nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi ma dang mes po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-21: phrugs la brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-22: de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:104a-23: lug bal zhes bya ba ni lug gi bal lo //
T08TD4104.1E:104a-24: 'khrur 'jud dam zhes bya ba ni tha na chur snyug bar byed du 'jud na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:104a-25: rmel du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-26: tha na 'da' bar byed du 'jud na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:104a-27: 'tshed du 'jud dam zhes bya ba ni tha na tshon du snyug par byed du 'jud na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:104a-28: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:104a-29: bal rmel du 'jud pa'i spang ba 'di ni /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-30: sngar 'khrur 'jug pa'i spang ba brtan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-32: bye brag tu sngar gos rnyed pa zhes smos pa'i gnas su 'dir lug gi bal dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:104a-33: sngar 'chag pa zhes smos pa'i gnas su 'dir rmel ba zhes brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:104a-34: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-35: dge slong gis lug bal dag dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la bsgo bas 'khrur bcug gam /
T08TD4104.1E:104a-37: rmel du bcug pa dag byas pa nyid na bal rmel du 'jud pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:104b-0: 'di'i byed pa po ni lug bal dang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa'i yul la 'du shes @104b gtso cher byed pa po yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:104b-1: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-4: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-7: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:104b-8: bal rmel du 'jug pa'i spang ba ste bcu bdun pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-10: // / gser dngul la reg pa'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-12: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas spyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:104b-13: de'i tshe na dge slong drug sbe dag / rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-17: khri dang khri'u dang khri'u chung du dag tu 'jog par byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-18: gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag ni ma log ma spangs pa so sor ma spangs pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-19: 'di ltar rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-20: phung po gcig tu byed phung po gnyis su byed /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-21: khri dang khri'u dang khri'u chung du dag tu 'jog par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:104b-22: bram ze dang khyim bdag kyang rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-28: khri'u chung ngur 'jog par byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-29: shes ldan dag sh'akya'i bu dge sbyong rnams dang /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-30: bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bya ba 'di la bye brag ci yod /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-32: tha dad bya ba ni ci yod /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-33: su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa bya bar sems zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-35: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-36: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:104b-37: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-38: yang dge slong gang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len tam /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-39: len du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:104b-42: nyon mongs pa ni dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa byed 'dod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:105a-0: nyes pa ni rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len pa dang @105a * //
T08TD4104.1E:105a-2: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am /
T08TD4104.1E:105a-3: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:105a-4: rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni rang gi lag pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:105a-5: gser dngul zhes bya ba ni gser dang dbyig go //
T08TD4104.1E:105a-6: len tam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:105a-7: len du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:105a-8: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:105a-9: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni //
T08TD4104.1E:105a-10: dge slong gis rin po che nor bu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:105a-20: g-yas su 'khyil pa la sogs pa rung bar ma byas pa thob par lcogs pa nyid kyi phyogs na 'dug pa bdag gir byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:105a-21: rang gi rin po che rung bar ma byas pa la rnam pa gang yang rung bas reg tu bcug na /
T08TD4104.1E:105a-22: gser dngul la reg pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:105a-23: 'di'i byed pa ni rin po che nor bu la sogs pa rung bar ma byas pa nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:105a-24: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:105a-26: thob par lcogs pa nyid kyi phyogs na 'dug pa dang /

T08TD4104.1E:105b-7: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde dag gam /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-8: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:105b-9: mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-10: khe spogs 'dod pa nyid kyis pa na dang rin po che la sogs pa mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa'o //

T08TD4104.1E:105b-16: byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /

T08TD4104.1E:105b-20: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:105b-21: de la spang ba snga ma dang /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-22: 'di dang 'og ma gsum gyis yul la bye brag ni 'di yin par rig par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-23: snga ma ni rin po che la sogs pa la reg pas so //

T08TD4104.1E:105b-26: de ltar bye brag bstan nas de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-27: dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas pha rol po khyim pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-28: nye du ma yin pa nyid la pa na dang rin po ches spyod pa las skyed phyin na /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-29: skyed de las mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:105b-30: 'di'i byed pa po ni rnyed pa 'dod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-31: pha rol po khyim pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-32: nye du ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-33: pa na dang rin po ches spyod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-34: skyed phyin pa nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:105b-35: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-36: rnyed pa 'dod pa dang pha rol po khyim pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-37: nye du ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:105b-38: pa na dang rin po ches spyod pa dang /

T08TD4104.1E:106a-1: can gyi spyod pa'i spang ba ste bcu dgu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:106a-3: // / nyo tshong byed spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /

T08TD4104.1E:106a-20: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:106a-21: drug sde dag gam gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:106a-22: nyo tshong zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung ba rnyed pa 'dod cing nyo tshong byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:106a-23: rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni rnam pa du ma'o //
T08TD4104.1E:106a-24: byed na zhes bya ba ni len par byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106a-27: 'tshong bar byed pa dag lhag par spyod par byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:106a-28: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:106a-29: nyo tshong byed pa'i spang ba 'di ni sngar mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa'i spang ba bstan pa'i bye brag yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:106a-30: mtshan nyid gzhan thams cad ni 'dra'o //
T08TD4104.1E:106a-31: bye brag tu na spang ba snga ma gnyis dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106a-32: 'di dang gsum gyi yul la khyad par ni 'di yod de /
T08TD4104.1E:106a-33: gser dngul la reg pa'i spang ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:106a-34: rin po che la sogs pa la reg pa las so //
T08TD4104.1E:106a-35: mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa'i spang ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:106a-36: khe spogs 'dod pa nyid kyis pa na dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106a-37: rin po che la sogs pa las so //
T08TD4104.1E:106a-38: nyo tshong byed pa'i spang ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:106a-39: gang yang rung bas rnyed pa 'dod cing nyo tshong la sogs pas spyod pa las skyed phyin na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:106a-40: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:106a-41: dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas /
T08TD4104.1E:106a-42: pha rol po khyim pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-0: nye du ma yin pa nyid la nyo tshong @106b la sogs pas spyod pa las skyed phyin na skyed de las nyo tshong byed pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:106b-1: 'di'i byed pa po ni rnyed pa 'dod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-2: pha rol po khyim pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-3: nye du ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-4: nyo tshong gis spyad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-5: skyed phyin pa nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:106b-6: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:106b-8: pha rol po khyim pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-9: nye du ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-10: nyo tshong gis spyad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-12: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:106b-13: nyo tshong byed pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-16: lhung bzed gnyis dang tha ga gnyis //
T08TD4104.1E:106b-17: byin phrogs ston zla tha chungs dang //
T08TD4104.1E:106b-18: dgon pa pa dang ras chen dang //
T08TD4104.1E:106b-19: bsngos pa dang ni gsog 'jog go //
T08TD4104.1E:106b-20: zhes bya ba ni bcu pa gsum pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-21: sdom la zhes bya ba'i dgos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-22: tshig gi don ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:106b-23: bcu pa gsum pa 'dis kyang spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos bcu bstan te /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-29: brtad pa las byung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-32: bsngos pa las bsgyur ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-34: de la lhung bzed 'chang ba'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-35: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-36: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:106b-37: de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag lhung bzed rnyed do cog sogs par byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-38: bdag nyid kyang spyod par mi byed dge slong gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-39: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag lhung bzed rnyed do cog stsogs par byed cing bdag nyid kyang spyod par mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-40: dge slong gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-42: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-43: dge slong rnams gyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:106b-44: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:106b-45: dge slong gis ltung bzed lhag pa zhag bcu'i bar du bcang bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:107a-1: na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-4: nyon mongs pa ni dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa byed 'dod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-5: nyes pa ni lhung bzed lhag pa zhag bcu las 'das par bcangs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:107a-6: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:107a-7: lhung bzed lhag pa zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab par byas pa las lhag pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:107a-8: zhag bcu'i bar du zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-9: nyin mtshan bcu'i mtha'i bar du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:107a-10: bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:107a-11: de las 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar 'chang na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:107a-12: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:107a-13: de la lhung bzed 'chang ba spang ba 'di'i mtshan nyid ni /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-14: sngar gos 'chang ba'i spang ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang thams cad 'dra ste /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-15: bye brag tu na sngar gos zhes smos pa'i gnas su 'dir lhung bzed zhes bya ba'i ming gzhug par bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-16: sngar 'khor gsum khebs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa zhes smos pa'i gnas su /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-17: 'dir byin gyis brlab tu rung ba chung ngu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-19: chen po'i mtha'i tshad dang ldan pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:107a-20: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-21: dge slong gis rang gis lhung bzed byin gyis brlab tu rung ba /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-24: chen po'i mtha'i tshad dang ldan pa yod la /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-25: byin gyis ma brlabs par zhag bcur rjes su zhugs pa nyid yin pa /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-26: zhag bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs dang po shar na /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-27: lhung bzed bcang ba'i spang pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:107a-29: rang gi lhung bzed byin gyis ma brlabs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:107a-30: 'di la yan lag bdun gyis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-33: byin gyis brlab tu rung ba gsum gyis mtha'i tshad dang /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-35: byin gyis ma brlabs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-36: zhag bcur rjes su zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-37: zhag bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:107a-38: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:107a-39: lhung bzed bcang ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu gcig pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:107a-41: // / lhung bzed tshol ba'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-0: sangs rgyas @107b bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-1: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:107b-2: de'i tshe na mnyan yod na spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig 'dug pa des lhung bzed shin tu gsal ba dbyibs legs pa longs spyad par bzod pa zhig rnyed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-3: dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig la phyin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-4: des ma 'dod pa nye dags thos nas des de bslang bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-5: spos 'tshong gi khye'u des rin med par ma byin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-6: nye dags khyim bdag gcig rin 'jal du bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-7: lhung bzed khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-8: dge slong rnams la ngoms spyoms dang /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-10: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan tshol bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-12: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-13: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:107b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-15: yang dge slong gang lhung bzed lhan pa lnga med pa /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-16: spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-18: lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol zhing lhung bzed grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:107b-19: dge slong des lhung bzed de dge slong gi 'khor la dbul bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:107b-20: dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong de la /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-21: dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-23: gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug gi bar du khad kyis dal bu dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-24: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-27: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-28: nyes pa ni lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan tshol bar byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:107b-29: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:107b-30: lhung bzed lhan pa lnga med pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:107b-31: lhung bzed lhan pa lngar ma tshang ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:107b-32: spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du zhes bya ba ni yongs su longs spyad par bzod pa yod bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:108a-0: bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mchog @108a * //
T08TD4104.1E:108a-2: lhung bzed sar pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-6: don 'dir ni gnyi ga yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:108a-7: gzhan zhas bya ba ni gnyis pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:108a-8: tshol zhing zhes bya ba ni tshol bar byed cing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:108a-9: lhung bzed grub na zhas bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-11: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:108a-12: 'di man chad ni lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa brim pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-13: spyad pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ston to //
T08TD4104.1E:108a-14: dge slong des zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so //
T08TD4104.1E:108a-15: lhung bzed de zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa de'o //
T08TD4104.1E:108a-16: dge slong gi 'khor la dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:108a-17: dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-19: gzhan la sbyin par me bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug gi bar du khad kyis dal bu dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya ste zhes bya ba la de'i rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-20: dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa spro bar bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-21: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis bsgo zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-22: des kyang kun du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin du dge 'dun la zhag gcig gi mdun rol nas bsgo zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-23: dge 'dun tshogs pa'i dus su brims te /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-24: dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-25: dge slong de la dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-27: gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug gi bar du khad kyis dal bu dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:108a-28: lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kyang de snod bzang por gzhug par bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-29: des 'bras chan skam po blang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-30: de dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-31: de byi dor sngar bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-32: de ngos khung bzang por gzhug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-33: de bsreg pa la sogs pa'i byi dor gces par bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108a-34: de snod bzang por gzhug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-0: de bdag @108b gis bskur ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-1: phrag pa g-yas pas bskur ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-2: de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bcang ba la sogs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-3: gzhung las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:108b-4: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-5: de la de'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:108b-6: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-7: dge slong de la lhung bzed lhan pa bzhi man chad nas de dag rung zhing yongs su spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-8: lhung bzed sar pa gzhan khyim pa nye du ma yin pa las /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-9: ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis slong ste yongs su btsal te /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-10: grub na lhung bzed tshol ba'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:108b-12: lhung bzed lhan pa lnga med pa spyad bzod pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-14: lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:108b-15: 'di'i yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te ;
T08TD4104.1E:108b-16: lhung bzed yod pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-18: khyim pa nye du ma yin pa las tshol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-19: ngag gi rnam pa rig byed kyis bslangs pas tshol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-21: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:108b-22: lhung bzed tshol ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-24: // /'thag tu 'jud pa'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-26: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:108b-28: 'di dag thams cad khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis bsdams pas phyin chad ras yug phran tsam po gcig gi rin yang gang las kyang blang bar mi nus kyi song ste bltas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-29: gal te la la las bslang bar nus so snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-30: de snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-31: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:108b-32: yugs sa mo lnga brgya dog ba 'khal zhing 'dug pa dag las dog pa shas shas kyis bslangs nas bu mo bde gnas ma zhig dang lag brjes te /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-0: dog pa phra mo blangs nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi yid brten pa'i @109a * //
T08TD4104.1E:109a-1: mi che ba zhes bya ba dang bsdongs te /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-2: 'thag pa'i sna bo spyi cher nan khugs kyis 'thag tu bcug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-5: kha zer ba byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-6: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:109a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-8: yang dge slong gang rang gis blangs pa'i dog pas tha ga la nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thar tu 'jud na /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-9: gos grub na sbang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-13: nyes pa ni tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:109a-14: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-16: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:109a-17: rang gis bslangs pa'i dog pas zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-18: 'dun bas la la las srang gcig / la la las srang phyed /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-20: la la las zho gcig bslangs pa'i dog pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:109a-21: tha ga pa zhes bya ba ni thags mkhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:109a-22: nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-24: phrugs la brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-25: de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:109a-26: gos 'thag tu bcug na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-33: nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:109a-34: gos grub na zhes bya ba ni gos thob na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:109a-35: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:109a-36: de la 'di'i dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-37: tha ga pa khyim pa nye du ma yin pa la rin med par ngag gis bsgo bas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-38: pho nya la sogs pa gzhan gyis kyang gos 'thag tu bcug na /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-39: 'thag tu 'jud pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:109a-40: 'di'i byed pa po ni thag pa khyom pa nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-41: rin med par bsgo bas sam gzhan gyis kyang 'thag tu 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:109a-42: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-43: tha ga pa khyim pa nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-45: ngag gu rnam par rig byed dam gzhan gyis bsgo ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:109a-46: gos rung ba tshad dang ldan pa 'thag tu bcug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-0: @109b de dag las yang lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:109b-1: 'thag tu bcug pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu gsum pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-3: // /'thag pa skyed pa'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-5: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
T08TD4104.1E:109b-6: mnyan yod na khyim bdag bza' bran gnyis shig 'dod pa la log par spyod pas /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-7: bu mo mngag gzhug ma zhig yod pa rtag tu brdegs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-9: khyim bdag bza' bran gnyis ji nas kyang skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-10: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod cing /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-11: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i bsngags pa ma yin pa yang brjod nas /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-12: des de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-13: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:109b-14: de phyin chad de gnyis bu mo de la yang mi rdeg /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-15: nye dga' la yang dog ba 'jam po dag cig tha ga pa /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-16: che ge mo zhig la ras lug chen 'thag tu bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-19: nye dga' la sbran pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-20: nye dga' snga dro bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-21: btsun mo breng ldan ma'i khyim nas /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-22: hvags kyi la du dag thob pa khyer te /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-23: tha ga pa de'i gan du song nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-24: bzhin bzangs la du 'di dag zol /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-25: kho bo'i ras yug chen 'di zhen che ba dang khrun ring ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-27: tha ga ras bzang bar legs par gyis shig ces /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-29: khyim bdag bza' bran gnyis kyi dog pa yang khrun pa skyed /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-30: thag pas kyang khyim bdag bza' bran gnyis las gla ma thob nas /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-31: nye dga' la bdas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-32: nye dags tha ga pa de nyi tshan la btags te btang nas de smod bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-34: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs te /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-35: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:109b-36: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-37: dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-38: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu bcug pa las /
T08TD4104.1E:109b-39: de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-0: rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung nas tha ga pa nye du @110a * //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-1: ma yin pa'i gan du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-2: 'di skad ces che dang ldan pa tha ga pa shes par gyis shig /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-4: tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa gos 'di zhing che ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-6: thar gyis zhag pa dang thag ran bzang bar legs par gyis shig /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-7: tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa 'di ltar kho bos gla rngan 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-10: bza' rgyu cung zad cig sbyin no zhes smras nas /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-11: de la gal te dge slong des gos bsgrub pa'i phyir gla rngan 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-14: bza' rgyu cung zad cig sbyin zhing gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-17: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-18: nyes pa ni gos 'thag pa bskyed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-19: de la dge slong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-21: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'i phyir ro //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-22: khyim bdag gam zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-23: khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni bud med do //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-24: tha ga pa zhes bya ba ni thags mkhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-25: nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-27: phrugs kyi bdun pa tshan chad ni nye du yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-28: de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-29: gos 'thag tu bcug pa las zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-36: nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-37: de na gal te dge slong de la zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' la'o ;
T08TD4104.1E:110a-38: sngar ma bstabs par zhes bya ba ni sngar mgron du ma bos par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-39: rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung nas zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:110a-40: bsnyen bkur byed pa 'ga' zhig byung nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-41: tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste zhes bya ba ni drung du song ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-42: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa shes par gyis shig / gos 'di kho bo'i phyir 'thag gis zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid nye bar ston par byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-43: tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa gos 'di zhes bya ba ni 'thag tu bcug pa'i phyir ro //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-44: zheng che ba zhes bya ba ni rgya che ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:110a-45: khrun ring ba zhes bya ba ni chu ring ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:110b-0: thar gyis zhag pa zhes bya @110b ba ni ;
T08TD4104.1E:110b-2: thags ran bzang ba zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-6: legs par gyis shig ces bya ba ni lag byad bzang por ro //
T08TD4104.1E:110b-7: tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa 'di ltar kho bos gla rngan 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni 'og ma lta bu dag sbyin no zhes dam bcas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:110b-8: bza' ba'am zhes bya ba ni bza' ba lnga po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:110b-9: bca' ba tsam mam zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:110b-10: bza' rgyu zhes bya ba ni bza' ba'i rgyu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:110b-11: cung zad cig sbyin no zhes smras nas zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-13: gos bsgrub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gos thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T08TD4104.1E:110b-16: bca' ba tsam mam bza' rgyu cung zad cig sbyin zhing zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-17: btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i khyim nas thob pa'i hvags kyi la du la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:110b-18: gos grub na zhes bya ba ni gos thob na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:110b-19: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:110b-20: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-22: tha ga pa khyim pa nye du ma yin pas dge slong gi phyir gos btags par bsam pa'i 'thag pa bskyed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-23: gal te sbyin bdag gi dog pa la sogs pa zad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-24: tha ga pa la gla rngan ma sbyin par gos grub na /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-25: 'thag pa skyed pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:110b-27: dge slong de'i phyir btags par bya ba bsam pa las byung ba nyid dang /
