T08TD4104.1E:110b-28: kho lag che ba nyid dam /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-29: 'bras bzang ba nyid la tha ga pa nges par sbyar ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-30: sbyin par byed pas de'i don du rjes su ma gnang ba lta bu ni /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-31: byed pa po dag yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:110b-32: 'di la yan lag drug gis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-33: sbyin bdag dang tha ga pa khyim pa nye du ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-34: dge slong de'i phyir gos 'thag tu bcug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-35: dge slong gis 'thag pa skyed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-36: gal te sbyin bdag gi dog pa la sogs pa zad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-37: tha ga pa la gla rngan ma byin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-39: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:110b-40: 'thag pa skyed pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:110b-42: // /'phrog pa'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-2: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:111a-3: dga' bo la lhan cig gnas pa dge slong chos zhes bya ba /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-4: ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa dang ldan pa bsdams pa 'dod pa zhig yod pa des ji srid du /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-5: dga' bo gnas ngan len kun du spyod par mi shes pa de srid du de dang lhan cig gnas so //
T08TD4104.1E:111a-6: gang gi tshe des de gnas ngan len kun du spyod par shes pa de'i tshe na de rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gnas par brtsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ba' zhig byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:111a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur bshegs kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-12: khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-13: chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-14: dge slong rnams la de skad ces bsgo ba dga' bos thos nas nye dga' la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-15: gal te bdag cag 'di nyid du 'dug na ni /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-17: ji nas kyang lto dgang ba bsgrub par bya dgos so //
T08TD4104.1E:111a-18: ji ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring du 'dong na ni /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-19: sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bco brgyad yod par gsungs pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'gro bar 'gyur bas /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-20: bdag cag gis re zhig chu yang rnyog pa can dag 'thung dgos par 'gyur la /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-21: shing ljon pa'i drung du yang go thob par mi 'gyur gyi /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-22: bdag cag dge slong rab tu shes pa 'ga' zhig khrid de sna la dong na /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-23: rnyed pa 'grub bar 'gyur na su bkri /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-25: khyod kyi lhan cig gnas pa dge slong chos de zang zing gis brid de khrid cig / de nas dga' bos dge slong chos rang gi drung du /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-26: chos gos snam sbyar 'drub par zhu bar 'ongs pa'i tshe smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-27: khyod la ngas chos gos snam sbyar cig sbyin gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:111a-28: khyod rang gis drub mi dgos so //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-0: de nas chos kyis dga' bos byin pa'i @111b snam sbyar gon te /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-1: rang gi ras yug chen dge 'dun la phul nas /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-2: snam sbyar rnying pa lnga bsod snyoms pa cig la byin no //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-3: de nas dga' bos chos la khyod rang nga'i phyi bzhin 'dong ngo zhes smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-5: dga' bos chos gos snam sbyar byin pa de phyir phrogs so //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-6: de nas dge slong chos gos snam sbyar med par bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring du ljongs rgyur song ba bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-7: tshe dan ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras so /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-8: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-9: de'i lo rgyus bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-11: yang dge slong gang dge slong la gos byin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-12: de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-13: yi ma rangs nas 'phrog gam 'phrog tu gzhug cing /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-14: de la 'di skad ces dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces zer na /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-15: dge slong des lhag ma yod pa'i phyir sbyin par bya zhing btang na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-18: nyon mongs pa ni mi bzod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-19: nyes pa ni byin phrogs byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-20: de la yang dge slong zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-22: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-23: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-30: ko ta ma ba'i gos dang /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-31: nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-32: byin nas zhes bya ba ni phyir byin mi dgos par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-33: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-34: khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni khro ba ma rangs par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-35: 'phrog gam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-36: 'phrog tu 'jug cing zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-37: de la 'di skad ces dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces zer na zhes bya ba ni dbrog pa'i bsam pas tshig de skad zer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-38: dge slong des zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:111b-39: dge slong gang yin pa des so //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-40: lhag ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i lhag ma gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:111b-41: phyir sbyin par bya zhing zhes bya ba ni gtang bar bya zhing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:112a-0: btang na zhes bya ba ni lus dang @112a * //
T08TD4104.1E:112a-2: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:112a-3: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-4: dbral bar bya ba dge slong nyid las dbrog par bya ba rang gi nyid ma yin pa'i gos la sogs pa yod byad gang yang rung ba de'i 'am des bskos pa'i lus dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-6: tha dad pa dag gis dbrog pa'i don du zhugs shing /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-7: lus las tha dad pa'i dngos por gyur pa mthar thug pa na dbrog pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:112a-9: dbral bar bya ba dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-10: dbrog par bya ba rang gi nyid ma yin pa gos la sogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-11: de'i'am des bskos pa'i lus dang ngag bsdus pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-12: tha dad pa dag gis dbrog pa'i don du zhugs pa lta bu ni byed pa po dag yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:112a-13: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-14: dbul bar bya ba dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-15: dbrog par bya ba rang gi nyid ma yin pa gos la sogs pa yo byad gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-16: de'i 'am des bskos pa'i lus dang ngag bsdus pa 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-17: tha dad pa gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-18: dbrog pa'i don du zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-19: lus las tha dad pa'i dngos por gyur pa mthar thug pa'o ;
T08TD4104.1E:112a-20: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:112a-21: 'phrog pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu lnga pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-24: brtad pa las byung ba'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-26: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:112a-27: ri brags shig na khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig 'dug pa des /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-28: dgon par dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-30: skar khung dra ba can dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-32: snying dang mig 'phrog par byed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-33: mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-36: yo byad phun sum tshogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-37: de na dge slong drug cu gnas pa de dag la /
T08TD4104.1E:112a-38: khyim bdag des chos gos dang bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba stobs par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:112b-0: de nas dus gzhan zhig @112b na khyim bdag de dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-1: de'i bus yo byad ma sbyar bar gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-2: dge slong drug cu po dag ni gzhan du dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:112b-3: rgan zhugs gnyis shig de na 'khod pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-4: byang phyogs nas tshong ba don mthun pa dag der lhags nas dge slong drug cu dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par khas len pa'i bsod snyoms dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-5: brgyad ston dang bcu bzhi ston dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-9: chos gos kyi zong dag phul te /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-10: dge slong bzang po dag bsol dbyar 'dir gnas par khas long shig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-11: bdag cag kyang dbyar gnas 'dir mchis te /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-12: dge slong brgya la mkho ba bstab bar bgyi'o rgan zhugs gnyis la smras te dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:112b-13: de nas rgan zhugs gcig gis rnyed pa sbas te /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-15: drug sde dag sbran pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-16: drug sde dag gis rgan zhugs gnyis las las phyung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-17: dge slong lto 'dun can zhig bskos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-18: nyi ma re re zhing bca' ba rnam pa bco brgyad dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-19: tshod ma snum bag can mang po sna tshogs dang /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-20: legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba sha stag brim pas /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-21: dbyar zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms thams cad zos te /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-22: gos kyi rnyed pa yang bgos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-23: mnyan yod du dong nas dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs te 'khod do //
T08TD4104.1E:112b-25: byang phyogs pa'i tshong ba don mthun pa dag der lhags te bltas na drug sde dag gis de ltar byas pa mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-26: de dag sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go //
T08TD4104.1E:112b-27: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-28: 'di ltar bdag cag gi dad pa'i myu gu skyes ma thag tu bcom mo zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-30: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:112b-31: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-32: dge slong gis ston zla tha chungs nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun chad du brtad pa las byung ba'i gos shig rnyed la /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-33: 'dod na dge slong des gos de blang bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:112b-34: blangs nas gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:112b-35: de las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:112b-38: nyon mongs pa ni rnyed pa la gdu ba /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-1: dbyar gyi nang du 'god par byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-2: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-3: ston zla tha chungs nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun chad du zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-4: zhag bcu na dgag dbye 'byung ba tshun chad du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-5: brtad pa las byung ba'i gos shig ces bya ba ni brtad pa las byung ba'i gos lnga po dag ste /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-7: nad pa la sbyin ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-8: nad pa'i phyir sbyin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-10: shi ba'i phyir sbyin ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-11: 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-12: de dag kyang dpe tsam du zad de /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-16: chu la sogs pas khyer du dogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-17: mchod gnas bgo skal la gtogs pa 'chir dogs pa la sogs pa dag kyang yongs su bsdu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-18: rnyed la zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-19: 'dod na zhes bya ba ni don du gnyer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-20: dge slong des zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-21: gos de zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-27: nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-28: blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-29: blangs nas gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni sba bar bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-30: dge slong gi gos sbyin pa'i dus ni gang yin /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-31: dus ma yin pa ni gang yin zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-32: sra brkyang ma bting ba'i gnas na ni /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-33: ston zla tha chungs nya tshun chad ni gos sbyin pa'i dus ma yin la lhag ma ni dus yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-34: sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas na ni ston zla tha chungs nya phan chad nas /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-35: dpyid zla 'bring po'i nya tshun chad ni dus yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-36: lhag ma ni dus ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-37: de las 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-39: sbang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-40: de la 'dir gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-41: dge slong gis dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang logs su bdag gir byed dam ;
T08TD4104.1E:113a-43: de sbed pa ma bskos pa rnams kyis dgag dbye'i nyin mo'i phyi de nyin par ma bgos na brtad ba las byung ba'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:113a-44: 'di'i byed pa po ni dbyar gyi rnyed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:113a-45: dbyar gyi nang logs su bdag gir byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-0: dbyar gyi nang @113b logs su bgos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-1: de sbed pa ma bskos pa rnams kyis dgag dbye'i nyin mo de'i phyi de nyin par ma bgos pa dag ni byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:113b-2: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-5: brtad pa'i dbang gis mtha'i zhag bcu la rnyed pa ma gtogs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-6: dbyar gyi nang logs su bdag gir byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-7: de dbyar gyi nang logs su bgos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-8: de sbed pa ma bskos pa rnams kyis dgag dbye'i nyin mo'i phyir nyin par ma bgos pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:113b-9: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:113b-10: brtad pa las byung ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu drug pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-12: // / zhag bdun na 'bral ba'i sbang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-14: rgyal byed kyi chal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:113b-15: mnyan yod nas ha cang thag mi ring ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-16: ri brags shig yod pa de na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-17: longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-18: de yang dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-20: gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-22: skar khung dra ba can dang /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-24: snying dang mig 'phrog par byed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-25: mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-28: yo byad phun sum tshogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-29: der dge slong drug cus dbyar gnas te dong nas ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na dge slong gzhan drug cu ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-31: khyim bdag des yo byad sna tshogs bstabs te /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-32: der dbyar gnas par khas blangs so //
T08TD4104.1E:113b-35: ri brags de'i nyen 'khor na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas de dag sbyin pa bya bar sems pa yang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin zhing byed pas /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-36: der dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong rnams la rnyed pa mang po byung ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:113b-37: ston zla tha chungs gyi g-yon can dag gis de thos nas dge 'dun tshes bcu bzhi la mtshan mo chos sgrogs pa'i tshe nang du brtul nas /
T08TD4104.1E:113b-38: dge slong dag bcom nas gos phrogs te dong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-0: dge slong de dag kyang mtshan mo sgren mor mnyan yod du @114a * //
T08TD4104.1E:114a-2: dge slong rnams kyis de dag las chos gos kyi bgo bsha' byas pa'i skabs de //
T08TD4104.1E:114a-3: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-5: de lta bas na dge slong dgon pa pas chos gos gsum la chos gos gang yang rung ba khyim gzhan du gzhag par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:114a-8: gtsug lag khang nyid du skya rengs 'char bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:114a-9: dge slong dgon pa pas zhag drug gi mtha' tshun chad du chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyir rol tu 'bral bar bya'o zhes rjes su gnang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-10: dge slong drug sde dag bsams bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-11: zhag bdun 'bral bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:114a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-13: dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas mal dgon pa dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-14: 'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-15: 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa dag tu dbyar phyi mar gyur la /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-16: dge slong dgon pa pas 'dod na /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-17: chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba khyim gzhan du gzhag par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:114a-18: dge slong dgon pa la mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro dgos pa de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-19: dge slong dgon pa des zhag drug gi mtha' tshun chad du chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:114a-20: de las 'das par 'bral na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-23: nyon mongs pa ni rang nyams byed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-24: nyes pa ni dgon par chos gos khyim gzhan du gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:114a-25: zhag bdun du 'bral bar byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:114a-26: de la dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos gos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:114a-27: rab tu mang po dag ces bya ba ni chos 'di gnyis yan chad ni rab tu mang po dag yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:114a-28: gnas mal zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:114a-29: dgon pa zhes bya ba ni rdul phra rab dang /
T08TD4104.1E:114b-0: khru rnams snga ma drug la phyi ma @114b gcig tu bsgres te /
T08TD4104.1E:114b-1: khru phyed dang bzhi la mi'i srid do //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-2: khru bzhi la gzhu gang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-3: gzhu lnga brgya la rgyang grags te /
T08TD4104.1E:114b-5: dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni chom rkun pas 'jigs par grags pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-6: 'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni seng ge dang /
T08TD4104.1E:114b-8: 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa dag tu zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:114b-13: sdig sbrul gyis 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa dag tu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-14: dbyar phyi mar gyur la zhes bya ba'i ni dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs par gyur la te /
T08TD4104.1E:114b-15: de ni gleng gzhi'i dbang gis gsungs par zad kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:114b-16: ltung ba bstan pa ni yan lag ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-17: dge slong dgon pa pas zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-18: 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-19: chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:114b-23: khyim gzhan du zhes bya ba ni gang lam po che dang /
T08TD4104.1E:114b-26: sum mdo dag yod par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-27: gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gdams par bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-28: dge slong dgon pa pas mtshams kyi phyi rol du dgos pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:114b-30: gang zag gi bya ba'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:114b-31: mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro dgos pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-32: dge slong dgon pa pa des zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-33: zhag drug gi mtha' tshun chad du zhes bya ba ni nyin mtshan drug gi mtha' tshun chad du ste zhag bdun pa'i skya rengs ma shar tshun chad du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-34: chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi ril du 'bral bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni chos gos gzhag pa gang yin pa de dang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-35: de las 'das par bral na zhes bya ba ni de las lhag par skya rengs 'char bar byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-36: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:114b-37: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-0: dge slong dgon pa pas chos gos gsum las gang yang rung ba khyim gzhan du gzhag pa las don gyi dbang gis mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba zhag bdun pa'i skya @115a * //
T08TD4104.1E:115a-2: zhag bdun na 'bral ba'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:115a-4: dge slong dgon pa ba'i cho gos dang /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-5: mtshams gzhan dang zhag bdun pa'i skya rengs shar ba'o /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-6: 'di la yan lag lnga dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-7: dge slong dgon pa pa'i chos gos gsum las gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-8: grong gzhan du gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-9: mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-10: bar chad kyi dbang ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-11: zhag bdun pa'i skya rengs shar ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:115a-12: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:115a-13: zhag bdun na 'bral ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu bdun ba'o /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-15: // / dbyar gyi ras chen gyi spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-17: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi dga' rab ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:115a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to //
T08TD4104.1E:115a-19: de na dge slong gang dag dbyar gnas pa snga mar khas len pa de dag ni rang gi dus yin no zhes tshol bar byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-20: bdag gis ci'i phyir mi bcang zhes 'chang bar byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:115a-21: dbyar phyi mar gnas pa khas len pa de dag kyang rang gi dus yin no zhes tshol bar byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-22: bdag gis ci'i phyir mi bcang zhes 'chang bar byed de /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-23: de dag ha cang myur bar tshol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-24: ha cang yun ring du bcang bar byed pas bya ba mang ba dang byed pa mang bar gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-30: nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-31: dge slong don nyung ngu dag smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-33: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-34: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:115a-35: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-36: dge slong gis sog rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus na /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-37: dbyar gyi gos ras chen btsal bar bya'o ;
T08TD4104.1E:115a-38: dbyar zad nas 'og tu zla ba phyed kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:115a-39: gal te dge slong gis so ga rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus pa'i sngon rol du /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-40: dbyar gyi gos ras chen tshol bar byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:115a-41: dbyar zad nas 'og tu zla ba phyed las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-1: gang zag ni dge slong rab tu mang po //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-2: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-3: nyes pa ni dbyar gyi gos ras chen ha cang sngar tshol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-4: ha cang yun ring du 'char bar byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-5: de la ge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-6: so ga rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus na zhes bya ba ni zla ba gcig na dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-7: dbyar gyi gos ras chen zhes bya ba ni chas 'bab pa'i gos so //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-8: btsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-9: dbyar zad nas 'og tu zla ba phyed kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgag dbye byas nas zla ba phyed kyi bar du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-10: gal te dge slong gis so ga rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus pa'i sngon rol du dbyar gyi gos ras chen tshol bar byed dam zhes bya ba ni de'i mdun rol du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-11: dbyar zad nas 'og tu zla ba phyed las 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni de las 'das par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-12: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-13: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-14: dge slong bdag nyid dbyar gnas pa snga ma'am phyi ma gan du khas blangs pa'i de'i mdun rol gyi zla ba gcig pas snga rol du /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-15: dbyar gyi gos ras chen rung ba tshol lam /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-16: dgag dbye byas nas zla ba phyed las 'das par dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'chang na /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-17: dbyar gyi ras chen gyi spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-19: dbyar nas par khas blangs pa'i zla ba gcig gi sngon rol du tshol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-20: dgag dbye byas pa'i 'og tu bzla ba phyed 'das par 'chang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-21: dbyar gyi gos ras chen rung ba nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-22: 'di la tsho ba dan 'chang ba'i dus gnyi ga la yan lag gsum gyis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-23: dbyar gnas par khas len pa'i zla ba gcig gi sngon rol gyi dus dang /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-24: de btsal ba grub ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-25: dbyar gi gos ras chen rung ba nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-26: dgag dbye byas pa'i 'og rol gyi zla ba phyed kyi dus dang /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-28: dbyar gyi gos ras chen rung ba nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-29: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:115b-30: dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyi sbang ba ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-32: // / bsngos pa las bsgyur pa'i spang bi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:115b-33: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-1: tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:116a-2: bsod snyoms pa zhig gis khyim bdag cig skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-3: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag ste /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-4: rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun ngag gi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-5: khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drang zhing ras zung cig yon dbul bar bsngos te /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-6: nye dags thos nas des rang la sgyur du bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-7: de'i 'og tu khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rang gi khyim du chos ston gsol nas /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-8: ras zung de rgan pa'i mtha' logs su rjes su yi rang bar mdzod cig ces /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-9: rjes su yi rang bar byed du bcug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-11: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa shes bzhin du gang zag bdag la sgyur du 'jug ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-13: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-14: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:116a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-16: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa shes bzhin du gang zag bdag la sgyur du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-18: gang zag ni nye dga' / nyon mongs pa ni brnab sems /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-19: nyes pa ni gzhan gyis gzhan la bsngos pa'i gos gang zag la sgyur du 'jud pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:116a-20: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-21: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:116a-22: dge 'dun la zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:116a-23: bsngos pa'i zhes bya ba ni gang zag pa'i'o //
T08TD4104.1E:116a-24: rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-27: don 'dir ni gos kyi rnyed pa yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:116a-28: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-29: bdag nyid kyis de shes par gyur pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-30: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:116a-31: gang zag bdag la sgyur du 'jud na zhas bya ba ni bdag nyid la dbul du 'jud na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:116a-32: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:116a-33: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:116a-34: dge slong gis yon bdag gzhan gyis gang zag dge slong gzhan nam /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-0: dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i gos rnyed pa shin @116b tu bdag nyid la bsgyur te thob na /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-1: bsngos pa las bsgyur ba'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:116b-3: gzhan gyis gzhan la bsngos pa'i gos kyi rnyed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-4: shes bzhin du bdag nyid la bsgyur te thob pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:116b-5: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-6: yon bdag gzhan gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-7: gang zag dge slong gzhan nam /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-10: shes bzhin du bdag nyid la bsgyur ba dang thob pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:116b-11: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:116b-12: bsngos pa las bsgyur ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu dgu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-15: // / gsog 'jog gi spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na gzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:116b-17: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i lhan cig gnas pa'i nye gnas dge slong dag sman gang dag de nas lag nyar blangs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-18: de las byin len byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-19: zas kyi phye dang 'dres pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-20: phan tshun 'dres pa dag gi rgyud kyi myags pa gang dag rnam par dbyer mi mngon /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-21: de dag dus su yang za bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-22: dus ma yin par yang za bar byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-23: de dag la bza' bar rnam par dbye bar yang mi mthong nas dge slong don nyung du dag smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-25: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-26: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:116b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong na ba rnams la /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-29: phan ba so sor bsten par bya ba'i sman gang dag bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-33: bu ram gyi dbu ba da dag las dge slong na bas 'dod na /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-34: rang gis zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs te /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-35: gsog 'jog gi yongs su longs spyod pas yongs su longs spyod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:116b-36: de las 'das par yongs su longs spyod par byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-38: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dge slong dag /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-39: nyon mongs pa ni lto 'dun che ba /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-40: nyes pa ni gsog 'jog byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:116b-41: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:116b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-1: zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-2: na ba rnams la zhes bya ba ni nad pa rnams la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-3: phan pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su mthun pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-4: so sor bsten par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-5: sman gang dag bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni rab tu bstan pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-6: zhun mar zhes bya ba ni mar bzhus pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-7: 'bru mar zhes bya ba ni 'bru mar nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-8: sbrang rtsi zhes bya ba ni sbrang rtsi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-9: bu ram gyi dbu ba zhes bya ba ni bu ram mo //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-10: de dag las zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa de dag las so //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-11: dge slong zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa de'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-12: na ba zhes bya ba ni nad pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-13: 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-14: rang gis zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-15: zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs te zhes bya ba ni nyin mtshan bdun par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-16: gsog 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas yongs su longs spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rang gis blangs te bza' bar bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-17: de las 'das par yongs su longs spyod par byed na zhes bya ba ni zhag bdun pa las 'das par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-18: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste /
T08TD4104.1E:117a-19: des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-20: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:117a-21: dge slong gis sman zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs pa bza' ba'i phyir 'chang ba skya rengs brgyad shar na /
T08TD4104.1E:117a-22: gsog 'jog gi spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-23: 'di'i byed pa po ni sman zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs pa bza' ba'i phyir 'chang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:117a-24: de dag skya rengs brgyad shar te gsog 'jog tu gyur pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-25: 'di la yan lag bzhis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:117a-26: sman zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:117a-27: rang nyid bza' ba'i phyir dang /
T08TD4104.1E:117a-29: skya rengs brgyad pa shar te gsog 'jog tu gyur pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-30: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:117a-31: gsog 'jog gi spang ba ste sum cu'o /
T08TD4104.1E:117a-33: // / tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu po dag bton zin to zhes bya ba ni spang ba'i ltung byed gdon pa'i mjug bsdu ba ste /
T08TD4104.1E:117a-34: spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu po dag ces bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i bcu phung gsum po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-0: bdag gis bton zin to zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa'i don gyis mjug @117b bsdu ba'i phyir dang /
T08TD4104.1E:117b-1: nyan pa po rnams spro bar bya ba'i phyir smos so //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-2: de la bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag la ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes dri'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-3: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du dri'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-4: 'di la tshe dang ldan pa dag yongs su dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes bya ba ni spang ba'i ltung byed rnam par gzhag pa bsgrag par bya ba yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:117b-5: de la zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:117b-6: spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu po dag bton pa de la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-7: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-8: sdang ba'i ltung byed gdon pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4104.1E:117b-10: // / da ni ltung byed 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ba gdon pa bshad par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:117b-12: shes bzhin dang ni sa bon dang //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-13: ma bskos pa dang yang dang yang //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-14: chu dang khyim dang bsams bzhin dang //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-15: 'gron mang rkun ma mchod ston no //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-17: spyi sdom la zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:117b-19: bcu pa phrag dgu 'og nas 'byung ba rnams kyi spyi'i don tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bsdus pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-20: de la shes bzhin dang ni zhes bya ba ni 'og nas sdom la /
T08TD4104.1E:117b-21: brdzun skyon dge slong phra ma dang //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-22: skyo sngogs byed dang ston pa dang //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-23: 'don dang gnas ngan len dang chos //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-24: bshes dor byed dang khyad du gsod //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-25: ces 'byung ba'i spyi sdom yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-26: sa bon dang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:117b-28: sa bon 'phya ba bsgo ba dang //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-29: khri dang gding dang skrod pa dang //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-31: rim pa gnyis su brtsig pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-32: zhes 'byung ba'i spyi sdom yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-33: ma bskos pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:117b-35: ma bskos nyi ma nub pa dang //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-36: zas dang chos gos gnyis dag dang //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-37: don mthun gru dang dben pa gnyis //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-38: dge slong ma yis sbyor bcug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-39: zhes 'byung ba'i spyi sdom yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-40: yang dang yang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:117b-42: yang dang yang ni 'dug gnas gcig //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-43: phye dang bca' dang stobs pa dang //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-45: kha nas mid dang bsod pa nyid //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-46: ces 'byung ba'i spyi'i sdom yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-47: chu dang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:117b-49: srog chags bcas dang nyal sar 'dug /'greng dang gcer bu dmag dang ni /
T08TD4104.1E:117b-50: gzhag gnyis bshams dkrug 'gro ba dang //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-51: brdeg dang gzas dang gnas ngan len //
T08TD4104.1E:117b-52: ces 'byung ba'i spyi sdom yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-3: bde dang me dang 'dun pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:118a-4: bsnyen par ma rdzogs chos dang smra //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-5: dge tshul kha dog bsgyur ba dang //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-6: rin po che dang tsha ba'i dus //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-7: zhes 'byung ba'i spyi sdom yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-8: bsams bzhin dang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:118a-11: rtse dang lhan cig sdangs byed dang //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-12: sbed dang gdeng med gzhi med dang //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-13: skyes pa med par lam 'gro ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-14: zhes 'byung ba'i spyi sdom yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-15: 'gron mang rkun ma zhes bya ba ni 'og nas /
T08TD4104.1E:118a-17: rku dang nyi shu ma lon dang //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-18: rko dang 'gron dang bslab pa dang //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-20: mi gus chang 'thung dus min pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-21: zhes 'byung ba'i spyi sdom yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-22: mchod ston no zhes bya ba ni //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-24: zas bcas skya rengs dag dod dang /
T08TD4104.1E:118a-25: khab ral dang ni khri rkang dang //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-26: bdal dang gding dang g-yan pa dang //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-27: ras chen bde gshegs chos gos so //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-28: zhes 'byung ba'i spyi sdom yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-29: da ni spyi sdom gyis bsdus pa'i sdom gyi bcu pa phrag dgu go rims bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:118a-31: brdzun skyon dge slong phra ma dang //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-32: skyo sngogs byed dang ston pa dang //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-33: 'don dang gnas ngan len dang chos //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-34: bshes ngor byed dang khyad du gsod //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-36: sdom la zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don dang dgos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-37: bcu pa dang po'i sdom 'dis ltung byed kyi chos bcu ston te /
T08TD4104.1E:118a-43: 'don pa dang gnas ngan len brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:118a-44: mi'i chos bla ma brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:118a-47: tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu po 'di dag ni zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa las 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni ltung byed gdon pa 'di'i lung dbog pa bstan to //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-48: ltung byed kyi chos zhes bya ba ni spang pa'i ltung byed dag ltar dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba lta bu ma yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:118a-49: spang bar bya ba'i dngos po med pa'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:118a-50: des na ltung byed 'ba' zhig ces bya ba'i ming thob po //
T08TD4104.1E:118a-51: de dag nyid kha na ma tho ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas chos zhes bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:118b-0: dgu bcu po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni grangs dgu bcu chad pa'i @118b bcu pa phrag dgu 'og nas 'byung ba dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:118b-1: zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-2: zla ba phyed phyed cing gso spyod 'don pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-3: 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i kha ton las 'byung ngo zhes bstan pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:118b-4: de la brdzun du smra ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:118b-6: de'i tshe na mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-7: sh'akya'i bu'i dge slong lag brgyud ces bya ba cig 'dug pa de shin tu smra ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-8: gzhan gyi smra ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas so //
T08TD4104.1E:118b-9: lho phyogs nas bram ze rig byed dang /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-10: rig byed kyi yan lag pha rol du son pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-11: yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams kyi ston par gyur pa zhig kyang bram ze'i khye'u mang po'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu mnyan yod du phyin to //
T08TD4104.1E:118b-12: mnyan yod na gnas pa'i bram ze 'khor shin tu mang po dang ldan pa zhig gis de dang brtsad par brtsams pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-13: rig pa'i gnas gang dang gang la gtam de 'dre bar byed pa de dang de la lho phyogs pa des mnyan yod pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dag spobs pa med par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:118b-14: de'i tshe sh'akya'i bu dge slong lag brgyud der 'ongs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-15: lho phyogs pa'i bram ze des smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-16: kye dge slong khyod slob dpon gyi mtshan yod pas khyod ni smra ba'i khyu mchog cig yin pa 'dra na /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-17: bdag la yang bla ma las yi ge cung zad blangs pa cig yod de /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-18: bdag khyod dang lhan cig cung zad gtam rnam par gtan la dbab pa byed par 'dod do //
T08TD4104.1E:118b-20: bram ze ma nyes te kho bo la yang gang du bdag gis rgol ba'i bstan bcos rnon po bya snyam pa'i blo skyes nas khyod kyang 'dir 'ongs kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-21: de bzhin du bya'o zhes phyi de nyin bar skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu 'gyed par dus btab po //
T08TD4104.1E:118b-22: de'i nub mo lag brgyud kyis bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-23: gal te bdag gis re zhig bram ze tshar bcad na ni /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-24: de lta na yang bdag gis sgo 'phar brgya dag 'das te /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-25: ji ltar lto dgang ba bsgrub par bya dgos so //
T08TD4104.1E:118b-26: gal te bram zes bdag tshar bcad na ni /
T08TD4104.1E:118b-27: de lta na bdag gi grags pa'i phreng ba med par 'gyur ro snyam nas de'i phyi de nang par rgol ba'i sar ma song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:118b-28: de lta bu lan gnyis lan gsum tsam du 'dus pa las kyang /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-0: sh'akya'i bu lag brgyud kyis de tho 'tshams pa'i phyir yul @119a * //
T08TD4104.1E:119a-2: brda dang mtshan ma byas nas ched du bsams te mi 'gro nas /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-3: gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag / sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni brdzun smra ba /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-4: brdzun smra ba las ma log / ma spangs /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-5: so sor ma spangs pa dag yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-6: snga btus pa las yul phyogs dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-8: mtshan ma byas nas ched du bsams te 'gro bar mi byed do zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-10: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-11: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:119a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du shes bzhin du brdzun smra na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-14: gang zag ni sh'akya'i bu dge slong lag brgyud /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-15: nyon mongs pa ni gzhan la tho 'tshams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-16: nyes pa ni shes bzhin du brdzun smra ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:119a-17: de la shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-19: brdzun smra na zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-20: brdzun smra ba ni rnam pa dgu yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-28: de la brdzun du smra ba rnam pa dgu gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-29: gzhi med par pham par 'gyur ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-32: so sor bshags par bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-38: rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-39: gzhi med par pham par 'gyur ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-42: so sor bshags par bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-47: rnam pa bdun gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-48: gzhi med par tshul khrims nyams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-55: rnam pa drug gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-56: dge slong brdzun du smra bar 'dod pa na 'di snyam du brdzun smra bar bya'o snyam pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-57: brdzun smra ba na 'di snyam du brdzun smra'o snyam pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-58: brdzun smras pa na 'di snyam du brdzun smras so snyam pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-59: gzhi med par mthong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119a-61: dogs pas brdzun du smra ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:119a-62: rnam pa lnga gar zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-0: gzhi @119b med par pham par 'gyur ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-3: so sor bshags par bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-5: rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-6: gzhi med par tshul khrims nyams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-10: rnam pa gsum gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-11: gzhi med par mthong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-14: gzhan yang rnam pa gsum gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-15: brdzun smra bar 'dod pa na 'di snyam du brdzun smra bar bya'o snyam pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-16: brdzun smra ba na 'di snyam du brdzun smra'o snyam pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-17: brdzun smras pa na 'di snyam du brdzun smras so snyam pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:119b-18: rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-19: brdzun smras pa na 'di snyam du brdzun smra'o snyam pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-20: brdzun smras pa na 'di snyam du brdzun smras so snyam pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:119b-21: brdzun smra ba la rnam pa gcig pu 'ba' zhig ni med do //
T08TD4104.1E:119b-22: brdzun smra ba ni pham par 'gyur ba yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-23: dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ba yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-24: nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ba yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-25: ltung byed du 'gyur ba yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-26: nyes byas su 'gyur ba yang yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:119b-27: de la brdzun du smra ba pham par 'gyur ba gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-29: dge slong la med la med bzhin du mi'i chos bla ma smra ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:119b-30: dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ba gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-32: dge slong khros shing zhe sdang bar gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-33: ji nas kyang 'di tshangs par spyod pa dang dbral lo snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-34: dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pa la gzhi med par pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur ba 'debs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:119b-35: nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ba gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-37: dge slong dge 'dun gyi nang du ched du bsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-38: chos ma yin pa chos su ston pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-39: chos chos ma yin par ston pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-40: 'dul ba ma yin pa 'dul bar ston pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-41: 'dul ba 'dul ba ma yin par ston pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:119b-42: nyes byas su 'gyur ba gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-44: dge slong zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-45: ci 'di la khyod yongs su dag gam zhes dris pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-46: yongs su ma dag bzhin du cang mi smra bar sdod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:119b-47: ltung byed du 'gyur ba gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:119b-49: brdzun du smra ba rnam pa bzhi po de dag ma gtogs par brdzun du smra pa gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad ni ltung byed du 'gyur ba yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:119b-50: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-4: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-7: gzhan yang ltung ba de ma bzhags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-8: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:120a-9: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-12: nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-13: nyes byas su 'gyur ba las gzhan pa'i brdzun du smra ba don shes pa'i yul la 'du shes gzhan du bsgyur te brdzun du smra ba ni 'di snyam du brdzun smra'o snyam pa dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:120a-14: brdzun smas pa na 'di snyam du brdzun smras so snyam na /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-15: brdzun du smra ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:120a-16: 'di'i byed pa po ni don shes pa'i yul la 'du shes gzhan du bsgyur ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:120a-17: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-19: bdag nyid kyis smras pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-20: nyan pa po mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-21: ltung byed du 'gyur ba'i brdzun nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-23: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:120a-24: brdzun du smra ba'i ltung byed de dang po'o /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-26: // / skyon nas smra ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-27: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-28: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:120a-29: de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag dge slong rnams la 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-30: zhar ba dag theng po dag / smad 'chal dag / lag sor rdum po dag / sgur po dag /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-31: mi'u thung dag / wa ba can dag / lkugs pa dag /'on pa dag / rten 'phye dag / gyol po dag / mchu 'phyangs pa dag / mgo bo che dag ces mi'i skyon nas smra bas kun du spyod par byed de /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-32: des dge slong dag snga gong pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-34: zhum par gyur nas lung mnod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-39: nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong zhing sdug bsngal te yid mi bde ba mang bar gnas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-40: dge slong don nyung du dag smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:120a-42: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:120b-0: de nas @120b bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du mi'i skyon nas smra na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-3: nyon mongs pa ni ngag yang dag par ma bsdams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-4: nyes pa ni mi'i skyon nas smra ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:120b-5: de la mi'i skyon nas smra na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-6: mi'i skyon na smra ba'i bsam pa dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-9: ngag gi rnam par rig byed smra ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:120b-10: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:120b-11: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-12: dge slong gis dge slong gi skyon nyid brjod par 'dod pas /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-15: skyon gyi rnam pa rung ba ma yin pa bsam pa gang yang rung bas smras na /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-16: mi dga' ba nyid du ma gyur na yang /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-17: skyon nas smra ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-18: 'di'i byed pa po ni skyon nyid brjod par 'dod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-19: pha rol po dge slong nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:120b-20: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-21: pha rol po dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-22: skyon nyid brjod par 'dod pa dang rang gi tshig gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-23: skyon rung ba ma yin par bsam pa gag yang rung bas smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-24: pha rol pos don go ba nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:120b-25: de dag la yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:120b-26: skyon nas smra ba'i ltung byed de gnyis ba'o /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-28: // / phra ma byed pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-30: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:120b-31: de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag dge slong rnams la phra mas kun du spyod par byed de /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-32: des dge slong dag spa gong ba dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:120b-34: zhum par gyur nas lung mnod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-39: nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas kyang gtong bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-40: 'di ltar dus yun ring po nas nye bar bsams pa chos dang ldan pa'i gcugs pa'i rgyun yang gcod par byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-41: dge slong don nyung du dag smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-43: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-44: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:120b-45: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:120b-46: dge slong la phra ma byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-1: nyon mongs pa ni dbyen gyi bsam pa /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-2: nyes pa ni dge slong la phra ma byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:121a-3: de la dge slong la phra ma byed na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-4: dge slong la phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas ngag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-9: tshig gi lam dang tshig gi sgra dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-11: ngag gi rnam par rig byed smra na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:121a-12: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:121a-13: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-14: dge slong phra ma byed 'dod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-15: dge slong gzhan la dge slong che ge mo zhig 'di skad zer ro zhes phra ma'i tshig gang yang rung ba smra na /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-16: phra ma byed pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:121a-18: dbye ba'i bsam pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-19: dbye bar bya ba gnyi ga dge slong nyid yin pa'o 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-20: dbye ba'i bsam pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-21: dbye bar bya ba gnyis ga dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-22: rang gi tshig gang yang rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-24: pha rol pos don go ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:121a-25: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:121a-26: phra ma byed pa'i ltung byed de gsum pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-28: // / skyo sngogs byed pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-30: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:121a-31: de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dge 'dun mthun pas chos bzhin du rtsod pa sbyangs par shes bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-32: rtsod pa 'di ni shad kyis ma byang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-33: legs par shad kyis ma byang ba yin gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-34: yang shad kyis byang bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:121a-35: rtsod pa 'di ni nges par ma brtags pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-36: legs par nges par ma brtags pa yin gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-37: yang nges par brtag par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:121a-38: rtsod pa 'di ni nye bar ma zhi ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-39: legs par nye bar ma zhi ba yin gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-40: yang nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed de /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-41: dge slong dag yang dang yang du rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-43: byed pa mang bar gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-49: nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:121a-50: dge slong don nyung du dag smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-0: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan @121b 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-2: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pas chos bzhin du rtsod pa sbyangs par shes bzhin du yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-5: nyon mongs pa ni rtsod pa la dga' ba ;
T08TD4104.1E:121b-6: nyes pa ni skyo sngogs byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-7: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-8: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-9: dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun no //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-10: mthun pas zhes bya ba ni blo mthun pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-11: chos bzhin du zhes bya ba ni chos ji lta ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-13: ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-14: rtsod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-15: rtsod pa bzhi po 'gyod pa'i phyir rtsod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-16: mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-17: ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-19: sbyangs par zhes bya ba ni nye bar zhi bar byas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-20: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-21: rang nyid kyis yongs su rig pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-22: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-23: yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na zhes bya ba ni yang byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-24: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-25: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-26: dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-28: 'dun pa 'bul ba dag gis dge slong gnyis kyi rtsod pa gang yang rung ba de dge 'dun gyis legs par zhi bar byas par shes bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-29: gang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-30: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong gnyis kyi rtsod pa nyid dge 'dun gyis legs par zhi bar byas pa nyid la /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-31: 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-32: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-34: phyir rgol ba gnyis ka dge slong nyid yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-35: rtsod pa bzhi po gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-36: dge 'dun gyis legs par zhi bar byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-37: ltung ba 'byin pa pos de ltar shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-38: yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-39: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:121b-40: skyo sngogs byed pa'i ltung byed de bzhi pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-42: // / ston pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:121b-43: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-0: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na @122a * //
T08TD4104.1E:122a-2: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sha mtshan gyi rig pa shes te /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-4: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-5: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs shing /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-6: bram ze dang khyim bdag dag la chos bstan nas /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-8: sru mo khyod kyi sgyug mo ci 'dra /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-10: 'phags pa ri bong mo mdas phog pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra'o //
T08TD4104.1E:122a-12: sru mo ci de de'i nyes pa yin snyam mam /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-13: de ltar de la gtum pa'i mtshan nu ma'i bar dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-15: rked pa'i bar dag na sha rman dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-16: mdzer bu dang sme ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-18: spru 'khyil pa dag yod pas de ni de'i nyes pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:122a-19: de'i 'og tu sgyur mo'i gan du song ste dris pa /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-20: sru mo khyod kyi mna' ma ci 'dra /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-22: 'phags pa de'i skyon ni se dar gyis bdar 'tshal te /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-23: le lo can sgrub mi phod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-24: gtum pa gshe ba spyo bar bgyid pa lags so //
T08TD4104.1E:122a-26: sru mo ci de de'i nyes pa yin snyam mam /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-27: 'di ltar de la gtum pa'i mtshan nu ma'i bar dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-35: de ni de'i nyes pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:122a-36: des bram ze dang khyim bdag gzhan dag la chos bstan nas /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-38: sru mo khyod kyi mna' ma ci 'dra /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-40: 'phags pa bu mo'am nu mo ci 'dra ba de 'dra'o //
T08TD4104.1E:122a-42: sru mo de ni de'i yon tan ma yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-43: 'di ltar de la nges pa'i mtshan nu ma'i bar dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-45: rked pa'i bar dag na dpal be'u dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-48: g-yung drung dag yod pas de ni de'i yon tan yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:122a-49: de'i 'og tu mna' ma'i gan du song ste dris pa /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-50: sru mo khyod kyi sgyug mo ci 'dra /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-52: 'phags pa ma'am phu mo ci 'dra ba de 'dra'o //
T08TD4104.1E:122a-54: bu mo de ni de'i yon tan ma yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-55: 'di ltar de la nges pa'i mtshan nu ma'i bar dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122a-61: g-yung drung dag yod pas de ni de'i yon tan yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:122a-62: de nas dus gzhan zhig na bud med de dag bsku ma nye dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-0: @122b khrus byed pa'i tshe gcig la gcig gsang ba'i gnas kyi mtshan ma rtog par byed pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-1: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ji skad bstan pa de kho na lta bu'i mtshan ma bzang po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-2: ngan pa dag mthong zhing gang gi tshe de dag 'thab pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-3: gcig la gcig skur pa yang 'debs shing 'dum pa'i tshe phebs par yang smra ste ;
T08TD4104.1E:122b-4: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-6: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-7: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:122b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dgongs te /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-9: gang gi phyir nyes dmigs cung zad cig byung ba de dag thams cad ni /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-10: dge slong bud med la chos ston pa las gyur pa yin par dgongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-11: dge slong gis bud med la chos bstan par mi bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-12: tshig lngas chos bstan par bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-13: tshig drug gis chos bstan par bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-14: skyes pa bzhag ste ci tsam 'dod par chos bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-15: drug sde dag gis khyi dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-18: phyi gan du nyal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-20: khye'u dag drung du bzhag ste /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-21: ji tsam 'dod par bud med la chos ston cing /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-22: des rlom pa dang khengs par byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-23: dge slong don nyung ngu dag smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-25: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-26: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:122b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-28: yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul la tshig lnga'am /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-29: drug las lhag par chos ston na /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-30: rig pa'i skyes pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' pa mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-32: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni sred pa /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-33: nyes pa ni bud med la rig pa'i skyes pa med par tshig lnga'am /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-34: drug las lhag par chos ston pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:122b-35: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-36: drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:122b-37: bud med la zhes bya ba ni bud med dam gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-38: nyes par smra pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes bar nus pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:122b-39: tshig lnga'am drug las lhag par zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:122b-40: tshig lngas chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du tshig drug pa la thal bar byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-0: tshig drug gis chos ston pa na yang bsams bzhin du tshig bdun pa la @123a * //
T08TD4104.1E:123a-2: chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-3: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:123a-4: ston na zhes bya ba ni 'chad na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:123a-5: rig pa'i skyes pa ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-6: rig pa'i skyes pa bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:123a-7: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:123a-8: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par bzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-9: dge slong gis khyim pa mo bud med dam /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-10: gzhon nu ma legs bar smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-11: nyes par smra ba'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa la gnas gcig tu sangs rgyas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-12: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyis gsungs pa'i chos tshig drug las lhag pa shes bzhin du rig pa'i skyes pa med par ston na /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-13: ston pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:123a-16: gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-17: nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-18: chos tshigs drug las lhag par ston pa la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:123a-19: 'di la yan lag drug gis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-20: bud med khyim pa mo legs par smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-21: nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-22: gnas gcig tu bstan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-24: tshig drug las lhag pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-25: rig pa'i skyes pa med pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-27: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:123a-28: ston pa'i ltung byed de lnga pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-30: // /'don pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-31: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-32: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:123a-33: de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dag dang tshig gis gdon par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:123a-34: des kun dga' ra ba'i mthar sgra mthon po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-35: sgra chen po skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi sgra lta bu 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-36: dper na bram ze rnams bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don pa lta bu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-37: rtsis mkhan rnams kyis rtsis kyi gnas na smra ba lta bu grag par gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan te /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-38: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:123a-39: kun dga' bos ji ltar gyur pa rgya cher gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:123a-40: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-0: yang dge slong gang zag bsnyen @123b bar ma rdzogs pa dang tshig gis chos 'don na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-3: nyon mongs pa ni ma zhi ba /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-4: nyes pa ni gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang tshig gis chos 'don pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-5: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-6: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-7: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-8: bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-11: de las gzhan pa ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-12: tshig gis zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-17: ji ltar tshig mnyam pas she na /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-19: sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-21: nye gnas kyang dus gcig tu //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-22: sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-24: de ltar tshig mnyam pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-25: ji ltar tshig snga mas she na /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-27: sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-28: zhes ma bton par nye gnas /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-29: dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-31: de ltar tshig snga bas so //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-32: ji ltar yi ge mnyam pas she na /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-33: slob dpon aa zhes gdon pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-34: nye gnas kyang dus gcig tu aa zhes 'don pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-35: de ltar yi ge mnyam pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-36: ji ltar yi ge snga bas she na /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-37: slob dpon gyis re zhig aa zhes ma bton par /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-38: nye gnas aa zhes 'don pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-39: de ltar yi ge snga bas so //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-40: chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-41: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-42: gdon na zhes bya ba ni 'dzin du 'jud na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-43: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-44: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-45: dge slong gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang cig car ram /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-46: de'i mjug thogs su de lung gi chos sam yi ge klag pa'i phyir 'don na 'don pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-47: 'di'i byed pa po ni gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-48: lung gi chos dang yi ge'o //
T08TD4104.1E:123b-49: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:123b-50: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-1: lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:124a-2: 'don pa'i ltung byed de drug pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-4: // / gnas ngan len brjod pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-6: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
T08TD4104.1E:124a-7: 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-8: nyon mongs pa rnams ma spangs pa'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-9: dge slong dag dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'byin par byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-10: kha cig ni lam gol bar rgas pas de dag gang gi tshe dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-12: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams las thos pa /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-13: de'i tshe ni de dag ltung ba chos bzhin du phyir byed cing spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-14: dge 'dun la chu 'brim pa'i tshe bram ze dang /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-15: khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-16: gang dag rin po che rtogs pa dag kyang de las nye bar brtags shing rin po che dag sdud par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:124a-17: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan bsod nams 'dod pa 'di dag kyang dge 'dun la chu 'brim zhing bsod nams sogs par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:124a-18: drug sde chen po 'di dag ni za zhing 'khor par byed do zhes zer ba drug sde dag gis thos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-20: shes ldan dag ci 'di dag chos bzang po'i chos kyi dge 'dun la cu 'brim par byed snyam mam /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-21: 'di ltar 'di dag ni chad pa'i las byed pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:124a-24: drug sde dag gis las bya ba ma yin pa byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-25: 'di lta 'di ltar byas so zhes smras pa dang de dag dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag yin pa de dag gi gnas skabs kyang re zhig 'di 'dra na /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-27: gsar bu gang dag yin pa de dag gi gnas skabs ci 'dra bar 'gyur zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-30: dge slong spo ba byed pa de dag phyi dro dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la lci ba 'jam po'i byug pas nyug par byed pa dag gi lhan cig gnas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-32: drug sde dag gis gnas ngan len brjod nas /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-33: gang gi tshe de dag ltung ba de las langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:124a-34: de dag gis rang gi dge tshul dag la las gyis shig ces bsgo ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-0: de tshul dag 'di skad ces las 'di ni khyed @124b cag gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa dag gis byas pa yin gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-1: kho bo cag mi byed do zhes zer ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-2: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag / gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba rjod par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-4: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-5: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:124b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du yang dge slong gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba brjod na /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-7: dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-10: nyon mongs pa ni gzhan gyis bsngags pa la phrag dog byed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-11: nyes pa ni gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la dge slong gis gnas ngan len brjod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:124b-12: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-13: drug sde 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:124b-14: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-15: bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-16: dge slong dang dge slong ma'o //
T08TD4104.1E:124b-17: de las gzhan pa ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:124b-18: gnas ngan len zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-20: pham par 'gyur ba kun nas slong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-21: dge 'dun lhag ma kun nas slong pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:124b-22: ci'i phyir de dag gnas ngan len zhes bya zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-23: ngo bo nyid las dang kun nas slong bas so //
T08TD4104.1E:124b-24: ltung ba brjod na zhes bya ba ni smra na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:124b-25: dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis gnang ba bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:124b-26: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:124b-27: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-28: dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gnas ngan len brjod par ma bskos pas nyan pa po snyen par ma rdzogs pa la pham par 'gyur ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-29: dge 'dun lhag ma dag so so yang rung bsdus pa yang rung ba smras na /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-30: gnas ngan len brjod pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:124b-32: nyan pa po bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa pham par 'gyur ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:124b-33: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba mi shes pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:124b-34: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-0: dge slong dge 'dun gyis gnas ngan len brjod par ma bskos pa @125a * //
T08TD4104.1E:125a-2: des nyan pa po bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa gnas ngan len mi shes pa nyid du shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-3: nyan pa po mi'i 'gro ba bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-4: gnas ngan len pham par 'gyur pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-5: dge 'dun lhag ma dag so so 'am bsdus pa gang yang rung ba smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-6: pha rol pos don go ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:125a-7: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:125a-8: gnas ngan len brjod pa'i ltung byed de bdun pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-10: // / mi'i chos bla ma brjod pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:125a-12: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nya pa lnga brgya chu klung yid 'ong ldan la brten cing 'khong ba dag gis chu srin nya'i rigs bzung ba'i gleng gzhi las /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-13: de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te //
T08TD4104.1E:125a-14: de dag mu ge byung ba'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-15: nya ba'i grong gi nye 'khor du dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa dag gis mi'i chos bla ma ji ltar thob pa nye du dag la brjod nas /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-16: 'jig rten ni yon tan la dga' ba yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-17: nye du dag gis re zhig rang gi bu dag las kyang phrogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-18: de dag la bsod snyoms legs par bstabs par gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:125a-19: gang gi tshe dbyar 'das nas 'dus pa chen po'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-20: dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'dong ba'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-21: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong gang dag sbong byed kyi gong du dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa de dag ni bsod snyoms kyis brel bas ring pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-27: sha dang khrag bri ba mthong /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-28: dge slong gang dag nya ba'i grong gi nyen kor dung byar gnas par khas blangs pa de dag ni bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med pas tsho ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-30: sha dang khrag rgyas pa mthong nas de ci las gyur pa'i rgyu dris pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-31: de dag gis kyang rgyas par smras so //
T08TD4104.1E:125a-32: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de dag la khyed cag gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:125a-33: mi'i chos bla ma bden pa brjod du rung ngam zhes dris pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-1: rung yang srid mi rung yang srid de /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-2: 'di ltar bdag cag gis ni smras so zhes zer ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-3: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la mi'i chos bla ma bden pa brjod ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-5: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:125b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du yang dge slong gang gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la mi'i chos bla ma bden pa smras na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-8: gang zag ni nya pa las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong dgra bcom ba lnga brgya /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-9: nyon mongs pa ni bag chags ma byang bas ma brtags pa /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-10: nyes pa ni gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la mi'i chos bla ma bden par smras pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:125b-11: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:125b-12: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-13: bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-14: dge slong dang dge slong ma'o //
T08TD4104.1E:125b-15: de dag las gzhan pa ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:125b-16: mi'i chos zhes bya ba ni mi rnams kyis chos mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-17: de ni mi rnams kyis 'thob kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-20: mtshan gnyis pa dag gis kyang mi 'thob kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-23: yi dgas rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i phyir ro //
T08TD4104.1E:125b-24: bla ma zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-25: 'dod pa'i khams pas gzugs kyi khams bla ma yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-26: gzugs kyi khams pas gzugs med pa'i khams bla ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:125b-27: yang na mi'i chos zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa lnga po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:125b-28: bla ma zhes bya ba ni de dag spangs pa gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:125b-29: bden pa zhes bya ba ni de'i dngos po bden pa kho na yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:125b-30: smra na zhes bya ba ni brjod na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:125b-31: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:125b-32: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-33: dge slong gis 'du shes ma bsgyur bar bdag nyid mi'i chos bla ma dang ldan pa bden ba nyid gang zag bden pa ma mthong ba bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la brjod na mi'i chos bla ma brjod pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:125b-34: 'di'i byed pa po ni mi'i 'gro ba'i gang zag bden pa ma mthong ba bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:125b-35: mi'i chos bla ma bden pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:126a-1: lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-4: nyan pa po mi'i 'gro ba bden pa ma mthong ba bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-6: pha rol pos don go ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:126a-7: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-8: mi'i chos bla ma brjod pa'i ltung byed de brgyad pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-10: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-12: skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:126a-14: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gnas mal 'bog pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-15: zas la bsko bar bskos pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-16: de dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-17: dge 'dun la chos dang ldan pas zhal ta byed pa'i las la brtson pa yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-18: des sangs rgyas sam chos sam dge 'dun nam /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-19: yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong rnams la ma phul ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-20: yongs su ma btang ba ci yang med de /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-21: des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas chos gos ngan cing snam sbyar yang yongs su rnyings nas /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-22: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol te /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-23: de dag las gsol ba'i las kyis ras yug chen byin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-24: dge slong mdza' bo dang sa las skyes gnyis /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-25: tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dang tshe rabs tshe rabs nas rjes su 'brel ba'i kho na yod pas de gnyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun na /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-26: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa rnyed do cog gcig gis gang zag la yongs su sngo bar byed na ;
T08TD4104.1E:126a-27: dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa grub par ga la 'gyur zhes smod par byed nas dge slong rnams kyis de gnyis la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-28: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed der ma 'dus sam /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-32: ci kho bo cag gnyis 'dur yang ma gnang ngam zhes zer na /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-33: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-34: dge slong dag la sngar legs par rung bar byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-35: de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gis 'di ltar bshes ngor byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:126a-36: dge 'dun gyi rnyed par bsngos pa bdag gi gang zag la bsngos so zhes zer zhing smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-0: kha @126b zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-1: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-3: yang dge slong gang sngar legs par rung bar byas nas /
