T08TD4104.1E:126b-4: de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gis 'di ltar bshes ngor byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-5: dge 'dun gyi rnyed par bsngos te /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-6: gang zag la bdag gi bsngos so zhes zer na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad do //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-8: gang zag ni mdza' bo dang /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-10: nyon mongs pa ni mi bzod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-11: nyes pa ni skur ba 'debs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-12: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-13: mdza' bo dang sa las skyes gnyis sam /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-14: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-15: legs par rung bar byas nas zhes bya ba ni sngar tha dad pa phul na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-16: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-18: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-19: tshe dang ldan pa dag gis 'di ltar bshes dor byas te zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-20: dge slong gi bshes pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-21: mkhan po'i ni lhan cig gnas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-22: lhan cig gnas pa'i ni mkhan po'o //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-23: slob dpon gyi ni nye gnas so //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-24: nye gnas kyi ni slob dpon no //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-25: mkhan po gcig pa'i ni mkhan po gcig pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-26: slob dpon gcig pa'i ni slob dpon gcig pa'o ;
T08TD4104.1E:126b-28: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-29: rnyed pa zhes bya ba la rnyed pa ni gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-32: don 'dir ni gos kyi rnyed pa yin par dgongs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-33: bsngos pa zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi nang du grub pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-34: gang zag la bdag gi bsngos so zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-35: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-36: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-37: ltung ba 'byin pa po bdag nyid kyang dge 'dun gyis las de'i nang du gtogs pa'i dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa gang zag gzhan la byin pa'i 'og tu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:126b-38: 'di skad ces dge slong 'dis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zas kyi rnyed pa ma yin pa gos kyi rnyed pa gang zag la log par bsngos so zhes /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-39: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i don nyid de nyid dam /
T08TD4104.1E:126b-40: gzhan gyi mdun du ming nas smos kyang rung ma smos kyang rung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-1: 'debs pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:127a-2: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge 'dun gyi gos gyi rnyed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-3: gang la bsngos pa'i gang zag mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa rab tu byung ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-5: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-6: sngar dad pas phul ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-7: dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-8: gang la bsngos pa mi'i 'gro ba gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-9: brdzun smras pa dang pha rol pos thabs gang yang rung bas don go ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:127a-10: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:127a-11: skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung byed de dgu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-13: // / khyad du gsod pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-15: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:127a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-17: dge slong rnams zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon pa byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-18: drug sde dag pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po dag 'don pa'i tshe na cang mi smra bar 'khod do //
T08TD4104.1E:127a-19: dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-20: ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-21: spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-22: ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-23: so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-24: bslab pa'i chos mang po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-25: rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag 'don pa'i tshe na ni /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-26: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang la gzhi nges pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-27: gang zag nges par rab tu shes pa yod bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-28: bdag cag gis rma sos pa dag ci'i phyir 'bral bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-29: gang dag gis dge slong rnams la 'gyod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-31: gnod par 'gyur ba bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba 'di dag gis zla ba phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa bton pa bdag gis ci bya zhes zer nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-32: tshe dang ldan pa dag gi phyir kho bo cag zla ba phyed phyed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-33: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa ma yin gyi /
T08TD4104.1E:127a-34: 'di ltar kho bo cag ni ston pa'i bka' lung gis 'don to //
T08TD4104.1E:127a-35: gal te khyed cag sdug bsngal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-0: yid mi bde ba skye na ci'i phyir lhag par @127b spyod par ches tshar bcad cing /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-1: dge slong don nyung du dag kyang drug sde la smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-3: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-4: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:127b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-6: yang dge slong gang zla ba phyed phyed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-7: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-8: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang gis dge slong rnams 'gyod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-10: gnod par 'gyur ba bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba 'di dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa bton pa dag gis ci bya zhes zer zhing bslab pa khyad du gsod na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-13: nyon mongs pa ni bag med pa /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-14: nyes pa ni bslab pa khyad du gsod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:127b-15: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-16: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:127b-17: zla ba phyed phyed cing zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-18: gso sbyong gi dus kyi zla ba phyed phyed cing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:127b-19: so sor thar pa'i zhes bya ba ni pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-20: dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-21: ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-22: spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-23: ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-24: so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-25: bslab pa'i chos mang po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-26: rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag gi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:127b-27: mdo zhes bya ba ni des nye bar sbyar bas mdo'am /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-28: yang na mdo yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:127b-29: gdon pa 'don pa na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-30: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa lnga po dag rab tu bton pa na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:127b-31: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag / gang gis dge slong rnams 'gyod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-33: gnod par 'gyur ba bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa bton pa dag gis ci bya zhes zer zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-34: bslab pa khyad du gsod na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-35: khyad du gsod pa'i bsam pas ngag dang tshig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:127b-43: ngag gi rnam par rig byed brjod na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:127b-44: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:128a-1: 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-2: dge slong gi sde snod gsum las /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-3: mdo sde ma gtogs pa 'dul ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-4: chos mngon pa las 'dul bar gtogs pa gang yang rung ba la brnyas thabs su gyur pa brjod na khyad du gsod pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:128a-5: 'di'i byed pa po ni sde snod gsum las 'dul bar gtogs pa thams cad dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-7: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-8: khyad du gsod pa'i bsam pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-13: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:128a-14: khyad du gsod pa'i ltung byed de bcu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-17: sa bon 'phya ba bsgo ba dang //
T08TD4104.1E:128a-18: khri dang gding ba skrod pa dang //
T08TD4104.1E:128a-20: rim pa gnyis su rtsig pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:128a-23: sdom la zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-24: dgos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:128a-25: bcu pa gnyis pa 'dis kyang ltung byed kyi chos bcu bstan te /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-26: sa bon dang skye ba 'jig pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-28: bsgo ba rnal gzon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-29: gnas mal dang gding ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-32: rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-33: srog chags dang bcas pa la spyod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-34: gtsug lag khang gi ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:128a-35: de la sa bon dang skye ba 'jig pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-36: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-37: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:128a-38: de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag / rang gi lag gis shing ljon pa gcod du 'jug par yang byed /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-39: rtsva sngon po rngar 'jug par yang byed /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-40: me tog dag 'thog cing 'thog tu 'jug pa yang byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-41: gzhan mu stegs can dag / shes ldan dag sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni 'di ltar byed de /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-42: bram ze dang khyim bdag 'di dag kyang de ltar byed pas /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-45: khyim bdag 'di dag la bye brag ni ci yod /
T08TD4104.1E:128a-47: tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-0: su zhig dge sbyong mgo re ga 'di dag la bsos snyoms sbyin pa @128b dag bya bar sems zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-2: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das pa gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:128b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-5: 'byung po'i gnas 'jig gam 'jig tu 'jud na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-8: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-9: nyes pa ni sa bon gyi tshogs dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-11: de la sa bon gyi tshogs zhes bya ba ni sa bon lnga ste /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-16: sa bon gyi sa bon nyid ni lnga pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:128b-17: rtsa ba'i sa bon gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-23: gzhan yang rtsa ba btab pa las rtsa ba nyid skye ba gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:128b-24: sdong bu'i sa bon gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-30: gzhan yang sdong bu btab pa las sdong bu nyid skye ba gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:128b-31: tho gu'i sa bon gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-36: gzhan yang tho gu btab pa las tho gu nyid skye ba nyid gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:128b-37: 'gas pa'i sa bon gang zhe na aardza ka dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-39: pha ni na rdza ka dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-42: gzhan yang 'gas pa btab pa las 'gas pa nyid skye ba gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:128b-43: sa bon gyi sa bon gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-50: gzhan yang sa bon nyid btab pa las sa bon nyid skye ba gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:128b-51: 'byung po'i gnas zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-52: 'byung po zhes bya ba ni grog sbur dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-55: til dang phub ma za ba dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-56: sbrul dang sdig pa dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-57: sbrang bu tree ma bu ka dang /
T08TD4104.1E:128b-58: tree la ta ka dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:128b-59: de dag gi gnas zhes bya ba ni shing ljon pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:128b-60: de dag 'jig gam 'jig tu 'jud na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-1: dag bdag nyid kyis byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-3: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-8: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-9: 'tshed par byed ltung bar byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:129a-10: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-11: so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed de /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-12: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:129a-13: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-14: dge slong gis sa bon gyi tshogs dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-16: sa bon dang khye'u kha 'thon pa rung bar ma byas pa ma nyams pa nyid du shes bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-17: tha na rtsva rgyun yan chad thabs ji ltar yang rung bas nyams par 'dun par rang ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-18: gzhan gyis kyang nyams par byas /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-19: nyams par bya ba'i sdong bu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-20: 'bru la sogs pa'i grangs ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sa bon gyi tshogs dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-21: 'byung po'i gnas 'jig pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:129a-24: khye'u kha 'thon pa rung bar ma byas pa dag gis ma nyams pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:129a-25: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-26: sa bon dang khye'u kha 'thon ba rung bar ma byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-28: rang dang gzhan gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-29: thabs gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-30: nyams par byas pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:129a-31: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:129a-32: sa bon dang skye ba 'jig pa'i ltung byed de bcu gcig pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-34: // /'phya ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-35: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-36: 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:129a-37: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-38: dge 'dun gyis gnas mal 'bogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-39: zas la bsko bar bskos pa'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-41: sa las skyes gnyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-42: tshe rabs tshe rabs nas rjes su 'brel pa'i kho na yod pas /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-43: dge slong mdza' bo dang sa las skyes gnyis /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-44: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang lhan cig 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'khod pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:129a-45: tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-0: de gnyis kyis nye dga' la @129b smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-1: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' gal te khyod kyang /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-2: dge 'dun gyis gnas mal 'bogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-3: zas la bsko bar bskos par gyur na /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-4: kho bo cag la 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-5: dper na tshe dang ldan ba gyad bu nor ram /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-6: kha cig bzhin du tho 'tshams par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:129b-7: nye dags de gnyis la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-8: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed gnyis dge 'dun mthun pas dge slong gang gnas mal 'bogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-9: zas la bsko bar bskos par shes bzhin du de la ngor 'phya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-12: kho bo cag gnyis 'dur yang mi dbang ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-13: ci kho bo cag gnyis kyis 'ga' zhig gi ming ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-14: rus nas smos sam zhes zer ba'i skabs te /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-15: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-17: dge slong dag khyod kyis dge slong mdza' bo dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-19: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa de gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis ngor 'phya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-20: gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'i grangs su chug shig / dge slong rnams kyis de gnyis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis ngor 'phya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-21: gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'i grangs su bcug kyang /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-22: de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-23: ngor 'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-24: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun mthun pas /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-25: dge slong gang gnas mal 'bogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-26: zas la bsko bar bskos par shes bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-28: gzhogs 'phyas byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-30: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-31: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:129b-32: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-33: 'phya'am gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-35: gang zag ni mdza' bo dang sa las skyes gnyis /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-36: nyon mongs pa ni mi bzod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-37: nyes pa ni dge 'dun gyi las byed pa'i dge slong la 'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:129b-38: de la 'phya'am gzhogs 'phyas byed na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:129b-39: 'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas bya ba'i bsam pas ngag dang tshig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-6: ngag gi rnam par rig byed brjod na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:130a-7: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:130a-8: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam pa gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-9: dge slong gang dge 'dun gyis gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las su bskos pa las kyis sbyor ba bag yangs su byas pa yang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-10: ma bskos pa las kyis sbyor ba bag yangs su ma byas pa yang rung ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-11: bdag dang 'brel ba'i don gyis skur pas ngor 'phya yang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-12: gzhogs 'phyas byed kyang rung ba dge 'dun gyis de'i grangs su bcu gnas yang byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-13: 'phya ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:130a-15: dge slong gang zag bcu gnyis kyis las su bskos pa las kyis sbyor ba ba g-yangs su byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-16: ma bskos pa las kyis sbyor ba bdag yangs su ma byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-19: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-20: dge slong dge 'dun gyis gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las su bskos pa sbyor ba bag yangs su pa'am ma bskos pa sbar ba bag yangs su ma byas ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-26: dge 'dun gyis de'i grangs su bcug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:130a-27: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:130a-28: 'phya ba'i ltung byed de bcu gnyis pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-30: // / bsgo ba rnal gzon pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-31: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das koo sh'amb'i na /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-32: gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:130a-33: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du phyir mi byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-34: de la dge slong don 'dod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-37: bde ba la reg par 'dod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-39: bde ba 'dod pa rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-40: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du phyir gyis shig / des smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:130a-41: su la ltung ba byung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-0: su 'gyod pa'i phyir byed par 'gyur @130b ro //
T08TD4104.1E:130b-1: gal te tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag la ltung ba byung na /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-2: kho bo'i mdun du ma 'chags par gzhan gyi mdun du shogs shig / tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag ni /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-4: shing ljon pa dag gi lo ma sna tshogs rlung gis blags pa dag gcig tu ltung zhing gcig tu 'dug pa bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-7: khyim sna tshogs nas rab tu byung ba dag yin gyi /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-8: kho bo'i 'phags pas ni byang chub thugs su chud pa yin no zhes de dge slong rnams kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-9: cang mi smra bas rna la gzon par byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-10: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-12: dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong 'dun pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-13: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa de gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-14: cang mi smra bas rnal gzon pa'i grangs su chug shig / dge 'dun gyis de gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-15: cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangs su bcug kyang /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-16: de dge slong rnams kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-17: cang mi smra bas rna la gzon par byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-18: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag / dge slong rnams kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-19: cang mi smra bas rna la gzon par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-21: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-22: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:130b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-24: bsgo ba rna la gzon na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-27: nyon mongs pa ni log thabs su byed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-28: nyes pa ni dge slong gis bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:130b-29: de la bsgo ba rna la gzon na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-30: bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i bsam pas ngag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:130b-39: ngag gi rnam par rig byed brjod na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:130b-40: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:131a-0: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam @131a * //
T08TD4104.1E:131a-2: dge slong gis gleng bar gtogs pa'i bsgo ba tshig gis rna la gzon par 'dun pas gzhan brjod pas rna la gzon na /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-3: bsgo ba rna la gzon po'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:131a-5: dge slong gis gleng bar gtogs pa'i bsgo ba tshig gis rna la gzon pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:131a-6: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-8: gleng bar gtogs pa'i bsgo ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-9: de'i tshig gis rna la gzon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-10: dge 'dun gyis de'i grangs su bcug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:131a-11: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:131a-12: bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i ltung byed de bcu gsum pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-14: // / gnas mal gyi ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:131a-16: de'i tshe na khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-17: dge slong gi dge 'dun ni bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:131a-18: bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrubs so //
T08TD4104.1E:131a-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas las byung ba ni bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par sgrub par mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-21: nang du yang dag 'jog la bzhed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-22: lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-23: nad pa lta bar bzhed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-24: gnas mal la rtog par bzhed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-25: 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:131a-26: don 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das gnas mal la rtog par bzhed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-27: 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhir bca' bar bzhed pas /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-28: rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrub par mdzad do //
T08TD4104.1E:131a-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-30: lde mig bsnams te kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra bar /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-31: gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang du /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-32: khang khyim nas khang khyim du /
T08TD4104.1E:131a-34: gol bar gshegs shing mthar gyis gshegs pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-0: @131b khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang zhig ga la ba der gshegs so //
T08TD4104.1E:131b-1: de'i tshe na khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang de na gnas mal rab tu mang po dag / bla gab med par bzhag cing dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po 'dus par gzigs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-2: ae ma zhes gsung zhing smad nas 'di snyam du dgongs te bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-3: pags pa dang sha dang khrag btsir cing sbyin pa dag sbyin /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-4: bsod nams dag byed pa gang yin pa de la /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-5: dge slong dag drod mi shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-6: so sor mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod par byed do snyam du dgongs nas rdzu 'phrul gyis dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po de phyir dgag pa mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-7: gnas mal rab tu mang po de dag skyabs yod par brubs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-8: dbyar gyi na bza' ras chen bsnams te /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-10: bar rim na bzhugs shing sku bsil nas dge slong dag slar 'khor nas snga ma bzhin du yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi khri'am /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-15: gor bu bla gab med par bting ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-16: 'ding du bcug nas ma bsdus sam sdud du ma bcug gam /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-17: dge slong 'khod pa la ma bcol bar de nas song na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-19: gang zag ni dge slong rab tu mang po /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-20: nyon mongs pa ni drod mi shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-21: so sor mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod par byed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-22: nyes pa ni gnas mal rab tu mang po dag bla gab med par bzhag pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:131b-23: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:131b-24: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:131b-25: khri'am zhes bya ba yang khri nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:131b-26: khri'u 'am zhes bya ba ni khri'u nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:131b-27: stan nang tshangs can nam zhes bya ba ni shing bal can no //
T08TD4104.1E:131b-28: la ba'am zhes bya ba ni la ba nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:131b-29: sngas sam zhes bya ba ni sngas su gzhug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:131b-30: gor bu zhes bya ba ni gru bzhi'o /
T08TD4104.1E:131b-31: bla gab me dpar zhes bya ba ni ma g-yogs par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:131b-32: bting ngam zhes bya ba ni rang gis so //
T08TD4104.1E:131b-33: 'ding du bcug nas zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:131b-34: ma bsdus sam zhes bya ba ni rang gis so //
T08TD4104.1E:131b-35: sdud du ma bcug gam zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-0: dge slong 'khod pa la zhes bya ba ni @132a * //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-1: de na dge slong gang 'dug pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-2: ma bcol bar zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-3: bcol ba ni rnam pa lnga ste /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-4: gtsug lag khang 'di re zhes bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-5: gtsug lag khang ltos shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-6: gnas mal 'de re zhes bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-7: gnas mal sdus shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-8: sgo lcags chug shig zhes bya ba nyid ni lnga pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-9: gal te dge slong med na dge tshul la bcol bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-10: gal te dge tshul med na khyim bdag la bcol bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-11: gal te khyim bdag med na phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te lde mig sbas te 'gro bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-12: gal te lam kar dge slong mthong na kho bos phyogs che ge mo zhig tu lde mig sbas kyis long shig ces brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-13: de nas song na zhes bya ba ni nyen kor spongs na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-14: de'i nyen kor ni 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshun chad de /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-15: de yang rtsig pa la sogs pas ma bskor ba la ni rung nyid nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-16: bskor ba la ni sgo khang nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-17: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-18: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-19: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-20: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gnas mal khri dang khri'u dang /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-24: gor bu la sogs pa gnas kyi yan lag tu gtogs pa gang yang rung ba rang ngam bskos pas bla gab med par bzhag pa ma bsdus sam /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-26: dge slong 'khod pa la ma bcol bar 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i mtha' las 'das par song na gnas mal phan phun du ma gyur kyang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-29: gnas mal phan phun du gyur na nyen kor las ma 'das kyang rung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-30: gnas mal gyi ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-31: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge 'dun gyi gnas mal nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-32: rang ngam bskos pas bla gab med par gzhag pa byas pa lta bu ni byed pa po dag yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:132a-33: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-34: dge 'dun gyi gnas mal nyid dang rang ngam bskos pas bla gab med par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-35: ma bsdus sam sdud du ma bcug gam dge slong 'khod pa la ma bcol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:132a-37: de nyid du gnyid log gam /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-0: @132b snyoms par zhugs pa la sogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-1: phan phun gsum po rlung gis bzlog gam /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-2: char pas rim pa gzhan slebs sam /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-3: sril la sogs pas rim pa bzhin slebs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-5: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:132b-6: gnas mal gyi ltung byed de bcu bzhi pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-8: // / gding ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-10: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:132b-11: lho phyogs nas dge slong rgan pa dang gzhon pa gnyis shig bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mnyan yod du 'ongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-12: rgan pa shos kyi gtsug lag khang ni gnas mal dang bcas pa zhig tu bskos /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-13: gzhon pa shos kyi gtsug lag khang ni gnas mal med pa zhig tu bskos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-14: gzhon pa shos de sgrub phod pa zhig yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-15: des rtsva mang po dag blangs nas pus mo nub tsam gyi gding ba bshams so //
T08TD4104.1E:132b-16: rgan pa des bsams pa gzhon nu de'i gtsug lag khang ji lta bu zhig tu bskos pa je bltas 'gro'o snyam nas de der song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-17: ji tsam na gding ba bzang po bshams pa mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-19: bdag ji srid du gnas mal phyir gtod par byed pa de srid du sang 'gro ba 'phyis par 'gyur gyis 'di nyid du 'dug go snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-20: des gnas mal dang bcas pa'i gtsug lag khang de dge slong gnas mal 'bogs pa la phyir gtad nas /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-21: de gnyi ga gtsug lag khang der mtshan gnas nas nang par sngar langs te dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:132b-22: phyogs de sa snum zhing dngar ba yin pas rtsva bting ba dag la sril dag chags nas /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-23: gtsug lag khang de'i phyi nang bcas pa thams cad sril gyis khyab par gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-24: ae ma zhes gsung zhing smad nas 'di snyam du dgongs te /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-25: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis pags pa dang sha dang khrag dag btsir zhing sbyin pa dag sbyin /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-26: bsod nams dag byed pa gang yin pa de la dge slong dag drod mi shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-27: so sor mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod do snyam du dgongs nas snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:132b-28: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du rtsva'i gding ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-2: 'ding du bcug nas ma bsdus sam /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-4: dge slong 'khod pa la ma bcol bar de nas song na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-6: gang zag ni lho phyogs pa'i dge slong gnyis /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-7: nyon mongs pa ni drod mi shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-8: so sor mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod par byed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-9: nyes pa ni dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du gding ba mang po dag bting nas ma bsdus par de nas song ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-10: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-11: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-13: gtsug lag khang du zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-14: gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-17: nyal ba dag byar rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-18: rtsva'i gding ba'am zhes bya ba ni rtsva dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-19: lo ma'i gding ba zhes bya ba ni lo ma dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-20: bting ngam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-21: sdud du ma bcug gam zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-22: dge slong 'khod pa la zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-23: de na dge slong gang yod pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-24: ma bcol bar zhes bya ba ni ma gtad par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-25: de nas song na zhes bya ba ni nyen kor spangs nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-26: de'i nyen kor 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshun chad de /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-27: de yang rtsig pa la sogs pas ma bskor ba la ni drung nyid nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-28: bskor ba la ni sgo khang nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-29: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-31: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:133a-32: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par bzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-33: dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang rdo ba dang bye ma'i gzhi nyid la sogs pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pas snum zhing dang rab sril la sogs pa'i srog chags skye ba de lta bu'i nyes dmigs yod pa nyid kyis gzhir rang ngam bskos pas rtsva'am lo ma'i gding ba bting ba ma bsdus sam /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-35: dge slong 'khod pa la ma bcol bar 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i mtha' las 'das par song na gtsug lag khang du nyes dmigs su ma gyur kyang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:133a-36: de nyid du gnyid log gam /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-1: gtsug lag khang du nyes dmigs su gyur na /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-2: nyen kor las ma 'das kyang rung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-3: gding ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:133b-4: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-5: rdo ba dang bye ma'i gzhi nyid la sogs pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-6: sril la sogs pa skye ba de lta bu'i nyes dmigs yod pa nyid kyi gzhir rang ngam bskos pas rtsva dang lo ma la sogs pa'i gding ba byas pa nyid lta bu ni byed pa po dag yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:133b-7: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-8: dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-9: rang ngam bskos pas de lta bu'i nyes dmigs yod pa nyid kyis gzhir bting ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-12: dge slong 'khod pa la ma bcol ba dang nye 'khor las 'das sam /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-13: de nyid du gnyid log gam /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-15: nyes dmigs sril la sogs pa gang byung yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:133b-16: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:133b-17: gding ba'i ltung byed de bco lnga pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-19: // / skrod pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-21: mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so ;
T08TD4104.1E:133b-22: / de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-23: tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg / ljongs rgyur 'dong dang /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-24: der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-25: rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-26: rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-27: khyed cag kyang ltung bzed dang /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-36: yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o zhes spro bar byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-37: 'char kas de dag rang la gnas 'char bcug ste ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang dag gi 'dab tu phyin pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-38: gtsug lag khang der dge 'dun gyi sa gnas mal gyi gand'i brdungs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:133b-39: 'char ka'i nye gnas rnams ni nang du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-0: 'char ka dang rang rang gi gnas mal mnos te bsdad na 'char ka phyi rol na 'du 'dzi'i gtam la yengs pa nam @134a * //
T08TD4104.1E:134a-1: sros kyi bar du ma 'ongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-2: de dag gis 'char ka'i gnas mal sdug gu bshams te /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-3: gcig la gcig zhus nas nyal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-4: ci tsam mig lam chod pa'i dus kyi tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-6: nye gnas de dag phyi rol du bskrad do //
T08TD4104.1E:134a-7: de dag de na mtshan thog thag bla gab med par lhags pas nyen cing na bar gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-8: nang par sngar langs te mnyan yod du dong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-9: bdag cag ji ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-10: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas dge slong skrod par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-12: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-13: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:134a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-15: yang dge slong gang khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-16: yid ma rangs nas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas dge slong skrod dam /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-17: skrod du 'jug na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-20: nyon mongs pa ni gnod sems /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-21: nyes pa ni dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas dge slong skrod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:134a-22: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:134a-23: khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-24: khro zhing khro ba'i zil gyis non nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:134a-25: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:134a-26: gtsug lag khang nas zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-27: gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-30: nyal ba dag byar rung ba nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:134a-31: dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o skrod dam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:134a-32: skrod du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:134a-33: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag ste'o ;
T08TD4104.1E:134a-34: ; ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:134a-35: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:134a-36: dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas rang ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-0: bsnyen par ma rdzogs par dge slong bskrad par bya ba de la gnod pa srog gi bar @134b chad la sogs pa skye bar dgos pa yod dam /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-1: skyes pa nye bar zhi bar mi 'gyur bar dogs pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-2: dge 'dun 'khrug pa skye bar 'gyur bar dogs pa yod dam /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-3: skyes pa nye bar zhi bar mi 'gyur bar dogs pa yong pa'i gnyen po 'dod pa ma yin pa'i bsam pa gang yang rung bas skrod na//
T08TD4104.1E:134b-4: skrod pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:134b-5: 'di'i byed pa po ni bskrad par bya ba dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-6: gang nas bskrad par bya ba dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nyid dag ni byed pa po nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:134b-7: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-8: bskrad par bya ba dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-9: gang nas bskrad par bya ba dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-10: rang ngam dge slong gzhan nam /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-12: bsnyen par rdzogs pa gang yang rung bas skrod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-13: gal te de la gnod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-15: nye bar zhi ba mi 'gyur ba'i gnyen po 'dod pa ma yin pa'i bsam pa gang yang rung bas skrod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-17: de dag las yan lag lag mtshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:134b-18: skrod pa'i ltung byed de bcu drug pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-20: // / phyis gnon gyi ltung byed kyi gleng bzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal du rgyal byed kyi tshal /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-22: mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:134b-23: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-24: dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-25: tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg / ljongs rgyur 'dong dang /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-26: der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-27: rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-28: rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing khyed cag kyang ltung bzed dang /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-37: yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o zhes spro bar byas nas 'char kas de dgar ngal gnas 'char bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-38: ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig gi 'dab tu phyin pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-39: gtsug lag khang der dge 'dun gyis gnas mal gyi gand'i brdungs nas 'char ka'i nye gnas rnams ni drung du dong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:134b-40: 'char ka dang rang gi gnas mal mnos te bsdad na /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-1: na 'du 'dzi'i gtam la yengs pa nam sros kyi bar du ma 'ongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-2: de dag gis 'char ka'i gnas mal sdug gu bshams te /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-3: gcig la gcig zhus nas nyal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-4: ji tsam mig lam chad pa'i dus kyi tshe 'char ka 'ongs nas sgo brdungs te nang du zhugs na /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-5: des de dag kha cig la gru mos bsnun /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-6: kha cig la ni pus mos bsnun nas /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-7: su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyid rkyen du byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-8: phyis gnon byas nas nye gnas de dag phyi rol du byung ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:135a-9: de dag de na mtshan thog thag bla gab med par lhags pas nyen cing na bar gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-10: nang par sngar langs te mnyan yod du dong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-11: bdag cag ji ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-12: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-13: dge slong dge 'dun gyi gtsug la khang nas dge slong dag snga na 'khod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-14: shes bzhin du phyis 'ongs nas su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur ba /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-15: de nyid rkyen du byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-16: phyis gnon byed cing stan la nyal ba dang 'dug par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-18: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-19: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-21: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-22: dge slong dag snga na 'khod par shes bzhin du phyis 'ongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-23: su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyid rkyen du byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-24: phyis gnon byas nas stan la nyal lam 'dug na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-26: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni tho 'tshams pa / nyes pa ni dge slong la phyis gnon byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:135a-27: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-28: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:135a-29: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:135a-30: gtsug lag khang na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-31: gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:135a-34: nyal ba dag byar rung ba na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:135a-35: dge slong dag ces bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:135a-36: snga na 'khod pa zhes bya ba ni snga na gnas par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-0: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang gis rig par gyur @135b pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:135b-1: gzhan dag gis bstan pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-2: phyis 'ongs nas zhes bya ba ni de'i 'og tu 'ongs nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-3: su la gnod pa zhes bya ba ni su bde ba la reg par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-4: de 'gro bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:135b-5: de de nas gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-6: de nyid rkyen du byas te zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:135b-8: phyis gnon byas nas zhes bya ba ni gnod pas zil gyis mnan nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-9: stan la zhes bya ba ni gnas mal lo //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-10: nyal lam zhes bya ba ni lus bsnyal na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-11: 'dug na zhes bya ba ni rku ba tshos bzhag na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-12: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-13: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:135b-14: dge slong na ba dang 'jigs pa'i dbang ma gtogs par tho btsams pa'i bsam pas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi gnas su dge slong gzhan sngar zhugs pa nyid du shes bzhin du phyis 'ongs nas su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyid rkyen du byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:135b-15: phyis gnon byas nas stan la nyal lam 'dug na phyis gnon gyi ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-16: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong na ba dang 'jigs pa'i dbang ma gtogs par dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi gnas su dge slong gzhan sngar zhugs pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-17: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:135b-18: gang la phyis gnon bya ba de nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:135b-19: gang la phyis gnon bya ba dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:135b-20: gang du phyis gnon bya ba dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:135b-23: na ba dang 'jigs pa'i dbang ma gtogs par phyis gnon byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-24: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-25: phyis gnon gyi ltung byed de bcu bdun pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:135b-27: // / rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-28: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed ki tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:135b-29: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nye dags dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la /
T08TD4104.1E:135b-30: tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg / ljongs rgyur 'dong dang /
T08TD4104.1E:135b-31: der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya /
T08TD4104.1E:135b-32: rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-2: khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-12: nad g-yog gis brel ba med par bya'o zhes spro bar byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-13: de gang gi tshe dge slong rnams kyis 'di gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-14: 'ga' yang de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba med do //
T08TD4104.1E:136a-15: bsod snyoms pa zhig gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-16: btsun pa nye dga' kho bo khyod dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro'o //
T08TD4104.1E:136a-17: dge slong rnams kyis bsod snyoms pa de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-18: bsod snyoms pa de ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin pas khyod la tho 'tshams par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:136a-20: kho bo ni lo 'das pa yin pas kho bo de la gnas bca' ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-25: yid la bya ba'i las rag lus pa cung zad kyang med pas /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-26: des kho bo la ci byar yod /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-27: des dge slong de dag gi tshig tshig ma yin par byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-28: de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:136a-29: nye dags gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi mtshams 'das pa de'i tshe na smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-30: bsod snyoms pa gtur bu 'di re zhig khyer cig /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-31: btsun pa nye dags ci khyod kyis sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun ma mthong ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-32: yo byad don med pa 'dis ci bya /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-34: bsod snyoms pa khyed re zhig mi khyer ba ni yus na /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-35: ci khyod kho bo bas kyang mkhas pa yin snyam mam /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-36: ci na khyod kho bo la de skad zer /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-38: mkhas pa ma yin yang rigs pa tsam smra'o //
T08TD4104.1E:136a-40: bsod snyoms pa 'di mi dga' bar bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-41: de gnyis mthar gyis ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-42: ri brags kyi gtsug khang zhig gi 'dab tu phyin pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-43: gtsug lag khang der dge 'dun gyis gnas mal gyi gand'i brdungs nas bsod snyoms pa ni nang du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-44: nye dga' dang rang gi gnas mal mnos te bsdad na /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-45: nye dga' phyi rol na 'du 'dzi'i gtam la yengs pa nam sros kyi bar du ma 'ongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-46: bsod snyoms pa des khar thog tu nye dga'i mal bshams nas rkang pa'i chu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:136a-47: rkang pa bsku ba mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-0: bdag nyid gtsug lag @136b khang gi phyi rol tu rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-1: 'og khang du mal bshams par zhugs te nyal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-2: ji tsam mig lam chad pa'i dus kyi tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-3: nye dga' 'ongs nas sgo brdungs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-4: bsod snyoms pas sgo ma phye bar steng du mal bshams par nyol cig ces smras so //
T08TD4104.1E:136b-5: nye dga' khang thog tu 'dzegs nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te gnas khang du zhugs nas bsod snyoms pa zhes bos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-6: bsod snyoms pas btsun pa nye dga' ci zer zhes byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:136b-7: nye dga' sgra la mkhas pas des bsod snyoms pa'i 'phral ba'i thad kar khri rkang gtad de /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-8: ci nas kyang khri rkang gis khang thog brtol nas bsod snyoms pa de'i dpral bar 'bab par 'gyur ba de ltar shugs drag pos mnan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-9: des bsod snyoms pa de'i 'phral bar phog pas 'phral ba zhom mo //
T08TD4104.1E:136b-11: btsun pa nye dga' kho bo gnad do kho bo gnad do //
T08TD4104.1E:136b-13: kye bsod snyoms pa ci zer /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-15: gal te skad phyung na 'dis rgan rims kyis khri yang phrogs par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-16: de cang mi smra bar 'dug 'dug nas nang par sngar langs nas mnyan yod du song nas /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-17: bdag ji ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod pa dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:136b-18: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la shes bzhin du lcid kyis phab ste /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-19: 'dug pa dang nyal bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-21: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-22: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:136b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-24: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la shes bzhin du lcid kyis phab ste 'dug gam nyal na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-27: nyon mongs pa ni tho 'tshams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:136b-28: nyes pa ni dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi yang thog tu rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'dug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:136b-29: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-0: sh'a kya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang @137a * //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-2: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-3: gtsug lag khang gi zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-4: gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-7: nyal ba dag byar rung ba'i 'o //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-8: steng gi nam mkha' la zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-9: khang steng gi nam mkha' la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-10: thog bor bar zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-11: rtsva'i thog gam lo ma'i thog bor ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-12: khri'am zhes bya ba ni khri nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-13: khri'u 'am zhes bya ba yang khri'u nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-14: rtsa ba 'byung ba la zhes bya ba ni rkang pa 'byung ba la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-15: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-16: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-17: lcid kyis phab ste zhes bya ba ni mthus mnan te'o //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-18: 'dug gam zhes bya ba ni rkub tshos 'jog par byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-19: nyal na zhes bya ba ni lus bsnyal na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-20: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-21: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-22: dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi thog byin gyis gzhol ba nyid dam /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-24: de dang 'dra bas g-yogs pa nyid ma yin par gnan par 'os pa khri la sogs pa'i rtsa ba phur bu ltar dbyung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-27: rkang rten bcug pa nyid ma yin par shes bzhin du lcid kyis phab ste gnon par byed na rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'dug pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-28: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi thog nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-29: gnan par 'os pa khri la sogs pa'i rtsa ba 'byung ba nyid gnon pa la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:137a-30: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-31: dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi thog byin gyis gzhol ba nyid dam /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-33: de dang 'dra bas g-yogs pa nyid ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-34: gnan par 'os pa khri la sogs pa'i rtsa ba 'byung ba bkan pa nyid dam /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-35: rkang rten bcug pa nyid ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:137a-39: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:137b-0: rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'dug pa'i ltung byed de @137b bco brgyad pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-2: // / srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das koo sh'amb'i na gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:137b-4: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chus rtsva dang lci ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-7: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-8: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa khyod shes bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-9: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chus rtsva dang /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-11: sa la ma 'debs shig 'debs su ma 'jud cig /'dun pas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-12: kho bo la 'ga' zhig gis bgrangs te gtad dam /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-13: ci shar gyi rgya mtsho chen por 'dong na ci nyes /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-16: byang gi rgya mtsho chen por 'dong na ci nyes /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-18: lteng ka dag tu 'dug na ci nyes zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-19: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chus rtsva dang lci ba dang sa la 'debs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-20: 'debs su 'jud par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-22: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-23: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:137b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-25: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chus rtsva'am lci ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-27: 'debs su 'jug na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-30: nyon mongs pa ni bag med pa /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-31: nyes pa ni shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu rang spyod pa'i don las gzhan du spyod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:137b-32: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-33: 'dun pa'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:137b-34: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-35: de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-36: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:137b-37: srog chags dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-38: srog chags dang bcas pa ni gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-39: gang dag mig gis mthong bar gyur pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:137b-40: gang dag chu tshags kyis zin par gyur pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:137b-41: chus zhes bya ba ni chu nyid kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:137b-42: rtsva'am zhes bya ba ni rtsva nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:137b-43: lci ba'am zhes bya ba ni lci ba nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:137b-44: sa la zhes bya ba yang sa nyid la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:138a-0: 'debs sam zhes bya ba ni rang gis @138a * //
T08TD4104.1E:138a-2: /'debs su 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:138a-3: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:138a-4: 'dir srog chags dang bcas pa la spyod pa'i ltung byed dang /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-5: 'og nas srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'i ltung byed ces 'byung ba de gnyis spyi'i mtshan nyid ni 'dra'o //
T08TD4104.1E:138a-6: bye brag tu 'di ni rang spyod pa ma yin pa'i don nyid la 'jug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-7: 'jug tu 'jug pa de gnyis kyi yul la rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:138a-8: 'og ma ni rang spyod pa'i don nyid la 'jug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-9: 'jug tu 'jud pa de gnyis kyi yul la rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:138a-10: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-11: dge slong gis shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chus rtsva 'am lci ba 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-12: sa la sogs pa rang spyod pa ma yin pa'i yul la 'debs sam /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-13: 'debs su 'jud na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags re re shi ba'i mthar srog chags dang bcas pa la spyod pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:138a-14: 'di'i byed pa po ni rang spyod pa ma yin pa'i don du /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-15: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:138a-16: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-17: rang spyod pa ma yin pa'i don gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-18: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags gang yang rung ba dang bcas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-21: srog chags ji snyed shi ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:138a-22: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:138a-23: srog chags dang bcas pa la spyod pa'i ltung byed de bcu dgu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-26: // / gtsug lag khang gi ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-27: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das koo sh'amb'i na gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:138a-28: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa drug sde dag gzhan gyis byed du bcug pa'i gtsug lag khang na gnas shing 'phyas 'dogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-29: dge slong rnams kyis smad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-30: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa nga rgyal skyes nas /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-31: des koo sh'amb'i na bram ze phyug pa /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-34: yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-35: ser sna can mig phra ba /
T08TD4104.1E:138a-36: bya rog la yang gtor ma mi ster ba /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-0: yo byad kun 'dzin pa zhig 'dug pa de dad pa bskyed nas rdzas las @138b byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po dag gi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-1: des gtsug lag khang brtsig par khas blangs te /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-2: k'ara sh'a pa na dag sbyar te smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-3: btsun pa bdag la k'ara sh'a pa na dag ni mchis na /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-4: bsod nams kyi grogs bgyid pa ma mchis so //
T08TD4104.1E:138b-6: kho bos khyod kyi bsod nams kyi grogs byas /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-7: 'di ltar khyed kyis kho bo dge 'dun gyis lag gi glar bskor chug shig / bram ze de gtsug lag khang du song nas dge 'dun la gsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-8: de na dag dge 'dun gyi nang na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed pas /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-10: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa gang gi tshe kho bos rgyal byed kyi tshal rtsig tu bcug pa de'i tshe yang kho bo sus kyang lag gi glar ma bskos so //
T08TD4104.1E:138b-11: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba rtsig tu bcug pa de'i tshe na yang de sus kyang lag gi glar ma bskos so //
T08TD4104.1E:138b-12: khyed kyang gal te gtsug lag khang byed du 'jug par 'dod na ma bskos pa nyid du byed du chug shig / tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pas bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-13: lhung bzed nag po can dag bdag can mthong bar yang mi dga' na /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-14: lag gi glar bskos te dad par ga la 'gyur snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-15: bram ze de'i gan du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-16: k'ara sh'a pan dag blangs nas so phag mkhan dang /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-21: gla mi'i gnas su song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-22: k'ara sh'a pa na dag byin nas de'i nyi ma gcig kho nas gtsug lag khang chen po sum rtseg sgo'i sbubs kyi gnas dang /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-25: chu khung gi gnas dag kyang ma bzhag par de bzhin kho nar spyad 'dra bar brtsigs te /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-26: de bram ze'i gan du song nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-27: bram ze khyod kyi gtsug lag khang zin gyis tshur shog / dge 'dun la phul cig / bram zes smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-28: 'phags pa deng bdag gis zhal zas sta go nam bgyis kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:138b-29: sang bdag gis zhal zas sta gon bgyis te mchi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:138b-31: gtsug lag chang 'di deng nyid du rdib par gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-0: gal te yongs su ma spyad pa kho nar rdib par gyur na bram ze 'di khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta @139a * //
T08TD4104.1E:139a-1: bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong snyoms par 'jug pa'i gnas pa thob pa dag mtshan mo'i thun dang po la /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-3: gtsug lag khang der bzhag nas /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-4: bcom ldan 'das nyid brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pas kyang /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-5: mtshan mo'i gung thun la der chos bstan pa mdzad nas slar gshegs so //
T08TD4104.1E:139a-6: mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la sprin kha dog lnga pa 'dus nas nges gtsug lag khang de /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-7: dper na spyad chus gang bar bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-8: chus gang bar gyur nas rdib par gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:139a-9: drug sde dag gis de thos nas skrag ste bros so //
T08TD4104.1E:139a-10: bram ze des kyang phyi de nyin par bca' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas shing rta bkang ste 'ongs nas rang gi gtsug lag khang rdib pa mthong nas nga rgyal te sa la 'gyel to //
T08TD4104.1E:139a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-12: bram ze la bka' stsal te /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-13: lha dang mi mang po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsngos te /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-14: gtsug lag khang dag byed du bcug pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su longs ma spyad kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-15: khyod kyi gtsug lag khang gang yin pa 'di ni mdang mtshan mo'i thun dang po la /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-16: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis yongs su longs phyod cing mtshan mo'i gung thun la yang bcom ldan 'das brgya byin dang tshang pa dang bcas pa lha rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pas yongs su longs spyad pas khyod kyis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bsgo'o //
T08TD4104.1E:139a-17: de nas bram ze de btsun pa kun dga' bo gal te de lta na bdag gdugs re re zhing gtsug lag khang 'di lta bu sha stag bgyid du stsol bar yang spro'o zhes zer ba drug sde dag gis thos nas der lhags pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-18: bram ze des de dag la ras yug chen sar pa re re bskon cing /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-19: yo byad thams cad kyis kyang bstabs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:139a-20: drug sde dag kho bo cag gis de ltar bram ze de'i nor de snyed chud gsan du zin kyang /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-0: 'on kyang des kho bo cag la ras yug chen sar pa re re bskon cing yo byad thams cad kyis kyang bstabs par gyur pa de ltar kho bo cag gis bram ze de mngon par dad par byas so zhes rlom par byed @139b nas ;
T08TD4104.1E:139b-1: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-2: dge slong dag yan lag gang gis ngo tsha bar bya ba'i yan lag de nyid kyis rlom par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-4: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-5: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-7: de dge slong gis gtsug lag khang chen po rtsig tu 'jug na sgo'i sbubs dang /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-9: snang ba'i gnas ji tsam pa'i 'du shes kyis sa brtag pa nas bzung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-10: pha gu'i rim pa 'jim pa dang bcas pa gnyis sam gsum brtsig par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-11: de las lhag par brtsigs na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-14: nyon mongs pa ni las ngan pa la dga' ba /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-15: nyes pa ni gtsug lag khang pha gu'i rim pa 'jim pa dang bcas pa gnyis sam gsum las lhag par brtsigs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-16: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-17: gtsug lag khang zhes bya ba ni gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-20: nyal ba dag byar rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-21: chen po zhes bya ba ni chen po gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-22: sbyin par bya ba las dang /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-24: don 'dir ni gnyi ga yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-25: rtsig tu 'jud na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-26: sgo'i sbubs dang gtan pa zhes bya ba ni sgo'i sbubs dang gtan pa gzhug par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-27: snang ba'i gnas ji tsam pa'i 'du shes pas zhes bya ba ni skar khung dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-28: chu khung gi gnas ji tsam gtod par bya ba'i 'du shes kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-29: sa brtag pa nas bzung ste pha gu'i rim pa 'jim pa dang bcas pa gnyis sam gsum zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-30: pha gu'i rim pa zhes bya ba ni pha gu rtseg ma'o //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-31: 'jim pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni sa 'jim pa dang bcas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-32: brtsig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gzhag par bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-33: de las lhag par brtsigs na zhes bya ba ni de las lhag par 'jog na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-34: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:139b-35: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:139b-36: dge slong gis gtsug lag khang spyod lam bzhi shong ba yan chad thams cad rdo'am /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-1: las byas pa ma yin pa char chu bskyab pa'i g-yogs pa ma byas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-4: khyim pa dbang ba yang rung ba yon bdag gis byas sam zin nas blta'o zhes smras pa chu khung dag ma btod pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-5: brkos te rmang gi rtsa ba ma brtsigs pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-6: sgo cha gong ma ma bcug pa yang rung ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-7: rang ngam gzhan gyis nyi ma de nyid la pha gu'i rim pa 'jim pa dang bcas pa gsum las lhag par rtsig gam /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-8: nyi ma gzhan la yang pha gu 'jim pa med par rim pa gsum las lhag par brtsigs na /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-9: gtsug lag khang gi ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:140a-10: 'di'i byed pa po ni gtsug lag khang spyod lam bzhi shong ba yan chad rdo'am /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-12: shing las byas pa ma yin pa char chu bskyab pa'i g-yogs pa ma byas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-16: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-17: gtsug lag khang spyod lam bzhi shong ba yan chad rdo 'am so phag gam shing las byas pa ma yin pa char chu bskyab pa'i g-yogs pa ma byas pa dge 'dun gyi'am gang zag gi'am /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-18: khyim pa yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-19: yon bdag gis byas nas blta'o zhe'am /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-20: zin nas blta'o zhes dge slong rnams la smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-21: chu khung dag ma btod pa 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-22: brkos te rmang gi rtsa ba ma btsugs pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-23: sgo cha gong ma ma bcug pa yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-24: rang ngam gzhan gang yang rung bas rtsig pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-25: nyi ma de nyid la pha gu'i rim pa 'jim pa dang bcas pa gsum las lhag par rtsig gam /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-26: nyi ma gzhan la yang pha gu 'jim pa med par rim pa gsum las lhag par brtsigs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:140a-27: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:140a-28: gtsug lag khang gi ltung byed de nyid shu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-30: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-33: ma bskos nyi ma nub pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-34: zas dang chos gos gnyis dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-35: don mthun gru dang dben pa gnyis /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-36: dge slong ma yis sbyor bcug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:140a-37: zhes bya ba ni bcu pa gsum pa dag yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-38: sdom la zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-39: dgos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:140a-40: bcu pa gsum pa 'dis kyang ltung byed kyi chos bcu bstan te /
T08TD4104.1E:140a-41: ma bskos par ston pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-0: nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa @140b dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:140b-1: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-3: dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'jug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-4: dge slong ma dang lhan cig grur 'jug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-7: dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa za ba'i ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:140b-8: de la ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:140b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gi res kyis dge slong ma la bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-11: dge slong drug sde dag la dge slong ma la ston pa'i res bab pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-12: de dag ci tsam pa de tsam bstan nas de dag dang lhan cig tho 'tshams par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-14: kun du ca co 'don par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-17: lus la reg pa dag byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:140b-18: de na gang dag bdag gir byed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-19: de dag ni de dag dang lhan cig tho 'tshams par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-21: kun du ca co 'don par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-24: lus la rdeg pa dag byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:140b-25: gang dag bdag gri mi byed pa de dag ni 'chags dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-26: dgar dang sgo khang dag na gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa 'di lta bu dag bdag cag la ston par byed do zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-28: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-29: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-31: dge slong drug sde dag dge slong ma'i ston par bsko bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:140b-32: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dge slong ma'i ston par bsko bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-33: de dag gcig gis gcig bskos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-34: mtshams kyi phyi rol tu dong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-35: gcig gis gcig bskos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-36: mtshams kyi nang du dge slong nad pa rnams kyi 'dun pa blangs te /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-37: lhag ma rnams dang mi mthun par byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-38: gcig gis gcig bskos te dge slong ma la ston par byed pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-39: nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-40: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-41: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-43: mtshams kyi phyi rol tu bskos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:140b-44: mtshams kyi phyi rol tu bskos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-1: kyi nang du dge slong nad pa rnams kyi 'dun pa blangs te /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-2: lhag ma rnams dang mi mthun par byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-3: gcig gis gcig bskos te dge slong ma la bstan par mi bya bar /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-4: 'di ltar gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa bskos te /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-6: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-8: gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-9: grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-10: dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-11: gal te sun phyung na yang des ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-12: yang na dge slong ma'i ston pa phyi ma ni sring mo dag khyed cag dge slong ma'i dge 'dun tshogs sam /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-15: kha na ma tho ba med dam /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-16: khyed cag la dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa'i gang zag 'ga' zhig ston par mi byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-17: khyed cag la ston pa'i gang zag 'ga' zhig dge 'dun las 'ong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:141a-18: khyed cag la dge slong 'ga' yang ston par mi spro'o //
T08TD4104.1E:141a-19: khyed cag gi gdams ngag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-20: rjes su bstan pa ni dge 'dun las so //
T08TD4104.1E:141a-21: sring mo dag gis bag yod par sgrubs shig ces bya ba de ston nus pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-22: de lta bu spro bar bya zhing gsol ba dang gnyis kyis bsko bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:141a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-24: drug sde dag ma bskos pa kho nar dge slong ma la ston par byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-25: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag ma bskos pa kho nar dge slong ma la ston par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-27: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-28: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:141a-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-30: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyis ma bskos par dge slong ma la ston na /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-31: chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-35: nyes pa ni ma bskos par dge slong ma la ston pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:141a-36: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-37: drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:141a-38: dge 'dun kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:141a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:141b-0: ma bskos par @141b zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:141b-1: dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:141b-2: ston na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-6: chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni tshe dang ldan pa lam pa'i chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:141b-7: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-9: yi dags dang ngan song dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-11: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed 'tshed par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-13: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na ;
T08TD4104.1E:141b-14: dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-15: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:141b-16: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-17: dge slong dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong bco lnga pa la mtshams kyi nang du spro par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-18: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis ma bskos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-20: ston pa phyi ma'i yon tan de dag las gcig dang yang mi ldan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-21: ma bskos pa yon tan de dag dang ldan yang rung ba /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-22: dge slong ma la ston na ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:141b-23: 'di'i byed pa po ni ma bskos par dge slong ma la ston pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:141b-24: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-25: gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la 'tshams kyi nang du dge 'dun gyis spro bar byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-26: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis ma bskos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-28: ston pa phyi ma'i yon tan de dag las gcig dang yang mi ldan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-29: ma bskos pa yon tan de dag dang ldan yang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-30: mi ldan yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-31: dge slong ma rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig la sogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-32: sde snod gsum gyi chos gang yang rung ba ston pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:141b-33: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:141b-34: ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gcig pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-36: // / nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-37: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:141b-38: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:141b-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-1: slong ma la thoms shig / dge slong ma la rjes su ston cig / dge slong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-2: dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog 'khor lnga brgya dang /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-3: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-4: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:142a-5: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-6: bud med ni shes rab chung ba yin no snyam nas des de la don dang tshig dang yi ge mdor bsdus pa 'dus pa dag gis chos bstan to //
T08TD4104.1E:142a-7: de shes rab can yin pas gong nas gong du 'dri bar byed nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis lan btab cing /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-8: des de la ci tsam na nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab pa de tsam gyi bar du chos bstan nas /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-9: de dag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te dong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-10: ji tsam na mnyan yod kyi sgo dag bcad par gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-11: dge slong ma rnams kyis sgo ba la sgo phye shig ces bos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-12: lde mig rgyal po'i pho brang du khyer zin to zhes zer ro //
T08TD4104.1E:142a-15: mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring ba kun dga' ra ba zhig yod pa der de dag dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:142a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis shing ljon pa yang rgan rims kyis bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-17: de dag shing ljon pa dag rgan rims kyis bsko ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-18: gcig la gcig 'bod pa'i sgra mthon po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-19: sgra chen po 'byung ba mnyan yod 'joms par 'dod pa'i g-yon can lnga brgya tsam de na bskur pa dag gis thos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-20: de dag gis dge slong ma rnams btsun mo'i 'khor yin snyam nas gzhom bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-21: autpa la'i mdog gis rgyal bu 'phags skyes po'i dpung sprul te rnga brdungs pa dang de dag skrag ste byer ro //
T08TD4104.1E:142a-22: dge slong ma dag nang par sngar langs te mnyan yod du zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-24: khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-25: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyis chos 'dre ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-26: lhag par 'dre zhing tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed pa bzang ngo zhes tho 'tshams par byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:142a-27: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-0: dge slong ma la ston @142b par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-2: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-3: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:142b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-5: dge slong gang dge 'dun gyis bskos kyang nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-7: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-8: nyon mongs ba ni bag chags ma byang bas so sor ma brtags pa /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-9: nyes pa ni nyi ma nub kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:142b-10: de la dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:142b-11: dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:142b-12: bskos kyang zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:142b-13: nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du zhes bya ba ni nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:142b-14: dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:142b-15: ston na zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:142b-18: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:142b-19: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-20: dge slong mtshan thog thag tu chos ston pa ma gtogs pas dge slong gi gtsug lag khang sgo phye ba'i mdun na dge slong ma'i dbyar khang 'dug pa la sogs pa ma yin par nyi ma nub pa nyid la nub par 'du shes bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-21: dge slong ma la ston na /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-22: nyi ma nub pa'i bar du ston pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:142b-23: 'di'i byed pa po ni nyi ma nub pa nyid la /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-24: 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
