T08TD4104.1E:142b-25: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-26: dge slong mtshan thog thag tu chos ston pa ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-27: dge slong gi gtsug lag khang sgo phye ba'i mdun na /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-28: dge slong ma'i dbyar khang 'dug pa la sogs pa ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-29: nyi ma nub pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-31: dge slong ma la ston pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:142b-32: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:142b-33: nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gnyis pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-35: // / zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:142b-36: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-0: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na @143a * //
T08TD4104.1E:143a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-3: dga' byed khyod kyis dge slong ma la thoms shig / dge slong ma la rjes su ston cig / dge slong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis shig zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-4: dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'i 'khor lnga brgya dang /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-5: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed gal ba der song ste phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-6: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:143a-7: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-8: de la don dang tshig dang yi ge zab pa zab pa dag gis chos bstan to ;
T08TD4104.1E:143a-9: / bud med ni shes rab 'chal pa'i phyir brda mi phrad cing 'jigs pa'i phyir 'dri mi nus so //
T08TD4104.1E:143a-10: skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'i bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-11: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-13: dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la bca' ba lnga po rtsa ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-18: bza' ba lnga po 'bras chan dang /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-30: rgya cang dag gis kun dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-31: dge slong ma dag / kha cig gis ni'o thug / kha cig gis ni zho thug / kha cig gis ni hvags kyi la thu khyer te /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-32: rgyal byed kyi tshal du tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la 'bul du 'ongs pa de /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-33: nye dags mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-34: nye dags kyang gal te 'di lta bu dag rnyed par 'gyur na /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-35: rtag pa kho nar dge slong ma la ston par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:143a-36: kho bo tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed chos bzang po'i chos kyis dge slong ma la ston snyam gyi /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-37: kho bo tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-38: dge slong ma la ston snyam mi sems so zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-39: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces /
T08TD4104.1E:143a-40: dge slong dag zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma rnams la ston par byed ces zer zhing smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-0: @143b kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-1: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:143b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dag zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston no zhes zer na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-5: nyon mongs pa ni phrag dog / nyes pa ni phyar ka gtong ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:143b-6: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-7: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:143b-8: de la dge slong rnams la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams la'o//
T08TD4104.1E:143b-9: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:143b-10: dge slong dag ces bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:143b-11: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-13: dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:143b-14: ston to zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-17: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:143b-18: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-19: dge slong gis dge slong zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa ma yin pa la dge slong 'di zas cung zad kyi phyir dge slong ma la ston to zhes de nyid dam gzhan la smra na /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-20: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:143b-22: dge slong ma la ston pa'i dge slong zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:143b-23: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-24: dge slong ma la ston pa'i dge slong zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-25: de la dge slong 'di zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-26: de la dge slong 'di zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-27: dge slong ma la ston to zhes phyar ka gtong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-28: de nyid dam gzhan la smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-29: pha rol pos don go ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:143b-30: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:143b-31: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gsum pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-33: // / gos sbyin pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-34: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:143b-35: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:144a-1: yod na tshong dpon zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de dang lhan cig rtser bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-3: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:144a-4: de rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nye du zad par gyur cing nor zad pa dang longs spyod zad par gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-5: des chung ma la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-6: bzang mo kho bos da nor sgrub par mi nus gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-9: rje'i sras bdag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:144a-10: des chung ma de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'i la gsol te /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-11: rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:144a-12: rang yang rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-13: dge slong gi dge 'dun la gsol nas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:144a-14: mnyan yod na de grags shing bsod nams che bas thams cad kyis mnyan yod pa'i tshong dpon rab tu phyung ngo zhes thos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-19: sman gyi yo byad dag dbul bas des de dag grub bo //
T08TD4104.1E:144a-20: de dus gzhan zhig na snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-21: dge slong ma de'i dbyar khang du song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-22: dge slong ma des de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-23: mdun du 'dug nas de'i snam sbyar de la yang dang yang du rtog nas /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-27: lha'i gnas kyi lhag ma bzhin du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:144a-28: bdag gis 'di la snam sbyar 'di sbyin par bya zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-29: bdag gis snam sbyar gzhan btsem par bya'o snyam nas des de la snam sbyar byin te song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:144a-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs pas /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-31: dge slong de snam sbyar med par chos gos stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro ba gzigs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-32: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-33: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:144a-34: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-35: kun dga' bo dge slong dag dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos dag sbyin nam /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-37: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:144a-38: kun dga' bo dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa ni 'di snyam du 'di'i chos gos gsum tshang ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-0: 'on te ma tshang snyam du mi sems par 'di ltar @144b thob bo cog len par byed kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-1: nye du la ni byin yang len par mi byed do zhes bka' stsal nas snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-2: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos sbyin na ltung do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-4: gang zag ni mnyan yod pa'i tshong dpon las rab tu byung ba /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-5: nyon mongs pa ni sngon gyi chung ma la sred pa /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-6: nyes pa ni dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos sbyin pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-7: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:144b-8: dge slong ma zhes bya ba yang chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:144b-9: nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang mes po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-10: phrugs las brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-11: de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:144b-12: gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-18: nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-19: sbyin na zhes bya ba ni bsab mi dgos par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:144b-20: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:144b-21: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-22: dge slong gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la gos dbul ba ma gtogs par dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-25: bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-26: brje bar 'dod pa ma yin pa la deng 'du shes pas gos rung ba 'khor gsum khebs pa'i tshad dang ldan pa byin na gos sbyin pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:144b-27: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:144b-28: 'di la yan lag drug gis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-29: dge slong dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la gos dbul ba ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-30: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-33: bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-34: brje bar 'dod pa ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-36: gos rung ba 'khor gsum khebs pa'i tshad yan chad dang /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-38: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:144b-39: gos sbyin pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu bzhi pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-41: // / gos byed pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:144b-42: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-0: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' @145a * //
T08TD4104.1E:145a-2: dge slong ma sbed ma'i chos gos lnga ngan cing snam sbyar yang rnyings nas /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-3: des ras yug chen zhig rnyed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-4: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la snam sbyar du btsem du bcol nas drug sde dag log ste ras yug chen de brgyangs nas dras shing drubs te /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-5: 'char kas snam sbyar de dang tshon sna lnga'i skud pa khyer te 'chag tu song nas /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-6: snam sbyar de la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-7: bdag nyid sbed ma'i mgul nas 'khyud de 'dug pa zhig skud ris su btsems nas bltab ste sbed ma la sbyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-8: re zhig ji tsam du tshon gyis ma bcal ba de srid du ma dbye shig / ltung ba dang bcas par gyur ta re zhes smras so //
T08TD4104.1E:145a-9: sbed mas snam sbyar de de bzhin kho nar dbyar khang du 'phags pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-10: dge slong ma grogs mo dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-11: 'phags pa 'char kas snam sbyar ji ltar btsems pa bltas /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-12: 'on cig ces byas pa na sbed mas ma ster nas /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-13: de dag gis snam sbyar hur ces phrogs nas phye ste bltas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-14: de la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas 'char ka sbed ma'i ma gul nas 'khyud de 'dug pa skud ris su btsems pa mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-15: de dag gis rta gad kyis btab ste /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-17: sbed ma khyod la 'phag pa 'char kas yun ring mo zhig gis gzod 'khyud do //
T08TD4104.1E:145a-18: de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'is thos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-19: nu mo dag drug sde gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa dag gis 'drums pa ltung bas /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-21: dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod nas /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-22: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:145a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'char ka la /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-24: khyed dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa'i gos byed pa bden nam zhes rmas nas snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-25: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa'i gos byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-27: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-28: nyes pa ni dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa'i gos byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:145a-29: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am /
T08TD4104.1E:145a-30: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:145a-31: dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:145a-32: nye du ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba ni phyi ma dang mes po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-0: phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad @145b ni nye du yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-1: de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:145b-2: gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-8: nyi 'og pa'i dag las gang yang rung ba dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:145b-9: byed na zhes bya ba ni 'tshem na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:145b-10: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:145b-11: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-12: dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la der 'du shes pas gos rung ba 'khor gsum khebs pa'i tshad dang ldan pa byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-13: gos byed pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:145b-15: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa nyid la der 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:145b-16: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-17: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-19: gos rung ba 'khor gsum khebs pa'i tshad yan chad dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-22: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:145b-23: gos byed pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu lnga pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-25: // / dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:145b-27: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-28: dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni rkang pa spre'u zhag gis bskus te /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-29: 'gro na yang 'gro bar chas pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-30: 'ong nas yang glo bar du 'ongs pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-31: skye bo mang po dga' ba dang yid du 'ongs bar yang 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:145b-32: yu bu cag ni khron pa'i rus sbal dang 'dra bar gar dang mi 'dong /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-33: gang nas kyang mi 'ong bas rnyed pa thob pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-34: skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-35: yid du 'ong bar ga la 'gyur gyis yu bu cag kyang ljongs rgyur 'dong ngo zhes de dag dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du dong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-36: dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag lam brgyags sbyor du bcug nas de dag kyang khrid cing /
T08TD4104.1E:145b-37: dge slong bsod snyems pa zhig kyang khrid de ljongs rgyur 'phags so //
T08TD4104.1E:145b-38: de dag gang gi tshe mtshams kyi phyi rol tu son pa de'i tshe na smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-0: dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag gus yun ji srid dug zhan gyi spyod lam gyis 'khod par byas @146a * //
T08TD4104.1E:146a-1: tshur sheg / bdag cag rang rang gi spyod lam gyis 'khod par bya'o zhes dang por dga' bo 'dug nas de'i 'og tu dga' mo 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' mo'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' bo'i dge tshul 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' mo'i dge tshul 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:146a-2: de bzhin du nye dga' dang /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-3: gtsug dga' mo la sogs pa yang spel mar bkod de dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:146a-4: don mthun de dang bram ze zhig lhan cig 'gro ba des de dag mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-10: de'i tsha bo'i chung ma ni 'di yin par shes par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:146a-11: nye dags thos nas smras ba /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-12: bkren pa khyod kyi gnya' ba rdog pas mnan nas de lta yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:146a-13: bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-15: gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa 'di dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro ba ni mi rung ngo snyam nas phyir log ste /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-16: rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas des skabs de dag dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-17: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas 'gron lam du 'jug par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-19: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:146a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-21: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-22: 'gron lam du 'jug na dus ma gtogs te ltung byed do ;
T08TD4104.1E:146a-23: / de la dus ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-24: lam don mthun gyis bgrod par bya ba /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-25: dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-26: 'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa zhig na de la de ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-29: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-30: nyes pa ni dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas 'gron lam du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:146a-31: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am /
T08TD4104.1E:146a-32: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-0: dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni chos 'di @146b pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-1: 'thams nas zhes bya ba ni brda byas nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-2: 'gron lam du zhes bya ba ni dgon pa'i lam du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-3: 'jug na zhes bya ba ni 'gro na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-4: dus ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dus bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-5: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-7: lam don mthun gyis bgrod par bya ba zhes bya ba ni don mthun med par bgrod mi nus pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-8: dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:146b-9: chom rkun pa dang g-yon can gyis 'jigs par grags pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-10: 'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:146b-11: seng ge dang stag dang gung gis 'jigs par grags pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-12: 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa zhig na zhes bya ba ni sha sbrang dang /
T08TD4104.1E:146b-16: sdig sbrul gyis 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa zhig na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-17: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:146b-18: bslab pa bcas pa de la de ni gnang ba'i dus yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-19: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:146b-20: 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i lam nyid du sngar 'thams par dge slong ma dang 'gron thabs gcig tu zhugs shing tha ma mi dad par 'gro ba nyid ma gtogs par dge slong ma gcig dang yang lam las 'da' zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:146b-21: 'gron rgyang grags re rer dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-24: dge slong ma'i 'gron pa dang 'thams pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-25: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:146b-26: lam 'jigs pa med pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:146b-27: dge slong ma gcig yan chad kyi 'gron pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:146b-30: rgyang grags gcig gi mtha' las 'das pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-31: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-32: dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'jug pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu drug pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:146b-34: // / dge slong ma dang lhan cig grur 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:146b-35: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:146b-36: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:146b-37: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:146b-38: dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-0: rkang pa spre'u zhag gis bskus te 'gron @147a * //
T08TD4104.1E:147a-1: yang 'gro bar chas pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed de /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-2: 'ong na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-3: skye bo mang po dag dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar yang 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:147a-4: yu bu cag ni khron pa'i rus sbal dang 'dra par gar yang mi 'dong /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-5: gang nas kyang mi 'ong bas rnyed pa 'thob pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-6: skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-7: yid du 'ong bar ga la 'gyur gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-8: yu bu cag kyang grur zhugs te 'dong ngo zhes de dag dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du dong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-9: dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag lam brgyags sbyor du bcug nas de dag kyang khrid cing /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-10: bsod snyoms pa zhig kyang khrid de grur 'jug tu 'phags so //
T08TD4104.1E:147a-11: de dag gang gi tshe mtshams kyi phyi rol du grur zhugs pa de'i tshe na smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-12: dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag gis yun ji srid du gzhan gyi spyod lam gyis 'khod par bya /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-13: tshur sheg / bdag cag rang rang gi spyod lam gyis 'khod par bya'o zhes dang por dga' bo 'dug nas de'i 'og tu dga' mo 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' mo'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' bo'i dge tshul 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' mo'i dge tshul 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:147a-14: de bzhin du nye dga' dang /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-15: gtsug dga' mo la sogs pa yang spel mar bkod de dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:147a-16: don mthun de dang bram ze zhig lhan cig 'gro ba des /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-17: de dag mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-23: de'i tsha bo'i chung ma ni 'di yin par shes so //
T08TD4104.1E:147a-24: nye dags thos nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-25: bkren pa khyod kyi gnya' ba rdog pas mnan nas de lta yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:147a-26: bsod snyoms pa des pa bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-28: gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa 'di dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro ba ni mi rung ngo snyam nas de phyir log ste /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-29: rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-30: des skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:147a-31: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag / dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas grur 'jug par byed ces smod par phyed /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-0: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan @147b 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-2: yang dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas gru gcig tu 'jug cing /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-5: thad kar pha rol du 'gro ba ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-8: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-9: nyes pa ni dge slong ma'i don mthun dang 'thams nas drug gcig tu 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-10: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-11: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-12: dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-13: 'thams nas zhes bya ba ni brda byas nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-14: gru gcig tu zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-18: 'jug cing zhes bya ba ni zhon cing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-19: gyen du 'gro 'am zhes bya ba ni rgyun las bzlog phyogs su 'gro ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-20: thur du 'gro na zhes bya ba ni rgyun phyogs su 'gro na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-21: thad kar pha rol du 'gro ba ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-22: thad kar pha rol tu 'gro ba bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-23: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-24: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-25: 'gram gnyis 'jigs pa dang bcas pa nyid ma gtogs par 'thams nas dge slong ma gcig dang yang cig car gru gcig gis lam las 'da' zhing 'gro na thad kar pha rol tu 'gro ba ma gtogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-26: rgyang grags re rer dge slong ma dang lhan cig grur 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-27: 'di'i byed pa po ni 'gram gnyis pa med pa 'jigs pa med pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-28: dge slong ma'i 'gron pa dang 'thams pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-29: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-30: 'gram gnyis 'jigs pa med pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-31: dge slong ma gcig yan chad kyi 'gron pa dang 'thams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-33: rgyang grags gcig gi mtha' las 'das pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-34: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:147b-35: dge slong ma dang lhan cig grur 'jug pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu bdun pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:147b-37: // / gcig pu 'dug pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin @148a * //
T08TD4104.1E:148a-1: gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:148a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs bgos /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-3: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-4: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas mthar gyis mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma'i khyim ga la bder song ngo /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-5: khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-6: mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i phyir stan shom par byed cing 'di skad ces kyang smras so /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-8: btsun pa 'char ka byon pa legs so //
T08TD4104.1E:148a-9: btsun pa 'char ka gdan bshams pa 'di la bzhugs shig / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang du bltas te 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:148a-10: khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma yang /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-11: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te kha phyir bltas te 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:148a-12: 'char kas de la ji tsam pa de la tsam gyi chos bstan nas /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-16: dga' mgur spyad pa dag dran par bya bar brtsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-17: sbed ma khyod kyis bdag cag gnyis skyed mos chal dang /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-19: lha'i gnas ga ge mo zhig tu bca' ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'chos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-20: bza' ba 'di dang 'di lta bu zos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-21: btung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'thungs ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-22: gnas mal 'di dang 'di lta bu bshams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-23: 'bru mar gyi mar me 'di dang 'di lta bu btsugs shing /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-24: der bdag cag gnyis kyis 'di dang 'di lta bu byas pa dran nam /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-27: bsod snyoms pa zhig der 'ongs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-28: sbed mas mthong nas bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-29: gal te langs te bsod snyoms phul bar gyur na /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-30: btsun pa 'char ka'i gtam spangs bar 'gyur ro snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-31: des lag pas song shig ces brda byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:148a-33: sbed ma khyed kyi snying lam na kho bos khyod la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i gtam byas snyam mam ci /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-34: 'di ltar bo bos lag pas bcal ba brgya dag gis longs spyod dag bsgrubs na khyod kyis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-35: bsod nams dag byed kyang mi nus sam zhes 'char kas sbed ma bsod snyoms 'bul du bcug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:148a-36: gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-0: bsod @148b snyoms pa des don gyis 'char ka la deng don gyis na bdag gis khyod kyi bsod snyoms zos so zhes smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-3: des dang po khyod thos snyam mam ci /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-4: des khyod song shig ces lag brda byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-5: kho bos de'i 'og tu de phyir 'bod du bcug go //
T08TD4104.1E:148b-7: de'i tshe na btsun pa 'char ka de nyid na 'dug par gyur tam /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-9: bud med dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-10: dben pa skyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug tu rung ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-11: rung yang srid mi rung yang srid de kho bo de ltar 'dug go zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-12: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag / bud med dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-14: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-15: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:148b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-17: yang dge slong gang bud med dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-19: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-20: nyes pa ni bud med dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-21: dben pa skyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:148b-22: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-23: 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:148b-24: bud med dang zhes bya ba ni bud med dam gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa dang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:148b-25: lhan cig ces bya ba ni de dang lhan cig go //
T08TD4104.1E:148b-26: gcig pu gcig dang zhes bya ba ni de dang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:148b-27: dben pa zhes bya ba ni gang na bud med dang /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-29: ma ning gzhan 'ga' yang med pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:148b-30: skyabs yod pa na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-31: lngas skyabs yod pa na ste /
T08TD4104.1E:148b-37: stan la zhes bya ba ni gzhi la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:148b-38: 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni 'don gang gi nang du rkub tshos 'jog par byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:148b-39: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:148b-40: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-0: @149a * // dge slong ma'i 'gro ba pa'i bud med dam /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-1: gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa gcig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-2: skye bo rgyun lugs med pa nyid kyis phyogs dben pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-3: skyabs dang bcas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-4: bar 'dom gang gi nang du gnyi ga rkub tshos 'jog par bzhag ste 'dug na /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-5: gcig pu 'dug pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:149a-7: rkub tshos bzhag ste 'dug pa la bud med gcig bu nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-8: skye bo'i rgyun lugs med pa nyid kyis phyogs dben pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-9: skyabs dang bcas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-10: bar 'dom gang nyid ni byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:149a-11: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-12: mi'i 'gro ba ba'i bud med dam /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-13: gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa gcig pu nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-14: skye bo'i rgyun lugs med pa nyid kyis phyogs dben pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-15: skyabs dang bcas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-17: gnyi ga rkub tshos bzhag ste 'dug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:149a-18: de dag la yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:149a-19: gcig pu 'dug pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu brgyad pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-21: // / gcig pu 'greng ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:149a-23: gang gi tshe sbed ma rab tu byung nas de khang skyong byed pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-24: dge slong ma rnams snga dro sham thabs bgos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-25: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-26: bsod snyoms la dong ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-27: sbed ma gtsug lag khang na phyag dar byed cing 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:149a-28: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang snga dro sham thabs bgos /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-29: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-30: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-31: dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ga la ba der song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:149a-33: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-34: mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-35: 'phags pa 'char ka byon pa legs so //
T08TD4104.1E:149a-36: byon pa legs so zhes des phyags ma phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas /
T08TD4104.1E:149a-37: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'greng ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:149b-0: 'char kas @149b de la ji tsam pa de tsam gyis chos bstan nas /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-4: dga' dgur spyad pa dag dran par bya bar brtsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-5: sbed ma khyod kyis bdag cag gnyis kyis skyed mos tshal dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-7: lha'i gnas ga ge me zhig tu /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-10: bza' ba 'di dang 'di lta bu zos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-11: btung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'thungs pa dang gnas mal 'di dang 'di lta bu bshams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-12: 'bru mar gyi mar me 'di dang 'di lta bu btsugs shing /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-13: der bdag cag gnyis kyis 'di dang 'di lta bu byas pa dran nam /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-14: sbed mas smras pa dran no //
T08TD4104.1E:149b-15: de na dge slong ma rgan mo nad ma zhig 'dug nas des bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-16: 'di gnyis ci'i phyir bag mar blangs pa yan chad kyang gcig la gcig rjod par byed snyam mo //
T08TD4104.1E:149b-17: de nas 'char ka song ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-18: sbed mas gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya bar brtsams pa dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:149b-19: dge slong ma de dag kyang lhags nas /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-21: sbed ma khyod kyis ci byas na /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-22: dbyar khang 'di de kho na bzhin du phyag dar dang bcas par 'dug / sbed mas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-23: phu nu mo dag gang tshun chad nas khyed cag bsod snyoms la dong ba /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-24: de tshun chad nas kho mo ma 'dug go//
T08TD4104.1E:149b-25: dge slong ma rgan mo nad ma des thos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-26: dge slong ma rnams la ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-27: dge slong ma de dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-28: dge slong dag dge slong ma dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-29: dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'greng bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-31: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-32: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:149b-33: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-34: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-35: lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang dben pa skyabs yod par 'greng na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-37: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-38: nyes pa ni dge slong ma dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-39: dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'greng pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:149b-40: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:149b-41: 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:150a-0: dge slong ma dang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa @150a * //
T08TD4104.1E:150a-2: lhan cig ces bya ba ni de dang lhan cig go //
T08TD4104.1E:150a-3: gcig pu gcig dang zhes bya ba ni de dang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:150a-4: dben pa zhes bya ba ni gang na skyes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-6: ma ning gzhan 'ga' yang med pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:150a-7: skyabs yod pa na zhes bya ba ni lngas bskyabs pa na ste rtsig pas bskyabs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-12: 'greng na zhes bya ba ni 'dom gang gi nang du 'greng na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:150a-13: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:150a-14: gcig pu 'dug pa'i ltung byed de sngar bstan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-15: gcig pu 'greng pa'i ltung byed 'di gnyis kyi mtshan nyid gzhan thams cad ni 'dra'o //
T08TD4104.1E:150a-16: bye brag tu na sngar bud med ces smos pa'i gnas su /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-17: 'dir dge slong ma zhes brjod par bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-18: sngar 'dug pa zhes smos pa'i gnas su 'dir 'greng ba zhes brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:150a-19: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-20: dge slong dge slong ma khyim so bzung ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-21: ma bzung ba mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa gcig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-22: skye bo'i rgyun lugs med pa nyid kyis phyogs dben pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-23: skyabs dang bcas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-24: bar 'dom gang gi bar du gnyis ka 'greng ste sdod na gcig pu 'greng pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:150a-25: 'di'i byed pa po ni 'greng ste sdod pa la dge slong ma gcig pu nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-26: skye bo'i rgyun lugs med pa nyid kyis phyogs dben pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-27: skyabs dang bcas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-28: bar 'dom gang nyid ni byed pa po dag yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:150a-29: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-30: dge slong ma khyim so bzung ba'am ma bzung ba mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa gcig pu nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-31: skye ba'i rgyun lugs med pa gnyis kyis phyogs dben pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-32: skyabs dang bcas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-35: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:150a-36: gcig pu 'greng ba'i ltung byed de nyi shu dgu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-38: // / dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa za ba'i ltung bzed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:150a-39: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-0: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas @150b sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:150b-1: phongs pa dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-2: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-3: dge slong nas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi bsod snyoms sbyar to //
T08TD4104.1E:150b-4: drug sde dag snga dro sham thabs bgos /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-7: mnyan yod na bsod snyoms la zhugs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-8: de dag dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag gi gan du dong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-10: 'phags pa dag bzhugs la zhal tshus gsol cig / sus sbyin par 'gyur /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-12: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-13: sring mo dag de tsam gyis kho bo chag 'tsho bar mi nus kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-14: de ltar bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can gang dag gis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gi bsod snyoms sbyar ba de dag gal te khyod kyis kho bo cag gi phyir sbyor du bcug pa de lta na kho bo cag 'tsho bar nus so //
T08TD4104.1E:150b-15: de nas dge slong ma sbom dga' mos snga dro sham thabs bgos /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-18: mnyan yod na bsod snyoms la zhugs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-19: de khyim gang du tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi n+ya dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-20: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gi bsod snyoms sbyar ba'i khyim de dag tu song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-22: khyed kyis su'i bsod snyoms sbyar /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-24: 'phags pa kun shes koondi n+ya dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-25: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:150b-27: khyod kyis sh'akya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa chos sgrogs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-28: rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can gang dag yin pa de dag gi bsod snyoms sbyar na /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-29: de ltar na khyed la bsod nams che bar 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:150b-40: de ltar bgyi'o zhes de dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-41: 'phags pa kun shes koondi n+ya dang /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-42: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gi bsod snyoms sbyar ba gang dag ga yin pa de dag drug sde dag gi phyir sbyor du bcug go //
T08TD4104.1E:150b-43: drug sde dag snga dro sham thabs bgos /
T08TD4104.1E:150b-44: lhun bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-1: yod du bsod snyoms la dong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-2: de dag lhung bzed khas btags pa'i bsod snyoms dag gis 'ongs pa dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-3: ae ma'o drug sde dag gis lhung bzed khas btags so //
T08TD4104.1E:151a-4: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-5: gang dag gis bdag cag gi phyir bsod snyoms dag sbyor du bcug pa'i sring mo dag nad med par gyur cig / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-6: khyed cag shes bzhin du dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa'i zas zar rung ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-7: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-8: rung yang srid mi rung yang srid de /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-9: ci kho bo cag ltogs te 'chi bar bya'am zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-10: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa'i zas za bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-12: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:151a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-14: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa'i zas za na /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-15: sngar khyim du bos pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-18: nyon mongs pa ni lto 'dun nyes pa ni dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa'i zas za ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:151a-19: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-21: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:151a-22: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de bdag nyid kyis rig pa'am gzhan gyis brjod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:151a-23: dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:151a-24: sbyor du bcug pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-25: sbyor du bcug pa gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-26: tshul khrims kyis sbyor du bcug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-27: thos pas sbyor du bcug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:151a-28: zas zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-30: za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:151a-31: sngar khyim du bos pa ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni sngar khyim du mgron du bos pa bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:151a-32: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no ;
T08TD4104.1E:151a-33: / de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-34: sbyin bdag gis dge slong mgron du ma bos pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:151a-35: dge slong mas yon tan yang dag pa ma yin pa dag gis ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis zas sbyor du bcug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-0: bos pa la yang dge slong mas yon tan yang dag pa ma yin @151b pa dag gis ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis zas lhag pa sbyor du bcug pa dge slong gis der 'du shes pas zos na /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-1: dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa za ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:151b-2: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po yin no//
T08TD4104.1E:151b-3: 'di la dge slong mgron du ma bos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-4: bos pa gnyi ga la yan lag drug gis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-5: mgron du ma bos pa la ni mgron du ma bos pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-6: dge slong mas yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yon tan dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-7: ngag gi rnam par rig byed dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-9: dge slong gis der 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-11: mgron du bos pa la ni mgron du bos pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-12: dge slong mas yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yon tan dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-13: ngag gi rnam par rig byed dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-14: zas lhag pa sbyor du bcug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-15: dge slong gis der 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-17: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:151b-18: dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa'i ltung byed de sum cu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-20: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-23: yang yang dang ni 'dug gnas gcig / phye dang bca' dang stobs pa dang //
T08TD4104.1E:151b-25: kha nas mid dang bsod pa nyid //
T08TD4104.1E:151b-27: bcu pa bzhi pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-28: sdom la zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don dang dgos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:151b-29: bcu pa bzhi pa 'dis kyang ltung byed kyi chos bcu bstan te /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-32: lhung bzed do gsum tsam las lhag par len pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-34: spangs pa la stobs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-36: dus ma yin par za ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-38: byin len ma byas par za ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-39: bsod pa slong ba'i ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:151b-40: de la yang za ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-41: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-42: yangs pa can ga la ba der logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:151b-43: yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsags pa'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:151b-44: khyim bdag drag shul can gyis de thos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-1: ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:152a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-5: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-6: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-7: yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-8: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
T08TD4104.1E:152a-9: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-10: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-11: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:152a-12: de nas khyim bdag drag shul can gyis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes spyan drangs so //
T08TD4104.1E:152a-13: phyi de nyin par gdugs tshod la bab pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-14: spyan 'dren gyis spyan drangs pa'i tshe dge slong gi dge 'dun ni zhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:152a-15: bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrubs so //
T08TD4104.1E:152a-16: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-17: dga' bo nye dga' sbyin bdag gi khyim dag tu 'dong ngo zhes de dag gis bsod snyoms pa zhig kyang khrid nas /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-18: ches sngar yangs pa can du zhugs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-19: khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu dong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-21: 'phags pa dag zhal tshus gsol cig / drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-22: kho bo cag mgron du bos so //
T08TD4104.1E:152a-24: khyim bdag drag shul can gyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:152a-26: 'phags pa dag 'o na aa mra'i khur ba dag gsol cig / de ltar bya'o zhes de dag gis aa mra'i khur ba dag zos so //
T08TD4104.1E:152a-27: bsod snyoms pa de mi za nas /
T08TD4104.1E:152a-29: 'phags pa khyod kyang aa mra'i khur ba dag gsol cig / des smras pa kho bo stan gcig pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:152a-31: 'o na snoms te bzhud la de nyid du gsol cig / des lhung bzed chung ngu bkang ste der song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:152a-32: de nas khyim bdag drag shul can gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar 'khod par rig nas /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-0: bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas @152b rang gi lag nas tshim par byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-1: bsod snyoms pa de'i mdun du 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-2: bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-3: khyim bdag 'dis bdag la 'di ltar aa mra'i khur ba dang zos so zhes bya ba de ltar rig par gyur gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-4: ji srid du 'dis bdag la klan ka ma rnyed pa de srid du bdag gis 'di la brjod par bya'o snyam nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-5: khyim bdag bdag 'ba' zhig gis aa mra'i khur ba dag zos par ma zad kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-6: drug sde 'di dag gis kyang aa mra'i khur ba dag zos so //
T08TD4104.1E:152b-8: 'phags pa ci'i phyir de skad zer zhes spyos te smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-9: 'phags pa ci kho bo la aa mra'i khur pa dag med snyam mam /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-10: des zho shas 'tsho ba dag aa mra'i khur ba dag gi sprog ma dag byed du bcug go //
T08TD4104.1E:152b-11: de nas dge slong bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod snyoms sgrub pa des /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-12: skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-14: yang yang za na dus ma gtogs te ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:152b-15: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-19: gos sbyin pa'i tshe dus te /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-20: de la ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-23: nyon mongs pa ni zas la gdu ba /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-24: nyes pa ni yang yang za ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:152b-25: de la yang yang za na zhes bya ba ni yang yang du za na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:152b-26: dus ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dus bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:152b-27: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-32: log par ltung ba dag tu sred par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-33: 'tshed par byed ltung bar byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:152b-34: gzhan yang ltung ba de ji srid du ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-35: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:152b-36: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-37: na ba dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-38: dge slong zas gcig gis 'tsho bar mi nus na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:152b-39: las dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-41: mchod rten gyi las phyag dar re lde tsam byas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-42: dkyil 'khor ba mal tsam byas na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:152b-43: lam dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:152b-44: dge slong dpag tshad phyed du song ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-2: gos sbyin pa'i tshe dus te zhes bya ba ni ras yug phran nam /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-4: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de la de ni gnang ba'i dus yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:153a-5: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-6: dge slong na ba ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-8: lam du ma song bas nyi ma gcig sbyin bdag tha dad pas cig car yang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-10: gos sam gos kyi rin gyi rnyed pa med pa'i zas bza' ba rnam lnga'i mgron du bos pa gnyis pa rnyed pa zos na /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-11: yang yang za ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:153a-13: mgron du bos pa gnyis ka yang nyi ma gcig pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-14: sbyin bdag tha dad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-15: zas za ba lta bu'i dus su ma gtogs pa'i rnyed pa nyid yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-18: lam du song ba ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-19: mgron du bos pa phyi ma la gos sam /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-20: gos kyi rin gyi rnyed pa med pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:153a-21: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-24: lam du song ba ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-25: mgron du bos pa gnyis ka yang nyi ma gcig la sbyin bdag tha dad par zas bza' ba lnga'i khongs su gtogs pa'i zas kyi rnyed pa nyid yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-27: mgron du bos pa phyi ma la gos sam /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-28: gos gyi rin gyi rnyed pa med pa nyid dang de zos pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:153a-29: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:153a-30: yang yang za ba'i ltung byed de sum cu gcig pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-33: // / 'dug gnas su za ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-34: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:153a-35: ri brags shig na khyim bdag gcig 'dug pa des /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-37: bram ze rnams kyi don du 'dug gnas byad du bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-38: de 'dug gnas de na phyogs bzhi'i dge sbyong dang /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-39: bram ze gang 'dug pa de la bsod snyoms kyi mkho ba stobs par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:153a-40: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po rnam par bstan te /
T08TD4104.1E:153a-41: gzhan mu stegs can dag tshar gcad cing /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-0: lha @153b dang mi rnams kun du dga' bar mdzad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-1: skye bo mdzangs pa dag gi snying rangs par mdzad pa de'i tshe na gzhan mu stegs can dag mtha' 'khob dag na rten cing gnas so //
T08TD4104.1E:153b-2: dus gzhan zhig na gcer bu pa drug cu ri brags der lhags nas /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-3: khyim bdag des da dag la mkho ba stobs par byed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-4: de'i tshe na mnyan yod nas tshong pa dad pa can zhig zong thogs te ri brags der 'ongs pa de yang khyim bdag des der bos pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-5: tshong pa des 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag yin gor ma chag gis song la blta snyam nas der song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-6: ji tsam na gcer bu pa ngo tsha dang khrel bor ba sha stag yin par mthong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:153b-7: khyim bdag des de la smras pa grogs po sa bon bzang zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-10: grogs po sa bon ni bzang na /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-12: ngo tsha dang khrel por ba sdig pa'i lta ba can dgon du nga tshva sgo can /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-13: tha chad sdig pa can gyis gzhi sha stag yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:153b-15: grogs po zhing bzang po gzhan 'ga' yod dam /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:153b-19: gal te de dag 'dir byon na /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-20: bdag gis de dag la bsod snyoms kyi mkho ba bstabs par bgyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:153b-21: tshong pa des zong bsgyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-22: rin blangs nas mnyan yod du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-23: nye dga' la sbran pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-24: drug sde dag ri brags der dong nas khyim bdag des de la mkho ba bstabs so //
T08TD4104.1E:153b-25: gcer bu pa de dag gis gcig gzhi srungs su bzhag nas /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-26: gzhan gshed du dong pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-27: drug sde dag gis gzhi srungs de bskrad nas /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-28: de na yun ring mo zhig tu za zhing 'dug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-29: re zhig na khyim bdag de ri brags gzhan zhig tu bya ba zhig la song pa'i phyir na drug sde dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-30: de'i chung ma zas 'dri ma pa la lus kyi skyon brjod cing /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-32: khyim bdag bza' bran ma dad par gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-33: 'tsho ba dang gnas mal yang khad kyis phri ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-34: gcer bu ba'i gzhi srungs bskrad pa des kyang /
T08TD4104.1E:153b-35: rang gi dpung drug cu po dag sbran te /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-0: drug sde dag dang gdol thabs kyi g-yul sprad nas drug sde dag gis rang rang gi kha mig dang khrims kyi rtsa ba tsam @154a * //
T08TD4104.1E:154a-2: gcer bu pa drug cu po dag rgya lcag dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-5: lcug ma dag gis shin tu gtal cing brims nas /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-6: de dag gis gcer bu pa rdeg bzhin du 'dug gnas kyi nang nas pha rol tu 'dzegs te byung pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-7: bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-8: de dag thos nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-9: shes ldan dag / ltos shig ltos shig /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-10: dge sbyong g-yul 'gyed pas char 'bab par ro zhes zer ro //
T08TD4104.1E:154a-11: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-12: dga' bo nye dga' spyod yul tshig cing me bdag zhi bar ma gyur gyis tshur sheg mnyan yod du 'dong ngo zhes de dag mnyan yod du dong ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-13: lho phyogs nas 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i rgol ba 'char ka zhes bya ba zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs pa tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus btul te /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-14: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon du byas shing de la brten nas skye bo phal pa'i tshogs 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang 'phags pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-15: drug sde dag mnyan yod du lhags nas dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-16: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so //
T08TD4104.1E:154a-17: 'ongs pa legs so khyed cag ga las 'ongs /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-18: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-19: lho phyogs nas 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i rgol ba bram ze kun du rgyu 'char ka zhes bya ba 'gyed 'dod cing 'gyed pa'i yo byad kyi phyir 'ongs pa tshar bcad de /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-20: g-yul las rnam par rgyal lo //
T08TD4104.1E:154a-21: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-22: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu tshogs can gnyis pa /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-23: chos kyi dmag dpon chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor bas rgol ba gcig tshar bcad pa 'di'i ngo mtshar ci che /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-24: gal te tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshar bcad pa ma gyur na yang /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-25: bcom ldan 'das klad nas bzhugs pas de ngo mtshar mi che'i /
T08TD4104.1E:154a-26: kho bo cag mi drug gis gcer bu pa drug cu tshar bcad pa ngo mtshar che'o //
T08TD4104.1E:154a-28: dbyug pa'i rig pas lus la chos bshad pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:154a-30: de'i tshe na ni 'tsho na da tsam 'tsho'am /
T08TD4104.1E:154b-0: shi gtol med do zhes zer nas dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i @154b phyir ;
T08TD4104.1E:154b-1: dge slong dag yan lag gis ngo tsha bar bya ba'i yan lag de nyid kyis rlom par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:154b-3: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:154b-4: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:154b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:154b-6: 'dug gnas gcig tu zhag lon pa'i dge slong min bas bsod snyoms gcig za bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:154b-7: de las lhag par za na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:154b-10: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chen dang 'thab krol byed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:154b-11: nyes pa ni 'dug gnas gcig tu zhag lon pas bsod snyoms gcig las lhag par za ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:154b-12: 'dug gnas gcig tu zhag lon pa'i zhes bya ba ni mu stegs can gyi 'dug gnas su zhag lon pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:154b-13: dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:154b-14: mi na bas zhes bya ba ni na ba ma gtogs pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:154b-15: bsod snyoms gcig bza' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni za na lan gcig go //
T08TD4104.1E:154b-16: de las lhag par za na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:154b-17: de las lan mang du za na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:154b-18: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:154b-19: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:154b-20: dge slong mi na bas chos 'di pa'i ma yin pa bdag po khyim pa dang bcas pa mu stegs can gyi 'dug gnas su zhag gcig lon pa la sbyin bdag gis ma bstabs par nyi ma gnyis pa'i bsod snyom zos na 'dug gnas su za ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:154b-22: dge slong mi na ba sbyin bdag gis ma bstabs pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:154b-23: chos 'du pa'i ma yin pa mu stegs can gyi 'dug gnas bdag po khyim pa dang bcas pa byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:154b-24: 'di la yan lag drug gis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:154b-25: dge slong mi na ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:154b-26: sbyin bdag gis ma bstabs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:154b-27: 'dug gnas chos 'di pa'i ma yin pa gzhan mu stegs can gyi yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:154b-28: bdag po khyim pa dang bcas pa dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:154b-29: dge slong der zas zos nas zhag gcig lon pa nyi ma gnyis pa'i bsod snyoms zos pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:154b-30: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:154b-31: 'dug gnas su za ba'i ltung byed du sum cu gnyis pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-0: // / ltung bzed do gsum tsam las lhag par len pa'i ltung byed @155a * //
T08TD4104.1E:155a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mnod zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:155a-3: mnyan yod na khyim bdag gcig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-5: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:155a-6: de la bu mo g-yas zhar ma zhig byung nas /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-7: de bsrings shing bskyed de cher mor gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:155a-8: bu mo de'i na zla gzhan thams cad bag mar btang na /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-9: bu mo de g-yas zhar ma yin pa'i phyir slong ba 'ga' yang ma 'ongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:155a-10: mnyan yod na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung blangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-11: de'i chung ma de rang gi la dag gis dus la bab po //
T08TD4104.1E:155a-12: des chung ma gnyis pa dag /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-13: gsum pa bdun pa'i bar du blangs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-14: de dag kyang de bzhin du dus la bab po //
T08TD4104.1E:155a-15: khyim bdag de yag skur pa btab par gyur pa'i las dag gis chung ma gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-16: de yang gzhan gyi bu mo dang /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-17: yugs sa mo yan chad bongs nas sus kyang ma ster na /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-18: de rang nyid so nam byed cing 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:155a-19: de'i chung po grogs po zhig gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-20: gal te de lta na g-yas zhar ma slongs shig ces zer nas ;
T08TD4104.1E:155a-21: des g-yas zhar ma'i pha ma g-yas zhar ma blangs te /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-22: bag mar bang ba'i dus btab po //
T08TD4104.1E:155a-23: de'i chung po grogs po de yang 'gyod pa skyes te /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-24: bdag gi grogs po la g-yas zhar ma slongs shig ces bskul ba de ni ma lags pa zhig byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-25: de mtshan ngan pa yin pas des grogs po gsod par gyur na mi rung gis /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-26: de bor la bdag gi sring mo yugs sa mo zhig yod pa sbyin no snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-27: des de la de skad ces smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-29: grogs po da de bzhin dor ba'i mi nus te /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-30: 'on kyang 'di la thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:155a-31: g-yas zhar ma'i ma des kyang bag rdzongs sta gon bya bar brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:155a-32: drug sde dag gi sbyin bdag yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-33: drug sde dag snga drog sham thabs bgos /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-34: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-35: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:155a-36: mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-0: ji tsam na g-yas @155b zhar ma brdzang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-1: gnyen ston gyi khur ba dag sreg pa mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-3: sring mo dus ston la bab du nye'am ci /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-5: 'phags pa dag khyod kyi lcam mo bag mar mchi ba la thug na de'i bag rdzongs sta gon bgyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:155b-6: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-7: sring mo kho bo cag gis kha zas dag cung zad mi 'thob bam /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-8: 'phags pa dag khyed cag la su zhig gis dbul 'tshal /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-9: 'di nyid khyod kyi lags so zhes de lag pa brkyang ste /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-10: de dag gis lhung bzed thams cad khur bdag gis bkang nas drug sde dag gis de'i kha zas thams cad bsdus te song ngo de nas g-yas zhar ma'i phas chung ma gos pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-11: bu bdag cag gis kha zas dag sta gon bya pa gyur pa gang yin pa de sbyin gnas dag gis bzhes kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-12: de nye du dag gi phyir kha zas sta gon byed kyi bar du sdod cig smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-13: chung ma gsod pa smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-14: kho bo mi sdod de gal te nyi ma de nyid la bag ma rdzong zhung sbyin na ni bag mar blang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:155b-15: gal te mi sbyin na kho bo chung ma gzhan len gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-16: khyod kyi bu mo dor bar bya'o zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-17: g-yas zhar ma'i pha mas dus su ma brdzongs pa'i skabs su chung ma gsod pas g-yas zhar ma mi blang bar byas pa na g-yas zhar ma'i phas /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-18: chung ma gsod pa bzung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-19: rgyal po'i pho brang du 'o dod bos nas shags la bkug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-20: chung ma gsod pas g-yas zhar ma'i pha pham bar byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:155b-21: g-yas zhar ma'i ma de bdag gi bu mo ma lom mo zhes ngu zhing 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-22: de'i ngos kyi khyim tshes dag / sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshu ni tshig go //
T08TD4104.1E:155b-23: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig go //
T08TD4104.1E:155b-24: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-25: 'di ltar bu mo byi zin pa'i bar chad byed do zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-27: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-28: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:155b-29: de na bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-30: dge slong rab tu mang po dag khyim rnams su dong ba las /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-31: gal te de dag la bram ze dang /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-32: khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis phye dag dang khur bdag dus kyis stobs par gyur la /
T08TD4104.1E:155b-33: 'dod na dge slong de dag gis lhung bzed gang ba gnyis sam gsum blang bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-1: par len na ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-2: lhung bzed gang ba gnyis sam gsum blangs nas phyi rol kun dga' ra bar dong la /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-3: dge slong 'khod pa rnams la yang bgo bsha' bya /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-4: bdag cag kyang bca' bar bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-5: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-9: nyes pa ni sbyin bdag khyim pas yongs su ma spangs pa ci bder ma byas pa'i kha zas bstabs pa la lhung bzed 'bring tshad gsum las lhag par len pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-10: de la dge slong zhes bya ba ni drug sde dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-11: rab tu mang po dag ces bya ba ni gnyis las lhag pa ni rab tu mang po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-12: khyim rnams su zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gi khyim rnams su'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-13: dong ba las zhes bya ba ni song ba las so //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-14: gal te de dag las zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-16: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-17: dad pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-18: chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-19: sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-20: chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-21: phye dag ces bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-23: khur ba dag ces bya ba ni bag chos dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-24: dus kyis stobs par gyur la zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-25: yang dang yang du stobs par gyur la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-26: 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-27: dge slong de dag gis zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa dag gis so //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-28: lhung bzed gang ba gnyis sam gsum blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-30: chen po dang 'bring dang chung du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-31: de la chen po ni gang du 'bras thug po che drus pa skam ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung do btsos pa sran tshod dang bcas /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-32: tshod ma dang bcas pa blugs na kha'i cha'i mtha' kho na nas mthe bo'i lto gang gis mi reg pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-33: 'bring ni bre'u chung phyed dang do btsos pa de lta bu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-34: chung du ni bre'u chung gang btsos pa de lta bu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-35: ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung gang la ni 'bras thug po che drus pa skam ma ga dh'a pa'i srang bcu drug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:156a-36: ma ga dh'a'i srang gcig la bod kyi srang gnyis yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:156a-37: 'bras thug po che drus pa skam ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung gang la bod kyi srang ni sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:156b-0: @156b phul tshad du brtsis na ni bdun phul do dang khyor gang yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:156b-1: ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung phyed dang do la ni bod kyi bdun phul phyed dang bzhi yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:156b-2: ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung do la ni bod kyi bdun phul bzhi dang khyor do yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:156b-3: 'bras drus pa skom ni chan du btsos na sum 'gyur du brtsi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156b-4: de ltar na lhung bzed chen po ni 'bras thug po che drus pa skam bod kyi bdun phul bzhi dang /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-5: khyor do btsos pa'i chan bre do de'i rkyen gyi tshod ma dang bcas pa blugs na mtheb sor gcig gis ma gang ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156b-6: lhung bzed 'bring ni 'bras thug po che drus pa skam bod kyi phul phyed dang bzhi /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-7: btsos pa'i chan bre phyed dang do ;
T08TD4104.1E:156b-8: / de'i rkyen gyi tshod ma dang bcas pa blugs na mtheb sor gcig gis ma gang ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156b-10: 'bras thug po che drus pa skam bod kyi bdun phul do dang /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-11: khyor gang btsos pa'i chan bre gang de'i rkyen gyi tshod ma dang bcas pa blugs na mtheb sor gcig gis ma gang ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156b-12: lhung bzed kyi kha'i cha'i mtha'i zhes bya ba ni kha'i zur gang du mchus rngub pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156b-13: mthe po'i lto gang zhes bya ba ni mtheb sor gcig ste /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-14: mthe bo'i tshigs dang po zur ya gcig nas ltos rol du bkris te /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-15: zur ya gcig la thug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156b-16: 'dir lhung bzed gang ba gnyis sam gsum blang bar bya'o zhes gnang ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-17: gsum man chad ci 'dod pa blang bar bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:156b-18: ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa la ni /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-19: lhung bzed 'bring po'i tshad dang sbyar te /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-20: lhung bzed 'bring po'i tshad kyi 'bras chan bre phyed dang do la ni /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-21: 'bras thug po che drus pa skam /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-22: ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung phyed dang do yod /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-23: lhung bzed 'bring po gsum gyi tshad kyi 'bras chan bre phyed dang lnga la ni /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-24: 'bras thug po che drus pa skam /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-25: ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung phyed dang lnga yod de /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-26: de man chad ci 'dod pa blang bar bya'i /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-27: de las lhag par len na ltung byed du 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-28: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong gis ji tsam du bre'u chung phyed dang lnga las lhag pa'i bsod snyoms len na thams cad du ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-29: de ni 'bras skam po'i tshad las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:156b-30: de la chan du btsos na sum gyur du brtsi bas /
T08TD4104.1E:156b-31: 'bras drus pa skam bre'u chung phyed dang lnga la 'bras chen bre'u chung phyed dang bcu bzhi yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:157a-1: drus pa skam bre'u chung phyed dang lnga la bod kyi bre phyed dang do yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:157a-2: de'i chan ni sum 'gyur te bre phyed dang lnga yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:157a-3: de ni lhung bzed gnyis sam gsum la 'bras skam ni bre phyed dang do //
T08TD4104.1E:157a-4: 'bras chan ni bre phyed dang lnga yod de /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-5: 'bras chan bre phyed dang lnga de'i rkyen gyi bya na dang /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-6: tshod ma dang bcas pa man chad blugs par bya'i /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-7: de las lhag na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:157a-8: phye dang khur ba la sogs pa bza' ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-9: bca' ba'i bsod snyoms gzhan dag la yang bdag dgag pa'i tshad ni /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-10: 'bras chan bre phyed dang lnga de'i rkyen gyi bya na dang /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-11: tshod ma dang bcas pa 'dis ci rigs par bsgre zhing brtsi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:157a-12: dge slong ma rnams kyi lhung bzed chen po dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed chung du dang tshad gcig ste /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-13: 'bring dang chung du yang de bzhin du na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:157a-14: chung tshad ni 'grangs pa tsam shong ba yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:157a-15: de la lhag par len na zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed 'bring gsum gyi tshad 'bras chan bre phyed dang lnga /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-16: de'i rkyen gyi bya na dang /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-17: tshod ma dang bcas pa de las lhag par len na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:157a-18: phye dang khur ba la sogs pa bza' ba dang bca' ba'i bsod snyoms gzhan dag las yang tshad 'di ci rigs par bsgre zhing brtsis pa las lhag par len na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:157a-19: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:157a-20: lhung bzed gang ba gnyis sam gsum blangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-21: phyi rol kun dga' ra bar dong la /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-22: dge slong bsod snyoms pa rnams la yang bgo bsha' bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-23: blang bar bya ba 'bras thug po che drus pa skam /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-24: ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung phyed dang lnga btsos pa'i cha na /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-25: bod kyi bre phyed dang lnga /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-26: de'i rkyen gyi bya na dang /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-27: tshod ma dang bcas pa tsam ste /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-28: gal te bdag nyid grogs dang bcas pas bza' ba las lhag cing mang ba nyid yin na /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-29: khyim gyi phyi rol du gtsug lag khang du dong la /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-30: de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa rnams la yang sbyin par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:157a-31: bdag cag kyang za bar bya ste zhes bya bya ba ni blang bar bya ba la gal te mang ba nyid yin na /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-32: dge slong dag la yang bgo bsha' bya /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-33: bdag cag kyang bca' bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:157a-34: gal te mang ba nyid ma yin na /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-35: dge slong dag la bgo bsha' bya ba gdon mi za bar bya ba ma yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:157a-36: bdag cag kyang bza' bar bya ba kho na yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:157b-0: de la de ni @157b cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de la de ni nges pa yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:157b-1: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-4: rab tu mang po dag kyang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-5: bdag khyim rnams su dong ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-6: sbyin bdag khyim pa stobs pa'i bsod snyoms yongs su ma spangs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-8: lhung bzed 'bring po gsum gyi tshad /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-9: 'bras thug po che drus pa skam /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-10: ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung phyed dang lnga la /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-11: bod kyi bre phyed dang do yod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-12: btsos na chan bre phyed dang lnga de'i rkyen gyi bya na dang /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-13: tshod ma dang bcas pa tsam las lhag par mnos te zos na ;
T08TD4104.1E:157b-14: lhung bzed do gsum tsam las lhag par len pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:157b-16: sbyin bdag khyim pa stobs pa'i bsod snyoms yongs su ma spangs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-18: dge slong gi lhung bzed 'bring po gsum gyi tshad las lhag ma mnos te za ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:157b-19: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-20: sbyin bdag mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim pa skyes pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-21: bud med gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-22: bstabs pa'i bsod snyoms yongs su ma spangs pa ji bder ma byas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-23: lhung bzed 'bring po gsum gyi tshad las lhag pa nyid do//
T08TD4104.1E:157b-24: khyim nas mnos te khyer ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-26: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:157b-27: lhung bzed do gsum tsam las lhag par len pa'i ltung byed de sum cu gsum pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-29: // / stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-30: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-31: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:157b-32: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-33: dge slong dag nga ni stan gcig pa'i zas za ste /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-34: bstan gcig pa'i zas za ba na snying las chung ngur tshor zhing gnod pa nyung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-35: nyam nga ba chung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-37: 'tsho ba dang stobs dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-38: bde ba dang kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:157b-39: bde ba la reg par gnas par tshor ro //
T08TD4104.1E:157b-40: dge slong dag khyed kyang tshur sheg la stan gcig pa'i zas zo shig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-0: khyed kyang stan gcig pa'i zas za ba @158a * //
T08TD4104.1E:158a-2: snying las chung ngur tshor zhing gnod pa nyung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-3: nyam nga ba chung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-5: 'tsho ba dang stobs dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-6: bde ba dang kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-7: bde ba la reg par gnas par tshor bar 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:158a-8: zas ma spangs pas ji tsam gyis chog pa bza' bar bya zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-9: zas brtsams pas slob dpon dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-12: bla ma lta bu mthong na yang dang bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:158a-13: bca' ba lnga po rtsa ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-17: 'bras bu dag gis ni spangs par mi 'gyur la /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-18: bza' ba lnga po 'bras chan dang zan dron dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-21: 'de gu dag gis ni spangs par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:158a-22: rgyu lnga po zas yod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-23: zas stobs pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-24: zas brtsams pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-25: zas spangs pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-26: spyod lam las nyams pa dag gis ni spangs pa brjod par bya la ;
T08TD4104.1E:158a-27: rgyu lnga po zas med pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-28: zas stobs pa med pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-30: zas spangs pa med pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-31: spyod lam las ma nyams pa dag gis ni /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-32: ma spangs pa brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:158a-33: gzhan yang tshig lhag ma med pa lnga po thong shig ces bya ba dang gzhan la byin cig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-34: song shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-35: zos zin to zhes bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-36: chog go zhes bya ba dag gis ni spangs par brjod par bya la /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-37: tshig lhag ma dang bcas pa lnga po re zhig thong shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-38: re zhig gzhan la sbyin cig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-39: re zhig song shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-40: re zhig zos zin to zhes bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-41: re zhig chog go zhes bya ba dag gis ni ma spangs par brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:158a-42: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis spangs pas bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-43: drug sde dag spangs pas kyang za bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-44: ma spangs pas kyang za bar byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-45: dge slong don nyung du dag / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis spangs pas za bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal na /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-46: ci'i phyir dge slong spangs pas kyang bza' bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-47: ma spangs pas kyang za bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:158a-49: kha zer ba byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-0: dge slong rnams @158b kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:158b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-2: yang dge slong gang zas zos zin cing spangs pa las lhag bor ma byas par bca' ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-3: bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad do //
T08TD4104.1E:158b-6: nyon mongs pa ni bslab pa la g-yel ba dang bka' la ma gus pa /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-7: nyes pa ni zas spangs pa za bar byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:158b-8: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-10: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:158b-11: zas zos zin cing spangs pa'am zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byas pa las so //
T08TD4104.1E:158b-12: lhag por ma byas par zhes bya ba ni lhag mar ma byas shing ma bor yongs su ma btang bar ro //
T08TD4104.1E:158b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag por byas te bca' bar rjes su gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-14: dge slong rnams kyis lhag bor ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-16: dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs te yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byas pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis bca' ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-17: bza' ba rnyed cing za bar 'dod na /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-18: dge slong der lag pa gnyis bsnyal te byin len byas la dge slong zas zos zin cing ma spangs la /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-19: spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-20: dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa de'i mdun du tsog pur 'dug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-22: tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol /
