T08TD4104.1E:158b-23: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'tshal ma 'tshal lags shig spangs te /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-24: yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par bgyis pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-25: bca' ba dang bca' ba rnyed cing 'tshal bar 'tshal na /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-26: lhag por bgyis te bdag la stsal du gsol /
T08TD4104.1E:158b-27: des kham gnyis sam gsum zos nas 'di skad ces khyod kyi gyur gyis bzhud cig ces brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:158b-28: de la yang dge slong zas zos zin cing ma spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa des ni bdag nyid kyis kham gnyis sam gsum zos nas lhag bor bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-0: dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa des ni bza' bar mi bya bar lag par byin nas lhag por @159a * //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-2: rgyu lngas lhag por ma byas par brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-3: lnga gang zhe na mtshams kyi phyi rol du dang /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-7: spyod lam las nyams pa byed du bcug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-8: rgyu lngas ni lhag por byas par brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-10: snga ma las bzlog pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-11: gzhan yang rgyu lngas lhag por ma byas par brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-13: mtshams kyi phyi rol du dang /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-17: spyod lam las nyams par byed du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-18: rgyu lngas ni lhag por byas par brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-20: snga ma las bzlog pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-21: gcig gis lhag por byas pa mang po dag gis bca' bar bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-23: bca' ba'am bca' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-24: bca' ba lnga po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-27: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-28: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-29: dge slong zas spangs pa nyid dang lhag bor ma byas pa nyid kyis dus su rung ba'i zas gang yang rung ba zos na stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-30: 'di'i byed pa po ni zas spangs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-31: lhag por ma byas pa nyid dag la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-32: 'di la yan lag ldas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-34: lhag por ma byas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-36: dus su rung ba'i zas dang /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-38: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-39: stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed de sum cu bzhi pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-41: // / spangs pa la stobs pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-42: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-43: mnyan yod na khyim bdag gcig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:159a-45: dga' dgur spyod par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:159a-46: de rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nye du zad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-0: @159b longs spyod zad par gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-1: nges chung ma la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-2: bzang mo kho bos rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nor sgrub mi nus kyis rab tu 'byung du 'gro'o //
T08TD4104.1E:159b-3: rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig / de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-4: dge slong la rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-5: des de mkhan po spong ba pa dgon pa na bsam gtan byed pa zhig yod pa'i gnas su khrid de /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-6: de legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas dge slong de la gtad de btang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:159b-7: dge slong des rgan zhugs de klog pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-8: slob tu 'jug pa na rgan zhugs de brjod ngas pas /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-9: yang dang yang du ltung ba 'byin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-10: des de mdun du cog pur 'dug du bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-11: ltung ba 'chags su 'jug par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:159b-13: bdag slob dpon 'dis rtag tu mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-15: bdag gis kyang 'di mdun du tsog pur 'dug du bcug la /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-16: ltung ba 'chags su gzhug pa'i thabs ji ltar yod snyam mo //
T08TD4104.1E:159b-17: khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-18: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gshegs te /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdugs tshod gsol nas /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-20: khyim bdag de la chos bstan par brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:159b-21: de dge slong des rgan zhugs de khrid de /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-22: sbyin bdag gi khyim du song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:159b-23: sbyin bdag gis de gnyis la zas bstabs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-24: de gnyis kyis kho bo cag zas bos zin to zhes spangs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-26: snoms te bzhud la lhag por mdzod te gsol cig / gnyis kyis byin len byas te dong nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-27: dge slong ni chu 'tshag / rgan zhugs ni lhag bor byed du bcug pa na rgan zhugs kyis rang gi skal ba ni lhag bor byas la /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-28: dge slong de'i skal pa de ni lhag por ma byas par byas so zhes de zer bcug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:159b-29: de'i 'og tu khyod kyis lhag bor ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bca' ba zos kyis ltung ba de shogs shig ces byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:160a-0: rgan zhugs kho bos ltung ba mi 'chags @160a * //
T08TD4104.1E:160a-2: 'di ltar khyod nyid ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro zhes des dge slong rnams la skabs de brjod pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:160a-3: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du dge slong zas zos zin cing /
T08TD4104.1E:160a-4: spangs pa la skabs tshol zhing ji nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:160a-5: tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'tsho zhig /'di zo shig ces lhag por ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba dus kyis stobs par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:160a-8: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:160a-9: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:160a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:160a-11: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs pa la skabs tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas nas ;
T08TD4104.1E:160a-12: tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'cho shig /'di zo shig ces lhag por ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba dus kyis stobs par byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:160a-14: gang zag ni dge slong rgan zhugs /
T08TD4104.1E:160a-15: nyon mongs pa ni nyes rtsom /
T08TD4104.1E:160a-16: nyes pa ni shes bzhin du dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs pa la lhag por ma byas pa'i bza' ba dang ltung ba dus kyis stobs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:160a-17: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:160a-18: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:160a-19: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:160a-20: dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:160a-21: zas zos zin cing spangs pa la zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byas pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:160a-22: skabs tshol zhing zhes bya ba ni klan ka tshol zhing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:160a-23: ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa zhes bya ba ni ji nas kyang dge slong 'di lung ba dang bcas par byas par 'gyur ro snyam pa'o de nyid rkyen du byas nas zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:160a-24: tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'cho zhig /'di zo shig ces bya ba ni bca' ba dang bza' ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:160a-25: lhag por ma byas pa zhes bya ba ni lhag mar ma byas shing ma bor yongs su ma btang ba'i'o //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-0: bca' ba dang bca' ba zhes bya ba @160b ni bca' ba lnga po dang bza' ba lnga po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-1: dus kyis stobs na zhes bya ba ni yang yang du stobs na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-2: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-3: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-4: dge slong gis shes bzhin du dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs pa la lhag por ma byas pa'i zas rung ba dus kyis stobs na /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-5: spangs pa la stobs pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-8: lhag por ma byas pa nyid dag las 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-9: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-10: dge slong zas spangs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-11: lhag por ma byas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-13: dus su rung ba'i zas dang bstabs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-14: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-15: spangs pa la stobs pa'i ltung byed de sum cu lnga pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-17: // /'dus shing za ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-19: de'i tshe na lhas byin dge slong rab tu mang po dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-20: lhan cig kun dga' ra ba'i nang du 'dus shing zas za nas /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-21: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-22: dge slong dag kun dga' ra ba'i nang na 'dus shing za bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-24: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-25: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-27: 'dus shing za na dus ma gtogs te ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-28: de la dus mi 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-34: dge sbyong gi zas dus te /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-35: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-37: gang zag ni lhas byin 'khor dang bcas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-38: nyon mongs pa ni mi mthun pa'i 'dod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-39: nyes pa ni 'dus shing za ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-40: de la 'dus shing zhes bya ba ni mi mthun par za na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-41: dus ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dus bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-42: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:160b-43: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:160b-44: na ba dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:161a-1: zas gcig gis 'tsho bar mi nus pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:161a-2: las dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:161a-4: mchod rten gyi las tha na phyag dar re lde tsam mam /
T08TD4104.1E:161a-5: dkyil 'khor ba mal tsam byas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:161a-6: lam dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste dge slong dpag tshad phyed du song ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:161a-7: de'i phyed du song ste phyir 'ongs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:161a-8: grur zhugs pa dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste dge slong grur zhugs pa dpag tshad phyed du song pa'am de'i phyed du song ste phyir 'ongs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:161a-9: 'dus pa chen po dus so zhes bya ba ni spags pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:161a-10: dge sbyong gi zas dus te zhes bya ba ni 'di las phyi rol pa'i rab tu byung ba dag 'khod pa de yang dge sbyong zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
T08TD4104.1E:161a-11: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:161a-12: bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de la ni gnang ba dang mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:161a-13: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag par ni dge slong na ba ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:161a-15: lam du ma song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:161a-16: grur ma zhugs pa so sor nges pa'i zas kyi gnas can dag las gzhan pa dge 'dun du longs pa'i dge slong cig car du za bas mtshams kyi nang du dge 'dun gzhi'i 'dug gnas su za ba las logs shig tu 'dug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:161a-17: dus ston chen po ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:161a-18: dge sbyong gi zas ma yin pa gang yang rung ba cung zad kyis gzhi'i 'dug gnas su za'am /
T08TD4104.1E:161a-19: 'dus shing za ba gang yang rung ba gcig lam bsrul bar der 'du shes pas dus rung ba'i zas zos na 'dus shing za ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:161a-21: so sor nges pa'i zas kyi gnas can dag las gzhan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun du gyur pa mtshams kyi nang nas gnas pa dag gis zan lhan cig ma yin pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:161a-22: 'di la yan lag bcus dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:161a-26: grur zhugs pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:161a-27: so sor nges pa'i zas kyi gnas can dag las gzhan pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:161a-28: dge 'dun du longs pa'i dge slong cig car za ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-0: dge 'dun gzhi'i 'dug gnas su za ba las logs @161b shig tu 'dus pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-1: dus ston chen po ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-2: dge sbyong gi zas ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-3: zas gang yang rung ba cung zad kyis gzhi'i 'dug gnas su za ba'am 'dus shing za ba gang yang rung ba gcig la ma bsrul ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-5: dus su rung ba'i zas zos pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:161b-6: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-7: 'dus shing za ba'i ltung byed de sum cu drug pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-9: // / dus ma yin par za ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-11: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:161b-12: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos nye ba 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe de dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-13: mnyan yod na bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:161b-14: bud med ni sred pa spyad pa yin pas bud med kyis de dag mthong nas brang brdungs te smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-15: 'di dag skyes pa na gang dag gis 'di dag skyes ma thag gi lce lan tshvas 'gengs par ma nus pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-16: brla phrag tu khron pa bcug ste 'brang bar ma nus pa de dag gis ci thob /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-17: bcu bdun sde dag nya mang bar gyur nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-18: bdag cag gis zan bcad par gyur pa ni bla'i /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-19: tshig ngan pa rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thos par gyur pa ni mi rung ngo zhes de dag de nyid nas phyir log ste /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-21: de dag gis ji srid du lus las mdangs ma yal ba de srid du dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-22: gang gi tshe lus las mdangs yal ba de'i tshe na glos phab ste nyal lo //
T08TD4104.1E:161b-23: grong khyer ba skyed mos tshal ba dga' ba dag / bza' ba dang ltung ba khyer te /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-24: mnyan yod kyi phyi rol rgyal byed kyi tshal du dong nas 'cha' bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-26: 'thung bar byed pa nas bcu bdun sde dag gis de dag mthong nas lto ba la nyug par byed pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:161b-30: de dag gis bcu bdun sde dag la bca' ba dang ltung ba byin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-0: de dag gis longs spyad nas zung bsdebs te 'chag cing kha ton bya bar @162a * //
T08TD4104.1E:162a-2: nye dags de dag kha ton byed pa mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-3: kye ma'o bcu bdun sde dag gis shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:162a-4: btsun pa nye dga' bcom ldan 'das kyis bden chos mngon par brjod par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:162a-6: sbyin bdag gis len pa po la zas sbyin pa na gnas lnga sbyin par byed de /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-11: brtson 'grus sbyin pa ni bde bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-12: zos na stobs dang ldan par 'gyur gyi /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-16: khyed dus ma yin par zar rung ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-17: gal te dus su ma rnyed na kho bo cag gis ltogs te 'chi bar bya'am ci zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-18: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dus ma yin par bca' ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-19: bza' ba za bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-21: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-22: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:162a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-24: yang dge slong gang dus ma yin par bca' ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-26: za na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de ;
T08TD4104.1E:162a-28: gang zag ni bcu bdun sde /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-29: nyon mongs pa ni sbyor mi bzod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-30: nyes pa ni dus ma yin par za ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:162a-31: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni bcu bdun sde'am /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-32: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:162a-33: dus ma yin par zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-34: dus ma yin pa gnyis te ;
T08TD4104.1E:162a-35: skya rengs ma shar ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-37: bca' ba'am bza' ba zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-39: bza' ba lnga po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:162a-40: 'cha' 'am zan zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:162a-41: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:162a-42: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-43: dge slong mi nabs 'dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa gnas gang na bdag nyid gnas pa'i rang gi nyi ma phyed yol phan chad nas phyi de nyin par gyi skya rengs dang po ma shar bar /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-44: shes bzhin du bca' ba dang bza' ba 'chos sam /
T08TD4104.1E:162a-45: zos na dus ma yin par za ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:162b-0: @162b dus ma yin pa de nyid la 'dus shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:162b-1: de la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-3: dus ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-5: dus su rung ba'i zas dang /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-7: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:162b-8: dus ma yin par za ba'i ltung byed de sum cu bdun pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-10: // / gsog 'jog gi ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:162b-12: tshe dang ldan pa nag po'i kun du spyod pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-13: grong ngam grong rdal gang na nye bar bsten cing gnas pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-14: de snga dro sham thabs bgos /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-15: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-16: grong ngam grod rdal de nyid du lus shin du bsrungs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-17: dbang po rnams kyi shin du bsdams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-18: dran pa shin du nye bar gzhag pas bsod snyoms la 'jug cing /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-19: gal te 'bras chan gsher ba rnyed na ni /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-20: lhung bzed kyis len par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-21: gal te 'bras chan skam po rnyed na ni /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-22: lhung bzed kyi snod kyis len par byed de /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-23: de grong ngam grong rdal der bsod snyoms brgyus nas gtsug lag khang du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-24: 'bras chan gsher ba ni za bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-25: 'bras chan skam po ni bskams nas /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-26: rdza ma so btang ba bkang ste 'jog par byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-30: lhags pa byung bar gyur ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-31: 'bras chan skam po chu dron pos spangs te zos nas bsam gtan dang /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-33: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:162b-34: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-35: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-36: gtsug lag khang rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-37: tshe dang ldan pa nag po'i gtsug lag khang gal ba der gshegs so //
T08TD4104.1E:162b-38: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nag po'i bcug lag khang na 'bras chan skam po rab tu mang po dag bting zhing 'dug pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-39: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:162b-40: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyas par gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:163a-2: kun dga' bo dge slong dag gsog 'jog byas ba za'am /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-5: yang dge slong gang bca' ba dang bza' ba gsog 'jog byas pa 'cha' 'am zan ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-7: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa nag po //
T08TD4104.1E:163a-8: nyon mongs pa ni bcag chags ma byang bas so sor ma brtags pa /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-9: nyes pa ni zas gsog 'jog byas pa za ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:163a-10: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-11: tshe dang ldan pa nag po'am /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-12: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:163a-13: bca' ba dang bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-14: bza' ba lnga po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:163a-15: gsog 'jog byas pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-16: gsog 'jog byas pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-17: snga dro byin len byas pa phyi dro'i bar du gsog 'jog byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-18: phyi dro byin len byas pa thun tshod las yul bar gsog 'jog byas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:163a-19: 'cha' 'am za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:163a-20: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:163a-21: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-22: dge slong gis dus su rung ba'i zas bca' ba lnga po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-23: bza' ba lnga po dag las gang yang rung ba byin len byas pa ma zhig pa bca' ba'i phyir 'chad pa phyed yol las 'das pa gsog 'jog tu gyur pa la der 'du shes pas zos na gsog 'jog gi ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:163a-24: 'di'i byed pa po na dus su rung ba'i zas bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga po dag nyid gsog 'jog tu gyur pa de nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:163a-25: 'di la yan lag bzhis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te dus su rung ba'i zas bca' ba 'am bza' bar gtogs pa dang gsog 'jog tu gyur pa dang der 'du shes pa dang zos pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:163a-26: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:163a-27: gsog 'jog gi ltung byed de sum cu brgyad pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-29: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-31: byin len ma byas par za ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:163a-32: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:163b-0: tshe dang ldan ba nag po chen po ni thams cad dur khrod pa dang ldan pa @163b yin te de'i lhung bzed kyang dur khrod pa yin /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-1: chos gos kyang dur khrod pa yin /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-2: bsod snyoms kyang dur khrod pa yin /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-3: gnas mal yang dur khrod pa yin te gang gi tshe skye bo phal po che la mi ngas byung ba de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po tsho ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-5: khrag rgyas par gyur pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-6: de yang dang yang du grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par mi byed la gang gi tshe skye bo phal po che la mi ngas ma byung ba de'i tshe na tsha dang ldan pa nag po rid pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-10: lus ma thob par gyur cing /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-11: de yang dang yang du bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:163b-12: sgo bas de mtshan mar bzung nas 'phags pa nag po chen po 'di mi sha za'am snyam zhing thams cad du yang 'phags pa nag pa chen po mi sha za'o zhes sgra grags so //
T08TD4104.1E:163b-13: mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-14: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-15: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-17: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:163b-18: de'i bu mo zhig byung nas bsring zhing bskyed de chen por gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:163b-19: dus gzhan zhig na bram ze de dus la bab nas nye du rnams kyis gos sngon po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-22: dkar po dag gis khyogs spyil brgyan nas dur khrod du khyer te bsregs shing dong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-23: de'i chung ma dang bu mo gnyis mtha' gcig tu dong ste bsdad pa dang tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po de'i gdong du lta zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-24: sdod pa mthong nas bu mos smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-25: yum 'phags pa nag po chen po 'di bya rog mo zhar ma bzhin du nges par rtog cing sdong do zhes /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-26: ngag gi las rtsub mo yang smras par gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:163b-27: mnyan yod na bram ze'i khye'u dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-28: 'phags pa nag po chen po mi sha za'o zhes thos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-29: de dag gis de bgam pa'i phyir gcig shi ba'i cha lugs su byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-30: yung ba dang 'bru mar gyis bskus te /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-31: khyogs spyil du bzhag nas mnyan yod nas phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-32: tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po yang mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-33: des de mthong nas bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:163b-34: bdag dgang dka' ba 'di'i don du grong du bsod snyoms la zhugs te ci rung /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-0: phyir log la zas lnga po 'di dag nyid bza' bar bya'o snyam nas de @164a * //
T08TD4104.1E:164a-2: de dag gis de dur khrod du bor te /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-3: mtha' gcig tu dong nas tshang tshing dang lhab lhub dag gi nang du mgo dkris te bsdad do //
T08TD4104.1E:164a-4: der wa zhig gis bgrod par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-5: tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen pos bsams ba /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-6: was zas lnga po dag zos shing bdag zan chad par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam du rig nas /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-7: des myur ba myur par 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-8: bram ze'i khye'u de skrag ste /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-9: kho bo zos so kho bo zos so zhes ngu bar brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:164a-10: bram ze'i khye'u de dag dbyug pa thogs te myur ba myur bar dong nas de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-11: 'phags pa drang srong gi rgyal mtshan thogs shing /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-12: sdig pa'i las rtsub po 'di dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-13: 'di lta bu dag lhag par spyod dam /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-14: des smras pa ji byas mi sha za'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164a-15: bzhin bzangs dag ci khyed kyis kho bo mtshon thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-16: sha gcod cing za ba mthong ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-18: 'o na ci'i slad du myur ba myur bar byon //
T08TD4104.1E:164a-19: bzhin bzangs dag / kho bo la blo skyes pa /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-20: wa 'dis zas lnga po 'di dag zos shing bdag gi za na ched par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam du rig nas myur ba myur bar 'ongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:164a-21: 'phags pa zas lnga po dag gsol lam /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-22: mi sha gsol ni ma 'tshal gyi 'di ltar thams cad du 'phags pa nag po chen po mi sa gsol zhes ni grags par gyur ro zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slang rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:164a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-24: nyes dmigs gang cung zad cig byung ba de ni dge slong dag byin len byed du ma bcug par za bar gyur pa yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-25: de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis byin len byed du bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-26: za na de nyid dpang por 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-27: de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis byin len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164a-28: byin len ni rnam pa lnga ste /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-31: lus dang 'brel bas lus su dang /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-32: lus kyis lus dang 'brel bar dang /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-33: lus dang 'brel pas lus dang 'brel pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:164a-34: gzhag pa'i cho ga dag ni lnga pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164a-35: rung ba ni rnam pa lnga ste /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-1: ne tshos rma byung bas rung ba nyid ni lnga pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-2: gzhan yang rung ba rnam pa lnga ste /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-8: sa bon gyi chos nyid med pa nyid ni lnga ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-9: lag pa la bkan par byin len rnam pa lnga ste /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-15: lhung bzed bzhi nyid lnga pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-16: mes rung bar bya ba ni phung por byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-18: gsum du reg par byas nas thams cad rung bar 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-19: mtshon dang sen mos ni re re nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-20: khyim pa rnams mi snyoms par 'drim nas /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-21: dge slong rnams kyis de tshul dag 'drim du gzhug par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-22: de dag kyang mi snyom nas /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-23: dge slong dag gis lag pa bsnyal te /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-24: byin len byas nas brim par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-25: 'on kyang ma snyoms na brim par bya ba gces pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-27: tha ma dag so sor bya'o//
T08TD4104.1E:164b-28: 'drim par byed pa'i skal ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-29: mkhan po dang slob dpon nam /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-30: drung na 'dug pa de dag gis mnod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-31: stan nas ma 'phags pas ji tsam zhus pa de tsam dag byin len byed du gzhug go //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-32: 'dril ba dag stan las ma 'phags pas len nus pa dag ni byin len byed du gzhug mi dgos la /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-33: mi nus pa dag ni yang byin len byed du gzhug par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-34: khyim pa dag kyang 'drim du gzhug par bya zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-35: dge slong gis dang por gzung zhing khyim pas phyis gzung bar bya bo'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-36: dge slong dag las blangs pa gang yin pa de dag gi byin len ni de nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-37: khyim pa dag las blangs pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-38: byin len byed du gzhug go //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-39: dang por dge slong dag gis gtang bar bya zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-40: phyis khyim pa dag gis gtang bar bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-41: phyis de nyin par dge 'dun la brim par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-42: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dge 'dun la zhun mar gyi bsum pa la sogs pa dag 'bul na blang par bya zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-43: blangs nas dge 'dun la brim par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-44: de dag gis chos gos dag snum par gyur pa ltan bar du rtsva 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:164b-45: lo ma dag bcug ste brim par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-46: de dag bzung ste 'greng ba na ngal bar 'gyur ba lta na gzhag par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:164b-47: gzhag pa na 'dril ba lta na 'og gzhi la gzhag par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-1: kyang blangs shing chu'i rdzing bu zab mo'i nang du zhag bdun nam brgyad gzhug par bya zhing //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-5: chu srin byis pa gsod pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-6: nya khyi ba dag gis ma lus par ldags par gyur pa /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-7: de'i tshe rung ba'i khang par bcug ste spyad par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-8: rnam pa lngas ni byin len byed du ma bcug par brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-10: mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pas dang /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-14: lag pa khas phub pas byin len byed du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-16: byin lan byed du bcug par brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-18: snga ma las bzlog pa dag gis so //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis byin len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-20: drug sde dag byin len byed du bcug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-21: byin len byed du ma bcug pa yang za bar byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-22: dge slong don nyung du dag bcom ldan 'das kyis byin len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-23: ci'i phyir dge slong dag byin len byed du bcug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-24: byin len byed du ma bcug pa yang za bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-26: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-27: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-29: yang dge slong gang ma byin par kha nas mid pa'i zas za na chu dang so shing ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-32: nyon mongs pa ni bka' dang bslab pa la g-yel ba /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-33: nyes pa ni byin len byed du ma bcug par za ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-34: de la yang dag slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-35: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-36: ma byin par zhes bya ba ni de la skyes pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-38: ma ning gang gis kyang ma byin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-39: kha nas med pa'i zas zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:165a-41: bza' ba lnga po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-42: za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-43: chu dang so shing ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni chu dang so shing gzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-44: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:165a-45: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-0: dge slong gis byang gi sgra mi @165b snyan pa'i dus dang /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-1: chu dang so shing ma gtogs pa'i bza' bar bya ba byin len ma bstabs pa nyid la 'du shes pas khar zos na byin len ma byas par za ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:165b-2: 'di'i byed pa po ni byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i dus dang /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-3: chu dang so shing ma gtogs pa'i bza' bar bya ba byin len ma bstabs pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:165b-4: 'di la yan lag drug gis dngos gzhi ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-5: byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i dus ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-6: chu dang so shing ma gtogs pa'i bza' bar bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-7: byin len gyi mtshan nyid mngon sum du mtshams kyi nang du 'thob pa'i phyogs na 'dug pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-8: lag pa bkan pas lus sam de dang 'brel par gyen du 'brel bar 'dug nus pa /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-9: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa mi ma yin pa las kyang sbyin par 'dod pas yan lag gis sam /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-10: de dang 'brel bas byin nang mnos pa'i byin len ma bstabs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-14: de dag las yang lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:165b-15: byin len ma byas par za ba'i ltung byed de sum cu dgu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-17: // / bsod pa slong ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-19: ser skya'i gnas su byon nas /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-20: ser skya'i gnas na n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:165b-21: sh'akya ming chen gyis de thos nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-24: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sh'akya ming chen la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-25: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-26: yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-27: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-28: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-29: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod /
T08TD4104.1E:165b-30: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:166a-0: de nas sh'a kya ming chen @166a * //
T08TD4104.1E:166a-2: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sang bdag gi sdum par /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-3: gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes spyan drangs nas gshegs te gdugs tshod gsol nas /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-4: sh'akya ming chen la chos bstan nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so//
T08TD4104.1E:166a-5: de'i nang par drug sde dag sngar langs te sbyin bdag gi khyim du song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-7: 'phags pa dag 'di nyid du gdugs tshod gsol cig / drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-8: kho bo cag mgron du bos so //
T08TD4104.1E:166a-11: 'o na sang gdugs tshod gsol cig /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-12: de ltar bya'o zhes drug sde dag gis sbyin bdag de dag phyi de nyin par gyi zan drug cu sbyor du bcug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-13: sh'akya ming chen gyi khyim du dong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-14: ci tsam de na kha zas sta gon byas pa yang med gnas mal bshams pa yang med par mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-16: sh'akya ming chen gyi zho shas 'tsho ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-18: shes ldan dag / khyed kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-19: snying las chung dur 'khod cing gdugs tshod kyang sta gon mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-20: gnas mal yang shom par mi byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-21: ci sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dag 'dun gyi gdugs tshod gcod par byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-23: 'phags pa dag khyed cag mnal bar gyur tam ci /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-24: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te gshegs lags so //
T08TD4104.1E:166a-25: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-26: ci kho bo cag gi zan gcad par bya'am /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-29: sh'akya ming chen la sbran gyi bar du re zhig yud tsam zhig gzhes shi gces de dag dong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-30: sh'akya ming chen la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-31: 'phags pa drug sde dag da gzod mchis te 'tshal ma slong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:166a-32: sh'akya ming chen gyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-33: deng la lhag rol cung zad cig yod pa de byin cig / de dag dong ste smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-34: 'phags pa dag bzhugs la gsol cig ces de dag gis brim par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-35: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:166a-36: sh'akya ming chen gyis kha shin du chen pos /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis sang bdag gi sdum bar dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu @166b gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes spyan drang nas /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-1: gal te zan 'di 'dra bas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drang du rung na ni /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-2: nye dgas kyang nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan 'dren par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:166b-3: 'di ltar bkren ba 'di la ci bdog gis deng la khyim bdag che ge mo'i khyim nas 'o ma long shig che ge mo'i khyim nas zho long shig / che ge mo'i khyim nas mar long shig / che ge mo'i khyim nas nya long shig / che ge mo'i khyim nas sha long shig / che ge mo'i khyim nas sha skam dag long shig ces de dag gis bdag nyid kyi phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-4: zas bsod pa de lta bu dag gzhan gyi khyim dag nas blangs te zos nas gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-5: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-6: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis zan gar zos /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-8: khyed cag de nam mthong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:166b-9: kho bo cag phyis lhags so //
T08TD4104.1E:166b-10: khyed cag gis zan ji lta bu zos /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-11: 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-12: nya dang sha dang sha skam dag zos so //
T08TD4104.1E:166b-13: dge slong dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-14: kho bo cag gis zas de lta bu ma thob bo //
T08TD4104.1E:166b-15: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-16: bkren pa de la zas de lta bu ga la yod /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-17: kho bo cag gis khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag nas blangs te der zos so //
T08TD4104.1E:166b-18: khyed cag bdag nyid kyi phyir zas bsod pa de lta bu dag / gzhan gyi khyim dag nas blangs te zar rung ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-21: kho bo cag gis ltogs te 'chi bar bya'am zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-22: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag bdag nyid kyi phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-23: zas bsod pa de lta bu dag gzhan gyi khyim dag nas blangs te 'cha' ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-24: za bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-26: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-27: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:166b-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyi zas bsod pa gang dag gsungs pa 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-30: 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang /
T08TD4104.1E:166b-34: yang dge slong gang mi na bar bdag nyid kyi phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-0: zas bsod pa de lta bu dag gzhan gyi khyim dag nas blangs te @167a * //
T08TD4104.1E:167a-1: 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-4: nyon mongs pa ni rang nyam dang lto 'dun /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-5: nyes pa ni mi na bar bdag nyid kyi phyir zas bsod pa dag gzhan gyi khyim dag nas blangs te za ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:167a-6: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
T08TD4104.1E:167a-8: dge slong rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-10: zas bsod pa gang dag gsungs pa zhas bya ba ni rab tu bstan pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-17: sha skam dag ste zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-19: dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-20: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:167a-21: mi na bar zhes bya ba ni na ba ma gtogs par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:167a-22: bdag nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la bsngos te'o //
T08TD4104.1E:167a-23: zas bsod pa de lta bu dag ces bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-30: gzhan gyi khyim dag nas zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:167a-31: bslangs te zhes bya ba ni slong mo byas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:167a-32: 'cha' 'am za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:167a-33: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:167a-34: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-35: dge slong mi na ba ji bder bstabs pa ma byas sam sbyin par byed pa nye du ma yin pa khyim pa nyid las zas bsod pa'o ma'am /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-40: sha skam lta bu rang gis bslangs te zos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-44: bzang po thob pa na zas bsod pa snga ma dag lta bu rang gis bslangs te zos na /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-45: bsod pa slong ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:167a-47: dge slong mi na ba ji bder bstabs pa ma byas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-48: sbyin par byed pa nye du ma yin pa'i khyim pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-49: zas bsod pa dag ni byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:167a-50: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-51: dge slong mi na ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:167a-52: ji bder bstabs pa ma byas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-0: sbyin par byed pa nye du ma yin pa khyim bdag nyid @167b dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:167b-2: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:167b-3: bsod pa slong ba'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-6: srog chags bcas dang nyal sar 'dug /'greng dang gcer bu dmag dang ni //
T08TD4104.1E:167b-7: zhag gnyis bshams dkrugs 'gro ba dang //
T08TD4104.1E:167b-8: rdeg dang gzas dang gnas ngan len //
T08TD4104.1E:167b-9: zhes bya ba ni bcu pa lnga pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-10: sdom la zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don dang /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-11: dgos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:167b-12: bcu pa lnga pa 'dis kyang ltung byed kyi chos bcu bstan te /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-13: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-14: nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-15: nyal bo byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-16: gcer bu la sbyin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-18: dmag gi nang na gnas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-19: dpung gi yan lag nyams su myong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-22: gnas ngan len 'chab pa'i ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:167b-23: de la srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das koo sh'amb'i na gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:167b-25: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod nas /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-26: de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-27: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa khyod shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la ma spyod cig / des smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-28: kho bo la 'ga' zhig gis bsgrangs te gtad dam ci /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-29: shar gyi rgya mtsho chen por 'dong na ci nyes /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-32: byang gi rgya mtsho chen por 'dong na ci nyes /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-35: lteng ka dag tu 'jug na ci nyes zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-36: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-37: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-39: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to ;
T08TD4104.1E:167b-40: / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-41: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod na ltung byed do zhes bca' pa mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-44: nyon mongs pa ni bag med pa /
T08TD4104.1E:167b-45: nyes pa ni shes bzhin du srog chags dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-0: @168a * // bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:168a-1: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-2: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:168a-3: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-4: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:168a-5: srog chags dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-6: srog chags dang bcas pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-7: gang dag mig sngar snang bar gyur pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-8: gang dag chu tshags kyis zin par 'gyur ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:168a-9: chu la spyod na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-10: chu'i spyod pa gnyis su ste /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-11: nang gi dang phyi rol gyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:168a-12: nang gir spyod pa ni khrus byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-17: phyi rol gyi spyod pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-19: lhung bzed chung du bkru ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-20: chos gos dag bkru ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-21: tshon gyi las byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-22: gtsug lag khang du chag chag 'debs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-24: lci ba sar ba'i byug pas nyug pa'o ;
T08TD4104.1E:168a-25: / ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-30: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-33: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-34: dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-35: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:168a-36: sngar srog chags dang bcas pa la spyod pa'i ltung byed bstan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-37: 'dir srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'i ltung byed bstan pa de gnyis kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid ni 'dra'o //
T08TD4104.1E:168a-39: snga ma ni rang spyod pa ma yin /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-40: gzhan spyod pa'i don nyid la 'jug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-41: 'jug du 'jud pa de gnyis kyi yul la rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:168a-42: 'di ni rang spyod pa'i don nyid la 'jug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-43: 'jug tu 'jud pa de gnyis kyi yul la rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:168a-44: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-45: dge slong rang spyod pa'i don du lus kyi nye bar spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-46: de'i ngo bo nyid khrus dang btung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-48: lag pa dang rkang pa bkru ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168a-49: lus kyi yo byad bza' bar bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-1: yo byad de dag tu nye bar sbyar bas dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-6: nye bar sbyar ba de dag las chu la sogs pa dgos pa 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-15: thug pa dag tu bya ba'i chu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-19: bu ram gyi dbu ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-27: bca' bar bya ba la sogs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-28: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags bltar nus pas snang ba dag gis srog chags dang bcas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-31: shing dang g-yeng ba dag chur gzhug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-34: gos rim pa gcig pa las gzhan pa spu can la sogs pa bkru ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-35: gos rim pa gcig pa de yang srog chags kyi khams lhag par mang ba'i chur 'khru ba lta bu'i sbyor ba ngag la yang srog chags dang bcas pa nyid du 'du shes pas rang nyid 'jug gam /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-37: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags re re shi ba'i mthar /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-38: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:168b-39: 'di'i byed pa po ni rang spyod pa'i don du chu la sogs pa srog chags dang bcas pa la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:168b-40: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-41: rang spyod pa'i don gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-42: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags gang yang rung ba dang bcas pa'i chu la sogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-44: rang dang gzhan gyis spyad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-45: srog chags ji snyed shi ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:168b-46: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:168b-47: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu gcig pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-49: // / nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:168b-50: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:169a-1: bsam pa'i nor bu'i rig pa shes te /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-2: de snga dro sham thabs bgos /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-3: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-4: mnyan yod du bsong snyoms la zhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:169a-5: mnyan yod na spos 'tshong gi khye'u chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon pa zhig 'dug pa des zong bkram pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-6: bdag chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod du 'gro'o snyam pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa skyes nas /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-7: des zong phyir bsdu bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-8: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa shes nas /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-9: bdag song la 'di re ba med par bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-10: de dang por de'i khyim du song ste stan la 'dug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-11: bu mo de la chos ston par brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:169a-12: ji tsam na spos 'tshong gi khye'u de 'ongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-13: des chung ma la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-14: 'phags pa 'char ka la bsod snyoms phul la bzhud du gsol cig / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-15: bzhin bzangs kho bos bdag nyid kyi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par byas te 'ongs nas chos ston par byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-17: 'dug la chos nyon cig ces des de nan gyis 'dug du bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-18: des ci tsam gyis de'i kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de tsam du chos bstan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-19: de sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go //
T08TD4104.1E:169a-20: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-21: 'di ltar rang gi chung ma la yang dbang med do zhes smad par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-24: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon byas te stan la 'dug par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-26: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:169a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon byas te stan la 'dug na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:169a-29: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags kyi kun du sbyor ba /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-0: nyes pa ni shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon byas te stan la 'dug @169b pa'o ;
T08TD4104.1E:169b-1: / de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-2: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:169b-3: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-4: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:169b-5: nyal po byed par shom pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-6: bud med ni skyes pa'i nyal po bya ba yin la skyes pa ni bud med la nyal po byed pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:169b-7: khyim du zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-8: bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:169b-9: phyis gnon byas te zhes bya ba ni phyis zhugs te'o //
T08TD4104.1E:169b-10: stan la zhes bya ba ni gzhi la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:169b-11: 'dug na zhes bya ba ni 'dom dang gi nang du rkub tshogs bzhas bzhag na'o /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-12: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:169b-13: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-14: dge slong 'jigs pa'i dbang dang gnas gzhan la sems gtod pa ma yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-15: khyim pa'i skyes pa dang bud med gnas gzhan mthong bas spyod yul gyi mtha' tshun chad kyi gza' tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-16: mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis sprad du rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-17: 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-18: phyogs par shes bzhin du mngon sum du brnag pas 'dug na nyal po byed pa shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:169b-21: bud med dge slong rang gi gnas las gzhan nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-22: mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis sprad du rung ba nyid na /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-23: 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-24: phyogs la 'du shes gtse cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:169b-25: 'di la yan lag bdun gyis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-27: gnas gzhan la sems gtod pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-28: khyim pa skyes pa dang bud med nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-29: gnas gzhan mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' tshun chad kyi gza' tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-30: mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis sprod du rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-31: 'khrig pa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa'am phyogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:169b-33: mngon sum du ba rang pas 'dug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:169b-34: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:169b-35: nyal pa byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-1: shom pa'i khyim na 'greng pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas spyon gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:170a-3: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bsam pa'i nor bu'i rig pa shes te /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-4: de snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-5: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:170a-6: mnyan yod na spos 'tshong gi khye'u chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon ba zhig 'dug pa des /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-8: bdag chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod du 'gro'o snyam pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa skyes nas /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-9: des zong phyir bsdu bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-10: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa shes nas /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-11: bdag song la blta'o snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-12: de dang por de'i khyim du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-13: sgo glegs kyi rgyab na mgo bsring zhing 'greng ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:170a-14: de'i 'og tu spos 'tshong gyi khye'u de 'ongs nas des chung ma khrid de gnas khang du zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-16: 'char ka bden pa na 'greng ba mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-18: rje'i sras 'phags pa 'char ka sgo glegs kyi rgyab na 'greng ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:170a-20: 'phags pa 'char ka gtsug lag khang na bsam gtan dang /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-22: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong zhing 'greng ngo zhes des chung ma la dga' mgur spyad nas /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-23: de gang gi tshe kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-24: des 'char ka mthong ba dang de sh'akya'i bu'i dge spyong rnams kyi dge spyong gi tshul ni tshig go //
T08TD4104.1E:170a-25: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-26: 'di ltar rang gi chung ma la yang dbang med do zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-29: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-30: dge slong dag shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-31: dben pa skyabs yod par 'greng bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-33: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:170a-34: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:170a-35: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-0: yang dge slong gang @170b shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'greng na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-2: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags kyi kun du spyor ba /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-3: nyes pa ni shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du dben pa skyabs yod par 'greng ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:170b-4: de la yang dge slong gan zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-5: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:170b-6: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-7: de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-8: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:170b-9: nyal po byed par shom pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-10: bud med ni skyes pa'i nyal po bya ba yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-11: skyes pa ni bud med la nyal po byed pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:170b-12: khyim du zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:170b-13: dben pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-16: ma ning gzhan 'ga' yang med pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:170b-17: skyabs yod par zhes bya ba ni ldas bskyabs par te /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-23: 'greng na zhes bya ba ni 'dod ma gang gi nang du 'greng na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:170b-24: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:170b-25: sdar nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du 'dug pa'i ltung byed bstan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-26: 'dir nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du 'greng ba'i ltung byed bstan pa de gnyid kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid ni 'dra'o //
T08TD4104.1E:170b-28: snga ma ni mngon sum du brnag pas 'dug pa'i yul la rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:170b-29: 'di ni bden pa skyabs yod par brag pas 'greng ba'i yul la rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:170b-30: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-32: gnas gzhan la sems gtod pa ma yin pas khyim pa'i skyes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-33: bud med gnas gzhan mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' tshun chad kyi gza' tha dad pa ma yi pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-34: 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:170b-35: phyogs par shes bzhin du dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng zhing spyod par byed pa tshor bya gnyis dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-1: gnyis kyis tshor ba na nyal bo byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:171a-4: bud med dge slong rang gi gnas las gzhan pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-5: mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis sprad du rung ba nyid ni /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-6: 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-7: phyogs pa la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:171a-8: 'di la yan lag brgyad kyis dngos bzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-10: gnas gzhan la yang sems gtod pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-11: khyim pa'i skyes pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-14: mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' tshun chad kyi gza' tha dad pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-15: mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis sprad du rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-16: 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'am phyogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-18: dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-19: sprod par byed pa tshor bya gnyis dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-21: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:171a-22: nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu gsum pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-24: // / gcer bu pa la sbyin pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon to //
T08TD4104.1E:171a-26: mnyan yod na skyod mos tshal zhig na /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-27: yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam dog pa 'khal zhing 'khod pa de dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-28: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis gzugs can brgyan cing gsal ba la sogs pa mthong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:171a-30: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems kyis dang por sangs rgyas mthong ba na sems nyams bde ba skyed par byed pa de ltar ni lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas kyis sems goms par byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-31: dbul pos gter mthong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-32: bud med kyis bu thob pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-33: rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba yang sems nyams bde ba skyed par mi byed pas /
T08TD4104.1E:171a-34: de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la @171b mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-5: khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-6: ji nas kyang de dag gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ma tho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-7: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad pas de dag gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
T08TD4104.1E:171b-8: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-9: sang bdag cag gi gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes spyan drangs nas gnang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-10: k'ara sh'a pa na dag khyer te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gan du song nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-11: btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag cag la snod spyad dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-12: mi blas dang gnas mal gyi 'byor pa ma mchis kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-13: khyed kyis kyang k'arash'a pa na 'di dag gis zhal zas sta gon bgyid du stsol cig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-14: bdag cag mchis te brim par bgyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:171b-15: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-16: khyim bdag khyod kyis 'di dag dang bdag nyid kyi k'ara sh'a pa na gzhan dag bsres te /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-17: zhal zas bsod pa sta gon gyis la 'dir skur cig ces smras so //
T08TD4104.1E:171b-18: de ltar byas nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du bskur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:171b-19: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-20: rigs kyi bu mo de dag la zhal zas sta gon byas kyis tshur sheg la /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-21: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la brims shig ces spring ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-22: de dag lhags te smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-23: btsun pa kun dga' bo khyod bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-24: tshur spyon khyod kyis kyang brim du gsol /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-25: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos brim par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-26: der gcer bu ma rgan gzhon gnyis shig 'ongs te /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-27: de gnyis kyis khyim bdag mo de dag la zan bslangs pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-29: zas 'di ni rgyal bu 'di'i yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:171b-30: gcer bu ma de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bslangs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-31: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ma bsams par brims pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-32: rgan mo la ni khur ba gcig byin /
T08TD4104.1E:171b-33: gzhon nu ma la ni khur ba gnyis sbyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-2: gzhon nu ma rgyal bu 'dis khyod don du gnyer gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-3: sta gon gyis shig ces zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-4: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag / gcer bu pa dang gcer bu ma kun du rgyu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-5: kun du rgyu ma la rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-6: bza' ba sbyin par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-8: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-9: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:172a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-11: yang dge slong gang gce bu pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-12: gcer bu ma kun du rgyu'am /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-14: rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang bza' ba sbyin par byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-16: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo //
T08TD4104.1E:172a-17: nyon mongs pa ni ma brtags par spyod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-18: nyes pa ni gcer bu ma la rang gi lag nas zan sbyin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:172a-19: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:172a-20: gcer bu pa'am gcer bu ma kun du rgyu'am kun du rgyu mo la zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-21: rtags 'di dang rab tu byung ba 'di med pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:172a-22: rang gi lag nas zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-24: bca' ba dang bza' ba zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-25: bca' ba lnga po dang bza' ba lnga po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:172a-26: sbyin na zhes bya ba ni bsam mi dgos par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:172a-27: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:172a-28: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-29: dge slong gis gzhan mu stegs can gyi rab tu byung ba gcer bu pho yang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-31: rtags 'di dang rab tu byung ba 'di med pa /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-32: nye du rab tu byung ba la ltos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-34: sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-35: bral ba nyid ma gtogs pa la rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-36: bza' ba zas de la rung ba dag de'i lus sam /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-38: gcer bu pa la sbyin pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:172a-40: gzhan mu stegs can gyi rab tu byung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-43: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:172a-44: gzhan mu stegs can gyi rab tu byung ba gcer bu pho yang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-0: mo yang rung ba rtags 'di dang @172b rab tu byung ba 'di med pa /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-1: nye du rab tu byung ba la ltos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-3: sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral ba nyid ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-6: gnyi ga la rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-7: de'i lus sam lus dang 'brel bar sbyin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:172b-8: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:172b-9: gcer bu la sbyin pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-11: // / dmag la lta ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-13: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:172b-14: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ri brags pa zhig log nas /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-15: der ru pa gcig btang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-16: bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:172b-17: ru pa gnyis pa dang gsum pa btang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-18: de yang bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-19: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis nga'i yul na /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-20: mtshon gyis 'tsho ba gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dong bar bya'o zhes dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-21: rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te 'phags pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-22: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-23: dga' bo nye dga' gsus po che'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ci 'dra ba bltas 'dong ngo zhes de dag lam kar dong ste 'khod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-24: ci tsam na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dag 'ongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-25: drug sde dag gis de dag la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-27: 'phags pa dag ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ri brags pa zhig log pa de 'bebs su mchi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:172b-28: drug sde dag gis smas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-29: bkren pa dag dpung gi tshogs 'di lta bu dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-30: ri brags pa phebs par 'gyur ram /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-31: khyed kyi glang po che 'di dag ni phag 'dra la /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-32: ri brags pa'i glang po che ni ri bo brtsegs pa 'dra'o //
T08TD4104.1E:172b-33: khyed kyi rta 'di dag ni bong bu 'dra la /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-34: ri brags pa'i rta 'di dag ni glang po che'i phru gu 'dra'o //
T08TD4104.1E:172b-35: khyed kyi shing rta 'di dag ni /
T08TD4104.1E:172b-37: ri brags pa'i shing rta dag ni gzhal med khang 'dra'o //
T08TD4104.1E:172b-38: khyed kyi mi 'di dag ni rtsva mi 'dra la /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-0: ri brags pa'i mi de dag ni gnod sbyin @173a * //
T08TD4104.1E:173a-1: gdug pa can 'dra bas khyed cag par 'gro ba yod kyang tshur ldog pa med kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-2: phyir deng la pha ma dag la til gyi chu byin la gzod deng shig / de dag mtha' gcig tu dong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-3: sems khong du chud cing 'khod do //
T08TD4104.1E:173a-4: ci tsam na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'ongs nas des smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-5: khyed cag ci'i phyir mi 'dong bar mtha' gcig tu dong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-8: lha bdag cag rgyal bar ga la 'gyur /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-9: 'di ltar dge sbyong mgo reg ras yug chen glegs pa 'tshal ba 'di dag ni mi mchi dgu mchi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:173a-10: gang dag 'phags pa drug sde dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:173a-11: shes ldan dag de dag ni /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-12: dge sbyong phral po dag yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-13: de dag gis smras pas khyed la ci gnod deng shig / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-14: 'di dag yang dang yang du bdag la tho 'tshams par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi zhig la phrin gyis bsnyun gsol te /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-16: btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag dmag chas tha la ltar mchi na /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-17: kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dag gis 'phags pa dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchi bar mi 'gyur bar dran par bgyi ba cung zhig bca' ba mdzad na legs so zhes gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:173a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-19: yang dge slong dmag chas pa la ltar 'gron ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-22: nyon mongs pa ni ma dul ba /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-23: nyes pa ni dmag chas pa la ltar 'gro ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:173a-24: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:173a-26: dmag ni yan lag gcig pa yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-27: yan lag gnyis pa yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-28: yan lag gsum pa yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-29: yan lag bzhi pa yang yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:173a-30: dmag yan lag gcig pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-32: dmag yan lag gnyis pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-33: glang po che'i tshogs dang rta'i tshogs so //
T08TD4104.1E:173a-34: dmag yan lag gsum pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:173a-38: dmag yan lag bzhi pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-2: dpung bu chung gi tshogs so //
T08TD4104.1E:173b-3: chas pa la zhes bya ba ni g-yul 'gyed pa la mngon par dga' ba la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:173b-4: ltar 'gro na zhes bya ba ni ltad mo ltar 'gro na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:173b-5: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:173b-6: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-13: ljongs kyi mis bkug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-14: bar chad byung ba'i dbang nyid ma gtogs pas g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag la lta ba'i don nyid kyis 'phags pa'i nyen kor gyi mtha' las 'das te mthong na /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-15: dmag la lta ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:173b-16: 'di'i byed pa po ni g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag la lta ba'i don nyid kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-17: 'phags pa'i nyen kor gyi mtha' las 'das te mthong ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:173b-18: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-25: ljongs kyi mis bkug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-26: bar chad 'byung ba'i dbang nyid ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-27: g-yul las mngon par dga' ba'i dmag nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-28: lta ba'i don nyid dang 'phags pa'i nyen kor gyi mtha' las 'das pa dang mthong ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:173b-29: 'di dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:173b-30: dmag la lta ba'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu lnga pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-32: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-34: dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-35: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:173b-36: ri brags pa de de lta na yang ma phebs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-37: rgyal pos de nyid du phru ma btab ste 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-38: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-39: lha khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa can dbang che bar grags pa lags pas /
T08TD4104.1E:173b-40: gal te de mchis par gyur na de'i mthus ri brags pa 'di phebs par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu gnas mchis par 'gyur gda'o //
T08TD4104.1E:174a-0: rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la khyim bdag mthong @174a * //
T08TD4104.1E:174a-1: bar 'dod do zhes yi ge spring ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-2: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin der 'ongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:174a-3: de lta na yang ri brags pa de ma phebs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-4: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-5: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-6: khyim bdag khye'u dag mi dran nam /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-7: lha khye'u dag mi dran te /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-8: 'di ltar 'phags pa dag mthong bar 'tshal lo //
T08TD4104.1E:174a-9: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-11: 'phags pa dag mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes yi ge spring ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-12: dge skos kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus su yi ge bklags te /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-13: gang der 'gro bar spro ba des tshul shing long shig ces /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-15: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-16: kho bo cag ni rgan po sbyor mi bzod pa dag yin pas der 'gro mi nus so //
T08TD4104.1E:174a-17: dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-18: der chos bstan par bya dgos na /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-19: bdag cag ni thos pa nyung ba yin pas chos bstan par mi nus na /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-20: der chu brim par bya'am ci /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-21: bdag cag kyang der 'gro mi nus so //
T08TD4104.1E:174a-22: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-23: dga' bo nye dga' ji srid du bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-24: bdag cag gson pa de srid du bstan pa gnas la /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-25: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-26: bdag cag dus la bab pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-27: bstan pa nub par brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-28: ji srid du bdag cag gson pa de srid du bstan pa la gces pa bskyed par byas /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-29: tshul shing blang ngo zhes de dag gis tshul shing blangs te der dong nas rgyal po la chos bstan pas /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-30: rgyal po mngon par dad par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:174a-34: khrom gyi ru sna dag la yang chos bstan pas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs mngon par dad par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:174a-35: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po rnams la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-36: ri brags pa bskor du dong ro zhes de dag 'phags pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-37: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:174a-38: dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag gis yun ji srid du gzhan gyi spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'am //
T08TD4104.1E:174a-39: gsus po che'i dmag ci 'dra ba ltar 'dong ngo zhes de dag la ma kar dong ste 'khod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-0: ci tsam ni dpung gi tshogs @174b yan lag bzhi pa 'ongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-2: 'phags pa dag shul phye shig / ci bya /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-3: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mchi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:174b-4: bkren pa dag 'di 'dra ba dag glang po che yin nam /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-5: phag 'dra'o zhes de dag gis de dag gi mche ba dag nas bzung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-7: 'di 'dra ba dag rta yin nam bong bu 'dra'o zhes de dag gis de dag gi mjug ma dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu por ro //
T08TD4104.1E:174b-8: 'di 'dra ba dag shing rta yin nam /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-9: shing rta zhig pa dag 'dra'o zhes de dag gis de dag gi srog shing dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro //
T08TD4104.1E:174b-10: 'di 'dra ba dag mi yin nam rtsva mi dag 'dra'o zhes de dag gis de dag gi gnya' bdag nas bzung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-11: mtha' gcig tu bor nas de dag sems khong du chud nas 'khod do //
T08TD4104.1E:174b-12: ji tsam na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'ongs nas des smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-13: shes ldan dag ci'i phyir khyed cag mi dong bar sems khong du chud cing 'khod /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-14: lha bdag cag rgyal bar ga la 'gyur /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-15: 'di ltar dge sbyong mgo reg ras yul chen glegs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-16: 'tshal ba 'di dag mi mchi dgu mchi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:174b-17: gang dag /'phags pa drug sde dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:174b-18: shes ldan dag / de dag ni dge sbyong hral po dag yin pas de dag gis smras pas khyed la ci gnod deng shig / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-19: 'di dag yang dang yang du bdag la tho 'tshams par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi zhig la phrin gyis bsnyun gsol nas /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-21: btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchis nas /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-22: shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas na /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-23: kye bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slang du /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-24: gang gis 'phags pa dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchis nas /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-25: shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas par mi 'gyur bar /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa rnams la dran par bgyi ba cung zhig bca' ba mdzad na legs so zhes gsol lo //
T08TD4104.1E:174b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-28: dge slong la dmag chas pa la ltar 'gro ba de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na /
T08TD4104.1E:174b-29: dge slong des dmag de'i nang du zhag gnyis tshun chad gnas par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:175a-1: gnas na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-4: nyon mongs pa ni ma dul ba /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-5: nyes pa ni shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:175a-6: de la dge slong gang la zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-7: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:175a-9: dmag ni yan lag gcig pa yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-10: yan lag gnyis pa yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-11: yan lag gsum pa yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-12: yan lag bzhi pa yang yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:175a-13: dmag yan lag gcig pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-15: dmag yan lag gnyis pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-18: dmag yan lag gsum pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-21: dmag yan lag bzhi pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-25: dpung bu chung gi tshogs so //
T08TD4104.1E:175a-26: chas pa la zhes bya ba la ni g-yul 'gyed par mngon par dga' ba la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:175a-27: ltar 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni rgyu gang gis so //
T08TD4104.1E:175a-28: de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-36: dge slong des zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-37: dge slong gang yin pa des so //
T08TD4104.1E:175a-38: dmag de'i nang du zhes bya ba ni dmag chas pa de'i nang du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:175a-39: zhag gnyis tshun chad gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-40: zhag gnyis kyi mtha' tshun chad gnas par bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:175a-41: de las lhag par gnas na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-43: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:175a-44: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-51: ljongs kyi mis bkug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-52: bar chad kyi dbang nyid byung na g-yul la mngon par dga' ba dmag de'i nang du nyin mtshan gnyis las lhag par nyin mtshan gsum pa'i skya rengs dang po shar bar gnas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:175a-53: rgyal po la sogs pas bkug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-0: bar chad kyi dbang de dag med @175b par lta ba'i don nyid kyis g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag de'i nang du nyin mtshan gsum pa'i snga ma nyin mtshan gcig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-1: gnyis kyi mthar gnas na yang dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:175b-3: rgyal po la sogs pas bkug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-4: bar chad kyi dbang de dag yod na g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag gi nang du /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-5: skya rengs gsum pa shar ba dang /
