T08TD4104.1E:175b-6: de dag med par zhag gcig dang gnyis kyi skya rengs shar ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:175b-7: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-8: dge slong rgyal po la sogs pas bkug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-9: bar chad kyi dbang gis dgos pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-10: g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag nyid dang der skya rengs gsum shar ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-11: dgos pa de dag med bar der zhag gcig gi skya rengs shar ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-12: dgos pa de dag med par der zhag gnyis pa'i skya rengs shar ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:175b-13: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:175b-14: dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu drug pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-16: // / dpung gi yan lag nyams su myong bar byed pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-18: mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:175b-19: ri brags pa de de lta na yang ma phebs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-20: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-21: khyim pa dag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-22: khyim bdag khye'u dag mi dran nam /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-23: lha khye'u dag ni mi dran te /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-24: 'di ltar 'phags pa dag mthong bar 'tshal lo ;
T08TD4104.1E:175b-25: / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-26: dge 'dun la 'phags pa dag mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes yi ge spring ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-27: dge skos kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du yi ge bklags te /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-28: gang der 'gro bar spro ba des tshul shing long shig ces tshul brims pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-29: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-30: kho bo cag ni rgan po sbyor mi bzod pa dag yin pas der 'gro mi nus so //
T08TD4104.1E:175b-31: dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-32: der chos bstan par bya dgos na bdag cag ni thos pa nyung ba yin pas chos ston par mi nus na /
T08TD4104.1E:175b-33: der chu brim par bya'am ci /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-0: @176a * // bdag cag kyang der 'gro mi nus so //
T08TD4104.1E:176a-1: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-2: dga' bo nye dga' ji srid du bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-3: bdag cag gson pa de srid du bstan pa gnas la /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-4: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-5: bdag cag dus la bab na bstan pa nub par brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-6: ji srid du bdag cag gson pa de srid du bstan pa la gces pa brjod par byas /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-7: tshul shing blang ngo zhes de dag gis tshul shing blangs te /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-8: der dong nas rgyal po la chos bstan pas rgyal po mngon par dad par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:176a-12: khrom gyi ru sna dag la yang chos bstan pas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs mngon par dad par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:176a-13: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis blon po rnams la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-14: ded la g-yul shoms shig ri brags pa bskor bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:176a-15: de dag gis g-yul bsham par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-16: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-17: dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag gis yun ji srid du gzhan gyi spyod lam gyis gnas par bya /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-18: rang gi spyod lam gyis gnas par byas /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-19: gsus po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-20: dpung gi mchog dang g-yul bkod cing bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar byas 'dong ngo zhes de dag g-yul shom pa'i nang du dong ste dris pa /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-23: 'phags pa dag bkod pa shom mo //
T08TD4104.1E:176a-24: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-25: bkren pa dag glang po che bcos ma 'di lta bu dag phyogs 'dir 'jog gam /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-26: 'di sol cig ces de dag gis de dag gi mche ba dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro //
T08TD4104.1E:176a-27: rta theng po 'di lta bu dag phyogs 'dir 'jog gam /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-28: 'di sol cig ces de dag gis mjug ma dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro //
T08TD4104.1E:176a-29: shing rta zhig pa 'di lta bu dag phyogs 'dir 'jog gam /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-30: 'di sol cig ces de dag gis de dag gis de dag gi srog shing dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro //
T08TD4104.1E:176a-31: mi zhar ba 'di lta bu dag phyogs 'dir 'jog gam /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-32: 'di sol cig ces de dag gis de dag gi gnya' ba dag nas bzung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:176a-34: drug sde dag gi mdun logs su ri brags pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-0: ha cang thag mi @176b ring bar 'khod de blag cor gyis sgra phyung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-2: ri brags pa dag rdzong nas rlugs te phyung ngo snyam du rig nas /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-3: skrag cing sdangs te bros par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-4: drug sde dag myur ba myur bar dong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-5: khrom gyi ru sna'i mdun du 'khod nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-6: shes ldan dag ci'i phyir bros /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-8: 'phags pa dag ri brags pa dag rdzong nas rlugs te phyung ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:176b-9: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-10: bkren pa dag de ni kho bo cag gis ku re cung zhig byas pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-11: gal te ri brags pa dag gis khyed cag de ltar breng ngas par shes shing rig par gyur na /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-12: nang par snga ba kho nar yang khyed cag gnyis ka gnya' ba dag nas btags te ri brags su khrid par 'gyur gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-13: ma 'jigs par phyir log shig / de dag phyogs gcig tu dong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-14: sems khong du chud cing 'khod do //
T08TD4104.1E:176b-15: ji tsam na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'ongs nas des smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-16: shes ldan dag khyed kyis da dung yang g-yul gyi bkod pa ma bshams sam /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-18: lha bdag cag rgyal bar ga la 'gyur 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-19: dge sbyong ras yug chen glegs pa 'tshal ba 'di dag mchis nas bdag cag la tho 'tshams shing /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-21: gang dag /'phags pa drug sde dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:176b-22: shes ldan dag de dag ni dge sbyong hral po dag yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-23: de dag gis smras pas khyed la ci gnod /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-24: deng la g-yul gyi bkod pa shoms shig / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-25: 'di dag yang dang yang du bdag la tho 'tshams par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi zhig la phrin gyis bsnyun gsol te /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-27: btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag / shin du yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i tshe yang bshams pa 'khrug tu mi mchi zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-30: g-yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar bgyid par mi 'gyur bar /
T08TD4104.1E:176b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa rnams la dran par bgyi ba cung zhig bca' ba mdzad na legs so zhes gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:176b-32: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-1: zhag gnyis dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i tshe yang gal te bshams pa 'khrug tu 'gro'am /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-4: g-yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-7: nyon mongs pa ni ma dul ba /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-8: nyes pa ni zhag gnyis dmag de'i nang na gnas pa'i tshe yang dpung gi yan lag nyams su myong bar byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:177a-9: de la dag slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:177a-10: zhag gnyis zhes bya ba ni zhag gnyis tshun chad do //
T08TD4104.1E:177a-12: dmag ni yan lag gcig pa yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-13: yan lag gnyis pa yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-14: yan lag gsum pa yang yod /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-15: dmag yan lag bzhi pa yang yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:177a-16: dmag yan lag gcig pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-18: dmag yan lag gnyis pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-21: dmag yan lag gsum pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-25: dmag yan lag bzhi pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-29: dpung bu chung gi tshogs so //
T08TD4104.1E:177a-30: de'i nang na gnas pa'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni 'dug pa'i tshe yang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:177a-31: gal te bshams pa 'khrug tu 'gro'am zhes bya ba ni g-yul la chas pa 'khrug tu 'gro ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:177a-32: rgyal mtshan gyi mchog ces bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-33: rgyal mtshan rnam pa bzhi ste /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-34: khyu mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-35: chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-38: dpung gi mchog ces bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-39: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-43: dpung bu chung gi tshogs so //
T08TD4104.1E:177a-44: g-yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar byed na zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-45: bshams pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-47: shing rta'i dbyibs lta bu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-48: zla gam gyi rnam pa lta bu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:177a-49: nam mkha' lding gi 'dab ma lta bu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:177a-50: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:177b-0: de la 'dir @177b dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-1: dge slong bar chad kyi dbang gis 'gro ba ma yin pas dpung gi yan lag bsdus pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-2: so so ba sta gon byas pa rnams kyi dngos po reg pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-4: lta ba'i phyir 'phags shing nyen kor gyi mtha' las 'das te /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-5: mthong ba lta bu nyams su myong na /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-6: dpung gi yan lag nyams su myong bar byed pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:177b-8: dge slong bar chad kyi dbang gis 'gro ba ma yin pa la dpung gi yan lag bsdus pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-9: so so ba sta gon byas pa rnams kyi dngos po byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:177b-10: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-11: dge slong bar chad kyi dbang gis 'gro ba ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-12: dpung gi yan lag bzhi po rnams dang /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-14: so so ba gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-15: sta gon byas pa rnams kyi dngos po reg pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-17: lta ba'i phyir 'phags shing nyen kor gyi mtha' las 'das te mthong ba lta bu gang yang rung ba dang de dag nyams su myong ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:177b-18: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:177b-19: dpung gi yan lag nyams su myong bar byed pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu bdun pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-21: // / rdeg pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:177b-23: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos nye ba 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-24: de dag drug sde dag la sten par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-28: bcu bdun sde dag tshur shog /'di dang 'di gyis shig de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-29: ci khyod kho bo cag gi slob dpon yin nam mkhan po yin mi byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:177b-30: des glen pa dag khyod las ci zhig byed ces de dag las gcig brdegs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:177b-31: de dag thams cad kyis bdag cag brdegs so //
T08TD4104.1E:178a-0: bdag cag brdegs so zhes phyi gan du bsgyel te du bar @178a * //
T08TD4104.1E:178a-2: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-3: tshe dang ldan pa 'chang ka ci'i phyir gzhon nu rnams la rdeg par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-5: tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bos gcig brdegs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-6: thams cad sa la bsgyel te ngu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:178a-7: dge slong rnams kyis bcu bdun sde dag la smas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-8: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag las gcig brdegs na /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-9: ci'i phyir thams cad sa la bsgyel te ngu /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-11: gal te ma dus na thams cad la rdeg par 'gyur ro zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-12: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-14: dge slong la rdeg par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-16: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-17: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:178a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-19: yang dge slong gang khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-21: dge slong la brdegs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-23: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni zhe sdang gi kun du sbyor ba /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-24: nyes pa ni dge slong la rdeg pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:178a-25: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-26: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:178a-27: khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-28: khros shing khro ba'i zil gyis non nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:178a-29: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:178a-30: brdegs na zhes bya ba ni rdeg par byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:178a-31: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:178a-32: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-33: dge slong gis rnyog pa can gyi sems nyid kyis dge slong pha rol la lus sam des 'phangs pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-34: de dang 'brel pa dag gang yang rung ba tha na rkang pa'i mthe bo'am /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-36: rtsva dag gis brdegs na reg pa tsam gyis rdeg spyad re re la rdeg pa'i ltung byad kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:178a-38: pha rol po brdeg par bya ba dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-39: rdeg spyad gang yang rung ba ji snyed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:178a-40: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:178a-41: rnyog pa can gyi sems nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-0: pha rol po brdeg par @178b bya ba dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-1: rdeg pa lus sam des 'phangs pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-2: de dang 'brel pa gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-3: rdeg spyad tha na rkang pa'i mthe bo'am /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-5: rtsva bas chung ba gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-6: tha na lus la reg pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:178b-7: de dag las yan lag mtshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:178b-8: rdeg pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-10: // / gzas pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-12: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:178b-13: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-14: nye ba 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-15: de dag drug sde dag la sten par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-19: bcu bdun sde dag tshur shog /'di dang 'di gyis shig de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-20: ci khyed kho bo cag gi slob dpon yin nam mkhan po yin mi byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:178b-21: des glen pa dag khyed ci zhig byed ces de dag las gcig la rdeg par gzas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-22: de dag thams cad kyis bdag cag la rdeg par gzas so //
T08TD4104.1E:178b-23: bdag cag la rdeg par gzas so zhes phyi gan du bsgyel te ngu bar brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:178b-24: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-25: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ci'i phyir gzhon nu dag la rdeg par gzas /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-27: tshe dang ldan pa kho bos gcig la rdeg par gzas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-28: thams cad sa la 'gyel te du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:178b-29: dge slong rnams kyis bcu bdun sde dag la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-30: khyed cag las gcig la rdeg par gzes pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-31: ci'i phyir thams cad sa la bsgyel te ngu /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-33: gal te ma dus na gang la cis rdeg gtol med do zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-34: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-35: dge slong la rdeg par gzas par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-37: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-38: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:178b-39: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:178b-40: yang dge slong gang khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-1: dge slong la rdeg par gzas na /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-2: tha na thal mos kyang rung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-3: ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-5: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni zhe sdang gi kun du sbyor ba /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-6: nyes pa ni dge slong la rdeg par gzas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:179a-7: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-8: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:179a-9: khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-10: khros shing khro ba'i zil gyis non nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:179a-11: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:179a-12: rdeg par gzas na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-14: / tha na thal mos kyang rung ste zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-15: tha na thal lcag kyang gzas kyang rung ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:179a-16: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:179a-17: sngar rdeg pa'i ltung byed bstan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-18: 'dir gzas pa'i ltung byed bstan pa de gnyis kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid ni 'dra'o bye brag tu na /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-19: snga ma ni brdegs pa'i yul la rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:179a-20: 'di ni rdeg par gzas pa'i yul la rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:179a-21: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-22: dge slong gis rnyog pa can gyi sems nyid kyis dge slong pha rol la lus sam /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-24: de dang 'brel ba dag gang yang rung ba tha na rkang pa'i mthe bo'am /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-26: rtsva dag gis rdeg par gzas na /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-27: gzas pa tsam gyis rdzas re re la gzas pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:179a-28: 'di'i byed pa po ni pha rol po la rdeg par gzas pa dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-29: gzo ba'i rdzas gang yang rung ba ji snyed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:179a-30: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-31: rnyog pa can gyi sems nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-32: pha rol po rdeg par gzas pa dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-35: de dang 'brel pa gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-36: gzo ba'i rdzas tha na rkang pa'i mthe bo'am /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-38: rtsva bas chung ba gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-39: tha na gzas par brtsams pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:179a-40: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:179a-41: gzas pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu dgu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-43: // / gnas ngan len 'chab pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:179a-44: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-0: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon @179b med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:179b-1: dga' bo la lhan cig gnas pa dge slong chos zhes bya ba ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa dang ldan pa bsdams pa bslab pa 'dod pa zhig yod pa des /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-2: ji srid du de gnas ngan len kun du spyod par mi shes pa de srid du de dang lhan cig gnas so //
T08TD4104.1E:179b-3: gang gi tshe des de gnas ngan len kun du spyod par shes pa de'i tshe na de rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gnas par brtsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ba' zhig byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:179b-5: de dag dga' bo'i gan du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-6: mkhan po gdugs la spyod du mchi'o zhes zhus pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-7: nye dags thos nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-8: bu chos kho bo'i stan yang khyer la song shig / des de'i stan khyer te nyin mo spyod du song nas /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-9: des de'i stan de shing ljon pa zhig ti drung du bzhag ste /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-10: dben pa'i phyogs su 'dug nas yid la byed pa bskyed par brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:179b-13: slob dpon gdan shing ljon pa'i drung du bzhag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-14: der bzhud la bzhugs shig / nye dga' der song nas mgo g-yogs te 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-15: des der mos pa ma rnyed nas stan las langs te phyogs bzhir rnam par lta bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-16: ji tsam na bu mo zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rib ma 'dra la ba mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-17: nye dga' song ste smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-18: bu mo khyod ci'i phyir rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rib ma dral bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-19: bu mo des 'dzum phyung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-20: nye dags de'i yan lag dang nying lag dag nas mnams te 'o byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-21: de chos kyi gan du song ste dris pa /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-22: bu chos khyod kyis cung zad mthong ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-23: slob dpon gzhug pa 'dzud pa 'ba' zhig ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad mthong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:179b-24: bu chos su la yang ma zer cig / slob dpon ji srid du rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong ma mthong ba de srid kyi bar du su la yang mi mchi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:179b-26: kho bos khyod kyi mkhan po'i gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba 'chab par byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-27: khyod kho bo'i 'chab par mi byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:179b-28: slob dpon khyod 'chab par mdzad kyang bdag ni 'chab par mi bgyid do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-0: @180a * // dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-1: dge slong gi gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba 'chab par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-3: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-4: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:180a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du dge slong gi gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba 'chab na ltung byed do zhes ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-8: nyon mongs pa ni nyes rtsom /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-9: nyes pa ni shes bzhin du dge slong gi gnas ngan len 'chab pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-10: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-12: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:180a-13: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-14: de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-16: dge slong gi zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:180a-17: gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba zhes bya ba ni gnas ngan len gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-18: pham par 'gyur ba kun nas slong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-19: dge 'dun lhag ma kun nas slong ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:180a-20: ci'i phyir de dag gnas ngan len ces bya zhe na /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-22: kun nas slong ba las so //
T08TD4104.1E:180a-23: 'chab na zhes bya ba ni mkhyud na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:180a-24: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:180a-25: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-26: dge slong gis shes bzhin du dge slong gi pham par 'gyur pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-27: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'chab na bde ba la mi reg pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-29: tshangs bar spyod pa'i bar chad dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-30: dge 'dun 'khrug tu dogs pa'i dbang nyi ma gtogs par nyin mtshan gcig gi skya rengs dang po shar ba'i mthar gnas ngan len 'chab pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:180a-31: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong gzhan gyis pham par 'gyur ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-32: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:180a-33: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-34: dge slong gzhan gyis pham par 'gyur ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-35: dge 'dun lhag ma kun nas slong ba'i gnas ngan len 'byung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180a-37: 'chab pa dang bdag la gzhi des bde ba la mi reg pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-0: @180b tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-1: dge 'dun 'khrug tu dogs pa'i dbang nyid ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-2: nyin mtshan gyi mtha' thug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:180b-3: de dag las yan lag ma tshad dang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:180b-4: gnas ngan len 'chab pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-7: bde dang me dang 'dun pa dang //
T08TD4104.1E:180b-8: bsnyen par ma rdzogs chos dang smra //
T08TD4104.1E:180b-9: dge tshul kha dog bsgyur ba dang //
T08TD4104.1E:180b-10: rin po che dang tsha ba'i dus //
T08TD4104.1E:180b-11: zhes bya ba ni bcu pa drug pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-12: sdom la zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don dang dgos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:180b-13: bcu pa drug pa 'dis kyang ltung byed kyi chos bcu bstan te /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-17: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-18: lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-19: spangs pa'i rjes su phyogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-21: kha ma bsgyur ba'i gos gyon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-22: longs pa'i gzhir gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-23: khrus byed pa'i ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:180b-24: de la zan gcod du 'jud pa'i ltung byed kyi glen gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed gyi tshal mgon med zas kyi sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:180b-26: dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa dge slong ches zhes bya ba ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa dang ldan pa bsdams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-27: bslab pa 'dod pa zhig yod pa des ji srid du de gnas ngan len kun du spyod par mi shes pa de srid du de dang lhan cig gnas so //
T08TD4104.1E:180b-28: gang gi tshe de gnas ngan len kun du spyod par shes pa de'i tshe na de rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gnas par brtsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ba' zhig byed de /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-30: nyi dags dga' bo la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-31: slob dpon chos 'dis kho bo sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du tho btsams pa la ltos /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-32: kho bos kyang 'di la nges par gnod pa cung zhig bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:180b-34: dge slong chos 'di ni ngo tsha shes pa /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-35: 'gyod pa dang ldan pa bsdams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:180b-37: khyod kyis 'di la gnod pa ci zhig byar yod /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-3: khyim bdag cig gis dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis zan la mgron du bos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-5: deng chos 'di'i zan gcad par bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-6: chos dga' bo'i gnang du bsod snyoms la 'gro bar zhur 'ong ba'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-7: dga' bos chos la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-8: chos kho bo cag deng khyim bdag cig gis zan la mgron du bos kyis tshur shog la de nyid du zan zo shig / des smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-9: lhung bzed dang chu tshags blangs te mchi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:181a-11: der lhung bzed dang chu tshags kyis ci bya /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-13: chu tshags dag 'bogs kyis tshur shog 'dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:181a-14: de de gnyis dang lhan cig mnyan yod du zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-15: de gnyis srang du dong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-17: nye dags khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-19: de'i 'og tu dga' bo yang khyim bdag de'i khyim du dong ste zan za zhing 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:181a-20: chos kyis nye dga' la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-21: slob dpon gdugs tshod bab kyis bzhud do //
T08TD4104.1E:181a-23: der thams cad sta gon byas zin pas der song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-24: bza' ba las gzhan pa'i bya ba ci yang med kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-25: gdugs tshod kyi kha kho nar 'dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:181a-26: chos langs te rkang pa gnyis kyis grib tshod gzhal bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-28: glen pa khyod kho bo cag gi bslab pa la cung zad yid mi ches sam /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-29: ci khyod kyi snying lam na kho bo cag dus ma yin par za bar 'gyur snyam mam /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-30: kho bo khyod dang lhan cig smra ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-31: 'dug pa bde ba ma yin gyi /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-32: 'di ltar kho bo gcig pu kho na smra'am 'dug na bdes khyod song shig / chos kyis bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-33: gal te bdag gis lhung bzed dang chu tshags khyer te 'ongs par gyur na /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-34: bdag bsod snyoms la rgyu bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-35: da ni ci byar yang med do snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-36: de gtsug lag khang du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-37: ji srid du de'i lus las mdangs ma yal ba de srid du dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-38: gang gi tshe de'i lus las mdangs yal ba de'i tshe na glos phab ste nyal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:181a-39: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-0: tshe dang ldan pa chos gal te zan gzhan gyi @181b yin zhes te lto yang gzhan gyi yin nam ci na /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-1: ji tsam gyis dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed kyang mi nus pa /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-2: de tsam gyi zan zos so //
T08TD4104.1E:181b-6: ci'i phyir des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-7: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag ched du bsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-8: dge slong gi zan gcod du 'jug ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-10: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-11: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:181b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du dge slong gang klan ka tshol zhing ci nas kyang /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-13: dge slong 'di la klan ka btsal bar 'gyur ro snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-14: dge slong la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog / khyim dag du 'dong dang /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-15: der khyod la bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pa dag ji tsam 'dod pa sbyin du gzhug go zhes smras nas /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-16: des de la sbyin du ma bcug par de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho bo khyod dang lhan cig smra 'am 'dug pa bde ba ma yin gyi /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-17: 'di ltar kho bo gcig pu kho na smra'am 'dug na bdes khyod song shing ces zer na /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-18: ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-21: nyon mongs pa ni zhe gdug / nyes pa ni ched du bsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-22: dge slong gi zan gcod du 'jud pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:181b-23: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga'am /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-24: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:181b-25: klan ka tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di la klan ka btsal bar 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:181b-26: snyam pa zhes bya ba ni ci nas kyang dge slong 'di'i zan gcod du bcug par 'gyur ro snyam pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:181b-27: de nyid rkyen du byas te zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:181b-28: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:181b-29: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'di skad ces smras nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:181b-30: tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog / khyim dag du 'dong dang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:181b-31: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gi khyim dag tu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:181b-32: der khyod la bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pa zhes bya ba ni bza' ba lnga po dang bca' ba lnga po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:181b-33: ji tsam 'dod pa sbyin du gzhug go zhes smras nas zhes bya ba ni ci tsam gyis chog pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:181b-34: des de la sbyin du ma bcug par /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-0: tshe dang ldan pa kho bo @182a * //
T08TD4104.1E:182a-1: khyod dang lhan cig smra'am 'dug pa bde ba ma yin gyi /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-2: 'di ltar kho bo gcig pu smra'am 'dug na bdes khyod song shig ces zer na zhes bya ba ni de skad zer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:182a-3: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-7: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-10: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-11: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:182a-12: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-13: dge slong dag gis dge slong pha rol pa'i nad kyi gnyen po'i don nyid ma gtogs par ched du bsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-14: khyim pa sbyin pa po'i tshig gis bsgo bas zan gcod du bcug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-15: zan gcod du 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:182a-17: zan gcad par bya ba dge slong nyid dag sbyin bdag khyim ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-19: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-21: zan gcad par bya ba dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-22: nad kyi gnyen po'i don nyid ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-23: sbyin pa po khyim ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-24: tshig gis bsgo ba dang zan gcod du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:182a-25: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:182a-26: zan gcod du 'jug pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu gcig pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-28: // / me la reg pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma ga dh'a dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-30: rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:182a-31: de'i tshe na drug sde dag / mes gzhan la gtong bas rtse bar byed cing zla ba yang byed /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-33: mgal me'i 'khor lo yang byed nas mu stegs can dag shes lan dag / sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag mes gzhan la gtong bas rtse bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-34: zla ba yang byed nyi ma yang byed /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-35: mgal me'i 'khor lo yang byed de /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-36: byis pa khye'u dag kyang de ltar byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:182a-37: shes ldan dag byis pa khye'u dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-0: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag la bye @182b brag ni ci yod /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-2: tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-4: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:182b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-6: yang dge slong gang mi na bar bdag nyid kyi phyir me la reg gam reg tu 'jud na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-9: nyon mongs pa ni 'gran gtor la dga' pa /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-10: nyes pa ni mi na bar bdag nyid kyi phyir me la reg par byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:182b-11: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-12: drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:182b-13: mi na bar zhes bya ba ni na ba bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:182b-14: bdag nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi ched du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:182b-15: me la reg gam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:182b-16: reg tu 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:182b-17: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:182b-18: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-19: dge slong gis mes rtse ba nyid kyis gzhan la gtong bas zla ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-21: mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-25: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba'i don nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-26: lhung bzed dam mtshon gyi las la brtag pa lta bus dus byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i dge slong na ba'i dbang nyid du gnas pa ma yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-30: ma reg pa'i bud shing bskul ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-31: me dang bcas pa 'dren pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-36: me lcer bud shing 'dzud pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-37: 'byin pa rang ngam bsgo bas byed na me la reg pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:182b-38: 'di'i byed pa po ni me ma mur dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-39: me lce ma gtogs pa'i me nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-41: dus byin gyis ma brlabs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:182b-42: na ba'i dbang nyid du gnas pa ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:182b-43: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-2: na ba'i dbang nyid du gnas pa ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-3: rang ngam bsgo bas reg pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:183a-4: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:183a-5: me la reg pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu gnyis pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-7: // /'dun pa phyir bsgyur ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-9: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:183a-10: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-11: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ni ko sh'amb'ir song ste yid dal du 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-12: 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis ni dus la bab pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-13: dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni dge 'dun gyi nang du gnas pa de'i tshe na bcu bdun sde dag gdug pa dang pha rol gnon par gyur cing mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-15: ma mo 'dzin pa yang yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-17: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag la yun ring po nas drug sde dag gis tho btsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-18: ji ltar dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis tho btsams pa ltar yang gzhan dag gis tho ma btsams la /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-19: ji ltar nye dags tho btsams pa ltar yang /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-20: dga' bos tho ma btsams kyis tshur sheg / de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:183a-21: de na gcig gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-22: phu nu po dag de'i phu ba dga' bo rtsod pa la mkhas pas bdag cag gis nye dga' gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya bar mi nus so //
T08TD4104.1E:183a-23: de brel ba bskyed par bya'o zhes de dag dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-25: tshe dang ldan pa dag aa rog gya /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-26: gnas brtan gyi chos gos dag dri ma can du gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:183a-27: bu dag kho bo rgas par gyur pas /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-28: dge slong lhan cig gnas pa dag gis kyang rgas pa'i phyir brnyas te /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-29: phyin chad chos gos kyi las byed du mi btub bo //
T08TD4104.1E:183a-30: bdag cag gis gnas brtan gyi chos gos dag bkru bar bgyis /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-31: chos gos dag tshur stsol cig ces bcu bdun sde dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:183a-32: dga' bo la rnyang rnying dag bskon te /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-0: de'i chos gos thams cad blangs nas 'gyur byed kyis brtsal te gnas mal @183b bshams nas /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-2: dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-3: gnas brtan dge 'dun gyi bya ba cung zhig mchis te /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-6: bu dag kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-7: dge 'dun gyi nang du ji ltar 'gro bar bya /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-8: dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la 'dun pa 'bul lo //
T08TD4104.1E:183b-9: de nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-10: dge slong gleng ba po rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-12: btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis bcu bdun sde dag gi lto dral te rgyu ma dag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i tshig smras pa gang yin pa de dran nam /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-13: tshe dang ldan pa rma sos pa dag dral te ci bya /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-14: de ni 'das pa'i don yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:183b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i dus kho na las brtsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-17: 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do zhes de dag gis nye dga' la gya tshom du nan gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:183b-18: nye dga' gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-19: phu bo dga' bo'i gan du song ste ngu bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-23: lhung bzed nag po can dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-24: kho bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:183b-26: gang dag gis kho bo'i nu bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa de dag grong dang /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-29: khams gsum nas phyung bar gyur cig / kho bos bdag gi nu bo gnas nas dbyung bar ma shes kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-30: dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig / khyed la 'dun pa mi sbyin no zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-31: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-32: dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la dge slong la 'dun pa phul nas /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-33: de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs nas rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas spong ba'i chos su byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-34: 'di skad ces dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig / khyod la mi sbyin no zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:183b-36: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-0: @184a * // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-1: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-2: dge slong la 'dun pa phul nas //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-3: de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas spong ba'i chos su byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-4: 'di skad ces dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig / khyod la mi sbyin no zhes zer na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-7: nyon mongs pa ni spong ba'i chos su byed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-8: nyes pa ni 'dun pa phyir bsgyur pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-9: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-11: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-12: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-14: bya ba chos dang ldan pa la zhes bya ba ni las chos 'di dang ldan pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-15: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-16: 'dun pa phul nas zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa byin nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-17: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-18: khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni khro ba'i zil gyis gnon nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-19: spong ba'i chos su byed cing zhes bya ba ni bsnyon pa'i chos su byed cing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-20: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-21: dge slong la 'dun pa phyir byin cig khyod la mi sbyin no zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-22: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-23: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-24: dge slong gi las brgya rtsa gcig gi nang nas nan tur gyis las lnga dang /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-25: gang zag bcu gnyis bsko ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-26: grangs su gzhug pa'i gzhi la sogs pa lta bu dge slong di don gyi ched kyi las dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du byas pa las 'dun pa phul ba phyir bsgyur ba'i phyir dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig / khyod la mi sbyin no zhes smras na /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-27: 'dun pa phyir bsgyur ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-29: dge slong gi don gyi ched kyi las byas pa la 'dun pa phul ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:184a-30: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos zhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-31: dge slong gi don gyi ched dang /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-33: de la 'dun pa phul ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:184a-34: dge 'dun gyi chos gzhin du byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-0: de'i @184b phyir bsgyur ba'i phyir smras pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:184b-1: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:184b-2: 'dun pa phyir bsgyur ba'i ltung byed de lnga bcu gsum pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-4: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-6: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:184b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-9: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-10: lhan cig nyal bar mi bya zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-11: snang ba la yang nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-12: nye dga' la dge tshul tsher ma dang /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-13: chen po pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod do //
T08TD4104.1E:184b-14: de de gnyis dang lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-15: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-16: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga'/
T08TD4104.1E:184b-18: dge slong gis gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal gyis khyod gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-19: lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu ma nyal cig / nye dags smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-20: gang la nub gnyis rung ba de la nub gsum pa yang rung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-23: ci nyes zhes zer nas dge slong don nyung du dag bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-24: dge slong gis gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal na /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-25: ci'i phyir dge slong dag ched du bsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-26: nub gnyis las lhag par 'da' bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-29: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-30: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:184b-31: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:184b-32: yang dge slong gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig / nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal na ltung byed do zhes bca' pa mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-1: pa ni 'dod chags kyi cha la brten pa /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-2: nyes pa ni gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-3: lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:185a-4: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-6: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o//
T08TD4104.1E:185a-7: gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig ces bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-8: bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-11: de las gzhan pa ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:185a-12: nub gnyis las lhag par zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-14: gnas gcig tu nyal na zhes bya ba ni gnas gzhi bo thams cad bskor ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-15: thams cad g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-16: phal cher g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-17: phal cher g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba dag tu nyal bas kyang skya rengs 'char bar byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:185a-18: de la gnas thams cad g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni gnas khang dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-20: khang pa brtsegs pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:185a-21: thams cad g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-23: sgo bcu gnyis pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:185a-24: phal cher g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni ;
T08TD4104.1E:185a-25: khyams ngos bzhi pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:185a-26: phal cher g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba ni khyams ngos gsum pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-28: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni lnga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:185a-29: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-30: dge slong lam gyis dub bas rmya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-31: dge slong gis byar mi rung ba sgrub par byed pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig pa'i nad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-33: 'khor yod pa'i dge slong sdig pa can rang gi dge tshul la 'tshe ba gnas der 'ongs pa ma gtogs pas khyim pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:185a-34: rab tu byung ba'i gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa mtshan dang lta ba gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig gnyi ga nyal ba'i spyod lam gyis gnyid log pas gnas phal cher g-yogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-0: bskor ba la sogs pa gcig tu mtshan mo gsum pa'i skya rengs 'char ba'i mthar nyal na bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir @185b 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:185b-1: 'di'i byed pa po ni khyim pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-2: rab tu byung ba'i gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa mtshan dang lta ba gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-4: 'di la yang lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-5: dge slong lam gyis dub pas rmya ba la sogs pa ma yin pa nyid dang khyim pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-6: rab tu byung ba'i gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa mtshan dang lta ba gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-8: gnyi ga la nyal ba'i spyod lam gyis gnyid log pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-9: mtshan mo gsum pa'i skya rengs shar ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:185b-10: de dag las yan lag mtshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:185b-11: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal ba'i ltung byed de lnga bcu bzhi pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-13: // / lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-15: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:185b-17: sngon bod rdzi dge slong mchi ltas la sdig pa can gyi lta pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-18: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-19: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer ro //
T08TD4104.1E:185b-20: dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis de thos nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-22: dge slong dag khyod kyis sngon bong rdzi dge slong 'chi ltas dang /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-23: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la gzhi de gtong du gzhug pa'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-24: dang por bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:185b-25: de lta na yang mi gtong na /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-26: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:185b-27: dge slong dag gis de bzhin byas kyang de sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-28: gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-29: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:185b-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:185b-31: yang dge slong gang 'di skad ces /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-0: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i @186a * //
T08TD4104.1E:186a-1: chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:186a-2: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer na /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-3: dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-4: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-5: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:186a-6: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:186a-7: tshe dang ldan pa bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-8: bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-9: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-10: tshe dang ldan pa khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186a-11: dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-12: gal te gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-13: gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtong bar bya ba'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-14: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-15: yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186a-16: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo //
T08TD4104.1E:186a-17: yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-18: gal te mi gtong na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-20: gang zag ni sngon bong rdzi dge slong 'chi ltas /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-21: nyon mongs pa ni lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-22: nyes pa ni sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186a-23: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-25: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186a-26: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186a-27: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba la bar du gcod pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-28: pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-29: dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-30: ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-31: spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:186a-32: ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-0: so sor @186b bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-1: bslab pa'i chos mang po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-2: rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-3: de dag bsten kyang zhes bya ba ni de las lhag par spyad kyang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-4: bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni des dge sbyong gi tshul gyis bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes zer ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-5: de lta na bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-6: chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-8: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu bstan pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-9: bdag gis shes so zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni bdag gis kun shes so zhes zer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-10: dge slong de la zhes bya ba ni 'chi ltas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-11: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-12: dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-13: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-14: bzhams te bsgo ba bsgo bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-15: dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-16: gal te gzhi de gtong na zhes bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa de yongs su gtong na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-17: de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-19: gal te mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi gtong na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-20: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-21: yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-22: yang dag par bsgo ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-23: yang dag par bstan pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-24: sngar bsgo ba las 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma bzhi'i skabs su bzhi bstan pa bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-25: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:186b-26: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-27: dge slong ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-28: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'jug pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-29: dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:186b-30: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-0: las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa'i mthar mi gtong na lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong @187a * //
T08TD4104.1E:187a-1: ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:187a-3: sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-6: bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:187a-7: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-8: bar du gcod pa'i chos nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-9: de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-12: bzhi'i las kyis chos dang mthun pas bzlog pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-13: las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-15: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:187a-16: lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed de lnga bcu lnga pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-18: // / spangs pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:187a-20: 'chi ltas de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa na du zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-21: nye dga'i gan du song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-25: lhung bzed nag po can dag gis bdag gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:187a-27: gang dag gis 'chi ltas gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa de dag grong dang /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-30: khams gsum nas gnas nas dbyung bar gyur cig /'on kyang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa dag la /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-32: grong rdal dag med dam ci sdod la bzod pa gsol cig ces /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-33: nye dga' 'chi ltas dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-36: kun du longs spyod par byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-37: de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-38: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du de skad zar ba'i gang zag chos bzhin ma byas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-39: sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de ma spangs pa dang gtam 'dre bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-42: kun du longs spyod par byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:187a-43: de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-1: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-2: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-4: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du de skad zer ba'i gang zag chos bzhin du ma byas pa sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de ma spangs pa dang gtam 'dre bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-5: phebs par smra bar byed kun du gnas par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-6: kun du longs spyod par byed cing de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-9: nyon mongs pa ni sdig pa 'dod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-10: nyes pa ni spangs pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-11: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-12: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-13: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-14: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-15: de skad zer ba'i gang zag ces bya ba ni 'chi ltas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-16: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-17: chos bzhin du ma byas pa zhes bya ba ni chos dang mthun par ma byas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-18: sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de ma spangs pa zhes bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa gang yin pa de'o //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-19: gtam 'dre bar byed ces bya ba ni lung dbog pa sbyin par byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-20: phebs par smra bar byed ces bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-21: dmigs kyis 'dri ba sbyin par byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-22: kun du gnas par byed ces bya ba ni gnas sbyin par byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-23: kun du longs spyod par byed cing zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-24: de la bsnyen bkur bdag gir byed cing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-25: de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal na zhes bya ba ni gnas bzhi po thams cad g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-26: thams cad g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-27: phal cher g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-28: phal cher g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba dag tu nyal bas skya rengs 'char bar byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-29: de la gnas thams cad g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-32: khang pa brtsegs pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-33: thams cad g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-34: sgo bcu pa dang sgo bcu gnyis pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:187b-35: phal cher g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:187b-36: khyams ngos bzhi pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:188a-1: cher g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba dag ni khyams ngos gsum pa dag dang 'khor gyi khyams dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:188a-2: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:188a-3: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-4: dge slong ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-5: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes bya ba la sogs par 'jug pa'i tshig de skad smras pas /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-6: dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-7: smad pa'i las byas shing spangs pa'i phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa'i dge slong la nad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-8: lta ba dang dbral bar gtogs pa'i don gyi dbang ma gtogs par /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-9: shes bzhin du lung dbog pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-15: zang zing gi longs spyod byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-16: bsnyen bkur bdag gir byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-17: gnas gcig tu gnyi ga nyal ba'i spyod lam gyis gnyid log pas skya rengs 'char bar byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-18: tha na 'dag rdzas tsam yan chad gzhan gyis srul na yang spangs pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro ;
T08TD4104.1E:188a-19: /'di'i byed pa po ni de skad smras pas /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-20: spangs pa phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa'i dge slong la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:188a-21: tha na 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-22: dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-23: de'i phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-25: nad pa dang lta ba dang dbral bar gtogs pa'i don gyi dbang ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-26: lung dbog pa nas gzhan gyis srul ba zhes smod pa'i bar gang yang rung ba byas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:188a-27: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:188a-28: spangs ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu drug pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-30: // / bsnyil ba sdud pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-31: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4104.1E:188a-32: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:188b-0: chen po pa zhes bya ba @188b gnyis shig yod de /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-1: 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-2: dge slong rnams de gnyis dang lhan cig gzhogs stegs byed /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-7: rgod pa dang dregs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-8: lus la rdeg par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:188b-9: phyis de dag gis bsdam par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bsdam pa byas /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-10: bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bshags par byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-13: rtsol bar byed pa dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing ;
T08TD4104.1E:188b-14: rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs so //
T08TD4104.1E:188b-15: dus gzhan zhig na dge tshul tsher ma dang /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-16: chen po pa gnyis me tog dag thu zhing 'khod pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-17: nam mkha' las dge slong dag cig rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dong ba mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-21: kho bo cag ming 'di zhes bya ba dag yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:188b-23: khyed cag gis kho bo cag gnyis dang lhan cig 'di lta bu dag byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:188b-25: de lta bu yin mod kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-26: 'on kyang kho bo cag gis bsdam par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bsdam pa byas /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-27: bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bshags par byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-30: rtsol bar byed pa dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-31: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs so //
T08TD4104.1E:188b-32: de na dge tshul tsher ma dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:188b-33: chen po pa gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-34: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bstan kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-35: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer ro //
T08TD4104.1E:188b-36: dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis de thos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-37: skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-38: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:188b-39: dge slong dag khyod kyis dge tshul tsher ma dang /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-0: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la gzhi de gtong du gzhug pa'i @189a * //
T08TD4104.1E:189a-2: dang por bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:189a-3: de lta na yang mi gtong na gsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-4: bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:189a-5: de lta na yang mi gtong na gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil ba'i las byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:189a-6: dge slong dag gis de bzhin byas kyang de sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-7: mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-8: gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-9: dge slong rnams kyis de gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:189a-10: de gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas pa na du zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-11: nye dga'i gan du song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-13: tsher ma dang chen po pa dang khyed gnyis ci'i phyir du /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-15: lhung bzed nag po can dag gis bdag cag gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:189a-17: gang dag gis khyed gnyis bsnyil ba'i las byas pa de dag / grong dang /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-20: khams gsum nas bsnyil bar gyur cig /'on kyang bsnyil ba'i las byas pa dag la /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-21: grong dang grong khyer dag med dam ci /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-22: sdod la bzod pa gsol cig ces /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-23: des de gnyis nye bar 'jog par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-24: nye bar gtong bar byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-25: de gnyis dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-26: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul dag nye bar 'jog par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-27: nye bar gtong bar byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-28: de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-30: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-31: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:189a-32: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-33: dge tshul zhig kyang de skad ces ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:189a-34: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer na /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-0: dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces dge tshul khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa @189b gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-1: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig / bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:189b-2: bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:189b-3: tshe dang ldan pa dge tshul 'dod pa bar du gcod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa du mar gsungs te /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-4: de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-5: dge tshul khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:189b-6: dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-7: gal te gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-8: gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtong bar bya ba'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-9: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-10: yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:189b-11: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo //
T08TD4104.1E:189b-12: yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-13: gal te mi gtong na dge tshul de la /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-15: deng phyin chad dge tshul khyod /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-16: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la ston pa'o zhes ma zer cig / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gang yang rung ba'i phyi bzhin du yang ma 'gro shig / dge slong rnams dang /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-17: dge tshul lhan cig nub gnyis tshun chad gnas gcig tu nyal du dbang ba gang yin pa de yang phyin chad khyod la med de /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-18: mi gti mug can khyod bsnyil gyis gzhan du song shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:189b-19: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul nye bar 'jog par byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-20: nye bar gtong bar byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-21: de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-24: nyon mongs pa ni sdig pa 'dod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-25: nyes pa ni dge tshul bsnyil ba sdud pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:189b-26: de la dge tshul zhig kyang zhes bya ba ni tsher ma dang /
T08TD4104.1E:189b-28: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:189b-29: 'di skad ces bya ba ni de skad zer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:189b-30: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:190a-1: dag ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-2: de dag bsten kyang zhes bya ba ni de dag lhag par spyad kyang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-3: bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni des dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te zhes zer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-4: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-5: chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:190a-7: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu bstan pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-8: bdag gis shes so zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni bdag gis kun shes so zhes zer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-9: dge tshul de la zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:190a-10: tsher ma dang chen po pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:190a-11: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-12: dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-13: 'di skad ces bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo bas bsgo bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-14: dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:190a-15: bzhams te bsgo ba na gal te gzhi de gtong na zhes bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa de yongs su gtong na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-16: de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-17: gal te mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi gtong na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-18: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
T08TD4104.1E:190a-19: yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:190a-20: yang dag par bsgo ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:190a-21: yang dag par bstan pa ni sngar bsgo ba las 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma bzhi'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-22: dge tshul de la zhes bya ba ni tsher ma dang /
T08TD4104.1E:190a-24: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-25: dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:190a-26: deng phyin chad dge tshul khyod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la ston pa'o zhes ma zer cig / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gang yang rung ba'i phyi bzhin du ma 'gro shig / dge slong rnams dang dge tshul lhan cig nub gnyis tshun chad gnas gcig tu nyal du dbang ba gang yin pa de yang deng phyin chad khyod la med de /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-0: mi gti mug can khyod bsnyil gyis gzhan du song shig / ces bsgo bar bya'o zhes @190b bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil ba bsgo bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190b-1: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-3: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190b-4: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-5: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:190b-6: de ltar bsnyil ba'i dge tshul zhes bya ba ni tsher ma dang /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-7: chen po pa ji lta bar ro //
T08TD4104.1E:190b-8: nye bar 'jog par byed ces bya ba ni gnas sbyin par byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190b-9: nye bar gtong bar byed ces bya ba ni lhung bzed dang /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-17: dmigs kyis 'dri ba sbyin pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:190b-18: de dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal na zhes bya ba ni gnas bzhi po thams cad g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-19: thams cad g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-20: phal cher g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-21: phal cher g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba dag tu nyal bas skya rengs 'char bar byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:190b-22: de la gnas thams cad g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni gnas khang dang /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-24: khang pa brtsegs pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:190b-25: thams cad g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba dag ni /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-27: sgo bcu gnyis pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:190b-28: phal cher g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-29: khyams ngos bzhi pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:190b-30: phal cher g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba ni khyams ngos gsum pa dang 'khor gyi khyams dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:190b-31: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:190b-32: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-33: dge tshul ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-34: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes bya ba la sogs par 'jug pa'i tshig de skad smra bas dge 'dun gyis bsnyil ba'i las byas shing spangs pa phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa'i dge tshul la /
T08TD4104.1E:190b-35: nad pa dang lta ba dang bral bar gtogs pa'i don gyi dbang ma gtogs par dge slong gis shes bzhin du lung dbog pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-4: zang zing gi longs spyod byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-5: bsnyen bkur bdag gir byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-6: gnas gcig tu nyal ba'i spyod lam gyis gnyid log pas skya rengs 'char bar byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-7: tha na 'dag rdzas tsam yan chad gzhan gyis srul na yang /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-8: bsnyil ba sdud pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:191a-9: 'di'i byed pa po ni de skad smra bas bsnyil ba'i dge tshul phyir bcos pa ma byas pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:191a-10: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-11: de skad smra ba'i dge tshul dge 'dun gyis bsnyil ba'i las byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-12: de phyir bcos pa nyid ma byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-13: dge slong der 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-15: lta ba dang bral bar gtogs pa'i don gyi dbang ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-16: de la lung dbog pa nas gzhan gyis srul ba zhes smos ba'i bar gang yang rung bas bsdu pa byas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:191a-17: de dag yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:191a-18: bsnyil ba sdud pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu bdun pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-20: // / kha ma bsbyur ba'i gos gon pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:191a-22: ma ga dh'a'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i rgyal po'i khab tu klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-23: yid 'ong gnyis kyi rten 'dzugs su bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-24: dus ston byed pa'i tshe lho phyogs nas gar mkhan zhig der 'ongs pas /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-25: dge slong ma sbom dga' mos gang gi tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-26: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dag mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo las rgya cher ji skad gsungs pa bzhin thams cad rgyas par mnyan te /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-28: de'i 'og tu yang drug sde dag zan zos zin cing spangs pas bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa rnyed pa'i lhag por byed pa mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-29: de yang smyon thabs su sbyar nas bla re bres te /
T08TD4104.1E:191a-30: rdza rnga chen po brdung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-0: skye bo phal po che'i tshogs der lhags te 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa'i tshe des mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo las rgya cher ji @191b skad gsungs pa dang 'dra bar de ltar bcos pa thams cad gar thams su rgya cher sbyar te gar byas shing /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-1: de'i 'og tu gar mkhan gcig gis 'char ka'i cha lugs su byas shing /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-2: gar mkhan gzhan gcig gis 'dun pa'i cha lugs su byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-3: kham phor thal bas bkang nas steng du bu ram gyi dum bu gnyis sam gsum du bzhag ste /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-4: 'char ka dang 'dun pa lhag por byed pa ltar bcos pa thams cad smyon thabs su rgya cher sbyar te bzhad gad byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-5: skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dad pa dang ldan pa dag ni /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-6: dad pa mngon par 'phel bar gyur cing /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-7: ma dad pa dag dad par gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-8: gar mkhan des kyang rnyed pa mang po grub par gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:191b-9: ji tsam na mthar gyis drug sde dag gis gar mkhan des bdag cag ltar bcos zhes grag go zhes thos nas de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-10: bdag cag gar mkhan de mi dga' bar byas /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-11: sring mo dag gi gan du gros byed du 'dong ngo zhes de dag dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag gi gan du song nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-12: sring mo dag bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa ni sgra mi snyan zhes bya ba'i gar thabs su byas pa gang yin pa de las cung zad ci dran pa 'gro'o zhes de rnams de dag dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal du dong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-14: ji tsam na cung zad kyang ma brjed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-15: de dag gis rgyal po'i pho brang nas rgyan dang cha lugs blangs te /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-16: gar mkhan de dang ha cang thag mi ring bar bla re bres nas /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-17: nye dags mgo ras kyis dkris te /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-18: rdza rnga chen po brdung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-19: gar la lta ba de'i nang nas /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-20: skye bo phal po che'i tshogs phyir byung ste der lhags so //
T08TD4104.1E:191b-21: gar mkhan de yang der song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-22: ji tsam na lha'i gar thabs lta bur mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-24: 'di dag lha gar byed pa yin nam /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-29: lto 'phye chen po dag gar byed pa yin snyam du rig nas ya mtshan skyes par gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:191b-30: drug sde dag gis kyang gar byas nas cha byad brtul te 'dong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-32: 'di dag su zhig yin snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:191b-33: de dag gi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang zhing song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-0: de ci tsam de dag 'od ma'i tshal du @192a * //
T08TD4104.1E:192a-2: gar mkhan des sgor bsdad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-3: ci tsam na 'char ka rna ba bab las bskus bzhin du sgor byung nas /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-4: gar mkhan des de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-5: 'phags pa gar de khyed kyis bgyis sam /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-7: kho bo cag gis khyod de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-8: bkren pa khyod kho bo cag kho na'i sgyu rtsal gyis nye bar 'tsho la /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-9: kho bo cag nyid ltar 'chos pas /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-10: khyod gang dang gang du gar byed pa de dang der kho bo cag dong la /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-11: khyod la tho btsams par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-12: kho bo cag gis rdza rnga chen po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-13: cha spyad gzhan ci yang bskur mi dgos par 'ong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:192a-15: 'phags pa de ni bdag cag gi 'tsho ba lags kyis bzod pa mdzod cig /'char kas smras pa /
