T08TD4104.1E:192a-16: gal te khyod kyis rnyed pa de dag thams cad kho bo cag la byin na bzod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:192a-18: de dag yang dang yang du tho btsams par 'gyur gyis sbyin no snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-19: des rnyed pa thams cad de dag la sbyin nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:192a-20: ji tsam na de'i chung po grogs 'ongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-22: grogs po khyod ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug / des smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-23: kho bo chad pas gcad do //
T08TD4104.1E:192a-24: sus sh'akya'i bu dge sbyong dag gis so //
T08TD4104.1E:192a-26: des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-27: des sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-28: dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-29: 'di ltar gar mkhan dag la yang chad pas gcod par byed do zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-32: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag mi mdzes pa de lta bu byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-34: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:192a-35: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-36: nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba de ni /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-37: dge slong dag khyim pa'i gos gyon pa las gyur pa yin pas de'i phyir dge slong gis khyim pa'i gos bsgo bar mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-38: dge slong gis gos gsar ba zhig rnyed na /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-39: kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am /
T08TD4104.1E:192a-41: dur smrig las gang yang rung bar kha bsgyur ba gsum bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:192b-0: @192b gal te dge slong gis gos gsar pa kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-2: ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar kha ma bsgyur bar gyon na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-5: nyon mongs pa ni mi bzod pa dang rnyed pa 'dod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-6: nyes pa ni gos kha ma bsgyur bar gon pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:192b-7: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-8: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:192b-16: nyi 'og gi gos gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:192b-17: sar pa zhig ces bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-21: don 'dir ni rnyed pas sar pa yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:192b-22: rnyed na zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so //
T08TD4104.1E:192b-23: kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-25: ngur smrig las gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-26: sngon po zhes bya ba ni rams nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:192b-27: dmar po zhes bya ba ni btsag go //
T08TD4104.1E:192b-28: ngur smrig ces bya ba ni shing shun no //
T08TD4104.1E:192b-29: kha bsgyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-31: gal te dge slong gis gos sar pa kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-33: ngur smrig las gang yang rung ba kha ma bsgyur bar spyod na zhes bya ba ni gyon na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:192b-34: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:192b-35: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-36: dge slong gis gos sar pa 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-37: dus tshigs su spyad pa rnying pa yang rung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-38: gsar du rnyed pas sar pa zhig rnyed na sde pa gzhan las 'ongs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-39: khyim pa gzhan las brkus pa'i gos ngur smrig rung bar byas zin pa ma gtogs pa rang gi gos dang /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-40: tha na lhung bzed kyi kha g-yogs dang /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-44: bsgo ba la sogs pa kha dog chen po brgyad ma gtogs pa sngon po'am /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-46: ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar kha ma bsgyur ba la yongs su longs spyod na /
T08TD4104.1E:192b-47: kha ma bsgyur ba'i gos gon pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:193a-0: 'di'i byed pa po ni rang gi gos tha na lhung bzed kyi kha g-yogs la sogs pa rnyed pas @193a * //
T08TD4104.1E:193a-2: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-6: kha dog chen po brgyad ma gtogs pa sngon po 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-8: ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar kha ma bsgyur ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-10: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:193a-11: kha ma bsgyur ba'i gos gyon pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu brgyad pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-13: // / longs pa'i gzhir gtogs pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-15: sbre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:193a-16: drug sde dag snga dro sham thabs bgos /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-17: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-18: yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:193a-19: lam gyi bar na yangs pa can gyi lo tstsha b'i rnams kyi skyed mos tshal dag yod nas /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-20: de dag de bltar zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-21: ji tsam na de na yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-33: su gho sha ka dag bzhag pa dag mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-34: de dag gis glu blangs shing bro brdung bar bya'o zhes /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-35: de dag gis glu blangs shing bro brdung bar brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:193a-36: rgyal po zas gtsang gi skyed mos tshal du spyad pa'i rol mo'i sgra gang yin pa de ni /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-37: lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dh'a'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i g-yul ngo la spyad pa'i rol mo'i sgra yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-38: yangs pa can gyi li tstsha b'i dag gis rol mo'i sgra de thos nas de dag sdangs te /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-40: shes ldan dag pha gsod pas ma sbran par dmag drangs te 'ongs so zhes de dag go bgos te phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-41: drug sde dag gis smras pa /

T08TD4104.1E:193a-43: khyed cag de ltar bred ngas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-44: 'phags pa dag khyed kyi rol mo'i sgra'i yo byad de dag sgra phyung ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-45: kho bo cag sgra phyung ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:193a-47: 'phags pa dag yangs pa can gyi li tstsha b'i dag sngangs pas /
T08TD4104.1E:193a-48: khyed la gnod pa byed na mi rung gis slar log shig / de dag phyir log pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:193b-0: dge @193b slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:193b-1: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag ji ste phyir log //
T08TD4104.1E:193b-2: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:193b-3: tshe dang ldan pa dag / kho bo cag de'u bsad do /
T08TD4104.1E:193b-5: yangs pa can gyi li tstsha b'i dag gis so //
T08TD4104.1E:193b-7: de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:193b-8: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir ;
T08TD4104.1E:193b-9: dge slong dag mi mdzes pa de lta bu byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:193b-11: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //

T08TD4104.1E:193b-14: rin po cher smos pa rang gi lag gis len tam /

T08TD4104.1E:193b-17: gnas khang du gtogs pa na 'dug pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do //

T08TD4104.1E:193b-20: rin po cher smos pa 'dug pa la /

T08TD4104.1E:193b-28: rin po cher smos pa rang gi lag gis len pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:193b-29: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:193b-30: drug sde 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:193b-31: rin po che'am zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:193b-32: rin po che zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:193b-44: rin po cher smos pa zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:193b-45: rin po cher smos pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:193b-46: g-yul dor spyad pa'i mtshon cha thams cad dang /
T08TD4104.1E:193b-47: rol mo spyad pa'i yo byad thams cad do //
T08TD4104.1E:193b-48: rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:193b-50: len tam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:193b-51: len du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:193b-52: kun dga' ra bar gtogs pa na 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:193b-53: gnas khang du gtogs pa na 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni kun dga' ra ba'i nang na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:194a-0: ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni kun dga' ra bar @194a * //
T08TD4104.1E:194a-2: gnas khang du gtogs pa na 'dug pa bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:194a-3: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:194a-4: dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //

T08TD4104.1E:194a-14: dge slong gis rin po che rang gi ma yin par nor bu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:194a-24: g-yas su 'khyil pa la sogs pa bdar ba dang /

T08TD4104.1E:194a-41: mda' phyed lcags las byas pa la sogs pa mde'u dang bcas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:194a-42: rol mor spyad pa'i yo byad pi bang dang /

T08TD4104.1E:194a-50: rdza rnga la sogs pa sgra 'byin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:194a-51: sku gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa nyid gtsug lag khang dang /

T08TD4104.1E:194a-54: longs pa'i gzhir gtogs pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //

T08TD4104.1E:194b-3: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /

T08TD4104.1E:194b-5: rin po cher smos pa'i gang yang rung ba nyid dang /

T08TD4104.1E:194b-14: // / khrus byed pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /

T08TD4104.1E:194b-16: rgyal po'i khab na chu dron gsum yod pa gcig ni /

T08TD4104.1E:194b-21: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:194b-22: rnam pa du ma'i sgo nas yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs na /
T08TD4104.1E:194b-23: khrus kyis ma bstabs kyis des bstabs par bya'o snyam du rig nas /
T08TD4104.1E:194b-25: btsun pa rgyal po'i khab 'di na chab dron gsum mchis pa gang du bdag khrus bgyid pa der 'phags pa dag kyang khrus mdzod cig gang du mchis brang gi 'khor khrus bgyid pa der yang 'phags ma dag khrus mdzad par gsol //
T08TD4104.1E:194b-26: drug sde dag la blo skyes pa /

T08TD4104.1E:194b-30: dga' bo nye dga' gal te bdag cag thams cad cig car khrus byas na myur du zin par 'gyur gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:194b-31: gnyis kyis bya zhing bzhis grogs bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:194b-32: de'i 'og tu yang gnyis kyis khrus bya zhing bzhis grogs bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:195a-1: kyis khrus bya zhing bzhis grogs bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:195a-2: de ltar bya'o zhes de dag las gnyis kyis khrus bya bar brtsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-4: de'i tshe ma ga dh'a'i po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang der khrus byed du 'phags nas des mi gsang la gtogs pa zhig da ltar sus khrus byed pa rtog tu btang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-5: des drug sde dag khrus byed par mthong nas rgyal pos der khri'u btsugs nas bsdad do //

T08TD4104.1E:195a-8: yang yun ring zhig lon nas rtog tu btang na yang de bzhin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-10: shes ldan dag /'o ni dag yun ring por nga la tho 'tshams par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-11: dbang bskur ba'i khrus kyis khrus bya'o //

T08TD4104.1E:195a-13: rgyal pos de nyid du dbang bskur ba'i khrus kyis khrus byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-14: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-16: chos mnyan pa ma mnyan pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:195a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po la smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-18: des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la drug sde dag gis tho 'tshams pa de rgyas par gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:195a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-20: nyes dmigs gang cung zad cig byung ba de ni /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-21: dge sbyong dag khrus byed pa las gyur pa yin pas de'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-22: dge slong rnams kyis khrus mi bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-23: zla ba phyed phyed cing khrus bya bar gnang ngo zhes snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing khrus bya bar gsungs pa de la 'dums par byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-25: dus ma gtogs te ltung byed do //

T08TD4104.1E:195a-28: dbyar rnams kyi dang po dang zla ba phyed dang gsum po 'di dag ni tsha ba'i dus so //
T08TD4104.1E:195a-29: lhag ma ni na ba dus so //
T08TD4104.1E:195a-35: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-38: nyon mongs pa ni tho 'tshams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:195a-39: nyes pa ni rgyal po'i chu kar khrus byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:195b-0: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis @195b zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:195b-1: zla ba phyed phyed cing khrus bya bar gsungs pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-2: zla ba phyed phyed cing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:195b-3: de bas 'dums par byed na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-4: zla ba phyed las 'dums par byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:195b-5: dus ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dus bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:195b-6: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:195b-7: de la dus ni 'di yin te /

T08TD4104.1E:195b-9: dbyar rnams kyi dang po dang zla ba phyed dang gsum po 'di dag ni tsha ba'i dus so zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-10: so ga rnams kyi zla ba lhag ma phyed dang gnyis zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-11: zla ba phyed dang gnyis na dbyar nye bar sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-12: dbyar zla ra ba tshes nas dbyar zla 'bring po nya'i bar gyi zla ba phyed dang gnyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:195b-13: dbyar rnams kyi dang po zhes bya ba ni gnas par khas blangs pa'i dang po zla ba gcig ste /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-14: dbyar rnams kyi 'bring po tshes bcu drug nas dbyar zla tha chungs nya'i bar gyi zla ba gcig go //
T08TD4104.1E:195b-15: zla ba phyed dang gsum po 'di dag ni tsha ba'i dus so zhes bya ba ni de ltar dbyar zla ra ba tshes nas /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-16: dbyar zla 'bring po nya'i bar gyi zla ba phyed dang gnyis dang /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-17: dbyar zla 'bring po tshe bcu drug nas dbyar zla tha chungs nya'i bar gyi zla ba gcig po de rnams spyir bsdoms pa la zla ba phyed dang gsum yod pa de dag ni /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-18: tsha ba'i dus yin pas de dag tu zla ba phyed las 'dums par khrus byed pa la ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:195b-19: lhag ma rnams ni na ba dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-20: dge slong na ba khrus ma byas par 'tsho bar mi nus so //

T08TD4104.1E:195b-23: mchod rten gyi las than phyag dar re lde tsam mam /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-24: byug pa ba mal tsam byas na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:195b-25: lam dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-26: dge slong dpag tshad gcig tu song ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-27: dpag tshad phyed du song ste phyir 'ongs na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:195b-28: rlung dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:195b-29: tha na rlung gis gos kyi grva bsgul bar gyur na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:195b-30: char dus so zhes bya ba ni /

T08TD4104.1E:195b-33: rdzi char dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /

T08TD4104.1E:196a-0: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bya ba ni @196a * //
T08TD4104.1E:196a-1: bslab pa'i gzhi'i bca' ba mdzad pa de la de ni gnang ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o //

T08TD4104.1E:196a-6: rlung gis gos kyi grva ma bskul ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-7: char thigs pa gnyis kyis lus nyid la ma phog pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-8: rdzi char gyis kyang de ltar ma gyur pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-9: yul aas ma pa ran ta na gnas pa ma gtogs pas dbyar zla ra ba tshes nas /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-10: dbyar zla tha chungs nya'i bar gyi zla ba phyed dang gsum las gzhan pa'i dus su nyi ma ga las khrus bya zhing nyi ma de nyid nas zhag bco lnga pa'i mdun rol nas /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-11: don gzhan la gzhol bas chu nyams su myong ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-12: de'i phyir ma bsams par rgal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-13: brgyal ba la gdab pa dag ma gtogs par chu ma yin par 'bru mar dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-16: 'o ma la sogs pa ma yin par chu nyid kyis dbang bskur bas sam ;
T08TD4104.1E:196a-17: 'jug pas khrus lte bar son par byed na khrus byed pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:196a-19: zla ba phyed kyi nang rol na /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-20: chu nyid kyis khrus byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:196a-21: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-22: zla ba phyed la 'dums pa nyid dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-23: dus ma gtogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-27: rkang ngam g-yas g-yon gang nas kyang rung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-29: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:196a-30: khrus byed pa'i ltung byed de drug cu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-32: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel bam po bco lnga pa /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-35: rtse dang lhan cig sdangs byed dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-36: sbed dang rdeng med gzhi med dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-37: skyes pa med par lam 'gro ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:196a-38: zhes bya ba ni bcu pa bdun pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-39: sdom la zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don dang dgos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:196a-40: bcu pa bdun pa 'dis kyang ltung byed kyi chos bcu bstan te /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-43: ga ga tshil byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-45: bud med dang lhan cig nyal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196a-48: byin nas nye bar 'tsho ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-0: @196b lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:196b-1: de la dud 'gro gsod pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:196b-3: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-4: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-5: des der bsod snyoms brgyus te /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-14: khyed kyis sgyu rtsal mchog las brgal to //
T08TD4104.1E:196b-17: mda' lnga phang bar byos shig / de dag gis bya bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-18: de lag pa gnyis 'dril bar byed bzhin sgyur bar byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:196b-22: da dung khyed cag gi slob dpon gyis kyang mi shes na /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-23: khyed cag gis lta shes par 'gyur re skan /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-25: 'phags pa 'di la mkhyen pa cung zad mnga' 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-27: sa'i steng na kho bos mi shes pa'i bzo'i gnas dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-30: 'phags pa g-yar rnga brim gyis mdzad du gsol /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-32: gzhu 'on cig de dag gis gzhu phul ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-34: gzhu 'di ni ras bal gyi gzhu 'dra bas /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-35: gzhu gzhan 'on cig / de dag gis gzhu gnyis pa dang gsum pa phul ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-37: gzhu 'di dag kyang ras bal gyi gzhu 'dra bas /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-38: khyed kyi slob dpon gyi gzhu 'on cig / de dag gis slob dpon gyi gzhu phul ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-40: 'di yang tshod yod pa zhig go zhes des gzhu de ras bal gyi gzhu bzhin du brdungs te rgyud sbrengs ba dang steng gi nam mkha' la bya rog gi tshogs rgyu bar brtsams nas /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-42: ji ltar je bya rog 'di'i rkub tu bsnun te khar dbyung bar bya'am /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-43: 'on te khar bsnun la rkub tu dbyung bar bya /
T08TD4104.1E:196b-45: 'phags pa rkub tu bsnun te khar dbyung du gsol /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-1: kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mda' gcig 'phangs shing /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-2: lho dang nub dang byang phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la yang /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-4: bya rog des kha gyen du phyogs te 'gro bar brtsams nas /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-5: 'char kas de'i phyi bzhin mda' cig 'phangs pas rkub tu bsnun te khar phyung nas /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-6: bya rog de sa la lhung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-7: de dag ya mtshan skyes nas /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-8: sems khong du chud cing 'khod do //
T08TD4104.1E:197a-10: bu dag bzo 'di ltar bslab par bya'am /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-11: yang na slob dpon gzhan dag btsal bar bya /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-12: 'bras bu med pa'i spun pa 'phyar zhing 'khod de ci rung zhes smras te song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:197a-13: de dag sems khong du chud cing 'khod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-14: ji tsam na de dag gi slob dpon 'ongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-16: khye'u dag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'khod /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-17: de dag gis skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-19: de yang dang yang du bdag la tho 'tshams par 'gyur bas /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-20: bdag gis de mi dga' bar bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-21: phyi de nyid bar tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs bgos /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-22: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-23: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-24: khye'u de dag bya rog gi ro de smyig ma ring po'i rtse mo la btags te bskur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-25: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i phyi bzhin rjes su btang ste /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-27: 'phags pa 'char kas mda' lnga 'phang ba 'di lta bu byas pas /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-28: bya rog 'di'i rkub tu bsnun nas khar phyung ba la ltos zhes sgrogs su bcug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-31: khye'u dag ci'i phyir kho bo la tho 'tshams par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-32: phyir log shig /'on kyang de dag phyir ma log par de skad sgrogs par byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-33: bram ze dang khyim bdag dag shes ldan dag / sh'akya'i bu'i dge slong 'di dag srog gcod par byed pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-34: srog gcod pa las ma log / ma spangs /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-35: so sor ma spangs pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:197a-36: shes ldan dag sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong sems can gang dag gi pags pa yang dgos par mi rung /
T08TD4104.1E:197a-38: rgyus pa dang rus pa yang dgos par mi rung ba 'di lta bu yang gsod par byed pa la ltos /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-0: su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la @197b bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-2: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-3: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:197b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-5: yang dge slong gang bas sam bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags gsod na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-7: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni ngan sems /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-8: nyes pa ni dud 'gro gsod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:197b-9: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-10: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:197b-11: bsams gzhin du zhes bya ba ni rnam par brtags nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:197b-12: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags zhes bya ba ni bya rog gam /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-13: gang gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:197b-14: gsod na zhes bya ba ni de'i srog gcod par byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:197b-15: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-17: yi dags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-18: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-19: 'tshod par byed ltung bar byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:197b-20: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-21: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:197b-22: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-23: dge slong gis gsod pa'i sems kyis dud 'gro gang yang rung ba la mtshon la sogs pa lus dang /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-25: gnyi ga dang ldan pa gang yang rung bas bsnun te /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-26: gzhi des de'i tshe 'am gzhan gyi tshe shi ba sbyor ba gcig gis gsad par bya ba ji snyed pa re re las dud 'gro gsod pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:197b-29: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:197b-30: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-36: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:197b-37: dud 'gro gsod pa'i ltung byed de drug cu gcig pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:197b-39: // /'gyod pa skyed pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed @198a * //
T08TD4104.1E:198a-1: kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:198a-2: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi 'u chen pos /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-3: nye ba 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu phyung zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-4: bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-5: de dag drug sde dag la sten par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcu bdun sde dag la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-9: bcu bdun sde dag tshur sheg 'di dang 'di gyis shig / de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-10: khyod kho bo cag gi slob dpon yin nam /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-11: mkhan po yin nam ci mi byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:198a-13: glen pa dag /'o na gzhan ci zhig byed ces des de dag gnya' ba dag nas bzung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-16: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag drug sde dag gis gang cung zad brnyas par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-17: bdag cag thos pa nyung ba las gyur pa yin gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-19: des na phyin char drug sde dag la cung zad kyang dri mi dgos par 'gyur ro zhes de dag dge slong zhig gi gan du song ste smras ba /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-20: btsun pa bdag cag klog tu stsol cig / des de dag la thabs yin no zhes smras nas /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-21: de dag gis de'i gan du bklag par brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:198a-23: btsun pa 'char ka bcu bdun sde dag der bdag cag la sten par mi byed bsnyen par mi byed bsnyen bkur mi byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:198a-25: kho bos de dag bskrad nas da ltar thos pa 'dzin par brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:198a-26: btsun pa 'char ka khyod kyis bdag cag gi sprul nyal ba lcag gis gzhus so //
T08TD4104.1E:198a-27: ji srid du glen pa de dag thos pa nyung ba de srid du de dang de bdag cag la sten par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-30: gang gi tshe de dag thos pa mang bor gyur cing /
T08TD4104.1E:198a-34: gdug cing pha rol gnon par gyur pa de'i tshe de dag bdag cag la gnod pa bya bar sems par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:198a-36: kho bos de dag ci nas kyang thos pa 'dzin par mi 'gyur pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-0: thos pa bzung ba las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes de dag gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces smras @198b so ;
T08TD4104.1E:198b-1: / kye bcu bdun sde dag shin du brtson 'grus brtsams sam /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-9: dbang po yongs su smin par 'gyur ro /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-10: dbang po yongs su smin pas cir 'gyur /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-13: khyed des pa la 'jug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-14: zag pa zad par 'gyur re skan /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-15: btsun pa 'char ka kho bo cag mtshams med pa'i las dag byas pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa yin nam ci /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-17: khyed cag mtshams med pa'i las dag byas ba yang ma yin /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa yang ma yin mod kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-19: 'on kyang khyed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang zag lo nyi shum lon pa /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-20: dge slong gi dngos por bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-21: gang zag de yang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi 'gyur la /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-22: dge slong de dag kyang smad par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ma thos sam /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-23: khyed cag lo nyi shu ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs pas /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-24: khyed cag nyid nges pa la 'jug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-25: zag pa zad par 'gyur re skan /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-26: de dag gis de thos nas sems khong du chud cing 'khod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-27: de dag gi slob dpon de 'ongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-29: gzhon nu dag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'khod /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-30: de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-32: khyed kyis de ni thos na bcom ldan 'das kyis las dang po pa la ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa de ma thos sam /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-33: khyed cag las dang po pa yin pas bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur gyi /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-34: tshur shog la lung nos shig / gzhan yang 'di ltar khyed sus 'gyod pa skyed /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-35: btsun pa 'char kas so zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-36: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag bsams bzhin du dge slong dag 'gyod pa skyed par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-38: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:198b-39: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:198b-40: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-0: yang dge slong gang bsams bzhin du ci nas kyang dge slong 'di yud tsam zhig kyang bde ba la reg par mi bya'o snyam pa de @199a * //
T08TD4104.1E:199a-2: dge slong la 'gyod pa skyed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-4: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni phrag dog / nyes pa ni dge slong 'gyod pa bskyed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:199a-5: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-6: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:199a-7: bsams bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rnam par brtags nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:199a-8: ji nas kyang dge slong 'di yud tsam zhig kyang bde ba la mi reg par bya'o snyam pa zhes bya ba ni tha na yud tsam zhig kyang yid mi dga' bar bya'o snyam pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:199a-9: de nyid rkyen du byas te zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:199a-10: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:199a-11: 'gyod pa skyed na zhes bya ba ni sems la cung zad 'gyod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-14: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:199a-15: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-16: dge slong gis dge slong la bde ba la mi reg pa skyed pa'i sems kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-17: tha na bzhad gad kyis khyod bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma yin zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-18: pham par 'gyur ba byung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-19: dge slong ma yin pa'i don gyis 'gyod pa skyed na 'gyod pa ma skyes na yang /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-20: 'gyod pa skyed pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:199a-22: pha rol po dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-23: dge slong ma yin pa'i don gyis 'gyod pa skyed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:199a-24: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-25: pha rol po dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-26: bde ba la mi reg pa skyed pa'i sems nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-27: dge slong ma yin pa'i don nyid kyis dang /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-28: tha na bzhad gad yan chad kyis 'gyod pa skyed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-31: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:199a-32: 'gyod pa skyed pa'i ltung byed de drug cu gnyis pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-34: // / ga ga tshil byed pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-35: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:199a-36: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos /
T08TD4104.1E:199a-37: nye ba 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-0: bcu bdun @199b sde dag la gal te gcig la las su bsko ba bab na yang /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-1: de dag thams cad bsdongs te byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:199b-2: ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na gtsug lag khang der mtshan thog thag tu chos mnyan pa byung nas /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-3: der de dag thams cad kyis bsdongs te tron byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:199b-4: phyi de nyin par dge 'dun gyi bsro gang du chos mnyan pa byug nas der yang de dag thams cad kyis bsdongs te tron byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:199b-5: de'i phyi de nyin par bcu bdun sde las gcig la dge skos bab nas /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-6: de'i nyin mo yang thams cad kyis gtsug lag khang brgyan te 'khong do //
T08TD4104.1E:199b-7: de na dge skos tron byed pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-8: bcu bdun sde las gcig la blo byung ba /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-9: bdag ni chad kyis nyal lo //
T08TD4104.1E:199b-10: mi bcu drug gis ci'i phyir tro na mi nus snyam mo //
T08TD4104.1E:199b-11: de bzhin du re re la yang blo de lta bu byung nas gzhan bcu drug po thams cad so sor nyal du 'dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:199b-12: dge skos de 'ba' zhig gcig pus mtshan thog thag las byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-13: mtshan mo nam ma nangs par mar me kong bu dag bsdus /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-15: gtsug lag khang chag chag btab /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-18: stan bshams shing mchod rten gyi 'khor sar bdug spos brims te /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-19: gtsug lag khang de'i steng du 'greng nas gand'i brdung par brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:199b-20: de nas bcu drug po de dag gand'i'i sgras sad nas /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-21: rang rang gi gnas khang dag nas lhung bzed thogs te byung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-22: de dag gis dge skos de gcig pu phar rgyug tshur rgyug cing 'dug pa mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-23: de dag gis phan tshun smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-24: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di gcig pu phar rgyug tshur rgyug cing 'dug pa /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-25: 'u bu cag las sus kyang 'di'i grogs ma byas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-27: kho bo la blo byung ba /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-28: bdag ni chad kyis nyal lo //
T08TD4104.1E:199b-29: mi bcu drug gis ci'i phyir tron mi nus snyam mo //
T08TD4104.1E:199b-30: de bzhin du gzhan yang de skad zer /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-31: gzhan dag kyang de skad zer te /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-32: thams cad kyis de skad smras so /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-33: de nas bcu drug po dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-34: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di bdag cag gi 'phral gyi bya ba thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba yin na /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-35: bdag cag gis 'di'i grogs ma bya pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-36: 'u bu cag gis ma legs pa byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:199b-37: 'di bdag cag la gsheg bar 'gyur gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-0: za na zos ma thag tu bzod @200a * //
T08TD4104.1E:200a-1: pa gsol bar bya'o zhes de dag gis zan zos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-2: bzod pa gsol bar brtsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-3: gzhon pa rnams kyis ni de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-4: rgan pa rnams kyis ni mgul nas 'khyud de /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-5: tshe dang ldan pa bzod par gsol zhes byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-6: des cang mi smra bar 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:200a-7: de dang ches bshes pa cig yod pa des /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-8: ga ga tshil byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-9: des bgad par brtsams te bzod do zhes kyang zer ro //
T08TD4104.1E:200a-11: de'i thabs legs pa yin no snyam nas gzhan gyis ga ga tshil byas shing /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-12: de bzhin du thams cad kyi bar gyis ga ga tshil byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-13: de rlung gyen du 'tshubs te dus la bab po //
T08TD4104.1E:200a-14: de dag brtad cing mya ngan bya bar brtsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-15: sems khong du chud cing 'khod do //
T08TD4104.1E:200a-16: dge slong rnams dang 'char kas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-17: khyed cag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'khod /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-18: de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-19: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong la sor mos ga ga tshil byed ces smos par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-21: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-22: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:200a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du //
T08TD4104.1E:200a-24: sor mos ga ga tshil byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-26: gang zag ni bcu bcun sde /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-27: nyon mongs pa ni ga ga tshil byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:200a-28: de la sor mos ga ga tshil byed na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-29: ga ga tshil bya ba'i bsams pas lus kyi las dang /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-31: lus kyi g-yo ba gang yin pa byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:200a-32: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:200a-33: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-34: dge slong lus kyi dbang po ma nyams pas /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-35: dge slong lus kyi dbang po ma nyams pa la skyi g-ya' bar bya ba'i sems kyis sor mo'am /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-46: rkang pa'i the bong la sogs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-47: rang gi lus kyi yan lag gos ma gtogs pa gang yang rung ba dag gis ga ga tshil byed pas pha rol po'i gos ma gtogs pa lus kyi yan lag gang yang rung ba la reg na /
T08TD4104.1E:200a-48: reg byed gcig gam du ma nyid la /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-0: @200b spyir ga ga tshil byed pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhi gcig tu 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:200b-1: 'di'i byed pa po ni gnyi ga'i lus kyi dbang po ma nyams pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-2: skyi g-ya' bar byed pa'i sems nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:200b-3: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-4: pha rol po dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-5: gnyi ga'i lus kyi dbang po ma nyams pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-6: kun du chags pa dang zhe sdang med pa'i sems sam /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-7: de gnyis kyi sems ma yin pa skyi g-ya' bar bya ba'i sems nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-8: sor mo la sogs pa lus kyi yan lag gang yang rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-10: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:200b-11: ga ga tshil byed pa'i ltung byed de drug cu gsum pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-13: // / chu la rtse ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:200b-15: gang gi tshe bcu bdun sde dag las /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-16: tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-18: bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'di dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam snyam na /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-20: su la rag las snyam na /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-21: bdag nyid la rag las par mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-22: de bcu drug po gzhan dag gdul ba ltos pas /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-23: de dag gi phyi bzhin rjes su 'brangs na /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-25: tshe dang ldan pa dag chu klung gnas can gyi dngos su chu'i don du 'dong zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-26: der khrus kyang bya'o zhes de dag chu tshags dang /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-28: chu klung gnas can ga la bder dong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-30: tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar je khrus bya'am /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-33: je chu btsag par bya ste de'i 'og tu khrus bya'o zhes de dag gis chu btsags nas /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-34: gos dag mtha' gcig tu phud de khrus bya bar brtsams nas /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-35: chur zhugs te de dag steng du 'byung bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-37: tshu rol gyi 'gram nas pha rol gyi 'gram du 'gro bar yang byed /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-38: pha rol gyi 'gram nas tshu rol gyi 'gram du 'ong bar yang byed /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-39: rgyun phyogs su 'gro bar yang byed /
T08TD4104.1E:200b-40: rgyun las bzlog phyogs su 'gro bar yang byed /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-1: rnga bo che'i sgra 'byin par yang byed /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-2: rdza rnga kha gcig pa'i sgra 'byin par yang byed /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-3: chu la gseg ma 'khrab pa dang 'phen par yang byed /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-4: chu la khor yug dang rdo rje lta bu yang byed /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-6: dba' klong dang chu srubs 'dren par yang byed chu la rgod bag dang 'phyar g-yeng dang lus la rdeg pa dag kyang byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:201a-7: tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor yang shes bzhin du khrus byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-8: chu klung gnas can rgal nas chos gos dag bgos te sdod do //
T08TD4104.1E:201a-9: de'i tshe na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir gtogs pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-10: btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang lhan cig 'dug pas /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-11: ji tsam na bcu bdun sde dag chu la rtsa bas rtse bar mthong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:201a-12: mthong nas kyang des btsun mo phreng ldan ma la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-13: phreng ldan ma yon gnas dag gi mdzes pa la ltos shig / phreng ldan mas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-14: lha de ni ngo mtshang mi che ste /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-15: lang tsho gsar du gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-16: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa lags kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-17: lha bgres pa'i gnas skabs su gyur kyang /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-18: da dung thugs ma byung ba ngo mtshar che lags so //
T08TD4104.1E:201a-19: rgyal po skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:201a-20: tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir gtogs pa na mi dga' bar sems pa mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-21: des de dag la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-22: tshe dang ldan pa dag ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal mi dga' bar sems kyis byung shig dang de dga' bar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:201a-23: de nas de dag byung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-25: tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor mos pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-26: 'di ltar de dag thams cad chu chags dang chu bum dang bcas te /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-27: steng gi nam mkha' la ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar 'phags te dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:201a-28: de dag steng gi nam mkha' la dong ba'i grib ma ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir bab nas /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-29: btsun mo phreng ldan mas de dag steng gi nam mkha' la ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar 'phags te dong ba mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-30: des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:201a-31: lha yon gnas dag gi mdzes pa la gzigs shig gzigs shig / rgyal pos smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-0: phreng ldan ma @201b dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa dag chu la 'phyar g-yeng gis rtse bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin skabs ma yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di na dge slong 'dug pa na 'dod chags dang bcas /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-6: gti mug dang bcas par mthong la /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-7: de nyid langs pa na 'dod chags dang bral /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-9: gti mug dang bral bar yang mthong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-10: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-12: ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje dang 'dra bas /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-13: nyon mongs pa rnams ni ye shes kyis 'joms so zhes gsungs pa de ma gsan tam /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-14: rgyal po thos pa nyung bas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:201b-15: phreng ldan mas kyang bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-16: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa dag chu la 'phyar g-yeng gis rtse ba de ni gnas ma yin skabs ma yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-17: de ni gnas med do snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-18: de nas btsun mo phreng ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi zhig la phrin gyis bsnyun gsol te /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-19: btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag chab la 'phyar g-yeng gis rtse bar bgyid pas /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-20: rgyal po'i glo ba mi dga' bar sems na /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-21: kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-22: gang gis 'phags pa dag chab la 'phyar g-yeng gis rtse bar mi 'gyur bar dran par bgyi ba cung zhig bca' ba mdzad na legs so zhes gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:201b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-24: chu la rtse na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-26: gang zag ni bcu bdun sde /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-27: nyon mongs pa ni ma dul ba /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-28: nyes pa ni chu la rtse ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:201b-29: de la chu la rtse na zhes bya ba ni chu la rtse ba'i bsam pas lus kyi las dang /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-31: lus kyi g-yo ba gang yin pa byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:201b-32: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:201b-33: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-34: dge slong gis sim par 'dod pas rgal ba la sogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-37: grang bar 'dod pas tshab thad ka'am /
T08TD4104.1E:201b-39: grang bar 'dod pas tsha myong bar bya ba'i 'dun pas /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-0: chu ma yin pa ma gtogs pa chu'i yul la rtse ba @202a * //
T08TD4104.1E:202a-1: rjes su sgrub pa dbang bskur bas nus pa la sogs pa ma gtogs par /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-2: chu'i nang du lte ba man chad nub par zhugs shing 'og tu nub pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-4: ngogs gzhan du brgal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-6: rgyun las bzlog phyogs su rtsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-7: chu la rnga bo che dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:202a-8: rdza rnga kha gcig pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-15: chu srubs 'dren pa dag byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-16: byed du bcug na chu la rtse ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:202a-18: dgod pas dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya ba'i 'dun pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-19: chu'i yul la rtse ba rjes su sgrub pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:202a-20: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-21: dgod pas dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya ba'i 'dun pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-23: lte ba nub pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-24: rtse ba rjes su sgrub pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-26: byed du bcug pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:202a-27: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:202a-28: chu la rtse ba'i ltung byed de drug cu bzhi pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-30: // / bud med dang lhan cig nyal ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-31: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:202a-33: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing //
T08TD4104.1E:202a-34: des rnam par grol ba'i bde ba nyams su myong ba'i tshe de 'di snyam du sems te /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-35: bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag la phan pa mdzad pa /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-36: legs pa mdzad pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-37: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi chos mang po sel bar mdzad pa /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-38: bde ba'i chos mang po sgrub pa /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-39: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos mang po sel bar mdzad pa /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-40: dge ba'i chos mang po sgrub par mdzad pa yin na /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-41: bdag gis de la ci zhig byas na /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-44: rab tu byas par 'gyur snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:202a-45: yang de 'di snyam du sems te /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-0: sangs rgyas bcom 'das dka' ba mdzad pa brgya stong du ma dag gis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis pha rol tu @202b phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-1: bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni sems can gyi don gyi phyir yin pas bdag gis kyang gdul ba'i bya ba cung zhig bya'o snyam nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus nas ljongs rgyur song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:202b-2: ri brags shig na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa de la bu gnyis dang /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-4: des bu de gnyis kyi khyim phub cing /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-5: bu mo de yang bag mar btang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:202b-6: dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de yang dus la bab /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-7: de'i bu mo'i yang khyo shi bar gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-8: ming po gnyis ni khyim na gnas pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-9: skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa las khye'u spyi brtol can zhes bya ba gcig byung nas /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-10: de'i ma yang spyi brtol can gyi ma zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:202b-11: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-13: dgra bcom pa rnams chos nyid kyis ma bsams par shes pa dang mthong ba mi 'jug pas de der song nas /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-14: bsti gnas brnyas nas der 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-15: des der rkang pa bkru ba'i chu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-17: dus ma yin pa'i zas bstabs pa dag ni des ma blangs so //
T08TD4104.1E:202b-18: des de'i mal bshams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-19: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa mal der skyil mo krung bcas nas lus drang por bsrang ste dran pa phyogs par bzhag nas 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:202b-20: de de'i gan du mtshan mo'i thun dang po nam phyed na 'ongs te /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-21: bud mad kyi g-yo dag nye bar bstan par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-22: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dbang po dag 'bebs par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:202b-24: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-28: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams nas /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-29: bud med de la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' las shod du babs te /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-33: rang bzhin khong du chud nas gang thos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:202b-34: bud med des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-1: zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rig par byed pa'i chos bstan pa byas pas des bden pa mthong nas phyi de nyin bar /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-2: 'phags pa ma 'gags pa sgo bcad de gdugs tshod gsol nas chos bstan pa'i tshe de'i ming po gnyis /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-3: mi zhig dang lhan cig 'thab mo byung ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-4: mi de na re khyed gnyis dang smra'am /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-5: khyed gnyis kyi sring mo ya mtshan can sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i mchod sbyin byed pas sh'akya'i bu dge sbyong yang ma btang ste /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-6: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong yang khar rtsang zhugs na da dung yang ma byung ngo zhes zer ro //
T08TD4104.1E:203a-8: bdag cag nyis gang cung zad mis brnyas par gyur pa de thams cad ni 'di'i le lan yin gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-9: de gsad du 'dong ngo snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-10: ral gri shubs nas phyung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-11: de'i khyim ga la bde logs su phyogs te brgyugs pa dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:203a-12: srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-13: kha cig ni ltad mo skyes pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-14: kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-15: de gnyis kyi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:203a-16: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-17: sring mo kho bo phyir byung gis /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-18: khyod kyis sgo chod cig / de phyir byung ba dang des sgo bcad do //
T08TD4104.1E:203a-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-20: cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams nas shod du babs te /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-21: chos bstan pas srog chags nyi khris rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:203a-22: ri brags de dang ha cang mi ring ba na skyed mos tshal zhig yod pa der mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-23: chom rkun pa lnga brgya tsam der lhags pa dag la yang chos bstan pas /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-24: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byas pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:203a-25: ri brags pa de dag pa chos bstan pas srog chags khri nyis stong gis kyang 'phags pa'i 'bras bu thob par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:203a-26: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas chom rkun pa las bden pa mthong ba'i rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po de dag bcom ldan 'das la gdul ba'i skyes su khrid de /
T08TD4104.1E:203a-27: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-0: @203b bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-1: de dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:203b-2: dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la dris pa /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-3: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-4: tshe dang ldan pa dag cung zad ni bde bar brgyus cung zad ni sdug bsngal bar yang brgyus so //
T08TD4104.1E:203b-5: ji ltar 'di ltar re zhig gdul ba'i bya ba byas pa gang yin pa de ni bde bar brgyus pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:203b-6: had por de'u gsad pa gnag yin pa de ni sdug bsngal bar yang brgyus pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:203b-7: ci'i phyir des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-8: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-9: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa khyod bud med dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal du rung ngam gang gi phyir mi rung ba de nyid kyi phyir nyes dmigs byung bar gyur to zhes zer na /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-10: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-11: dge slong gang dag bud med dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-13: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-14: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:203b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-16: yang dge slong gang bud med dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-18: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-19: nyon mongs pa ni bag chags ma byang bsam bsams par shes pa dang mthong ba mi 'jug pa /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-20: nyes pa ni bud med dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu nyal ba'o//
T08TD4104.1E:203b-21: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:203b-22: bud med dang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-23: bud med dang gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa dang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:203b-24: lhan cig ces bya ba ni de dang de'o //
T08TD4104.1E:203b-25: gnas gcig tu zhes bya ba ni gnas bzhi po thams cad g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-26: thams cad g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-27: phal cher g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:203b-28: phal cher g-yogs shing phral cher bskor ba dag tu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:203b-29: de la gnas thas cad g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni gnas khang dang /
T08TD4104.1E:204a-1: dang khang ba brtsegs pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:204a-2: thams cad g-yogs shing phal cher bskor ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:204a-3: sgo bcu pa dag dang sgo bcu gnyis pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:204a-4: phal cher g-yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni khyams ngos bzhi pa dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:204a-5: phal cher g-yogs sing phal cher bskor ba ni khyams ngos gsum pa dang 'khor gyi khams dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:204a-6: nyal na zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo glos pa ba ste nyal na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:204a-7: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:204a-8: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnams par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:204a-9: dge slong mi'i 'gro ba bud med dam /
T08TD4104.1E:204a-10: gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyos pa khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa dang lhan cig gnas gcig tu mtshan mo nyal nas skya rengs 'char ba'i mthar bud med dang lhan cig nyal ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:204a-12: mi'i 'gro ba ba'i bud med dam gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa nyid de do ;
T08TD4104.1E:204a-13: /'di la yan lag ldas dngos gzhi'i ltung byed du 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:204a-14: mi'i 'gro ba pa'i bud med dam gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyad pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:204a-15: lhan cig gnas gcig pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:204a-19: / de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:204a-20: bud med dang lhan cig nyal ba'i ltung byed de drug cu lnga pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:204a-22: // / sdangs par byed pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:204a-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:204a-24: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos nye ba 'khor la sogs pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe de dag drug sde dag la sten par byed bsnyen par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:204a-26: de nas 'char kas de dag la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:204a-27: bcu bdun sde dag tshur sheg /'di dang 'di gyis shig / de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:204a-28: khyed kho bo cag gi slob dpon nam /
T08TD4104.1E:204a-32: glan pa dag 'o na gzhan ci byed ces des de dag gnya' ba nas bzung ste bskrad do //
T08TD4104.1E:204b-1: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag drug sde dag gis gang cung zad brnyas par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni bdag cag thos pa nyung ba las gyur pa yin gyis bdag cag thos pa 'dzin par 'dong dang /
T08TD4104.1E:204b-2: des na phyin chang drug sde dag la gang cung zad kyang dri bar mi bya'o zhes de dag dge slong zhig gi gan du dong ste smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:204b-3: btsun pa bdag cag klog tu stsol cig / des de dag la thabs yin no zhes smras nas /
T08TD4104.1E:204b-4: de dag gis de las bklag par brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:204b-6: btsun pa 'char ka bcu bdun sde dag de bar bdag cag la sten par mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:204b-10: de dag kho bos bskrad nas thos pa 'dzin par brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:204b-11: btsun pa 'char ka khyod kyis bdag cag gi sprul nyal ba lcag gis gzhus so //
T08TD4104.1E:204b-12: ji srid du glen pa de dag thos pa nyung bar gyur pa de srid du de dag bdag cag la sten par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:204b-15: gang gi tshe de dag mang du thos par gyur cing mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:204b-18: gdug cing pha rol gnon par gyur pa de'i tshe na de dag bdag cag la gnod pa bya bar sems par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:204b-20: kho bos ci nas de dag gis ma rtogs pa yang dogs par mi 'gyur zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:204b-21: rtogs pa las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur pa de ltar bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:204b-22: bcu bdun sde dag me khang du mar me btsugs te kha ton bya bar btsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:204b-23: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la ba zhig spu phyir bstan te gyon nas me khang du zhugs te mar me bsad nas 'byung po'o 'byung po'o zhes smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:204b-24: de dag sdangs shing skrag nas me khang nas phyir byung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:204b-26: de dag slob dpon gyis mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:204b-27: gzhon nu dag ci'i phyir kha ton mi byed par kha rog ste 'khod /
T08TD4104.1E:204b-29: slob dpon bdag cag mi ma lags pas gtses so //
T08TD4104.1E:204b-31: rgyal byed kyi tshal gnod sbyin gos sngon po gon pa lnga brgyas rtag tu mi gtong bas 'di na mi ma yin pa yod re skan /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-0: lhung bzed nag po can gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa 'ga' zhig gis 'di @205a * //
T08TD4104.1E:205a-3: gzhon nu dag mi ma yin pa de 'dzin par 'dod dam /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-6: gzhon nu dag me khang gi grva bzhir mar me btsugs te rdza mas kho ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-7: dbus su mar de bcugs te kha ton gyis shig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-9: dbus kyi mar me bsad nas 'byung po 'byung po zhes zer ba na sgo chod la /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-10: me khang grva bzhir mar me phye la zung shig / de dag gis de ltar byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-11: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka //
T08TD4104.1E:205a-12: la ba zhig spu phyir bstan te gyon nas me khang du zhugs te /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-13: dbus kyi mar me bsad nas 'byung po'o 'byung po'o zhes smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-14: de dag gis sgo bcad nas me khang gi grva bzhi'i mar me phye ste bzung nas brdeg par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-18: khyed kyi snying lam na 'char ka kho bo cag gi grogs yin pas de yin no zhes byas na btang bar 'gyur snyam mam /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-19: shi drod kyis ma bzung gi bar du mi btang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:205a-20: de dag gis yang smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-21: tshe dang ldan pa dag mi ma yin pa ni shin du chen po zhig bsad pas kyang nyes pa sbom por 'gyur bar zad pas bdag cag gis ltung ba mthol cing bshags par byas /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-22: te por brdeg go zhes de dag gis de te por tal tal te btang nas /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-23: 'char ka 'phyes 'khrud de rang gi gnas su phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-24: de phyi de nyin bar lus dag 'bru mar gyis bsku mnye byas nas khri la nyal zhing 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-25: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-26: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ci nyes /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-28: tshe dang ldan pa dag ku re cung zhig byas na nyes dmigs 'di lta bu byung bar gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:205a-30: des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-31: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-32: khyod dge slong la sdangs par byed du rung ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-33: gang gi phyir mi rung ba de nyid kyi phyir nyes dmigs 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur to zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-34: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag / dge slong la sdangs par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-36: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:205a-37: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:205a-38: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-0: yang @205b dge slong gang dge slong la sdangs par byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-1: sdangs par byed du 'jud na tha na bzhad gad bya bar bsams kyang rung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-2: ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-4: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni phrag dog //
T08TD4104.1E:205b-5: nyes pa ni dge slong la sdangs par byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:205b-6: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-8: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:205b-9: de dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:205b-10: sdangs par byed dam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:205b-11: sdangs par byed du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:205b-12: tha na bzhad gad bya bar bsams kyang rung ste zhes bya ba ni tha na ku re bya bar bsams pas kyang rung ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:205b-13: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:205b-14: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-15: dge slong gis bzhad gad bya bar bsams kyang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-16: khro ba sngon du btang bas kyang rung ste sdangs par 'dod pas 'jigs pa'i rgyu nye bar sgrub pa sngon du btang ba 'jigs par byed pa yid du mi 'ong ba /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-21: lus srul po gzugs la ba nag po'am /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-23: ka ba tshig pa lta bu sgra seng ge'am /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-33: ra'i ze ba'i dri lta bu /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-36: phyar ba'i reg pa lta bu dag nyid 'di na yod do zhes /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-37: dge slong la bdag nyid kyis go bar byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-38: gzhan gyis kyang go bar byed du bcug na 'jigs pa skyes kyang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-40: skyo bar bya ba'i ched nyid ma gtogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-41: sdangs par byed pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:205b-44: yid du mi 'ong ba nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:205b-45: 'di la yan lag drug gis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-46: bzhad gang bya bar bsams pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-47: khro ba sngon du btang ba'i bsam pa gang yang rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-49: 'jigs pa'i rgyu yid du mi 'ong ba gang yang rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:205b-50: pha rol po sdangs par bya ba dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-0: bdag nyid dam gzhan gang yang rung bas go bar byed pa nyid @206a * //
T08TD4104.1E:206a-2: pha rol po 'jigs pa skyes kyang rung /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-4: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:206a-5: sdangs bar byed pa'i ltung byed de drug cu drug pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-7: // / sbed pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:206a-9: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-10: nye ba 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-11: de dag drug sde dag la sten par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-14: khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-15: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ni gshegs so //
T08TD4104.1E:206a-17: bcu bdun sde dag phyi bzhin 'brang zhing dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:206a-18: de na lam na rdzing bu chus gang ba zhig 'dug nas drug sde dag gis /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-19: bcu bdun sde dag la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-20: bcu bdun sde dag kye ma /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-21: khyed cag dang kho bo cag lhan cig 'gran pa yin na /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-22: tshur sheg yu bu cag chu'i nang du gang yun ring du 'dug phod pa lta'o //
T08TD4104.1E:206a-24: de ltar bya'o zhes de dag thams cad chur zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-25: nye dga' chu nang nas byung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-26: bcu bdun sde dag gi gos dag sa 'bus pa zhig gi 'og tu sbas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-27: drug sde dag myur ba myur bar rdzing bu'i nang nas byung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-28: gos dag gyon nas dong ngo /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-29: bcu bdun sde dag chu'i steng du byung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-30: drug sde dag mi snang nas /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-31: de dag gis bdag cag pham par byas na mi rung ngo zhes de dag yang chu'i 'og tu zhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:206a-32: de dag las yang dag yang du chu'i steng du byung ste bltas na /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-33: drug sde dag mi snang nas /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-34: de dag da dung chu'i 'og na 'dug go snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-36: tshe dang ldan pa dag drug sde dag gis gos sbas te 'dong ngo zhes bgros pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-37: ji tsam na gos dag mi snang nas /
T08TD4104.1E:206a-39: tshe dang ldan pa dag de dag gis bdag cag tho btsams so zhes de dag rdzing bu nas byung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-1: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-2: mood gal gyi bu chen po gnyis 'khor lnga brgya dang ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-4: tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos de dag gi gos dag phyung ste de dag la byin no //
T08TD4104.1E:206b-5: de nas de dag dge slong dag gi nang du dong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-7: tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te kho bo cag la mkhan pos ma dgongs su zin na /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-8: kho bo cag gi zan bcad pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:206b-9: ci'i phyir de dag gis de rgyas par brjod pa dang dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-10: dge slong dag dge slong gi gos dag sbed par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-12: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-13: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:206b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-15: yang dge slong gang dge slong ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-18: dge tshul ma'i lhung bzed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-23: dge slong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba sbed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-25: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-28: nyon mongs pa ni tho btsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-29: nyes pa ni rab tu byung ba'i yo byad sbed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:206b-30: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-32: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:206b-36: dge tshul ma'i zhes bya ba ni dge slong 'di pa'i'o //
T08TD4104.1E:206b-37: lhung bzed ces bya ba ni lhung bzed nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:206b-38: gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po dag las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:206b-39: dra ba zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed kyi snod do //
T08TD4104.1E:206b-40: phor bu zhes bya ba ni kham phor ro //
T08TD4104.1E:206b-41: ska rags zhes bya ba ni shur bu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:206b-45: dge slong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba ni de dag las gzhan gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:206b-46: sbed dam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:206b-47: sbed du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:206b-48: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni phan par 'dod pas sbed pa de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:207a-1: ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:207a-2: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-3: dge slong gis rab tu byung ba 'di ba dbang ba'i lhung bzed dang /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-7: ska rags la sogs pa dge slong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba sbed dam ;
T08TD4104.1E:207a-9: phan par 'dod pas sbed pa ma gtogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-10: sbed pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:207a-11: 'di'i byed pa po ni tho btsams pa'i bsam pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-12: rab tu byung ba 'di pa gang yang rung ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:207a-13: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-15: rab tu byung ba 'di pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-19: phan bar 'dod pa ma gtogs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:207a-20: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:207a-21: sbed pa'i ltung byed de drug cu bdun pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-23: // / byin nas nye bar 'tsho ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:207a-25: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sngangs pas /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-26: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-27: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ni koo sh'amb'ir song ste snying la chung ngur 'dug /'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis ni dus la bab /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-28: dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni dge 'dun gyi nang na 'khod pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-29: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' rgas par gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-30: de la lhan cig gnas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-31: nye gnas 'ga' yang mi nyan pas de'i tshe gos dag dri ma can du gyur kyang des 'khru ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-32: kha bsgyur bar mi nus nas /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-33: de la blo byung ba thabs cig bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-34: des chos gos de dag lhan cig gnas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-35: nye gnas dag la bu dag / kho bo rgas pas 'di dag khyod kyi yin no zhes /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-36: la la la snam sbyar byin /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-37: la la la bla gos byin /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-38: la la la mthang gos byin /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-39: de dag gis rang gi sred pas /
T08TD4104.1E:207a-40: chos gos de dag lags par bkrus shing legs par kha bsgyur bar byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:207b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' @207b bo la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-1: kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-2: khyod cag dang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-3: chos gos kyi las dag gyis shig ces bsgo shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de skad bsgo ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-4: dge slong de dag gis chos gos de dag nye dga' la gtams te dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:207b-5: nye dags de dag spyad nas /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-7: ji tsam na dge slong de dag phyir 'ongs nas khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun glo bur du gshegs pa'i gshegs ston la spyan drangs pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-8: de dag gis chos gos de dag blangs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-9: nye dags spyad par mthong nas bzhag ste /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-10: chos gos rnying pa dag gis zhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:207b-11: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-12: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag gis chos gos dag cig gtams te bzhag ste /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-13: ci'i phyir lam gyi chos gos dag cig gyon te 'ongs /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-16: 'o na ci'i phyir de dag mi gyon /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-17: de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-18: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-19: dge slong dag dge slong la chos gos byin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-20: de'i 'og tu rdeng med par spyod par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-22: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:207b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-25: dge slong la gos byin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-26: de'i 'og tu rdeng med par spyod na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-29: nyon mongs pa ni thug thob /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-30: nyes pa na dge slong la gos byin pa rdeng drod med par spyod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:207b-31: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:207b-32: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:207b-33: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:207b-37: mthang gos gsum las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:207b-38: byin nas zhes bya ba ni blang ba med par byin nas so //
T08TD4104.1E:207b-39: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan du'o//
T08TD4104.1E:208a-0: @208a * // rdeng med par zhes bya ba ni mi blang bar ro //
T08TD4104.1E:208a-1: spyod na zhes bya ba ni gyon na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:208a-2: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:208a-3: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-4: dge slong gis dge slong la gos snam sbyar dang /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-6: mthong gos gang yang rung ba gtan byin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-7: de'i 'og tu des gnang pa'i rdeng mad par gzhi des de dga' bar mi 'gyur bar spyod na /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-8: byin nas nye bar 'tshe ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:208a-10: dge slong gi gos dag rdeng med par spyod na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:208a-11: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-13: dge slong gi yo byad gzhan ma gtogs pa'i gos nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-14: rang gis phar byin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-15: pha rol po'i rdeng med par rang gi blos nye bar 'tsho ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-16: gzhi des de dga' bar mi 'gyur bar spyod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:208a-17: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:208a-18: byin nas nye bar 'tsho ba'i ltung byed de drug cu brgyad pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-20: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-22: skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so ;
T08TD4104.1E:208a-24: / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la rdzing bu rdo rtsig can zhes bya ba'i 'gram na 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:208a-25: dge slong ma autpala'i mdog / bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'chal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-26: tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-27: tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:208a-28: de'i tshe na dge slong mdza' bo dang sa las skyes gnyis /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-29: phyag dar khrod cig rnyed cing de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dang tshe rabs tshe rabs nas rjes su 'brel pa'i khon yod pas /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-30: rtag tu klan ka tshol ba la brtson pa yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:208a-31: de gnyis phyag dar khrod kyi gos khyer te rdzing bu rdo rtsig can du 'khrur bcug nas nyi ma la bting ste 'khod do //
T08TD4104.1E:208a-33: tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyi gos kyi grva rlung gis bskyod nas /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-0: dge @208b slong ma autpa la'i mdog gi mgo la reg go //
T08TD4104.1E:208b-1: de mdza' bos mthong nas sa las skyes la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-2: sa las skyes gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog dang lhan cig lus kyis reg pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma byung gis 'dong la dge slong rnams la brjod par bya'o zhes de gnyis dong ste /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-3: dge slong rnams la de skad smras so //
T08TD4104.1E:208b-4: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-5: tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag gnyis lha dang mi rnams gcig tu yongs su btang zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-8: dud 'gro rnams su gcig tu gnas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-9: ci na dge slong dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-10: mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam par ston pa de la /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-11: khyed gnyis gzhi med pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs par byed ces zer ba de'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-12: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-14: dge slong dag khyed kyis de gnyis la ci zhig mthong /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-17: khyed gnyis ci'i phyir der son pas de mthong zhes legs par rab tu glengs shing rtogs shig / dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis legs pa rab tu glengs shing brtags pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-19: tshe dang ldan pa dag / tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-20: dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog dang lhan cig lus kyis reg pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ma byung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-21: 'di ltar bdag cag gnyis kyis che dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la 'dun pas smras /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-24: 'jigs pas smras so zhes zer nas dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag / dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pa la gzhi med par dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur ba 'debs par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-26: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-27: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:208b-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:208b-29: yang dge slong gang khros shing zhe sdang bar gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-0: dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pa la gzhi med par dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur na ltung @209a * //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-1: byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-3: gang zag ni mdza' bo dang sa las skyes gnyis /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-4: nyon mongs pa ni khon du 'dzin pa /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-5: nyes pa ni gzhi med par dge slong la dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-6: de la dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni mdza' bo dang sa las skyes sam /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-7: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-8: khros shing zhes bya ba ni 'khrugs shing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-9: zhe sdang bar gyur nas zhes bya ba ni yid mi dga' bar gyur nas de 'khrugs pa mi gsal bar ro //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-10: dge slong dag pa zhes bya ba ni tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor ram /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-11: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-12: ltung ba med pa la zhes bya ba ni gzhi de'i ltung ba med par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-13: gzhi med par zhes bya ba ni gzhi gsum po mthong ba'i gzhi dang /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-15: dogs pa'i gzhi med par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-16: dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-17: bcu gsum po gang yang rung ba ste /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-18: de ni chos ma yin pa la chos kyi sgrar gsungs pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-19: skur na zhes bya ba ni skur pa 'debs na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-20: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-21: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-22: dge slong gis skur pa 'debs par 'dod pas /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-23: dge slong la 'du shes bsgyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-24: dge 'dun lhag mas skur pa gsal ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-25: bag tsam gyis kyang brjod na skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-29: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-31: pha rol po dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-35: bag tsam gyis kyang brjod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-36: de dag las lan lag ma tshan na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-37: skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung byed de drug cu dgu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-39: // / bud med dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi gling gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:209a-40: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:209a-41: rgyal po'i khab na tha ga pa spyi cer zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa des /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-0: @209b mnyan yod pa'i tha ga pa zhig gi bu mo bag mar blangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-1: des bu mo de la yang dang yang du khu tshur dang /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-2: thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed nas /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-3: dus gzhan zhig na tha ga pa spyi cer tshong khang du chang 'thungs te /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-4: ra ro nas rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-5: des bu mo de shin brdegs te gnyid du song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-6: des tha ga pa de gnyid log par rig nas sgo dang po phye ba kho na nas byung ste bros so //
T08TD4104.1E:209b-7: dge slong zhig rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-8: mnyan yod du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'phags pa de yang sgo dang po phye ba kho na nas byung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-15: bdag kyang mnyan yod du mchi yis 'phags pa dang lhan cig 'grogs te mchi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:209b-16: de ltar gyis shig / sring mo de dge slong de dang lhan cig 'grogs te 'gro bar brtsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:209b-17: ji tsam na thag pa spyi cer ra ro ba sangs te sad pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-18: bu mo de mi snang nas des song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-19: sgo ba la dris pa dang /
