T08TD4104.1E:209b-20: kye nang rje sgo 'di nas bu mo zhig phyir byung ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-22: sgo dang po phye ba kho na nas byung ste song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:209b-23: thag pa de ra ba la 'dzegs te phyi bzhin bltas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-24: ji tsam na thag ring po kho na nas song ba mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-25: de myur ba myur bar babs te bsnyags pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-26: ci tsam na dge slong zhig dang lhan cig 'gro bar mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-28: bdag ni gcig pu yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-30: gal te de bzung na 'di gnyis log ste /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-31: bdag brdeg par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-32: ra mda' bzlog go snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-33: ri brags shig na tha ga pa lnga brgya tsam 'khod pa dag gi gan du song ste smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-34: shes ldan dag kho bo'i chung ma sh'akya'i bu'i dge slong gis phrogs kyis de la grogs gyis shig ces ra mda' bzlog tu bcug go //
T08TD4104.1E:209b-35: tha ga pa dag ni yongs su mi rtog pa yin pas de dag gis thags zangs lnga brgya tsam thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-36: ri brags nas phyir byung nas /
T08TD4104.1E:209b-37: de dag gis dge slong de shin tu brdegs te /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-1: bu dang khar ba dag kyang bcag / chos gos dag kyang dral nas shi'o snyam du bsams nas bor ro //
T08TD4104.1E:210a-2: bu mos dge slong de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-3: 'phags pa dag khyed cag gis rgyal po las gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba thob pa lags kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-4: rgyal po'i gam du bzhud de gsungs la /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-5: 'di dag gis lag pa dang rkang pa dag gcod du stsol cig / de dag skrag nas /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-6: dge slong de la bzod pa gsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-7: dge slong gi snying ni mar dang 'dra bas bzod par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:210a-9: gal te 'phags pas bzod kyang bdag gis mi bzod do ;
T08TD4104.1E:210a-10: / de dag gis bu mo de la yang bzod par gsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-12: khyed cag la ni bzod na /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-13: tha ga pa spyi cer 'di la mi bzod de /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-14: bdag gis 'di'i lag pa dang rkang pa dag gcad par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:210a-16: 'di la yang bzod par gyis shig / bu mo des smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-17: gal te phyin chad bdag la mi rdeg na de lta na bzod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:210a-18: tha ga pa des smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-21: gal te de ltar na bzod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:210a-22: dge slong de mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-23: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-24: tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so //
T08TD4104.1E:210a-26: ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-27: tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar brgyus /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-28: kho bo tha ga pa dag gis had por srog dang de'i phral lo //
T08TD4104.1E:210a-29: des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-30: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-31: khyed skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gror rung ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-32: gang gi phyir mi rung ba de nyid kyi phyir nyes dmigs 'di lta bu byung ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:210a-33: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-34: dge slong dag skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig tu 'gron lam du 'gro zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-36: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:210a-37: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-38: yang dge slong gang skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gro na /
T08TD4104.1E:210a-39: tha na grong bar du yang rung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-0: ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad @210b de ;
T08TD4104.1E:210b-2: gang zag ni dge slong chos 'di pa /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-3: nyon mongs pa ni shes bzhin ma yin pa /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-4: nyes pa ni skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gro ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:210b-5: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-6: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:210b-7: skyes pa med par zhes bya ba ni de dang de'o //
T08TD4104.1E:210b-8: bud med dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-9: bud med dam gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa dang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:210b-10: 'gron lam du 'gron zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-12: tha na grong bar du yang rung ste zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-13: tha na rgyang grags kyi bar du yang rung ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:210b-14: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:210b-15: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-16: dge slong skyes pa gzhan med par mi'i 'gro ba pa'i bud med dam gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa rang gi bsel byed pa dang lam du 'jug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-17: mi nus pa 'khrig pa ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-18: lhan cig 'dod pas lam du 'gro na /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-19: rgyang grags re re'i mthar bud med dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:210b-21: mi'i 'gro ba pa'i bud med dam gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-22: lam rgyang grags kyi mtha' nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:210b-23: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-24: mi'i 'gro ba pa'i bud med dam /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-25: gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-26: rang dkar 'dod pas lam du 'gro ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-29: mi nus pa khrid pa ma gtogs pa nyid dam /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-30: rig pa'i skyes pa ma gtogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-31: lam rgyang grags kyi mtha' las 'das pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:210b-32: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:210b-33: bud med dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-36: rku dang nyi shu ma lon dang //
T08TD4104.1E:210b-37: rko dang mgron dang bslab pa dang //
T08TD4104.1E:210b-39: mi gus chang 'thung dus min pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:210b-41: bcu pa brgyad pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-42: sdom la zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don dang /
T08TD4104.1E:210b-43: dgos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:211a-1: pa 'dis kyang ltung byed kyi chos bcu bstan te /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-2: rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-3: lo nyi shu ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-5: mgron du gnyer ba las ring du 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-6: bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa spong pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-7: nyan rna las gyur pa dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:211a-11: dus ma yin par 'gro ba'i ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:211a-12: de la rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:211a-14: dge slong zhig rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas su gnas par khas blangs so //
T08TD4104.1E:211a-15: de nas dge slong de dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-16: chos gos byas pa dang ldan /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-17: chos gos zin pa dang ldan zhing lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal du 'phags nas mnyan yong du 'gro ba'i don mthun pa btsal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-19: des tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-24: kho bo yang khyed dang lhan cig mnyan yod du 'gro'o zhes de dag dang lhan cig 'phags so //
T08TD4104.1E:211a-25: ji tsam na ri brags shig tu sho gam gyi gnas su phyin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-26: tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba de dag sho gam gcod pa de dag gis 'jigs pas lam gol ba nas 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-27: dge slong de yang mdun du song ngo ;
T08TD4104.1E:211a-28: / de dag sho gam gcod pa dag gis mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-30: kva ye tshong ba sho gam 'dral ba dag gar 'dong /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-31: de dag gis dge slong de mdun du 'gro ba mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-33: shes ldan dag tshong ba sho gam 'dral pa 'di dag gis ma nyes kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:211a-34: sh'akya'i bu'i dge slong mdun du 'gro ba'i 'dis nyes kyis 'di gsad par bya'o zhes de dag gis dge slong de shin tu brdegs te lhung bzed kyang bcag / phor bu dang khar ba dag kyang bcag / chos gos dag kyang dral te shi'o snyam nas bor ro //
T08TD4104.1E:211a-35: tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba de dag gis dge slong de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-0: 'phags pa @211b khyed kyis rgyal po las gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba thob pa lags kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-1: rgyal po'i gan du bzhud de gsungs la /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-2: sho gam pa 'di dag gi lag pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-3: rkang pa dag gcod du stsol cig / de dag skrag nas /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-4: dge slong de la bzod par gsol pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-5: dge slong gi snying ni mar dang 'dra bas des bzod par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:211b-6: sho gam 'dral ba dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-7: gal te 'phags pas bzod kyang bdag cag gis mi bzod do //
T08TD4104.1E:211b-8: de dag gis sho gam 'dral ba de dag la yang bzod par gsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-9: sho gam 'dral ba de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-10: gal te khyed sho gam ji snyed pa dag gis kho bo cag tshong pa ji snyed pa dag sho gam 'jal du mi 'jug na kho bo cag gis kyang bzod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:211b-11: sho gam pa de dag gis tshong pa de dag la gnang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:211b-12: dge slong de mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-13: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-14: tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so //
T08TD4104.1E:211b-16: ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-17: tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar brgyus /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-18: kho bo sho gam pa dag gis had por srog dang de'u phral lo //
T08TD4104.1E:211b-19: ci'i phyir des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-20: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-21: khyod don mthun rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gror rung ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-22: gang gi phyir mi rung ba de nyid kyi phyir nyes dmigs 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur to zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-23: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag / don mthun rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gro zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-25: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:211b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-27: yang dge slong don mthun rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gro na /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-28: grong bar du yang rung ste ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-30: gang zag ni dge slong chos 'di pa zhig /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-31: nyon mongs pa ni shes bzhin ma yin pa /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-32: nyes pa ni don mthun rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gro ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:211b-33: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:211b-34: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:212a-0: don mthun rkun ma dang lhan @212a * //
T08TD4104.1E:212a-2: rkun ma zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-3: chom rkun pa grong 'joms par byed pa dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-4: tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:212a-5: 'gron lam du 'gro na zhes bya ba ni dgon pa'i lam du 'gro na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:212a-6: tha na grong bar du yang du rung ste zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-7: tha na rgyang grags kyi bar du yang rung ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:212a-8: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-11: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-14: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-15: dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-16: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:212a-17: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnams par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-18: dge slong grong 'joms pa'i chom rkun pa dag gam /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-19: sho gam 'dral ba'i tshong pa rang gi bsel byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-21: mi nus pa khrid pa ma gtogs pa dang lhan cig 'dod pas lam du 'gro na /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-22: rgyang grags re re'i mthar rkun ma dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-23: lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:212a-25: mi'i 'gro ba pa grong 'joms pa'i chom rkun pa dag gam /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-26: sho gam 'dral ba'i tshong pa dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-27: lam rgyang grags kyi mtha' nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:212a-28: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-30: grong 'joms par byed pa'i chom rkun pa dag gam /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-31: sho gam 'dral ba'i tshong pa dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-32: rang dgar 'dod pas lam du 'gro ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-35: mi nus pa khrid pa ma gtogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-37: rku thabs su rab tu byung ba dag ma gtogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-38: lam rgyang grags kyi mtha' las 'das pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:212a-39: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:212a-40: rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu gcig pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-42: // / lo nyi shu ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:212a-43: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:212b-0: gang @212b gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos nye ba 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu phyung zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-1: bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-2: de dag mtshan mo'i tho rangs kyi dus kyi tshe bkres pa'i nyam chung bas yongs su gzir nas du'o//
T08TD4104.1E:212b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gsan nas /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-4: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos skabs de rgyas par gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:212b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-7: kun dga' bo dge slong dag gang zag lo nyi shu ma lon pa /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-8: dge slong gi dngos po bsnyen par rdzogs par byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-10: kun dga' bo gang zag lo nyi shu ma lon pas ni grang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-18: sdig sbrul dag gis reg pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-19: gzhan las tshig gi lam ngan pa smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-21: lus kyi tshor ba sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-22: tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog par byed pa byung ngo cog dag mi bzod cing zag pa dag la ji mi snyam par bya ba yang mi bzod cing dang du len mi nus pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T08TD4104.1E:212b-23: gang zag lo nyi shu lon pa ni de las bzlog pa yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:212b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-25: yang dge slong gang gang zag lo nyi shu ma lon pa /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-26: dge slong gi dngos por bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:212b-27: gang zag de yang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi 'gyur la /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-28: dge slong de dag kyang smad par 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-29: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-31: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi pu chen po //
T08TD4104.1E:212b-32: nyon mongs pa ni bag chags ma byang bas so sor ma brtags pa /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-33: nyes pa ni gang zag lo nyi shu ma lon pa dge slong gi dngos por bsnyen par rdzogs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:212b-34: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:212b-35: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:212b-36: gang zag ces bya ba ni dge slong du bya ba gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:212b-37: lo nyi shu ma lon pa zhes bya ba ni lo nyi shu ma lon pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:213a-0: dge slong gi dngos por bsnyen par rdzogs par @213a * //
T08TD4104.1E:213a-1: byed na zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:213a-2: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:213a-3: gang zag de yang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni gang zag gang yin pa de'o //
T08TD4104.1E:213a-4: dge slong de dag kyang smad par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang 'khod pa de dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:213a-5: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de la /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-6: de ni nges pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:213a-7: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-8: dge slong gis gang zag dge slong gi dngos por bsnyen par rdzogs par byan lo nyi shu nyid kyang ma lon la /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-9: dge slong gis de ltar shes bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-10: mkhan po nyid kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na lo nyi shu ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i ltung byed gyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:213a-12: bsnyen par bya ba lo nyi shu ma lon pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:213a-13: 'di la yan lag bzhis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-14: bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba de'i dus na /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-15: lo nyi shu ma lon pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-17: mkhan po nyid byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-18: dge slong gi dngos por bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:213a-19: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:213a-20: lo nyi shu ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i ltung byed de bdun cu gnyis pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-22: // / sa rko ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:213a-24: de'i tshe na drug sde dag rang gi lag gis sa rko bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-30: gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag / sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni rang gi lag gis sa rko bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-32: rnang sgal spyur bar byed spyur du 'jud par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-35: bram ze dang khyim bdag dag kyang de ltar byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:213a-36: shes ldan dag sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dge dang /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-0: bram @213b ze dang khyim bdag dgal bye brag ni ci yod /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-2: tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-3: su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-4: bya bar sems zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-6: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-7: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:213b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-9: yang dge slong gang rang gi lag gis sa rko'am /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-10: rkor 'jud na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-13: nyon mongs pa ni dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-14: nyes pa ni sa rko ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:213b-15: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-16: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:213b-17: rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-19: sa zhes bya ba ni sa gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-21: rang bzhin can ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:213b-22: rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-23: char chu zhod na zla ba gsum gyis sa 'thas par 'gyur ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:213b-24: char chu ma zhod na zla ba drug gis sa 'thas par 'gyur ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:213b-25: rang bzhin can ma yin pa ni de las gzhan pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:213b-26: sa rko 'am zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:213b-27: rkor 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:213b-28: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:213b-29: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-30: dge slong lag gi blas rgyu skar gyi sbyor bas rung bar byed pa med na thur ma sor bzhi tsam 'dzugs pa ma gtogs par sa tshig pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-34: bye ma la sogs pa ma gtogs pa sa'i rang bzhin can 'thas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-37: 'dus pa dag la sa'i shas che ba la sogs pa dag la de ltar 'du shes pas /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-40: lan re btab pa'i sbyor ba re re las rko ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:213b-42: sa'i sa rang bzhin can 'thas pa nyid la sogs pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-43: 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:213b-44: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:213b-45: dge slong lag gi blas rgyu skar gyi sbyor bas rung bar byed pa med na /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-0: thur ma sor bzhi tsam 'dzugs pa ma gtogs @214a * //
T08TD4104.1E:214a-2: sa'i rang bzhin can 'thas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-7: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:214a-8: sa rko ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu gsum pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-11: // / mgron du gnyer ba las ring du 'dug pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya rnams kyi nang na ljongs rgyu zheng gzhegs pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-13: ser skya'i gnas su byon nas ser skya'i gnas na n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:214a-14: sh'akya ming chen gyis de thos nas bsams pa ;
T08TD4104.1E:214a-15: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-16: lan mang du gdugs chod la khyim gzhan du spyan drangs te /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-18: lan 'ga' yang yo byad thams cad kyis spyan ma drangs kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-19: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba bzhir yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drang ngo snyam mo //
T08TD4104.1E:214a-20: de nas sh'akya ming chen bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:214a-22: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya ming chen la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-23: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-24: yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-25: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
T08TD4104.1E:214a-26: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-27: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-28: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:214a-29: de nas sh'akya ming chen stan las langs te /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-30: bcom ldan 'das gal de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-31: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:214a-32: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dgung zla bzhir bdag gi na bza' dang /
T08TD4104.1E:214a-36: sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis sh'akya ming chen @214b la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:214b-1: de nas sh'akya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas des bsnyung bar rung ba'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug cing bsnyung ba'i sman yang 'jog tu bcug / bde ba'i sman dus su rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-4: thun tshod du rung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-6: 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-11: 'bras bu'i sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug / zhun mar bskol du bcug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-12: ma bskol ba dag kyang 'jog tu bcug /'bru mar bskol ba dang ma bskol ba dag kyang 'jog tu bcug / bdag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-14: ra bzhon dag kyang 'jog tu bcug / yo byad thams cad kyang 'jog tu bcug / sman dang snyun g-yog dag kyang 'jog tu bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-15: dge slong dag la yang yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs so //
T08TD4104.1E:214b-16: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-17: dga' bo nye dga' bca' ba dang bza' ba 'di lta bu rnyed kyis thabs shig bya'o zhes de dag gis sman pa la dris pa /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-18: bzhin bzangs dag kho bo cag la nad ci yod pa je ltos shig / sman pas bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-19: 'di dag ni dge sbyong hral po dag yin pas bza' 'dod kyis 'di dag dang mthun par smra bar bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-20: des de dag la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-21: 'phags pa dag khyed cag ni shul gyis 'du ba pa dag lags pas je skur snum bag gsol la /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-22: de'i 'og tu bska ba gsol cig / de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-23: dga' bo nye dga' 'di ni sman pa chen po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-25: thabs la mkhas pa rgyal po la mkho bo yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-26: gal te bdag cag thams cad kyis dus gcig tu de ltar bya bar brtsams na /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-28: je dang por gnyis kyis snum bag bsten cing /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-30: de'i 'og tu yang gnyis kyis snum bag bsten cing /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-32: de'i 'og tu yang gnyis kyis snum bag bsten cing bzhis nad g-yog bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:214b-33: de ltar bya'o zhes de dag las gnyis kyis snum bag bsten par brtsams shing /
T08TD4104.1E:214b-34: bzhis nad g-yog byed pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-0: @215a * // ji tsam na zla ba gcig 'das so //
T08TD4104.1E:215a-1: de'i 'og tu gzhan gnyis kyis snum bag bsten par brtsams shing bzhis nad g-yog byed pa ni zla ba gnyis 'das so //
T08TD4104.1E:215a-2: de'i 'og tu yang gzhan gnyis kyis snum bag bsten par brtsams shing bzhis nad g-yog byed pa na zla ba gsum 'das so //
T08TD4104.1E:215a-3: zla ba bzhi pa la thams cad 'dus te /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-4: bza' bar brtsams nas zla ba bzhi 'das pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-5: sh'akya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das gshegs ston la spyan drangs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-6: nye dgas phyag tshang la phrin spring ste /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-7: bzhin bzangs deng kho bo la khu sha dang /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-9: sha tshod dag gyis shig ces spring ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:215a-11: 'phags pa dag dgung zla bzhi 'das te sh'akya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das gshegs ston la spyan drangs na /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-12: khyed kyi bya ba da dung yang ma rdzogs sam /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-14: bkren sh'akya ming chen kha shin du chen pos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba bzhir yo byad thams cad kyis spyan 'dren na /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-15: gal te spyan drang pa 'di lta bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drang du rung na ni /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-16: nye dags kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ji srid 'tsho'i bar du spyan 'dren par spro'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215a-17: des smras pa khyed cag zla ba bzhir sha dang khu ba sha dang khu ba sha stag zos par gyur kyang /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-18: 'on kyang khyed cag smod par byed na /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-19: gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag gis zla ba bzhir aa ru ra 'brum bu gcig kyang ma gsol ba de dag ni shin du dka' ba byed pa yin no zhes zer nas ;
T08TD4104.1E:215a-20: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag ha cang slong bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-22: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-23: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-26: dge slong gis ha cang slong bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215a-27: ha cang slong na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:215a-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:215a-29: dge slong gis zla ba bzhir mgron du bso pa bdag gir bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215a-30: de las lhag par bdag gir byed na de ni ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-0: so sor mgron du bos pa @215b dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:215b-1: yang dang yang mgron du bos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-2: dus kyis mgron du bos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-3: rtag du mgron du bos pa ni ma gtags te /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-4: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-8: nyes pa ni mgron du bos pa'i zas la ha cang slong ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-9: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-10: zla ba bzhir zhes bya ba ni zla ba bzhi tshun chad du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-11: mgron du bos pa bzhes bya ba ni bstabs pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-12: bdag gir bya'o zhes bya ba ni khas blangs par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-13: de las lhag par bdag gir byed na zhes bya ba ni de las 'das par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-14: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-15: so sor mgron du bos pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-16: dge slong so so so sor tha dad pas mgron du bos pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-17: yang dang yang du mgron du bos pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-18: dge slong yang dang yang du mgron du bos pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-19: dus kyis mgron du bos pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-20: dge slong nan gyis mgron du bos pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-21: rtag tu mgron du bos pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-22: dge slong gtan du mgron du bos pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-23: ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-24: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de la de ni gnang ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-25: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-26: dge slong min pas sbyin bdag nye du ma yin pas so sor mgron du bos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-27: yang dang yang du mgron du bos pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-28: dus kyis mgron du bos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-29: rtag tu mgron du bos pa ma gtogs pas /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-30: dus kyi tshigs rnam par gzhag pa med par mgron du gnyer ba dang ldan pa'i sbyin bdag las phyis rnam pa gzhan nam yang dang yang du'am /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-31: dus kyis mgron du gnyer ba ma byas par zla ba bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'og tu /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-32: sngar bshams pa'i zas bzang ngan gang yang rung blangs te zos na /
T08TD4104.1E:215b-33: mgron du gnyer ba las ring du 'dug pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:215b-36: sbyin bdag nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-2: dge slong min ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-3: sbyin bdag nye du ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-4: dus ma gtogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-5: sngar mgron du bos pa las bslangs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-7: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:216a-8: mgron du gnyer ba las ring du 'dug pa'i ltung byed de bdun cu bzhi pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-10: // / bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa spong ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:216a-12: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thun mong bca' bar mdzad pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-13: gnyi ga'i dge 'dun sdud par mdzad pas 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thun mong bca' ba mdzad pa yin na /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-14: 'di la gnyi ga'i dge 'dun bsdu bar mdzad pas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-15: kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-16: dge slong zhig dge slong ma rnams gyi nang du thong la /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-17: 'di skad ces sring mo dag / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thun mong 'di ltar bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-18: dge slong gis zla ba bzhir mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:216a-19: de dag las lhag par bdag gir byed na ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:216a-20: so sor mgron du bos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-21: yang dang yang du mgron du bos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-22: dus kyis mgron du bos pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-23: rtag tu mgron du bos pa ni ma gtogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-24: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad kyi /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-25: khyed kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bsgo shig ces gyis shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin du 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-26: tshe dang ldan pa lam pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-27: tshe dang ldan pa la ma pa la de skad ces bsgo'o //
T08TD4104.1E:216a-28: tshe dang ldan pa lam pas btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i tshig mnyan nas /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-29: dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ga la ba der song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216a-30: ji tsam na drug sde dag gis de mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-1: tshe dang ldan pa lam pa khyod gar 'gro //
T08TD4104.1E:216b-2: tshe dang ldan pa lam pas bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-3: 'di dag gis kyang ma thos pa 'dras 'di dag la yang brjod par bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-4: des de dag la yang de skad bsgo ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-6: bdag cag dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-8: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la 'dri'i bar du /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-12: mi mkhas pa khyod kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes de dag gis byis pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-15: mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba dag gis khur bslang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:216b-16: tshe dang ldan pa lam pa de nas song ste 'gro ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-17: dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag gis mthong nas de dag gis de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-18: btsun pa lam pa gar bzhud /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-19: des de dag la sring mo dag shes par gyis shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thun mong 'di ltar bca' ba mdzad de zhes bslab ba'i gzhi rgyas par brjod de /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-20: khyed kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-22: bdag cag dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-24: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la 'dri ba'i bar du /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-28: mi mkhas pa khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes byis pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-31: mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba dag gis khur bslang ste dong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:216b-32: tshe dang ldan pa lam pas bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-33: bdag la gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa 'di dag la brjod pas ci bya /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-34: da ni song la skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'i ma gtogs pa gzhan 'gal la yang brjod par mi bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-35: de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'i ga la bder song ste phyin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-36: skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'i la 'di skad ces smras so //
T08TD4104.1E:216b-37: goo ta m'i shes par gyis shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thun mong 'di ltar bca' ba mdzad de zhes bslab pa'i gzhi de rgyas par brjod do //
T08TD4104.1E:216b-38: khyed kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bsgo pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:216b-39: skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'is smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-1: 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad pa gang lags pa de /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-5: tshe dang ldan pa lam pas bsgo ste phyir 'ongs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-6: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-8: tshe dang ldan pa lam pa khyed kyis dge slong ma rnams la bsgo'am /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-14: mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba bdag gis khur bslang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:217a-18: des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-19: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bsgo ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-21: bdag cag dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-23: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la 'dri ba'i bar du /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-27: mi mkhas pa khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes zer zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-29: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-30: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:217a-31: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-32: yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-33: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bsgo ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-35: bdag dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-37: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la 'dri ba'i bar du /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-41: khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob po zhes zer na ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:217a-42: dge slong kun shes pa 'dod pas kyang bslab pa de la bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:217a-43: dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-45: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la yang dri bar bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-46: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-49: nyon mongs pa ni bka' dang bslab pa la ma gus pa /
T08TD4104.1E:217a-50: nyes pa ni bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa spong ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:217a-51: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-0: gzhan yang de lta bu gang @217b yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:217b-1: dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:217b-2: tshe dang ldan pa khyed kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni bslab pa gang yin pa de la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:217b-3: de dag zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-5: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'di skad zer na'o /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-6: dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde mtha' dag 'dzin pa gang yin pa rnams so //
T08TD4104.1E:217b-7: 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba mtha' dag 'dzin pa gang yin pa rnams so //
T08TD4104.1E:217b-8: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la 'dri ba'i bar du zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-9: ma mo mtha' dag 'dzin pa gang yin pa rnams so//
T08TD4104.1E:217b-10: byis pa zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-11: byis pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-12: nyes par bsam pa sems pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-13: nyes par smra ba brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-14: nyes par bya ba'i las byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:217b-15: rmongs pa zhes bya ba la rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-16: 'dul ba 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-17: ma mo 'dzin pa ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:217b-18: mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-19: mdo sde mi gsal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-22: mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-23: mdo sde la mi mkhas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-24: 'dul ba la mi mkhas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-25: ma mo la mi mkhas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:217b-26: khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes bya ba ni de skad ces zer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:217b-27: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:217b-28: dge slong kun shes par 'dod pas kyang bslab pa de la bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:217b-29: dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-31: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la yang dri bar bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-32: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de la de ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:217b-33: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-34: dge slong ltung ba 'byin pa pos rang nyid bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa'i sde snod gsum las /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-37: ma mo las 'dul ba'i char gtogs pa'i bslab pa mngon par shes pa nyid kyi smra ba po byis pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:217b-40: mi mkhas pa ma yin pas khyed kyis 'dul bar gtogs pa'i bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes brjod pa na 'am bsgo ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-1: dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-3: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la 'dri ba'i bar du mi slob bo zhes rgyu'i dngos po des go bar byed pa'i dge slong 'dul ba dang ldan pa'i bslab pa'i yul la mngon par shes pa nyid dang ldan pa de la byis pa /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-7: khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob po zhes mi shes pa nyid sgrogs par byed pa'i tshig de skad brjod na /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-8: bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa spong ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:218a-10: bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa smra ba po'i dge slong 'dul ba dang ldan pa'i bslab pa'i yul la mngon par shes pa /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-14: mi mkhas pa ma yin pa nyid la /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-15: 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:218a-16: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-17: bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa'i dge slong smra ba po 'dul ba dang ldan pa'i bslab pa'i yul /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-18: mngon par shes pa byis pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-21: mi mkhas pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-22: ltung ba 'byin pa pos de ltar rab tu 'du shes pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-23: 'dul ba dang ldan pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes brjod dam bsgo ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-24: mi slob pa'i rgyu'i dngos po //
T08TD4104.1E:218a-25: dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-27: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la 'dri ba'i bar du zhes zer ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-28: go bar byed pa la byis pa /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-31: mi mkhas pa khyod kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes mi shes pa nyid sgrogs par byed pa'i tshig brjod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:218a-32: de dag las yan lag mtshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:218a-33: bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa spong ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu lnga pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-35: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-37: nyan rna las gyur ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:218a-38: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:218a-39: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-0: tshe dang @218b ldan pa 'dun pa ni koo sh'amb'ir song ste snying las chur ngur 'dug /'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis ni dus la bab /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-1: dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug pa de'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-2: bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag gdug cing pha rol gnon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-7: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag yun ring po nas drug sde dag gis tho btsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-8: ji ltar dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis tho btsams pa ltar yang gzhan gyis tho ma btsams la /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-9: ji ltar nye dags tho btsams pa ltar yang dga' bos ma btsams kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-10: de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:218b-12: 'di'i phu bo dga' bo rtsod pa la mkhas pa yin gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-13: tshur sheg je gros bya'o zhes de dag dpong sa'i khang par zhugs te /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-14: sgo bcad nas gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-15: nye dags skar khung nas mnyan cing /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-17: kye ma bcu bdun sde dag ci'i phyir gros byed kho bo'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-18: la la ni snying las chung ngu kho nar 'dug //
T08TD4104.1E:218b-19: kha cig ni dus la bab /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-20: da 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o snyam du sems sam ci /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-21: khyed kyis da kho bo cag zil gyis mnan te 'khod snyam mam /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-22: kho bo cag gis kyang khyed la mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:218b-24: glang po'i thag pa nyi ma dang //
T08TD4104.1E:218b-25: rlung gis yongs su bskams gyur cing //
T08TD4104.1E:218b-26: glang po'i gnya' nas lhung gyur kyang //
T08TD4104.1E:218b-27: lug ni lnga brgyas drang bar bya //
T08TD4104.1E:218b-28: zhes bya ba ma thos sam zhes bsdigs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-30: 'dis bdag cag gros byed pa 'phrigs kyis gzhan du 'dong ngo zhes de dag me khang du zhugs te gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-31: nye dga' yang der 'jab cing 'ongs te nyan cing nges der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so //
T08TD4104.1E:218b-39: sban spun dag gi nang dgon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-40: tshang tshing dag gi nang dang /
T08TD4104.1E:218b-41: lam na 'dong zhing gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-2: nyan cing de dag kyang de bzhin du bsdigs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-4: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya bar mi nus kyis 'di la bzod pa gsol bar bya'o zhes de dag gis de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-5: btsun pa nye dga' bdag cag la bzod par mdzod cig / nye dags smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-7: de dag gis de la dris pa /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-8: khyed kyis kho bo cag gros byed pa ji ltar shes /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-9: nye dags skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-11: khyod nyan rnar 'dug tu rung ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-13: gal te kho bo khyed cag gros byed pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-14: nyan rnas 'dug par ma gyur du zin na /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-15: khyed cag gis kho bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed par 'gyur gyis zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-16: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-17: dge slong dag dge slong rnams 'thab par gyur /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-20: rtsod par gyur cing 'khod pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-21: dge slong 'di dag ji skad zer ba de bdag gis mnyan te /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-22: de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad gdags par bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-23: cang mi smra bar nyan rnas 'dug par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-25: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:219a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-27: yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams 'thab par gyur /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-30: rtsod par gyur cing 'khod pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-31: dge slong 'di dag ji skad zer ba de bdag gis mnyan te /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-32: de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad gdags par bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-33: cang mi smra bar nyan rnas 'dug na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-36: nyon mongs pa ni sha gla na pa'i bsam pa /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-37: nyes pa ni rtsod pa skrod pa'i gros la nyan rna byed pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:219a-38: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:219a-40: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:219a-41: dge slong rnams zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams so //
T08TD4104.1E:219b-0: rtsod par gyur @219b cing 'khod pa la zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-1: phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:219b-2: dge slong 'di dag ji skad zer ba de bdag gis mnyan te /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-3: de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad gdags par bya'o snyam pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-4: de lta bu'i bsam pas gnyen pos de lta de ltar pha rol mnan par bya'o snyam pa'o ;
T08TD4104.1E:219b-5: / de nyid rkyen du byas te zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'i //
T08TD4104.1E:219b-6: cang mi smra bar nyan rnas 'dug na zhes bya ba ni cang mi smra bar rna gtad pas 'dug na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:219b-7: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:219b-8: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-9: dge slong gis dge slong dag rtsod par gyur pa /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-10: dge slong dag gros byed pa na nye bar zhi ba 'dod pa ma gtogs par 'khrug long bya ba la gzhol bas /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-11: mnyan pa'i phyir rna gtod cing sgra'i don go ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-12: lam nor tam zhi bar 'dod pa ma gtogs pa don gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyis son cing shes pa'i 'og tu rkang pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-14: lud pa'i sgra dag gis go bar mi byed mnyan rna las gyur pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:219b-16: dge slong dag rtsod pa'i gros dang /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-17: 'khrug long bya ba la gzhol ba'i bsam pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-18: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-19: phyogs gnyi ga dge slong nyid yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-20: rtsod pa gang yang rung ba'i gros byed pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-21: 'khrug long bya ba la gzhol ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-23: sgra dang bcas pa'i don go ba nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:219b-24: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:219b-25: nyan rna las gyur ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu drug pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-27: // / mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-28: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:219b-29: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa mngon du byas /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-30: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ni koo sh'mb'ir song ste nying las chung ngur 'dug /'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis ni dus la bab /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-31: dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni dge 'dun gyi nang 'dug pa de'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:219b-32: bcu bdun sde dag gdug cing pha rol gnon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-4: tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag yun ring po nas /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-5: drug sde dag gis tho btsams te /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-6: ji ltar dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis tho btsams pa ltar yang gzhan gyis ma btsams la /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-7: ji ltar nye dgas tho btsams pa ltar yang dga' bos ma btsams kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-8: de gnas nas 'byung ba'i las bya'o / de nas kha cig gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-9: 'di'i phu bo rtsod pa la mkhas pa yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-10: bdag cag gis 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya bar mi nus so //
T08TD4104.1E:220a-12: gcig smra ba na gnyis kyis mnyan par mi bya bar tshogs smra na /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-13: tshogs ni rgyal po dang 'dra bas /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-14: gal te cung zad smra bar gyur na /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-15: de'i tshe gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o zhes de dag gis gnas mal bshams nas /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-16: gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-17: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-18: gleng ba po rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-19: btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag gi lto dral te /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-20: rgyu ma dag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i tshig smras pa gang yin pa de dran nam /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-22: tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni don 'das pa yin na /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-23: rma sos pa glengs te ci bya /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-25: bcom ldan 'das ni 'das pa'i don kho na la brten te 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar mdzad do //
T08TD4104.1E:220a-26: dga' bos phyir bzlog par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-28: gang gcig phyir zlog par byed pa de yang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:220a-30: 'di dag gi byed stangs las na /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-31: bdag la yang gnas nas 'byin pa'i las byed par gyur na ma legs par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-32: de dgun gyi dus la bab pas /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-33: la ba zhig gyon te 'ongs pas /
T08TD4104.1E:220a-34: des la bde rtsig drung du slang ste bzhag nas cang mi smra bar langs te song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:220a-36: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod pa smros shig ces de dag gis gya tshom du nye dga' gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:220b-0: de gnas nas dbyung ba'i @220b las byas pa na ngu zhing phu bo'i gan du song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-3: lhung bzed nag po can dag gis bdag gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:220b-5: gang dag gis kho bo'i nu bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa de dag / grong dang /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-7: khams gsum nas gnas nas dbyung bar gyur cig /'on kyang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa dag / grong dang /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-9: sdod la phyis bzod par gsol cig /'di ltar de dag gis mi mthun pa kho nar las byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:220b-13: bdag gis de na rgan pa'i mtha' logs na slob dpon gyi sgra thos so //
T08TD4104.1E:220b-14: dga' bos bdag nyid ji ltar cang mi smra bar stan las langs te song ba'i skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-15: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-16: dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa 'byung ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-17: cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-19: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:220b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-21: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-22: cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro zhing dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-23: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-26: nyon mongs pa ni las mi mthun par 'dod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-28: dge 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-29: cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:220b-30: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-32: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:220b-33: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:220b-35: chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung ba na zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:220b-37: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byung ba na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:221a-0: cang mi smra bar stan las langs @221a * //
T08TD4104.1E:221a-1: te 'gro zhing zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das te 'gro zhing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:221a-2: dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na zhes bya ba ni de ni dge slong gang 'dug pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:221a-3: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni gleng gzhi las dge slong 'dug pa la smra bar byed pa de srid du de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig par gyur pa de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:221a-4: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:221a-5: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-8: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bdag nyid gso spyong dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-9: dgag dbye la sogs pa las brgya rtsa gcig chos dang ldan pa nyid du byed pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-10: dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dus pa brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-11: dge slong gcig la ma smras par 'gro na /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-12: thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das na mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:221a-14: dge 'dun gyi gsol ba la sogs pa'i las chos dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-15: dge slong 'khod pa la ma smras pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-16: brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:221a-17: 'di la yan lag drug gis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-18: dge 'dun gyi gsol ba la sogs pa'i las chos dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-19: bdag nyid lus kyis der 'dus pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-20: dge slong 'khod pa la ma smras pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-21: brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba nyid dang //
T08TD4104.1E:221a-22: thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'da' bar 'dod pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-23: thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:221a-24: de dag las yan lag ma tshangs na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:221a-25: mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu bdun pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-27: // / ma gus pa'i tshul gyi ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-28: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:221a-29: de'i tshe glang chen snying po'i bu dge slong nag po glang chen lhas zhes bya ba /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-30: dge slong rab tu mang po dag 'di lta ste 'di ni chos so //
T08TD4104.1E:221a-32: 'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa'o zhes rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-33: dngos sa'i khang par 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:221a-34: gcig pus dge 'dun zlog par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-0: gcig pus @221b dge 'dun mi mthun par byed cing rtsod pa bzung ste rtsod cing 'dug la /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-1: gtam gyi mjug sdod par mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-3: rje sar mi byed cing phyir smra par bya'o snyam du sems nas /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-4: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong rab tu mang po dag 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-7: 'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa'o zhes rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir dngos sa'i khang par 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-8: gcig pus dge 'dun zlog par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-9: gcig pus dge 'dun mi mthun par byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-12: gtam gyis mjug sdod par mi byed ;
T08TD4104.1E:221b-14: rje sar mi byed cing phyir smra bar bya'o snyam du sems zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-16: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-17: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:221b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du gus par mi byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-20: gang zag ni dge slong nag po glang chen lhas /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-21: nyon mongs pa ni nga rgyal gyi kun du sbyor ba /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-22: nyes pa ni dge 'dun dang gang zag la ma gus pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:221b-23: de la gus par mi byed na zhes bya ba ni gnyis la gus par mi byed na ste /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-25: de la dge 'dun ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-27: gang zag ni mkhan po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-29: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:221b-30: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-31: dge slong sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-32: dge 'dun gyi tha snyad pa'i tshig las 'gal bar byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-33: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis dug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-36: gtsug lag khang len pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-37: smra ba la sogs pa chos dang ldan pa nyid kyis bsgo ba'i don lam gus par chos dang ldan par shad kyis sbyang ba med par de las bzlog ste gal bar byed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-38: gzhan dag chos dang ldan pa gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa'i bar du /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-39: glo bur du gtam zer na /
T08TD4104.1E:221b-40: ma gus pa'i tshul gyis ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:222a-2: dge 'dun gyi tha snyad pa'i tshig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-3: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis chos dang ldan pa nyid du bsgo ba'i don dang /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-4: gzhan dag chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:222a-5: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-7: dge 'dun gyi tha snyad pa'i tshig gam /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-8: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bsgo ba'i don gyi gtam dag las gang yang rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-9: chos dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-10: ma gus pas chos dang ldan par shad kyis sbyang ba med pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-11: log thabs kyi bsam pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-13: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:222a-14: ma gus pa'i tshul gyi ltung byed de bdun cu brgyad pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-16: // / myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:222a-18: yul ngan spong gi phu zhes bya ba na chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ril khyim bdag rtogs ldan zhes bya ba /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-22: yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-23: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-24: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor la 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-25: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-26: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-28: dga' ma gur spyod par byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:222a-29: de la bu mo gzugs bzang ba /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-31: mdzes pa zhig btsas nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis dpal gyi 'byor pas bu'i chung mar blangs so //
T08TD4104.1E:222a-32: khyim bdag rtogs ldan de yang rtse bar byed /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-34: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa'i chung ma la sems can srid pa tham pa zhig zhugs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-35: de btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung nas /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-36: de'i ming legs 'ongs zhes bya bar btags so //
T08TD4104.1E:222a-37: khye'u legs 'ongs de khad kyis mnyan yod du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas /
T08TD4104.1E:222a-38: bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-0: de la gdams ngag stsal te des gcig @222b pu dben pa bag yod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-2: bdag nyid gtang bar gnas pa na dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:222b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-4: yul ngan spong gi phu dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-5: chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ring byon nas /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-6: chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi tshal ri dags kyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-7: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-8: klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa zhes bya ba 'dug pa yun ring po nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la gnas pa'i skye bo kho na med pa rnams la khon du 'dzin pa /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-9: mi 'gran pa rnams la 'gran tshol ba /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-10: mi 'khu ba rnams la 'khu bar byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-11: lo thog skyes so cog ma rung bar byed pa de btul nas /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-12: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa slar ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-13: mthar gyis mnyan yod du byon nas /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-14: mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-15: mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:222b-16: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa gzhan ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas der gshegs so//
T08TD4104.1E:222b-17: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs ni chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi chung po grogs bram ze sbrul khas bsdigs pa zhig 'dug pa de /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-18: klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa'i 'jigs pas bros te /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-19: mnyan yod du song ba kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis glang po che'i bsgo ba'i blar bskos pa des /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-20: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis klu de btul ba thos /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-21: dga' ba'i dbang du byas pa'i zan la de'i khyim gzhan du bos so //
T08TD4104.1E:222b-22: de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs bde bar 'dug par rig nas /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-23: rang gi lag nas kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas so //
T08TD4104.1E:222b-25: btsun pa legs 'ongs kyis kha zas bsod pa zos pas 'ju bar mi nus so snyam du shes nas /
T08TD4104.1E:222b-26: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smras so //
T08TD4104.1E:222b-27: btsun pa legs 'ongs rtsad nan gsol lam /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-0: bram zes glang po che'i chang gi nang du @223a * //
T08TD4104.1E:223a-1: mdzub mo btsugs te skom gyi nang du krog krog dkrugs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-2: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la phul lo //
T08TD4104.1E:223a-3: dra bcom pa dag ni ma bsams par shes pa dang mthong ba mi 'jug pas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis de 'thungs te /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-4: yon bshad pa byas nas stan las lngas nas song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:223a-5: de mnyan yod kyi srang re ldes g-yogs pa las thal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-6: nyi ma'i 'od zer dag gis lus la phog pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-7: ra ro nas chang gis myos pa'i shugs kyis sa la 'gyel lo //
T08TD4104.1E:223a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid mnga' ba yin pas ;
T08TD4104.1E:223a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis der lo ma ma yin pa'i sbyil bu zhig sprul pa mdzad de bkab bo //
T08TD4104.1E:223a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-11: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim dag tu gdugs tshod gsol nas /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-13: gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs te phyogs der byon te /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-15: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-16: dge slong dag 'di ni gang gis klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa btul ba'i dge slong legs 'ongs zhes bya ba yin na /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-17: dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-18: dge slong legs 'ongs 'dis da ltar sbrul phrug kyang thul bar nus sam /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-19: btsun pa rdo mi thogs so //
T08TD4104.1E:223a-20: dge slong dag de ltar na nyes dmigs 'di dang gzhan dag kyang myos par 'gyur ba 'thungs pa las 'byung bas /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-21: dge slong nga la ston pa'o zhes smra ba de dag gis myos par 'gyur ba tha na rtsva'i rtse mos btung bar mi bya zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs sad par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-26: bde bar gshegs pa ma bsams so //
T08TD4104.1E:223a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs te byon nas /
T08TD4104.1E:223a-28: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-0: bcos pa'i chang myos par @223b 'gyur ba 'thungs na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de yul ni mnyan yod /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-1: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-2: nyon mongs pa ni bag chags ma byang bsam bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-3: nyes pa ni myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:223b-4: de la 'bru'i chang zhes bya ba ni chan gyi btung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-6: bcos pa'i chang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-10: me tog gi btung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-12: de dag gnyi ga bsres pa'i 'bru'i chad dang /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-13: bcos pa'i chang zhes bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:223b-14: myos par 'gyur pa zhes bya ba ni 'thungs na myos par 'gyur ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:223b-15: 'thungs na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:223b-16: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:223b-17: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong 'bru'i chang dang /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-18: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba ma bskol ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-20: bcos pa'i chang gi tshigs ma myos par 'gyur ba mgul du mid na myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:223b-21: 'di'i byed pa po ni myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:223b-22: 'di la yan lag bzhis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-24: de nyams par ma byas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-27: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:223b-28: myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu dgu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-30: // / dus ma yin par 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-31: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yong na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:223b-32: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze'i bu mo zhig / rgyal byed kyi tshal du gtsug lag khang bltar 'ongs pa la /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-33: ku re byas pa'i gzhi la brten nas /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-34: da phyin chad bdag 'khor bar 'khor ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-35: nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun du spyod par mi 'gyur bar de ltar bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-36: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i gan du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:223b-37: chos bstan par gsol pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-0: des de la 'di dang 'di ltar yid la @224a * //
T08TD4104.1E:224a-2: bag yod par sgrubs shig ces gdams ngag byin no //
T08TD4104.1E:224a-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka / gcig pu dben pa bag yod par brtun pa dang ldan pa /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-4: bdag nyid gtang bar gnas pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-5: rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-6: skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-7: yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-8: tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-9: tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te ba bsbrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-10: tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
T08TD4104.1E:224a-12: srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-13: dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-14: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-15: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-16: tsan dan zhag lon par bzhag pa lta bu /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-17: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-19: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-20: srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-21: bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-23: nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-25: mngon du smra bar gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:224a-26: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-27: rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-28: bde ba nyams su myong ba na 'di snyam du sems te /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-29: bcom ldan 'das ni bdag la phan par mdzad pa /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-31: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi chos mang po dag sel bar mdzad pa /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-32: dge ba'i chos mang po dag sgrub par mdzad pa /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-33: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma dag sel bar mdzad pa /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-34: dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma dag sgrub par mdzad pa yin na /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-35: bdag gis ci zhig byas na des bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:224a-37: rab tu byas par 'gyur snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dka' ba mdzad pa brgya stong du ma dag gis bskal ba grangs med pa gsum gyis pha rol tu byin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas bla na med @224b pa'i mkhyen ba thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-1: sems can la phan pa'i phyir yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-2: bdag gis kyang sems can la phan par bya'o snyam mo //
T08TD4104.1E:224b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa 'ga' yod snyam na /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-5: des ci tsam na med par mthong ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:224b-7: bdag nyid la ltos par mthong nas legs kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-8: bdag gis ston pa'i thugs la dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-9: de mthar gyis gdul ba'i don la mnyan yod du zhugs nas bram ze'i khyim dang po bcu pa nas lnga brgya lhag tsam gnyis ka nas btul cing bzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:224b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-11: dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong gis khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-12: dge slong 'char ka nag po 'di yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:224b-13: de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-14: mnyan yod na bram ze gsang sngags dag gis mi ma yin pa dbang du byas nas shing rta 'dren du 'jug pa zhig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-15: gyad stobs rlom pa zhig kyang btul te /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-16: de gnyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-17: khyim bdag gi chung ma gtum mo'i mna'am /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-18: chom rkun ma'i dmag dpon lus brten pa mkhrang pa dam pa zhig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-19: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa zhig la /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-20: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bud med de 'dod chags spyad pa zhig yin par shes nas /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-21: des de la 'dod chags kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod do //
T08TD4104.1E:224b-24: gzhan gyi sems la mkhas pa yin pas des bdag 'phrigs kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-25: gal te de ma bsad na /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-26: des bdag gi khyim thab la byas shing /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-27: des bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-28: bdag gis bsad do snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-29: des chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon de la de bsod cig ces pa dang chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-30: kho bo de mi gsod do //
T08TD4104.1E:224b-31: de ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi chung bo grogs /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-32: btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i slob dpon yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:224b-33: kho bo de gsad par gyur na /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-0: kho bo rgyal pos rgya skyegs kyi khang par bcug ste bsregs pas 'chi bar bya dgos pa gang @225a * //
T08TD4104.1E:225a-1: yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:225a-3: gal te khyod de gsod na de lta na legs /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-4: gal te mi gsod na khyod phyin chad kho mo'i khyim du 'jug par mi bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:225a-5: 'dod pa sten pa dag ni sdig pa'i chos mi bya ba ci yang med pas /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-6: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon des smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-7: gal te de gzhan gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa yin na /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-8: kho bos ji ltar gsad par bya /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-10: thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o zhes de dus ma yin pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-11: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i gnas su mngag pa btang ste /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-12: btsun pa 'char ka bdag bro 'tshal bar gyur na /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-13: khyod kyis bdag gzigs par ci gnang zhes spring ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:225a-14: dgra bcom pa dag ni ma bsams par shes pa dang mthong ba mi 'jug pas /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-15: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang dus ma yin par zhugs te /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-16: de la chos bstan pa byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-17: de phyir dbyung bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-19: 'phags pa bdag khyod mthong na glo ba dga'/
T08TD4104.1E:225a-20: yud tsam zhig bzhugs su gsol zhes des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ji srid kyis shin tu nam sros par gyur pa de srid du bzung nas /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-21: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon yang /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-22: ral gri shubs nas phyung ste sgo na sdod do //
T08TD4104.1E:225a-23: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phyir byung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-24: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-25: 'jig rten pha rol ba tang ba des /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-26: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la bsgyel lo //
T08TD4104.1E:225a-27: snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-28: 'jig rten pha rol btang ba de gnyis kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-29: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i lus de phyag dar gyi phung po zhig tu sbas te bzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:225a-30: de'i nyin mo gso sbyong gi zhal ta ba rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-31: smras pa 'ga' zhig gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i 'dun pa blangs sam /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-33: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-34: dge slong dag khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog de ni bsad kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-35: chos gos dag long shig dang /
T08TD4104.1E:225a-36: de'i lus la mchod pa bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:225a-38: ji tsam na mnyan yod kyi sgo bcad nas /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-0: bcom @225b ldan 'das kyis gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od btang ba mdzad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-1: des mnyan yod thams cad gser bco ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:225b-2: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de mthong nas /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-4: bcom ldan 'das gshegs par bzhed gor ma chag snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-5: de btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mnyan yod kyi lde mig khyer nas sgo phye ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-6: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs so //
T08TD4104.1E:225b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen par dka' ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-8: bzod par dka' ba yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-9: des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar ma nus so //
T08TD4104.1E:225b-10: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mdun du gshegs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-11: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-12: slad bzhin du rjes su 'brang zhing song ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-13: ji tsam na phyag dar gyi phung po de'i phyogs der byon to //
T08TD4104.1E:225b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-15: dge slong dag khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog de 'dir sbas kyis phyung shig / de phyung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-16: de na gang dag tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la brten nas 'phags pa'i bden pa dag mthong ba de dag gis gsol pa /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-17: 'di bdag gcag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag 'di'i lus la mchod pa bgyi bar ci gnang /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi sa ma gnang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:225b-20: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gsol pa /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-21: 'di bdag gi chung po grogs lags na /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'di'i lus la mchod pa bgyi bar ci gnang /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:225b-24: btsun mo phreng ldan mas gsol pa /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-25: 'di bdag gi slob dpon lags na /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'di'i lus la mchod pa bgyi bar ci gnang /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-28: de nas btsun mo phreng ldan mas /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-29: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i lus des dkar gyis dril phyi byed du bcug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:225b-31: ras kha dog sna tshogs dag gis khyogs spyil bcas nas der bcug ste bzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:226a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi dge 'dun dang bca' @226a * //
T08TD4104.1E:226a-2: rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa de'i phyir bzhin du rjes su 'brang zhing song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-3: sa phyogs go skabs yangs pa zhig tu bzhag nas /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-4: btsun mo phreng ldan mas spos kyi shing thams cad kyi phung por bcer te bsreg pa nas me'i phung po de'o mas zhi bar byas te /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-5: rus pa de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig du bcug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-13: sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byas te ;
T08TD4104.1E:226a-14: rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad de gshegs so //
T08TD4104.1E:226a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du byon nas /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-17: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gad na bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-18: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-19: dge slong dag nyes dmigs 'di dang gzhan dag kyang dge slong dag dus ma yin par grong du 'jug pa las gyur pas /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-20: dge slong gis dus ma yin par grong du 'jug par mi bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:226a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-22: yang dge slong gang dus ma yin par grong du 'jug cing /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-23: dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-24: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-26: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni bag chags ma byang bas ma bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-27: nyes pa ni dus ma yin par grong du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:226a-28: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'am /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-29: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:226a-30: dus ma yin par zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-31: dus ma yin pa gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-32: skya rengs ma shar ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-34: grong du zhes bya ba ni gang nas srang dang bzhi mdo dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-35: sum mdo dag yod par ro //
T08TD4104.1E:226a-36: 'jug cing zhes bya ba ni 'gro zhing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:226a-37: dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang 'dug pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:226a-38: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni gleng gzhi las /
T08TD4104.1E:226a-39: dge slong 'dug pa la smra bar bya ba de srid du de'i lhung bzed dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-0: chos gos tshig par gyur pa de 'dra ba'i rkyen @226b bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:226b-1: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:226b-2: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-3: rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba ma gtogs pas /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-5: de med na dge slong ma'am /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-6: de med na dge tshul lam /
