T08TD4104.1E:226b-7: de med na dge tshul ma 'khod pa la ma smras par rang gi phyed yol nas skya rengs ma shar ba'i bar gyi dus ma yin par khyim pa'i grong gzhan du zhugs na /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-8: dus ma yin par 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:226b-9: 'di'i byed pa po ni dus ma yin pa nyid la /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-10: dge slong 'khod pa la ma smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-11: brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-12: rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba ma gtogs pa'i 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:226b-13: 'di la yan lag bdun gyis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-14: dus ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-16: dge slong 'khod pa la ma smras pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-17: brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-18: rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba ma gtogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-21: de dag las yan lag mtshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:226b-22: dus ma yin par 'gro ba'i ltung byed de brgyad cu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-25: zas bcas skya rengs dag dod dang //
T08TD4104.1E:226b-26: khab ral dang ni khri rkang dang //
T08TD4104.1E:226b-27: bdal dang gding ba g-yan ba dang //
T08TD4104.1E:226b-28: ras chen bde gshegs chos gos so //
T08TD4104.1E:226b-30: bcu pa dgu pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-31: sdom la zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don dang dgos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:226b-32: bcu pa dgu pa 'dis kyang ltung byed kyi chos bcu bstan te /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-34: rgyal po'i pho brang du nub mo 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-35: bslab pa'i gzhi'i dngos po khyad du gsod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-38: shing bal gyis gos par byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-39: gding ba las gyur pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-40: g-yan pa dgab pa las gyur pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-41: dbyar gyi ras chen las gyur pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:226b-42: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad las gyur pa'i ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:226b-43: de la grong du rgyu ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba @227a * //
T08TD4104.1E:227a-2: mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-3: de'i khyim du nye dga' dus dang dus su 'gro zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-5: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:227a-6: dus gzhan zhig na des de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod rnams bya ba'i gzhi 'dun po dag gi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-7: des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar brtsams nas /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-9: 'phags pa khyod kyis bdag gi ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan drang ba'i rigs so //
T08TD4104.1E:227a-10: des dang du blangs nas de bzhin du spyan drangs so //
T08TD4104.1E:227a-11: chos nyid kyis na gang gi ngor dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs pa de dus sngar 'gro ba yin pas /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-12: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dus sngar der song nas /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-13: des khyim bdag de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-14: khyim bdag kho bo sbyin bdag gi khyim dag lta ba'i bar du /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-15: khyed re zhig zas sta gon gyis shig / kho bo ma 'ongs pa'i bar du yang khyed kyis re zhig brim par mi bya'o zhes smras te song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:227a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-18: sngar khyim bdag de'i khyim gal ba der gshegs te sgo drung na gzhes so //
T08TD4104.1E:227a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la khyim bdag de la ci bder gyis shig ces bsgo ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-21: 'phags pa bdag gis khyed cag gi ci bder ci legs ma 'tshal gyis /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-22: 'di ltar khyed cag kho na'i slad du gdan dag bshams kyis bzhugs su gsol /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-23: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la de skad ces gsol pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-25: gal te de skad zer na khyed cag kho na'i phyir stan dag bshams pas ci bder byas par brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-26: 'dug par bya zhing 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:227a-27: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:227a-28: ji tsam na gdugs tshod la bab tu nye na /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la khyim bdag de la gdugs tshod la bab du @227b nyes ;
T08TD4104.1E:227b-1: zhal zas brims shig / zas 'dis khyod la ci bya zhes bya ba bsgo ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-3: 'phags pa nye dga' mchi ba'i bar du yud tsam zhig gzhes su gsol /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-4: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-5: bcom ldan 'das la de skad ces gsol pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsam zhig gzhes nas /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-7: yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-8: khyim bdag de la gdugs tshod la bab kyis zhal zas brims shig / zas rul par gyur pa 'dis khyod la ci bya zhes bsgo ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-10: 'phags pa nye dga'am mchi bar du yud tsam zhig gzhes su gsol /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-12: bcom ldan 'das la de skad ces gsol pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la khyim bdag de la nye dga' 'ongs par ma gyur na zan sbyin par mi byed dam zhes smras pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-16: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la de skad ces gsol pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-18: gzhan dbang thams cad sdug bsngal te //
T08TD4104.1E:227b-19: bdag dbang thams cad bde ba yin //
T08TD4104.1E:227b-20: thun mong dag gis gnod byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:227b-22: ci tsam na gdugs tshod kyi mtha' la bab pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-23: nye dga' 'ongs nas des smras pa //
T08TD4104.1E:227b-24: khyim bdag mi 'brim par ci gdong //
T08TD4104.1E:227b-27: kho bo ma 'ongs kyi bar du re zhig brim par mi bya'o zhes byung la de skad ces mi gsung ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-28: nye dga' shags med nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:227b-29: de nas khyim bdag des brim par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-30: ji tsam na gdugs tshod yol nas /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-31: dge slong kha cig gis ni zas thob nas zan gcad pa byas /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-32: kha cig gis ni zan ma thob pa kho nar zan gcad pa byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-33: bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad de gshegs so //
T08TD4104.1E:227b-34: nye dga' ngo tsha bar gyur pa'i snying gis de nyid du 'dug go //
T08TD4104.1E:227b-35: de'i nyin mo gso sbyong gi zhal ta ba rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:227b-36: dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo zhing smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-2: 'ga' zhig gis de'i 'dun pa blangs sam /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-3: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-4: de ma 'ongs te sus kyang de'i 'dun pa yang ma blangs so //
T08TD4104.1E:228a-5: dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-6: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bdag cag snga dro zang zing gi ched la tho btsams la ;
T08TD4104.1E:228a-7: da ni chos kyi ched la tho btsams par byed do zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-8: dge slong don nyung du ngag ci'i phyir dge slong dag zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro dang phyi dro khyim dag tu rgyu bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-10: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:228a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-12: yang dge slong gang zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-13: snga dro dang phyi dro dag khyim dag tu rgyu zhing khyim pa 'dug pa la mi bsgo na /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-14: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-17: nyon mongs pa ni rang nyams kyis kun du spyod pa /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-18: nyes pa ni zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-19: snga dro dang phyi dro dag khyim dag tu rgyu zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-20: dge 'dun gyi zang zing gi bar chad byas pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-21: phyi gro khyim dag tu rgyu bas dge 'dun gyi chos kyi bar chad byas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:228a-22: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-24: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:228a-25: zas dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-26: mgron du bos pa dang bcas pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:228a-27: khyim du zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:228a-28: mgron du bos nas zhes bya ba ni bsod snyoms kyi phyir ro //
T08TD4104.1E:228a-29: snga dro zhes bya ba ni snga dro nyid de khyim gnyis las lhag par rgyu na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:228a-30: phyi dro zhes bya ba ni phyi dro nyid de khyim gsum las lhag par rgyu na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:228a-31: khyim dag tu zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:228a-32: rgyu zhing zhes bya ba ni 'gro zhing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:228a-33: khyim pa la mi bsgo na zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:228a-34: de na khyim pa gang 'dug pa la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:228a-35: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni gleng gzhi las khyim pa 'dug pa la bsgo bar mi byed pa de srid du /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-0: de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig par gyur pa de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag @228b ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:228b-1: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-4: ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dag tu sred par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-7: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-8: dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-9: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4104.1E:228b-10: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-11: dge slong de'i tshig gis dge 'dun zas dang bcas pa ni khyim du spyan drangs pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-12: sbyin bdag la kho bo ma 'ongs pa'i dbang gis brim pa yol bar ma bya shig ces ma bsgo ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-13: brtad pa'i dbang ma gtogs par khyim gsum pa la sogs par rgyu ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-14: gung tshigs las yol ba'i dus ma yin par dge slong 'khod pa la smras su zin kyang brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung bar khyim bzhi la sogs par 'gro na khyim gsum pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-15: bzhi pa dang lnga pa la sogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-18: drug pa la sogs par re rer phyin pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-19: grong rgyu ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:228b-21: snga dro la ni khyim gsum pa la sogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-22: khyim pa 'khod pa la ma bsgo ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-23: brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:228b-24: 'di la yan lag ni snga dro la ni lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-26: de'i tshig gis dge 'dun spyan drangs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-27: sbyin bdag la kho bo ma 'ongs pa'i dbang gis brim pa yol bar ma byas shig ces ma bsgo ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-28: brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-29: khyim gsum pa la sogs par son pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:228b-30: phyi dro la ni yan lag gsum gyis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-32: brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-33: khyim bzhi pa la sogs par son pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:228b-34: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:228b-35: grong du rgyu ba'i ltung byed de brgyad cu gcig pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-37: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel /
T08TD4104.1E:228b-39: rgyal po'i pho brang du nub mo 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal @229a * //
T08TD4104.1E:229a-1: mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:229a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mod gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-3: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis btul nas /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-4: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de la brten nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i pho brang du zhag bdun gyi bar du gdugs tshod gsol te /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-5: de'i tshe na mnyan yod na khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-7: khyim bdag tshul khrims tshong dpon dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-8: rgyal bu nag po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la chos mngon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-9: 'dul ba mngon pa'i zhu ba zhus nas /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la gong nas gong du bka' lan stsal pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-11: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang de dag gi gdong du lta zhing 'dug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-12: des yud tsam zhig chos dang ldan pa'i gtam mnyan nas /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:229a-14: de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas btsun mo phreng ldan ma la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-15: phreng ldan ma deng khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-17: khyim bdag tshul khrims tshong dpon dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-18: rgyal bu nag po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la chos mngon pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-19: 'dul ba mngon pa'i zhu ba zhus nas /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag la gong nas gong du bka' lan stsal pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-21: nga yang de dag gi gdong du lta zhing kha rog par 'dug 'dug nas langs te song ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:229a-23: lha khyod kyis kyang ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la ma zhus /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-24: phreng ldan ma nga ni thos pa nyung ba yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-25: de dag ni thos pa mang ba yin pa sangs ci zhig zhur yod /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-26: lha khyod kyang ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog par mi mdzad /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-27: phreng ldan ma nga rgyal po'i bya ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-28: rgyal po'i byed pa dag la rtag tu bral bas ji ltar klog //
T08TD4104.1E:229a-29: gal te khyod 'ga' zhig las sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog na /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-30: ngas mtshan mo khyod las bklag par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:229a-32: rgyal pos btsun mo rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma'i slob dpon du ni /
T08TD4104.1E:229a-33: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gnyer /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-0: btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i @229b slob dpon du ni /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-1: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gnyer te /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-2: de gnyis kyis de dag klog tu 'jug pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-3: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ni dus shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-6: rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma klog tu 'jug gi dus ma yin par mi 'gro'o //
T08TD4104.1E:229b-7: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ni dus mi shes pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-8: dus ma yin pas dus su yang song ste phreng ldan ma klog tu 'jug la /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-10: ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ri brags gzhan zhig tu bya ba cung zhig byung nas /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-11: de'i mtshan mo nyid du langs te der 'phags pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-12: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka glang po che'i sgra dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-14: dung gi sgra dag gis sad nas /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-16: btsun mo phreng ldan ma la bzlas pa sbyin du 'gro'o snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-17: rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-19: btsun mo phreng ldan ma gnyid log cing 'dug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-20: des se gol gyi sgras de bslang ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-21: des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-22: btsun mo'i 'khor la 'os pa'i gos dag brjes nas gos stug po dag gyon te 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-23: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sa de la bzlas pa byin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-24: khung gzhan yang phog pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-27: bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo //
T08TD4104.1E:229b-28: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de blangs te phyir byung ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-29: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nang du 'jug pa dang phrad nas /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-31: don nyung ngu khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di lta bus zag pa zad par byas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-33: kho bos ni bzlas pa byin nas /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-36: bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang pa 'di yang thob bo //
T08TD4104.1E:229b-37: tshe dang ldan pa sh'ari'i bus smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-38: de'i phyir khyod drug sde yin no zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-39: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-40: dge slong dag nam ma langs skya rengs ma shar rin po che dag gam /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-41: rin po cher smos pa dag ma bsdus par /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-42: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i sgo gtan nam /
T08TD4104.1E:229b-43: sgo gtan gyi nye 'khor las 'da' bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-1: byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:230a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-3: yang dge slong gang nam ma nangs /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-6: rin po cher smos pa dag ma bsdus par rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i sgo gtan nam /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-7: sgo gtan gyi nye 'khor las 'da' na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-9: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni dus ma shes pa /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-10: nyes pa ni rgyal po'i pho brang du nub mo 'gro ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:230a-11: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-12: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:230a-13: nam ma nangs zhes bya ba ni nam nags par ma gyur pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:230a-14: skya rengs ma shar zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-19: de la skya rengs dang po ni sngon por snang ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:230a-20: skya rengs par ma ni ser por snang ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:230a-21: skya rengs tha ma ni dmar por snang ba ste /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-22: 'dir skya rengs tha ma yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:230a-23: ma shar zhes bya ba ni ma byung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:230a-24: rin po che dag ces bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-25: rin po che dag ces bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-29: shang ka shi la dag dang /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-37: rin po cher smos pa dag ces bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-38: g-yul ngor spyad pa'i mtshon cha thams cad dang /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-39: rol mor spyad pa'i cha spyad thams cad do //
T08TD4104.1E:230a-40: ma bsdus par zhes bya ba ni ma brtul bar ro //
T08TD4104.1E:230a-41: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-42: bud med rgyal rigs la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur na /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-43: de yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-47: dmangs rigs rgyal srid la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur na /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-48: de yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-49: sgo gtan nam zhes bya ba ni sgo gtan ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-50: grong khyer gyi sgo gtan dang /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-51: rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo gtan dang /
T08TD4104.1E:230a-52: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgo gtan dang /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-0: sgo gtan gyi nye @230b 'khor las zhes bya ba ni de'i drung las so //
T08TD4104.1E:230b-1: 'da' na zhes bya ba ni 'gro na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:230b-2: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-3: gleng gzhi las btsun mod pa la ldan 'dul pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-4: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-5: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang mod kyi 'di nyid rkyen du mdzad nas gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-6: de 'dul ba la ltos pas de nyid du 'dug go zhes bya ba de 'dra ba'i rkyen du bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:230b-7: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:230b-8: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-9: dge slong rgyal po dang btsun mo dang /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-12: bar chad dang gdul ba'i dbang ma gtogs par btsun mo'i 'khor 'dug pa'i gnas sam /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-13: rgyal po'i pho brang gi gnas dang /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-14: bdag nyid 'gro bar 'brel ba'i gnas skabs der skya rengs tha ma ma shar cing nam ma nangs par shes bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-15: btsun mo de'i sgo bcad pa la ni phyi rol gyi nye 'khor 'obs la sogs pa'i nang rol gyi ngos las 'das pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-16: sgo ma bcad pa la sgo 'phar nas nang rol du sgo gtan gyi srid kyi nyes 'gyur las 'das na sbyor ba tha dad pas mtshan mo re re la mtshan mo'i skya rengs 'char ba'i mtha' la bsdad mi dgos par nam son pa'i mod nyid la /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-17: rgyal po'i pho brang du nub mo 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:230b-18: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong rgyal po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-23: 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'gro ba ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-25: rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug pa'i gnas dang /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-26: bdag nyid 'gro bar 'brel pa nyid kyi gnas skabs des nam ma nangs pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:230b-27: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-33: 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'gro ba ma gtogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:230b-35: rgyal po'i pho brang gi gnas gang yang rung bar bdag nyid 'brel par 'gro ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-0: de'i gnas skabs na skya rengs tha ma ma shar cing nam ma nangs @231a * //
T08TD4104.1E:231a-4: ma bcad pa'i gtan pa'i nye 'khor gyi phyir lta ba'am /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-5: nang du lta ba gang yang rung ba las 'das pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:231a-6: de dag las yan lag mtshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:231a-7: rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i ltung byed de brgyad cu gnyis pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-9: // / bslab pa'i gzhi'i dngos po la khyad du gsod pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:231a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas //
T08TD4104.1E:231a-12: dge slong rnams zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo don pa gdon pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-13: drug sde dag gus par byas te chos nyan par mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-14: bla mar byas te mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-15: ru shing ltar byas te mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-16: yid la byed de mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-17: sems rtse gcig tu mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-19: sems thams cad kyis bsams te chos nyan par mi byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-20: dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar chos 'di yang mdo'i nang du gtogs /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-21: mdo'i nang du 'dus par da gdod bdag gis shes so zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-22: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-23: tshe dang ldan pa dag so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-24: gus par da dod thos sam ci na gang gi phyir de skad zer /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-26: tshe dang ldan pa dag ci kho bo cag la las de tsam 'ba' zhig tu zad dam /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-27: 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa la yang rnam par brtag dgos so //
T08TD4104.1E:231a-28: gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-29: rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa la yang rnam par brtag dgos so zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-30: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag zla'i phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-31: gus par byas te chos nyan par mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-32: bla mar byas te mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-33: ru shing ltar byas te mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-34: yid la byas te mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-35: sems rtse gcig tu byas te mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231a-37: sems thams cad kyis bsams te chos nyan par mi byed cing /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-0: dge slong @231b rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar chos 'di yang mdo'i nang du gtogs /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-1: mdo'i nang du 'dus par bdag cag gis da gdod shes so zhes zer zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-3: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:231b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-5: yang dge slong gang zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-6: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar chos 'di yang mdo'i nang du gtogs /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-7: mdo'i nang du 'dus par bdag gis da gdod shes so zhes zer ro de la gal te dge slong rnams kyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'di /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-8: gso sbyong gi las gnyis sam gsum gyi tshe 'dug par shes shing /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-9: lan mang du lha ci smos na /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-10: tshe dang ldan pa de mi shes pas mi 'grol bas de ltung ba gang byung ba de chos bzhin du byed du gzhug gi steng du /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-11: khyod zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-12: gus par byas te chos nyan par mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-13: bla ma ltar byas te mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-14: ru shing ltar bya te mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-15: yid la byas te mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-16: sems rtse gcig tu bya te mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-18: sems thams cad kyis bsams te chos nyan par mi byed pas /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-19: tshe dang ldan pa khyed kyis ma rnyed de /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-20: rnyed pa ma yin zhing nyes pa rnyed de /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-21: legs pa rnyed pa ma yin no zhes 'gyod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:231b-22: tshe dang ldan pa de la 'gyod par bya ba ni de yin te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-25: nyon mongs pa ni sgyu thabs kyi bsam pa /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-26: nyes pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi'i dngos po khyad du gsod pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:231b-27: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:231b-28: zla ba phyed phyed cing zhes bya ba ni zla ba phyed phyed cing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:231b-29: so sor thar pa'i mdo zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-30: so sor thar pa zhes bya ba ni pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-31: dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-32: ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-33: spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-34: ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /
T08TD4104.1E:231b-35: so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang bslab pa'i chos mang po dang /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-1: zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-2: mdo gdon pa zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-3: mdo gdon pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-4: 'don pa'i tshe zhes bya ba ni rab tu mang po ston pa'i tshe'o //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-5: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-6: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar chos 'di yang mdo'i nang du gtogs mdo'i nang du 'dus par bdag gis da gdod shes so zhes zer la zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos 'di yang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-8: de la gal te dge slong rnams kyis kyang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-9: de na dge slong gang dag 'khong pa rnams kyis kyang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-10: tshe dang ldan pa 'di zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa 'di'o //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-11: sngon gso sbyong gi las gnyis sam gsum gyi tshe 'dug pa shes shing zhes bya ba ni 'di so sor thar pa'i mdo lan gnyis sam gsum thos par shes shing ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-12: lan mang du lta ci smos na zhes bya ba ni lan mang du 'dug par shes pa lta ci smos na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-13: tshe dang ldan pa de mi shes pas mi 'grol bas zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-14: de des ltung ba las mi 'grol bas de ltung ba dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-15: de ltung ba gang byung ba zhes bya ba ni ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-16: de chos bzhin du byed du gzhug ces bya ba ni 'chags su gzhug pa'o//
T08TD4104.1E:232a-17: steng du khyod zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-18: gus par byas te chos nyan par mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-19: bla mar byas te mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-20: ru shing ltar byas te mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-21: yid la byas te mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-22: sems rtse gcig tu mi byed /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-24: sems thams cad kyis bsams te chos nyan par mi byed pas /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-25: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis ma rnyed de /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-26: rnyed pa ma yin zhing nyes pa rnyed de /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-27: legs pa rnyed pa ma yin no zhes 'gyod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'gyod du gzhug par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-28: tshe dang ldan pa de la 'gyod par bya ba ni de yin te zhes bya ba ni de ltar 'gyod par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-29: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:232a-30: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-31: dge slong dge 'dun zla ba phyed phyed cing gso sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:232a-32: sngar yang de lan gnyis su myong zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-0: yid rmongs pa ma yi pas bzhad gad tsam gyis kyang so sor thar pa'i @232b mdo gdon pa 'di la /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-1: bslab pa'i gzhi'i chos 'di'i yod par bdag gis gzod shes so zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-2: dngos su smra'am brgyud pa de skad zer na /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-3: mdo sde dang ldan pa ma gtogs te /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-4: de la bslab pa'i gzhi'i dngos po la khyad du gsod pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:232b-6: dge slong sngar yang gso sbyong lan gnyis nyams su myong zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-7: yid rmongs pa ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-8: mdo sde dang ldan pa ma gtogs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi'i dngos po nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:232b-9: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-10: dge slong slar gso sbyong la na gnyis nyams su myong ba nyid dang ;
T08TD4104.1E:232b-11: / yid rmongs pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-12: gso sbyong 'don pa'i dus nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-13: 'dul bar gtogs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi'i dngos po nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-15: brgyud pas khyad du gsod pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:232b-16: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:232b-17: bslab pa'i gzhi'i dngos po la khyad du gsod pa'i ltung byed de brgyad cu gsum pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-19: // / khab ral 'chos pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:232b-21: mnyan yod na gcer bu pa'i nyan thos chos zhes bya ba /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-22: ba so mkhan zhig 'dug pa de gcer bu pa dag la shin du mngon par dad do //
T08TD4104.1E:232b-23: de dus gzhan zhig na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig gis chos bstan pas btul nas /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-24: des kyang de la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-25: bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs so //
T08TD4104.1E:232b-26: yang bsod snyoms pa des de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-27: de mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-28: 'phags pa bdag gis kyang rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi cung zhig yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bgyis yis /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-29: bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la rang gi bzos bsnyen bkur bgyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:232b-30: bsod snyoms pa de gtsug lag khang du song ste dge slong rnams la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-31: tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis gcer bu pa'i nyan thos chos zhes bya ba so mkhan de skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4104.1E:232b-32: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag nas /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-0: de dge slong dge 'dun la rang @233a * //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-1: gi bzos bsnyen bkur byed kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-2: su ci 'dod pa des byed du chug shig / ji tsam na dge slong zhig la khab ral med na /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-3: de'i gan du song nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-4: bzhin bzangs kho bo la khal ral med kyis de gyis shig /'phags pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-6: 'phags pa ba sa las bgyis pa bzang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-8: ba so las byas pa gyis shig / des de'i khab ral ba so las byas te byin no //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-9: dge slong des dge slong rnams la bstan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-10: dge slong gzhan gyis kyang de lta bu byed du bcug cing /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-11: gzhan gyis kyang byed du bcug / gzhan gyis kyang de lta bu byed du bcug pas de'i ba so zad par gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-12: dge slong gzhan zhig kyang 'ongs te smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-13: bzhin bzangs kho bo'i khab ral gyis shig /'phags pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-15: 'phags pa ba so las bgyis pa bzang na ba so de ni bas so //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-16: gal te bzhed na rus pa las bgyis pa bgyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-17: bzhin bzangs ma nyes kyis gyis shig / des de'i khab ral rus pa las byas te byin no //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-18: dge slong des dge slong rnams la bstan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-19: dge slong gzhan gyis kyang de lta bu byed du bcug cing /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-20: gzhan gyis kyang byed du bcug /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-21: gzhan gyis kyang byed du bcug pas de'i rus pa yang zad par gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-22: dge slong zhan zhig kyang 'ongs te smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-23: bzhin bzangs kho bo'i khab ral gyis shig /'phags pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-25: 'phags pa ba so las bgyis pa bzang na de ni bas so //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-26: bzhin bzangs gal te de lta na rus pa las bgyis pa gyis shig /'phags pa rus pa yang bas so //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-27: gal te bzhed na rva la bgyis pa bgyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-28: bzhin bzangs ma nyes kyis gyis shig / des de'i khab ral rva las byas te byin no //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-29: dge slong des dge slong rnams la bstan pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-30: dge slong gzhan gyis kyang de lta bu byed du bcug cing /
T08TD4104.1E:233a-31: gzhan gyis kyang de lta bu byed du bcug //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-32: gzhan gyis kyang de lta bu byed du bcug pas de'i rva yang zad par gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:233a-33: de rang gi zan dang rang gi yo byad dag gis dge slong rnams kyi las byed pa na dbul bar gyur to //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-0: gcer bu pa dag chos 'di gang gi tshe kho @233b bo cag la mngon par dad par gyur pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-1: 'di thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur na /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-2: 'di de ltar sh'akya'i bu'i dge slong rnams la mngon par dad pa zan yang slong bar byed do zhes 'phya ba la zhugs pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-4: yang dge slong gang ba so'am /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-6: rva'i khab ral byed du 'jug na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-8: gang zag ni chos 'di pa'i dge slong rab tu mang po //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-10: nyes pa ni khab ral 'chos pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-11: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-12: ba so'am zhes bya ba ni ba so nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-13: rus pa'am zhes bya ba ni rus pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-14: rva'i zhes bya ba ni rva nyi kyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-15: khab ral zhes bya ba ni khab ral gnyis te /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-16: sbu gu can dang chang pa lta bu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-17: don 'dir ni gnyi ga yin par dgongs so //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-18: byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni rang gis sam gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-19: bcag nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de bag nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-20: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-21: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-22: dge slong gis rin po che ma gtogs pa ba so'am /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-25: lcags la sogs pa'i khab ral byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-26: byed du bcug na khab ral 'chos pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-29: rin po che ma gtogs pa'i khab ral nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-30: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-31: 'dod zhen gyi bsam pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-33: gnang ba nyid ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-35: rva'am lcags la sogs pa'i khab ral nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-36: byas zin pa rnyed pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-37: byas zin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-38: rang gis byed dam gzhan byed du bcug pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-39: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:233b-40: khab ral 'chos pa'i ltung byed de brgyad cu bzhi pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:233b-42: // / khri rkang 'chos pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal @234a * //
T08TD4104.1E:234a-1: mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:234a-2: de'i tshe na dge slong gang zhig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos te sgo khang du khri dma' ba'i khyim zhig rnyed pa'i mdun du rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa gnyid kyis yur ba'i tshe /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-3: lus 'khyog cing khri'i sgra tseg tseg zer ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-4: 'og nas sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa zhig byung bas 'phral bar bzung ste dus la bab nas /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-5: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i drang srong rnams kyis nang du skyes te /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'ongs nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i gzhi las /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-8: nyes dmigs gang cung zad cig byung ba de thams cad dge slong dag khri dma' ba la mal 'cha' zhung de'i mdun du rkang pa gnyis 'khru ba las gyur pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-9: de lta bas na dge slong gis khri dma' ba la mal bca' bar mi bya zhing /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-10: khri'i mdun du rkang pa gnyis bkru bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-11: dge slong mchil lham mi bdog pa la gnod par gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-13: gang dag la mchil lham mi bdog pa de dag gis mgo logs dang /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-14: rkang pa logs su rkang pa gnyis bkru bar bya ste /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-16: drug sde dag gis dge slong khri dma' ba la nyal ba sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pas zin te dus la bab nas /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khri dma' ba la mal bca' bar mi bya'o zhes bkag pa thos na /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-18: de dag gis khri rkang pa khru bcu gnyis pa bcas te ya gad mthon po btsugs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-19: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-20: tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed byar byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-23: khyed kyis dge slong khri dma' ba la nyal ba sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pas zin te dus la bab pa ma mthong ngam ci /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-24: khyed drug sde dag kyang sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pas bzung ste /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-25: dus la bab cing kho bo cag shi ba'i yo byad dag 'ged par 'dod dam zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-26: dge slong don nyung ngu dag / ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun rnams kyis bzlog pa na /
T08TD4104.1E:234a-27: de dang de skad zer zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:234b-1: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-2: de na bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:234b-3: yang dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi khri'am byed du 'jug na /
T08TD4104.1E:234b-4: rtsa ba bu gar gzhug pa ma gtogs par bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad kyi tshad du byed du gzhug par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-5: de las lhag par byed du 'jug na bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:234b-8: nyon mongs pa ni lhag tshol ba /
T08TD4104.1E:234b-9: nyes pa ni khri rkang mthon po byed na'o //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-10: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-11: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-12: khri'am zhes bya ba ni khri nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-13: khri'u zhes bya ba ni khri'u nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-14: byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-15: rtsa ba bu gar gzhug pa ma gtogs par zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:234b-16: gleng gzhi las tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i lus tshad las shin tu 'das pa yin pas de'i pus mo gnyis ko sko la reg nas /
T08TD4104.1E:234b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:234b-18: de lta bas na rtsa ba bu gar gzhug pa ma gtogs so zhes gsungs pa de lta bu bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-19: bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad gyi tshad du byed du gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:234b-20: bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-21: de'i sor brgyad gang dag yin pa de dag la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gang ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-22: de las lhag par byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni de las gong ma'o //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-23: bcad na ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de bcad nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-24: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-25: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:234b-26: dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi khri'am khri'i rkang pa bzhin pa la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rkang pa bu gar gzhug pa'i sa phyogs ma gtogs par tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gang las lhag par byed dam byed du 'jug na /
T08TD4104.1E:234b-27: khri rkang 'chos pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-29: dge 'dun gyi khri'am ma khri'u rkang pa'i tshad nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:234b-30: lhag tshol ba'i bsam pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:234b-31: 'di la yan lag bzhis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-0: dge 'dun gyi khri'am khri'u gang yang rung @235a * //
T08TD4104.1E:235a-1: ba dag gi rkang pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-2: de dag gi tshad bu gar gzhug pa'i sa phyogs ma gtogs pa khru gang las lhag pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-3: rang gi byed dam gzhan byed du 'jug pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:235a-4: de dag las yan lag mtshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:235a-5: khri rkang pa'i ltung byed de brgyad cu lnga pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-8: // / shing ba la gyis gos par byas pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgya byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs //
T08TD4104.1E:235a-10: nye dga' gsar bu yin pa de'i khri thob bo cog rgan pas phrogs shing gnas mal bsko ba'i dus la yang bab nas des bsams pa /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-11: gang gis bdag gi khri mi phrogs pa de lta bu'i thabs ci yod snyam pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-12: des bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-13: shing bal dag kyang blangs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-14: de la blo skyes pa shing bal bdal te bzhag go snyam nas /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-15: des khri'u'i steng du shing bal bdal te gzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:235a-16: ji tsam na dge slong ches rgan pa zhig 'ongs nas /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-21: de na dge slong zhig 'dug pa des smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-22: nye dga' ji skad zer ba de bzhin de /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-23: shing bal ni nye dga'i yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:235a-24: 'di ltar khri ni dge 'dun gyi yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:235a-26: nye dga' khros nas des shing bal khyer te /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-27: khri de'i steng du shing bal cung zad bdal te bzhag go //
T08TD4104.1E:235a-28: dge slong des so sor ma brtags pa nyid du /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-29: der nyal nas mtshan mo nam nangs te langs pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-30: gos thams cad shing bal gyis skya bor gyur nas /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-31: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-32: ci khyod g-yul gyi gzhir nyal lam /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-33: des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-34: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi khri'am /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-35: khri'ur shing bal bdal te 'jog par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-37: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:235a-38: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du //
T08TD4104.1E:235a-39: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi khri'am /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-40: khri'u la shing pal bdal lam /
T08TD4104.1E:235a-41: bdal du 'jug na bsdus nas ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-0: nyon mongs @235b pa ni zhe dku ba /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-1: nyes pa ni dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la shing bal bdal ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-2: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'a kya'i bu nye dga' 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-3: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-4: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun no //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-6: khri'am zhes bya ba ni khri nyid do ;
T08TD4104.1E:235b-7: / khri'i zhes bya ba yang khri'u nyid la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-8: shing bal zhes bya ba ni lnga po shal ma li'i dang /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-12: ae ra ka'i shing bal dag las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-13: bdal lam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-14: bdal du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-15: bsdus nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de bsdus nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-16: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-17: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-18: dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi khri'am khri'u dag la gos dang lus ma rung bar 'gyur ba'i shing bal shal ma li 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-21: spra ba'i ae ra ka'i dag las gang yang rung ba rang ngam bskos pas bdal na /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-22: shing bal gyis gos par byas pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-24: dge 'dun gyi khri'am khri'u la sogs pa gnas mal gang yang rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-25: lus dang gos lam rung bar 'gyur ba'i shing bal gang yang rung ba nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-26: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-27: dge 'dun gyi gnas mal rung ba gang yang rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-28: shing bal gang yang rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-29: lus dang gos ma rung bar 'gyur ba nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-30: zhe dku ba'i bsam pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-31: rang ngam bskos pas bdal ba nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-32: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-33: shing bal gyis gos par byas pa'i ltung byed de brgyad cu drug pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-35: // / gding ba las gyur pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-36: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:235b-37: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gding ba byed du 'jug go zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:235b-38: dge slong dag tshad las ha cang lhag pa byed du 'jug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:236a-0: dge slong don nyung du dag bcom ldan 'das @236a * //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-1: kyis dge slong gis gding ba byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal ba na /
T08TD4104.1E:236a-2: ci'i phyir dge slong dag tshad las ha cang lhag par byed du 'jug ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:236a-4: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du dge slong gis gding ba byed du 'jug na tshad bzhin byed du chug shig / de la gding ba'i tshad ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:236a-6: srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho do zheng du mtho phyed dang do'o //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-7: srid du mtho gang gis srings shig / de las lhag par byed du 'jug na bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:236a-9: gang zag ni dge slong rab tu mang po dag / nyon mongs pa ni tshad mi shes pa /
T08TD4104.1E:236a-10: nyes pa ni gding ba tshad las ha cang lhag pa byed du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-11: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di bas so //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-12: gding ba zhes bya ba ni steng rim du gding ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-13: byed du 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-14: tshad bzhin du byed du chug shig ces bya ba ni gding ba'i tshad gang yin pa de bzhin du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-15: de la gding ba'i tshad ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:236a-16: srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho do //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-17: zheng du mtho phyed dang do zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:236a-18: srid du zhes bya ba ni chur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-19: bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-20: de'i mtho'i mtho do gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gsum mo //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-21: zheng du zhes bya ba ni rgyar ro //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-22: mtho phyed dang ngo zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:236a-23: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho byed dang ngo gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru do dang sor drug go //
T08TD4104.1E:236a-24: srid du mtho gang gis srings shig ces bya ba ni gleng gzhi las /
T08TD4104.1E:236a-25: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i lus tshad las ha cang lhag pas de'i gding ba des mi chog nas /
T08TD4104.1E:236a-26: de gnas mal bsrung ba'i phyir rkang ba'i mtha' logs su lo ma'i chun po dag bzhag pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:236a-27: kun dga' bo de lta bas na srid du mtho gang gis srings shig ces gsungs pas mi chog na srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gis bsring ste /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-0: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gang @236b yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru phyed dang ngo ste /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-1: des na gding ba'i srid kyi tshad ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru phye dang lnga pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:236b-2: de la lhag par byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni de las gong ma'o //
T08TD4104.1E:236b-3: bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po bcad nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:236b-4: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:236b-5: de la 'di 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-6: dge slong gi gding ba srid du khru gsum zheng du khru do dang sor dug pa /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-7: des mi chog na srid du khru phyed dang dos bskyad de /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-8: khru phye dang lnga pa bya'o zhes gsungs pa las /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-9: chu zheng gang yang rung ba tshad las lhag bar byed dam /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-10: byed du bcug nas gding ba las gyur pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:236b-11: 'di'i byed pa po ni rang gding ba'i tshad do //
T08TD4104.1E:236b-12: 'di la yan lag bzhis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-14: tshad las lhag pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-16: rang ngam bskos pas byas pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:236b-17: de dag las yan lag ma tshang ba ni ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:236b-18: gding ba las gyur pa'i ltung byed de brgyad cu bdun pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-20: // / g-yan pa gdab pa las gyur pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:236b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis g-yan pa dgab pa byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-23: dge slong dag tshad las kha cang lhag pa byed du 'jug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-24: dge slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis g-yan pa dgab pa byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-25: dge slong dag tshad pas ha cang lhag pa byed du 'jug ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-27: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:236b-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-29: dge slong gis g-yan pa dgab pa byed du 'jug na tshad bzhin du byed du chug shig / de la g-yan pa dgab pa'i tshad ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-30: srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho bzhi /
T08TD4104.1E:236b-32: de la lhag par byed du 'jug na bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-0: gang zag ni dge slong rab tu mang po @237a * //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-1: dag / nyon mongs pa ni tshad mi shes pa /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-2: nyes pa ni g-yan pa dgab pa tshad las lhag par byed du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-3: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-4: g-yan pa dgab pa zhes bya ba ni na ba'i gos so //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-5: byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan no//
T08TD4104.1E:237a-6: tshad bzhin du byed du chug shig ces bya ba ni g-yan pa dgab pa'i tshad gang yin pa de bzhin du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-7: de la g-yan pa dgab pa'i tshad ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-8: srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho bzhi /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-9: zheng du mtho do zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-10: srid du zhes bya ba ni chur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-11: bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-12: de'i mtho'i mtho bzhi gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru drug go //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-13: zheng du zhes bya ba ni rgyar ro //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-14: mtho do zhes bya ba la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho go gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gsum mo //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-15: de las lhag par byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni de las gong ma'o //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-16: bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de bcad nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-17: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-18: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-19: dge slong gis g-yan pa dgab pa'i tshad srid du khru drug zheng du khru gsum pa las lhag pa byed dam byed du 'jug na g-yan pa dgab pa las gyur pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-21: rang gi g-yan pa dgab pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-22: tshad las lhag pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-23: 'di la yan lag bzhis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-24: rang gi g-yan pa dgab pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-26: tshad las lhag pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-27: rang ngam bskos pas byas pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-28: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-29: g-yan pa dgab pa las gyur pa'i ltung byed de brgyad cu brgyad pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-31: // / dbyar gyi ras chen las gyur pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-32: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:237a-33: bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gyi gos ras chen byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-34: dge slong dag ha cang tshad las lhag par byed du 'jug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:237a-35: dge slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T08TD4104.1E:237b-0: dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras @237b chen byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal nas ci'i phyir dge slong dag ha cang ras chen tshad las lhag par byed du 'jug go zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:237b-2: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-4: dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen byed du 'jug na tshad bzhin du byed du chug shig / de la dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyi tshad ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:237b-5: srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho drug zheng du mtho phyed dang gsum /
T08TD4104.1E:237b-6: de las lhag par byed du 'jug na bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad do /
T08TD4104.1E:237b-8: gang zag ni dge slong rab tu mang po //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-9: nyon mongs pa ni tshad mi shes pa /
T08TD4104.1E:237b-10: nyes pa ni dbyar gyi gos ras chen tshad las lhag par byed du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-11: de la dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-12: dbyar gyi gos ras chen zhes bya ba ni char pa skyob pa'i gos so //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-13: byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-14: tshad bzhin du byed du chug shig ces bya ba ni dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyi tshad gang yin pa de bzhin du'o //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-15: de la dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyi tshad ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:237b-16: srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho drug zheng du mtho phyed dang gsum zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:237b-17: srid du zhes bya ba ni chur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-18: bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-19: de'i mtho'i mtho drug gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru dgu'o zheng du zhes bya ba ni rgyar ro //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-20: mtho phyed dang gsum mo zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:237b-21: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho phyed dan gsum gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i gru gsum dang sor bco brgyad do //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-22: de las lhag par byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni de las gong ma'o //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-23: bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de bcad nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o //
T08TD4104.1E:237b-24: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no ;
T08TD4104.1E:237b-25: / de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:237b-26: dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyi tshad srid du khru dgu zheng du khru gsum dang sor bco brgyad las lhag par byed dam byed du 'jug na dbyar gyi gos ras chen las gyur pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:238a-1: byed pa po ni rang gi dbyar gyi gos ras chen nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-3: 'di las yan lag bzhis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-4: rang gi dbyar gyi gos ras chen nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-6: tshad las lhag pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-7: rang ngam bskos pas byas pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:238a-8: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:238a-9: dbyar gyi gos ras chen las gyur pa'i ltung byed de brgyang cu dgu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-11: // / bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad las gyur pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4104.1E:238a-13: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' ba bzo mkhan gyi gan du song ste /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-14: yud tsam zhig gtam 'dri bas 'dug nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-15: bzhin bzang bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos gos 'tshem nus sam /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-17: 'phags pa khyed la bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos gos kyis ci bya /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-19: bkren pa khyod la 'dir ci god /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-20: gal te gla 'dod na tshems shig / des bsams pa 'di zer ba ma nyes kyi bdag la 'dir ji gong bdag la bla dgos kyis btsem mo snyam du rig nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-22: des de la ras dang gla byin nas des de btsems so //
T08TD4104.1E:238a-23: nye dags de las cung zhig gyon te /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-24: lhag ma phrag pas khyer te 'phags pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-25: dge slong zhig gis mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-26: gnas brtan gtur bu gzigs shig dang ngal sor gzhug go //
T08TD4104.1E:238a-28: tshe dang ldan pa 'di gtur bu ma yin no //
T08TD4104.1E:238a-30: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos so //
T08TD4104.1E:238a-31: gnas brtan khyod bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos gyon tu rung ngam /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-32: dgra bo dag gi gnya' ba rdog pas mnan nas rung ngo //
T08TD4104.1E:238a-33: gnas brtan la yang dag dgra bo dag yod dam /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-34: je dang bor khyod kho bo'i dgra bo yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-35: des na kho bo bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos gyon pa mi bzod do zhes zer nas /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-36: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir /
T08TD4104.1E:238a-37: dge slong dag bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos gos chang bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4104.1E:238b-0: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis @238b bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4104.1E:238b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
T08TD4104.1E:238b-2: yang dge slong gang bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos gos byed du 'jug gam bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos las lhag par byed du 'jug na ltung byed do //
T08TD4104.1E:238b-3: de la bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:238b-4: srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho bcu zheng du mtho drug ste de la 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad do zhes bca' ba mdzad do //
T08TD4104.1E:238b-7: nyon mongs pa ni bla ma ltar 'chos pa /
T08TD4104.1E:238b-8: nyes pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad dam de bas na lhag pa'i chos gos byed du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:238b-9: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am /
T08TD4104.1E:238b-10: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:238b-11: bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o //
T08TD4104.1E:238b-12: de'i chos gos kyi tshad kyis zhes bya ba ni bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi chad gang yin pa de'i 'o //
T08TD4104.1E:238b-13: chos gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po //
T08TD4104.1E:238b-20: nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4104.1E:238b-21: byed du 'jug gam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan no //
T08TD4104.1E:238b-22: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos las lhag par byed du 'jug na ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:238b-23: gleng gzhi las bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyis chos gos byed du 'jug na ltung byed do zhes 'dul ba las nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad pa dang /
T08TD4104.1E:238b-24: tshe dang ldan pa nye dags lhag par byed du bcug nas /
T08TD4104.1E:238b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4104.1E:238b-26: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la /
T08TD4104.1E:238b-27: 'di ni rjes su bcas pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:238b-28: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos las lhag par byed du 'jug na ltung byed do zhes gsungs pas de'i gong ma'o //
T08TD4104.1E:238b-29: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:238b-30: de la bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:238b-31: srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho bcu zheng du mtho drug ste /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-0: de la 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi @239a * //
T08TD4104.1E:239a-1: tshad do zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-2: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho bcu gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru'i khru bco lnga'o //
T08TD4104.1E:239a-3: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho drug gang yin pa de ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru'i khru dgu'o //
T08TD4104.1E:239a-4: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-5: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad tsam gyi lus med pas /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-6: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad srid du ston pa rang gi ni khru lnga /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-7: tshad dang ldan pa'i ni khru bco lnga /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-8: zheng du ston pa rang gi ni khru gsum /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-9: tshad dang ldan pa'i ni khru dgu ba nyid dam /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-10: de las lhag pa byed dam byed du 'jug na /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-11: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad las gyur pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4104.1E:239a-12: 'di'i byed pa po ni bde bar gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad tsam gyi lus med pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-13: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad dam /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-14: de las lhag pa'i chos gos nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:239a-15: 'di la yan lag bzhis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-16: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku tshad tsam gyi lus med pa nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-17: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad dam /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-18: de las lhag pa'i chos gos nyid dang /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-20: rang ngam bskos pas byas pa nyid do //
T08TD4104.1E:239a-21: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4104.1E:239a-22: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad las gyur pa'i ltung byed de dgu bcu pa'o /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-24: // / tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu po dag bton zin to zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-25: ltung byed 'ba' zhig tu gyur pa rnams gdon pa'i mjug bsdu ba ste /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-26: ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu po dag ces bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-27: sngar bstan pa'i bcu phung dgu po dag go //
T08TD4104.1E:239a-28: bton zin to zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-29: dam bcas pa'i don gyis mjug bsdu ba'i phyir dang /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-30: nyan pa po rnams spro bar byed pa'i phyir smos so //
T08TD4104.1E:239a-31: de la bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag la ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes dri'o //
T08TD4104.1E:239a-32: ji 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du dri'o //
T08TD4104.1E:239a-33: 'di la tshe dang ldan pa dag yongs su dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes bya ba ni ltung byed rnam par gzhag pa bsgrags pa yin te /
T08TD4104.1E:239a-34: de la zhes bya ba ni ltung byed dgu bcu po ston pa de la'o //
T08TD4104.1E:239a-35: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4104.1E:239a-36: ltung byed dag gdon pa bshad zin to /
